A Thousand Faces (DRU).name: 千面万相(德鲁伊)（A Thousand Faces (DRU)）
A Thousand Faces (DRU).description: 13级起，德鲁伊具有任意改变相貌的能力，如同‘变身术’的效果，但使用时必须是原本身形。

A Thousand Faces (SHI).name: 千面万相(变形者)（A Thousand Faces (SHI)）
A Thousand Faces (SHI).description: 18级起，变形者获得任意改变相貌的能力，如同变身术（Alter Self）法术，但使用时必须是原本身形。

AC Bonus (PSY).name: AC加值(异能者)（AC Bonus (PSY)）
AC Bonus (PSY).description: 在不穿甲（unarmored）且未收负重影响（unencumbered）时，你能够将感知加值（若有的话）加到你的AC和CMD上。在对抗接触攻击或者你自己陷入措手不及的状态时，这些加值也能应用在AC上。当你无法行动（immobilized）或陷入无助（helpless）、穿戴护甲、携带盾牌或者负重为中载或重载时，便会失去这些加值。

AC Bonus (BRA).name: AC加值(拳师)（AC Bonus (BRA)）
AC Bonus (BRA).description:
当不着甲，着轻甲也没有过度负重时，拳师在她的的AC与CMD上获得+1闪避加值。在第9级，13级和18级时，这个加值还会额外+1。

  该加值在拳师对抗接触攻击时依然起效。当她行动不能或者无助时拳师将失去此加值。而当拳师穿戴中甲或重甲，或者负重达到中载或重载时都将失去此加值。

AC Bonus (MNK).name: AC加值(武僧)（AC Bonus (MNK)）
AC Bonus (MNK).description: 当不穿甲也没有过度负重时，武僧可以将其感知加值（如果有）加在他的AC与CMD上。另外，4级武僧AC与CMD+1，而之后每4个武僧等级该加值都会再增加1点，直到20级的+5。该加值在武僧对抗接触攻击或者措手不及时依然起效。当他无法动作或者无助时他将失去此加值。而当他穿戴任何盔甲，使用盾牌，或者负重达到中载或重载时都将失去此加值。

AC Bonus (UMK).name: AC加值(掉链僧)（AC Bonus (UMK)）
AC Bonus (UMK).description:
当不穿甲也无过度负重时，武僧可以将其感知加值（如果有）加在他的AC与CMD上。另外，武僧4级时AC与ＣＭＤ+1，而之后每4个武僧等级该加值都会再增加1点，直到20级时的+5。

  该加值在武僧对抗接触攻击或者措手不及时依然起效。当他无法动作时、无助时、穿戴任何护甲、携带盾牌、负重达到中载或重载时都将失去此加值。

Abadar's Boon.name: Abadar's Boon（Abadar's Boon）
Abadar's Boon.description:
You can spend 1 minute meditating on and communing with a masterwork object of any type. At the end of this time, you can speak with that item. This functions as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{石言术}, except that it works with masterwork goods, and the item cannot tell you what it covers or conceals if that question is not applicable to it.

  You can speak with items in this way for a number of minutes equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

Aberrant Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Aberrant Bloodrager Bloodline（Aberrant Bloodrager Bloodline）
Aberrant Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
There is a taint in your blood that is both alien and bizarre. When you bloodrage, this manifests in peculiar and terrifying ways.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{精通擒抱},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}.

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (16th)

Ability Increase (2 pts).name: Ability Increase (2 pts)（Ability Increase (2 pts)）
Ability Increase (2 pts).description:
An eidolon grows larger muscles, gains faster reflexes, achieves greater intelligence, or acquires another increase to one of its abilities. Increase one of the eidolon's ability scores by +2.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. It can only be applied once to an individual ability score, plus 1 additional time for every 6 levels the summoner possesses.

Ability Increase (UC) (2 pts).name: Ability Increase (UC) (2 pts)（Ability Increase (UC) (2 pts)）
Ability Increase (UC) (2 pts).description:
The eidolon grows larger muscles, gains faster reflexes, achieves greater intelligence, or acquires another increase to one of its abilities. Increase one of the eidolon閳ユ獨 ability scores by 2.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. It can be applied only once to an individual ability score, plus one additional time for every 6 levels the summoner possesses.

Ability Score Increase (SPI).name: 属性提升(唤魂师)（Ability Score Increase (SPI)）

Abjuration Resonant School.name: 防护灵器（Abjuration Resonant School）
Abjuration Resonant School.description:
防护灵器关联防御和守护。

  灵器（Implements）：护符、护甲、铃铛、护腕、胸针、披风、圣徽、盾牌。

Abnormal Anatomy.name: Abnormal Anatomy（Abnormal Anatomy）
Abnormal Anatomy.description: At 12th level, your internal anatomy shifts and changes, giving you a 50% chance to negate any critical hit or sneak attack that hits you. The damage is instead rolled normally.

Aboleth Curse.name: Aboleth Curse（Aboleth Curse）
Aboleth Curse.description:
Your mind is marked by aboleth tampering, either as a result of a close encounter with one of these creatures while you were a child, or even through an ancestor, close family member, or one of your sisters or brothers in faith閳ユ敄his associate閳ユ獨 interaction with the aboleths may be all that it takes to infect you. You take a 閳? penalty on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and add @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术} to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

Abominate.name: Abominate（Abominate）
Abominate.description:
The witch transforms a creature within 30 feet into an aberration. This hex acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.t8ei2mrmqg7252vw]{恶意变形术}, except the target is transmuted into a Small, Medium, or Large aberration. The target閳ユ獨 abilities are modified as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6jc9e9qooa4c89vr]{Monstrous Physique IV}.

  Whether or not its save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Abomination Discipline.name: 憎恨境界（Abomination Discipline）
Abomination Discipline.description:
你的精神受到了外部力量的污染。这可能是在你体内流淌着的可怕先祖的血液、或者强大而又未知的精神力量侵入了你的思维。这就像一种精神的疾病一般，感染并侵蚀着你的大脑，创造出和你的正常自我相对的黑暗半身。每当你使用异能者法术（psychic spell）之时，便会唤起这股危险的存在——而它有可能进一步控制住你。这种恶性的影响可能来源于底栖魔鱼（Aboleth）或罗刹（Rakshasas）这样的生物，或者也有可能源自位于繁星之间、身处虚空之中的恶意实体。

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnocwsre2mckj58a]{Excruciating Deformation} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yi0rf7b0v4lev9fl]{Explode Head} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.003tu19dpyoaj0se]{Orb Of The Void}(16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.egbw0mba2cpe3xe5]{Telekinetic Storm} (18th).

Absentia.name: Absentia（Absentia）
Absentia.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0
Prerequisite emptiness

  You are always under the effect of @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} as if you had cast it on yourself. If the effect is dispelled, you can call if forth again as a standard action. You can accept 1 point of burn to grant a creature touched the effects of nondetection.

Absorb Blow.name: 吸收冲击（Absorb Blow）
Absorb Blow.description: 你获得DR/-以及强酸，寒冷，电击，火焰和音波抗力，数值等同于你的通灵者等级的一半。除此之外，将法术牺牲（Paladin's Sacrifice）APG加入你的法术列表，视为二环法术。

Abyssal Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Abyssal Bloodrager Bloodline（Abyssal Bloodrager Bloodline）
Abyssal Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into the essence of your bloodline. While it doesn閳ユ獩 manifest in all of your kin, in those moments when you閳ユ獧e bloodraging, you embody its terrifying presence.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{精通冲撞}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{精通破武}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (16th)

Abyssal Claws.name: Abyssal Claws（Abyssal Claws）
Abyssal Claws.description: At 1st level, you can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to make two claw attacks as a full attack action using your full base attack bonus. These attacks deal 1d4 points of damage each (1d3 if you are Small) plus your Strength modifier. At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR. At 7th level, the damage increases by one step to 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if you are Small). At 11th level, these claws become flaming weapons, each dealing an additional 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit. You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

Acceleration of Form.name: Acceleration of Form（Acceleration of Form）
Acceleration of Form.description: A ninja with this trick can spend 1 ki point as a standard action to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} for 1 round per 2 ninja levels.

Accurate Poisoner.name: Accurate Poisoner（Accurate Poisoner）
Accurate Poisoner.description: A rogue with this talent delivers poisons with deadly precision. When the rogue successfully hits an opponent with a poisoned weapon and would deal sneak attack damage, she can forgo the sneak attack damage and increase the poison閳ユ獨 potency. If she does, the poison閳ユ獨 duration increases by 2 (for example, large scorpion venom lasts for 8 rounds instead of 6 rounds, and drow poison lasts for 4 minutes instead of 2 minutes).

Accursed Curse.name: Accursed Curse（Accursed Curse）
Accursed Curse.description:
You are cursed with misfortune and sorrow, and you cannot gain benefit from morale bonuses. However, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against curse effects.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.2qbdesr0fwtmi9tj]{Brand, Greater} to your list of spells known.

  At 15th level, you are immune to curse effects except for your own oracle curse.

Acid Resistance.name: Acid Resistance（Acid Resistance）
Acid Resistance.description: At 6th level, you gain resist acid 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to acid.

Acrobatic Assist.name: Acrobatic Assist（Acrobatic Assist）
Acrobatic Assist.description: You can expend an attack of opportunity to perform an aid another action to assist an adjacent ally閳ユ獨 Acrobatics check, so long as he makes the check as part of movement that passes through your space or an adjacent space. Additionally, whenever you use the aid another action to assist an ally in making an Acrobatics check and you succeed, your ally gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity caused when he moves out of or within a threatened area, until the end of his turn.

Action Before Thought (UC).name: Action Before Thought (UC)（Action Before Thought (UC)）
Action Before Thought (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points as a free action as part of rolling initiative to roll twice on the initiative check and take the higher result.

  A monk must be at least 6th level before selecting this ki power.

Adumbration.name: Adumbration（Adumbration）
Adumbration.description: At 13th level, shadows move to conceal you. You gain a bonus on Stealth checks equal to half your level. In addition, you can use the Stealth skill even while being observed and without cover or concealment, as long as you are within 10 feet of a shadow other than your own. You gain no benefit from adumbration in areas of bright light.

Advanced Psychic Magic (UC) (3 pts).name: Advanced Psychic Magic (UC) (3 pts)（Advanced Psychic Magic (UC) (3 pts)）
Advanced Psychic Magic (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype; intermediate psychic magic evolution; Charisma 12; summoner level 7th.

  The eidolon gains 5 points of psychic energy that it can spend each day. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{黑暗术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.13pilcgm2oydyogv]{Disfiguring Touch}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fa3oswb6t4drz74g]{Id Insinuation I}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.it1fbobapvnp5swg]{Mind Thrust II}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触}

  The eidolon can cast that spell as a psychic spell by spending 2 points of psychic energy. The caster level and save DC are the same as for basic psychic magic. This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 amount of psychic energy available to spend each day does not stack閳ユ攰t uses only the highest number of points granted by its most powerful psychic magic evolution.

Advanced Slayer Talents.name: Advanced Slayer Talents（Advanced Slayer Talents）
Advanced Slayer Talents.description: At 10th level and every 2 levels thereafter, a slayer can select an advanced talent in place of a slayer talent.

Aegis.name: 御守（Aegis）
Aegis.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点触摸一套护甲或一面盾牌，给予它增强加值。该加值为1+每6秘学士等级1点（最高18级时+4）。本能力给予的增强加值可以与护甲盾牌本身的叠加，但最高不得超过+5。你也可以不直接给予护甲盾牌增强加值而是给予护甲特殊属性，用特殊属性等效增强加值替换你本应给予的增强加值同额数值。在被赋予特殊属性前，目标物必须至少有+1增强加值（来自物品本身或御守能力）。一般而言，该能力的增强加值持续1分钟。

Aeon Subdomain.name: Aeon Subdomain（Aeon Subdomain）
Aeon Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (aeons only)

Aerial Adaptation.name: 适应大气（Aerial Adaptation）
Aerial Adaptation.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你变得免疫高原病（altitude sickness），而且你会获得一定数量的闪电抗力，具体数值等同于当前超载数值的两倍。

Aerial Evasion.name: 避难气流（Aerial Evasion）
Aerial Evasion.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Su）；等级：3；超载：1

  前置：风卷之衣（enveloping winds）

  你能够使用风力推动自己远离区域攻击。直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止，你会获得反射闪避（Evasion），就如同盗贼职业能力一般。

  以太傀儡（Aether Puppet）

  元素：以太；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：5；超载：0

  你使用以太来活化物体。你能够活化一个中型或更小的物体，就如同它是一个不具有构装生物点数（Construction Points）能力的活化物体（animated object；Bestiary 14页）一般，不过如果物体本身是由岩石或金属构成的话，它就可以获得岩石结构（Stone）或者合金体：普通（Metal：common）能力。每轮在你的回合中，你必须使用移动动作来引导物体，否则它就会恢复成无生命的状态。通过承受1点超载，你能够把少量的自我注入到以太傀儡中，使得效果能够持续每个操念使等级1轮，而且无需额外的动作来维持。12级起，你能够活化一个大型或更小的物体，它会获得所有中型活化物体的能力，外加额外攻击（Additional Attack）能力。14级起，你能够活化超大型或更小的物体，它会获得所有大型活化物体的能力。16级起，你能够活化巨型或更小的物体，它会获得所有超大型活化物体的能力，如果物体本身是由秘银（mithral）构成的话，还会获得合金体：秘银（Metal：mithral）能力。18级起，你能够活化一个超巨型或更小的物体，它会获得所有巨型活化物体的能力，如果物体本身是由精金（adamantine）构成的话，还会获得合金体：精金（Metal：adamantine）能力。

Aether Architect.name: Aether Architect（Aether Architect）
Aether Architect.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Su); Level 9; Burn 0

  You can spin a small building, bridge, or other edifice out of aether, and even use aether to tether a building to a flat surface other than the ground. By concentrating for 10 minutes, you can create an edifice out of scintillating aether (same hardness and hit points as a wall of force) as long as the edifice is no larger than one 10-foot cube per kineticist level. Unless the creation is extremely simplistic, you must succeed at a Craft or Knowledge ：工程 check to add embellishments.

  This ability can also create a series of tethers to securely attach a normal building to a vertical surface or even a cavern ceiling. Aether architect lasts as long as you concentrate, and you can accept 1 point of burn to make the effect last until destroyed; by accepting this burn, you can use this ability any number of times in a row to create a larger edifice.

Aether Puppet.name: Aether Puppet（Aether Puppet）
Aether Puppet.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You use strands of aether to animate an object. You can animate a Medium or smaller object as an animated object (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 14) with no Construction Point abilities (except for stone or metal [common], if the object is constructed of one of those materials). Each round on your turn, you must take a move action to guide the object, or it reverts to its inanimate state.

  By accepting 1 point of burn, you can pour a bit of your own sentience into the aether puppet, allowing the effect to persist for 1 round per kineticist level without requiring additional actions.

  At 12th level, you can animate a Large or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Medium animated object plus the additional attack ability.

  At 14th level, you can animate a Huge or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Large animated object.

  At 16th level, you can animate a Gargantuan or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Huge animated object, as well as the metal (mithral) ability if the object is made of mithral.

  At 18th level, you can animate a Colossal or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Gargantuan animated object, plus the metal (adamantine) ability if the object is made of adamantine.

Against the Wall.name: Against the Wall（Against the Wall）
Against the Wall.description: A rogue with this talent is considered to be flanking any opponent adjacent to a stone wall (whether the stone is worked or unworked).

Aggressive Possession.name: Aggressive Possession（Aggressive Possession）
Aggressive Possession.description: At 1st level, you can make a melee touch attack as a standard action. The target must succeed at a Will save or be confused for 1 round. The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Agitating Cognizance.name: Agitating Cognizance（Agitating Cognizance）
Agitating Cognizance.description: Whenever you are not maintaining an altered form via metamorphosis (including the 24 hours normally required to assume a new form), your maximum number of points in your phrenic pool increases by 1.

Agonizing Wound.name: 剧痛之创（Agonizing Wound）
Agonizing Wound.description: 13级起，每当你施放了一个对一个生物造成伤害的法术时，你还会让该名生物惊惧（Frightened）或恶心（sickened），产生何种效果由你选择，持续的轮数等同于你的魅力调整值。若你花费两次该能力的使用次数，则能够让该生物变得晕眩（Dazed）、反胃（Nauseated）、或恐慌（Panicked），持续1轮。该生物能够尝试一次意志豁免检定来使该效果无效。每日能够使用该能力的次数等同于3 + 你的魅力调整值。这是个影响心灵的痛苦UM（Pain）效果。

Agony's Embrace.name: Agony's Embrace（Agony's Embrace）
Agony's Embrace.description:
At 12th level, whenever you閳ユ獧e hit by a critical hit, your morale bonus to Strength from your bloodrage increases by 2 for 1d6 rounds or until your rage ends.

  The bonus to Strength instead increases by 4 at 16th level and by +6 at 20th level.

Ahrimon's Favor.name: Ahrimon's Favor（Ahrimon's Favor）
Ahrimon's Favor.description: At 20th level, you are filled with Ahriman閳ユ獨 wickedness. You gain immunity to fire and poison. You also gain acid resistance 10 and electricity resistance 10, and the ability to see perfectly in darkness of any kind to a range of 60 feet.

Air Cushion.name: 气流缓冲（Air Cushion）
Air Cushion.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  无论从多高的地方落下，你都能够免受伤害。你被视为受到持续性的羽落术（Feather Fall）效果影响，而且在判断你自己会如何受到风力影响时，总是视为你的体型比正常大1级。

Air Lung.name: Air Lung（Air Lung）
Air Lung.description: An alchemist with this discovery has conditioned his body to adapt to life above water. He gains the amphibious special quality. Only an alchemist with the aquatic subtype can select this discovery.

Air Shroud, Greater.name: Air Shroud, Greater（Air Shroud, Greater）
Air Shroud, Greater.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite air shroud

  Your air shroud improves, granting you the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6lqt3ju8m7r5la2]{维生气泡}. When you accept burn to grant the benefit to others, the benefit lasts until the next time your burn is removed.

Air Shroud.name: 空气罩（Air Shroud）
Air Shroud.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你总是被空气所包围，就如同气泡术（Air Bubble；UC）一般。以标准动作，你能够承受1点超载来将该效果延伸至数个额外生物身上，生物数量等同于你的体质调整值，持续时间为每个操念使等级1分钟。

Air Totem, Greater.name: Air Totem, Greater（Air Totem, Greater）
Air Totem, Greater.description: While raging, the barbarian is surrounded by an aura of howling winds. Creatures attempting to cast spells while adjacent to the barbarian must succeed at a concentration check (DC 15 + spell level), and ranged attack rolls against the barbarian take a 閳? penalty. Creatures smaller than the barbarian that attack the barbarian in melee with a natural weapon or touch attack must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier) or the attack fails and the creature is flung back 5 feet and knocked prone. The barbarian can suspend this aura as a free action.

Air Totem.name: Air Totem（Air Totem）
Air Totem.description: Once per rage, the barbarian can move for 1 round as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.e4v1uv8hexeu9sxj]{凌空而行}.

Air's Leap.name: 空气跃动（Air's Leap）
Air's Leap.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Su）；等级：1；超载：0

  当你跳跃时，总是被视为已经进行了助跑，所有用于跳跃的特技动作检定都会获得等同于你的操念使等级的加值，你的跳高或跳远距离总是检定结果所显示的两倍，当你跳跃时可以承受1点超载来使得跳跃距离再次加倍（总计为四倍距离）。

Air's Reach.name: 大气延伸（Air's Reach）
Air's Reach.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Su）；等级：1；超载：－

  当你使用突风（air blasts）、气系原力、或者包含气元素的复合念袭时，念袭的有效范围（effective range）会加倍。该效果会在诸如增距（extended range）注能之类的效果调整范围之后再生效。这种范围加倍只会增加念袭的有效距离，不会对云形（cloud）和气旋（cyclone）这样产生区域效果的注能生效。

Alchemy Subdomain.name: Alchemy Subdomain（Alchemy Subdomain）
Alchemy Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2nd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.ll1ut0nx5em2uegh]{Touch Injection}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sxtpslsxy4yn66tg]{增效灵药}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.loah8i0n6li2o377]{即效延迟剂}

Alien Consciousness (UC) (3 pts).name: Alien Consciousness (UC) (3 pts)（Alien Consciousness (UC) (3 pts)）
Alien Consciousness (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant or protean subtype; summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 mind is dangerously incomprehensible to mortals who contact it. Nonaberrations that read the eidolon閳ユ獨 mind or make mental contact with it take 1d4 points of Wisdom damage (or 1d8 points of sanity damage, if you use the sanity rules from Horror Adventures). This contact also includes communication via telepathy閳ユ攣n eidolon that has telepathic capability must initiate this particular contact as a swift action against a single target in order to force its alien consciousness on another creature. A successful Will saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 HD + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier) halves the damage. Once a creature has been subjected to the eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness, it is immune to further damage from that eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness for 24 hours.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 summoner is immune to his own eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness, but he can still be affected by other eidolons閳?alien consciousnesses. This is a mind-affecting effect.

Alien Summons.name: Alien Summons（Alien Summons）
Alien Summons.description: Whenever the shaman calls or summons one or more creatures, one creature of her choice arrives with the advanced creature simple template. The creature presents a distorted mockery of the usual creature summoned, its body deformed and alien in nature. This chosen creature閳ユ獨 anatomy is so confounding that it is immune to the additional damage from critical hits or precision damage (such as that granted by sneak attack).

Aligned Disguise.name: Aligned Disguise（Aligned Disguise）
Aligned Disguise.description: When a rogue with this talent uses the @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} spell-like ability, she can also alter her alignment aura to deceive spells that discern alignment (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{侦测邪恶}) for the duration of the disguise self effect. She can choose to detect as any specific alignment, or to detect as no alignment at all. This ability does not protect against spells or effects that cause harm based on alignment. The rogue must have disguise self as a spell-like ability before choosing this talent.

Aligned Sneak Attack.name: Aligned Sneak Attack（Aligned Sneak Attack）
Aligned Sneak Attack.description: When making a sneak attack against a creature that has damage reduction that can be overcome by weapons of a particular alignment (such as DR 5/good), the rogue閳ユ獨 attack reduces that damage reduction by an amount equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled until the end of the rogue閳ユ獨 turn.

Alignment Smite.name: Alignment Smite（Alignment Smite）
Alignment Smite.description:
Choose a single alignment component that opposes one of the summoner閳ユ獨 own. Once per day as a swift action, the eidolon chooses one target within sight. If this target閳ユ獨 alignment matches that chosen for this ability, the eidolon deals an additional +1d6 points of damage with one of its natural weapons. This attack is treated as good-aligned for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction. The alignment smite persists until the target is dead or the eidolon is dismissed.

  At 10th level, the summoner may spend 1 additional evolution point to allow the eidolon a second daily use of this ability.

  The summoner must be at least 5th level before selecting this evolution. Evil or true neutral summoners cannot select this evolution.

All the Stars in the Sky.name: All the Stars in the Sky（All the Stars in the Sky）
All the Stars in the Sky.description: Certain master ninjas possess a seemingly limitless supply of their trusted weapons. Whenever a ninja with this trick buys a set of 50 identical magic shuriken, she thereafter replenishes them at no cost and never runs out. This stock of magical shuriken can be upgraded as though it were a normal magic weapon, and shuriken upgraded this way likewise never run out.

Allay Reason.name: Allay Reason（Allay Reason）
Allay Reason.description: The subject of this trick gains DR 15/閳?against one attack that deals nonlethal damage. The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject is hit with an attack that deals nonlethal damage.

Allure (Stare).name: 诱引（Allure (Stare)）
Allure (Stare).description: 催眠注视的减值还能应用至先攻检定以及察觉检定上。

Always Prepared.name: Always Prepared（Always Prepared）
Always Prepared.description:
The vigilante can set aside resources to plan for future contingencies. The vigilante gains the Brilliant Planner feat except he can spend up to 100 gp per character level for his brilliant plan fund and only requires 1 minute to enact his brilliant plan. In addition, while in a settlement for at least 1 week, he can spend 24 hours and up to 500 gp per character level to create a stash somewhere within the settlement.

  Once per day, the vigilante can take 1 hour to retrieve a stash, retrieving any number of items that would have been available in a settlement he visited at the time of making the stash, regardless of the weight of the items. Once he retrieves a stash in this way, he subtracts the price of the items from the stash閳ユ獨 value and the stash is exhausted and lost, regardless if he used the full value of the stash.

  The vigilante can maintain any number of stashes, but a stash is lost if he does not spend 1 hour to maintain the stash at least once per month. A vigilante閳ユ獨 stash is well-hidden and only the vigilante knows the location of a stash he creates.

Ambuscading Grapple.name: Ambuscading Grapple（Ambuscading Grapple）
Ambuscading Grapple.description: When a rogue with this talent succeeds at a combat maneuver check to grapple an unaware opponent, she can immediately deal her sneak attack damage to the target. This counts as having hit with a sneak attack for the purpose of other abilities and talents.

Ambush Subdomain.name: Ambush Subdomain（Ambush Subdomain）
Ambush Subdomain.description:
替代神授力量 Note: Only creatures with the Kobold Faith trait can take this subdomain.

  替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nee6cxpoekp3aklq]{魔法警报}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7c0l64pfdkgl7j5y]{幻墙术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱}

Ameliorating.name: Ameliorating（Ameliorating）
Ameliorating.description:
The witch can touch a creature to suppress or protect it from negative conditions. The witch chooses one of the following conditions each time she uses this hex: dazzled, fatigued, shaken, or sickened. If the target is or later becomes afflicted with the chosen condition, that condition is suppressed for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level.

  Alternatively, the witch can grant her target a +4 circumstance bonus on saving throws against effects that cause any two of the listed conditions (which condition is always the witch閳ユ獨 choice) for 24 hours.

  Once a creature has benefited from this hex, it cannot benefit from the hex again for 24 hours.

Amorphous (UC) (4 pts).name: Amorphous (UC) (4 pts)（Amorphous (UC) (4 pts)）
Amorphous (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant or elemental subtype; summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 biology lacks discernible weak points. It is not subject to critical hits and sneak attacks.

Amorphous Anatomy.name: Amorphous Anatomy（Amorphous Anatomy）
Amorphous Anatomy.description: At 20th level, your vital organs shift position, and as a rule they are constantly changing their shape and size to best protect you. You gain immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks. In addition, you gain blindsight with a range of 60 feet and damage reduction 5/閳? You automatically recover from physical blindness or deafness after 1 round by growing new sensory organs to replace the compromised ones; you cannot otherwise regenerate lost body parts.

Anarchic Bomb.name: Anarchic Bomb（Anarchic Bomb）
Anarchic Bomb.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal chaotic divine damage. Lawful creatures that take a direct hit from an anarchic bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against neutral creatures, anarchic bombs deal half damage, and such targets are not affected by their staggering effect. Anarchic bombs have no effect on chaotic-aligned creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

Anathema.name: Anathema（Anathema）
Anathema.description:
When an investigator creates or prepares a poison, including poisons derived from racial or class abilities, he can spend one use of inspiration to create an anathema instead. Anathemas count as poisons, but they can affect creatures that are normally immune to poison, as they exploit vulnerabilities in their very nature rather than their biology. When an anathema is created, select a creature type (and subtype, if applicable) from the ranger favored enemy list; the anathema functions only against this chosen type. The investigator also chooses one of the following special abilities for the anathema to affect: damage reduction (except DR/閳?, energy resistance (one type chosen by the investigator), fast healing, movement speed, or spell resistance.

The method of delivery (contact, ingested, inhaled, or injury) and the DC of the anathema閳ユ獨 save are identical to those of the poison used to make the anathema. If the target fails its save against the anathema (even if the enemy is normally immune to effects that require a specific save, such as undead閳ユ獨 immunity to effects that require a Fortitude save), the value of the chosen ability is lowered by 5 (minimum 0) for 1 round per investigator level.

Ancestor Totem, Greater.name: Ancestor Totem, Greater（Ancestor Totem, Greater）
Ancestor Totem, Greater.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 insight bonus to her chosen skill increases to +6. Once per rage, she can spend one round of rage as an immediate action to reroll a skill check in the chosen skill. She must take the result of the second roll, even if it is lower.

  A barbarian must have the ancestor totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

Ancestor Totem, Lesser.name: Ancestor Totem, Lesser（Ancestor Totem, Lesser）
Ancestor Totem, Lesser.description: When she enters a rage, the barbarian selects a skill of her choice, which must be one she can use while raging, such as Climb or Intimidate. While raging, she gains a +2 insight bonus to the chosen skill.

Ancestor Totem.name: Ancestor Totem（Ancestor Totem）
Ancestor Totem.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 insight bonus to her chosen skill increases to +4. The barbarian can now select any skill to receive this bonus, even a Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skill or a skill that requires patience or concentration; if she selects such a skill, she can use it even while raging.

  A barbarian must have the lesser ancestor totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Ancestor's Council.name: Ancestor's Council（Ancestor's Council）
Ancestor's Council.description:
As a standard action the shaman can call upon her ancestors to provide advice and assistance to one ally within 30 feet. The ally gains a +2 bonus on any attack roll, saving throw, ability check, or skill check made before the beginning of the shaman閳ユ獨 next turn.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma bonus.

Ancestors Spirit Manifestation.name: Ancestors Spirit Manifestation（Ancestors Spirit Manifestation）
Ancestors Spirit Manifestation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes one with the spirits of her ancestors. She gains a bonus on Will saving throws equal to her Charisma modifier, blindsense out to a range of 60 feet, and a +4 bonus to her caster level for all divination spells. She can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} as a spell-like ability once per day without requiring material components.

Ancestors Spirit.name: Ancestors Spirit（Ancestors Spirit）
Ancestors Spirit.description:
A shaman that selects the ancestors spirit has wise eyes and thick white or silver hair. Fine wrinkles line the shaman閳ユ獨 face, becoming more obvious when she smiles or glowers. When she calls upon one of this spirit閳ユ獨 abilities, her hair glows as though lit from within, rustling of its own accord.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{灵能武器} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{灵能盟友} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3lfx1ccxo2hdqrf3]{心灵遥控} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (9th)

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal has streaks of gray or silver hide, hair, or fur, and long facial hair that appears similar to a wispy mustache or bushy eyebrows. The spirit animal can speak and understand a number of bonus languages equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma bonus.

Ancestral Blessing.name: Ancestral Blessing（Ancestral Blessing）
Ancestral Blessing.description:
The shaman can grant the blessings of her ancestors to any ally within 30 feet. The blessed creature receives a +1 competence bonus on attack and damage rolls. This blessing lasts until the blessed creature hits with an attack or deals damage to a target. The shaman can have only one ancestral blessing active at a time. If the shaman uses this ability again, the previous blessing immediately ends.

  At 8th level and 16th level, the bonuses provided by this blessing increase by 1.

Ancestral Champion.name: Ancestral Champion（Ancestral Champion）
Ancestral Champion.description: At 12th level, when your ancestral strikes target a creature whose alignment is opposite to the type of damage the strikes deal, your ancestral strikes instead deal 2d6 additional points of damage of that type.

Ancestral Enlightenment.name: Ancestral Enlightenment（Ancestral Enlightenment）
Ancestral Enlightenment.description:
The vigilante can attempt any Knowledge check untrained. If he already has ranks in a particular Knowledge skill, he gains a +4 bonus on checks with that skill.

  A vigilante must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Ancestral Guardian.name: Ancestral Guardian（Ancestral Guardian）
Ancestral Guardian.description: The shaman can call on the ancient allies of her ancestors to physically appear and assist her, even if they have moved on to new roles in the cosmos. Once per day as a standard action, the shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友}. Although there is no cost to use the spelllike ability, the planar ally demands payment for services it performs as normal for the spell.

Ancestral Strikes.name: Ancestral Strikes（Ancestral Strikes）
Ancestral Strikes.description:
At 1st level, three times per day as a swift action, you can imbue your melee attacks with a measure of your ancestor閳ユ獨 power. For 1 round, your melee attacks deal 1d6 additional points of good-aligned damage if you are good, or they deal 1d6 additional points of evil-aligned damage if you are evil. If you are neutral, you must choose which type of damage this ability deals when you choose this bloodline, and the decision cannot be changed later.

  At 8th level, you can use this ability up to five times per day.

  At 20th level, all your melee attacks deal this additional damage, and you don閳ユ獩 need to activate this ability.

Ancient Tactics.name: Ancient Tactics（Ancient Tactics）
Ancient Tactics.description: At 4th level, while you are bloodraging, whenever you or an ally within 30 feet of you would gain a bonus on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield position (such as flanking or cover), that bonus is increased by 1. Allies must be able to see and hear you to gain this bonus. You can expend a spell slot as an immediate action to further increase this bonus by 1 per level of the spell slot expended until the beginning of your next turn.

Anguish Bomb.name: Anguish Bomb（Anguish Bomb）
Anguish Bomb.description: You can throw bombs infused with psychic trauma. This discovery allows other alchemists to duplicate the anguish bombs used by mnemostillers.

Animal Fury, Greater.name: Animal Fury, Greater（Animal Fury, Greater）
Animal Fury, Greater.description:
This power works as animal fury, but the barbarian閳ユ獨 bite attack deals damage as if she were one size larger.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power to select this rage power.

Animal Mastery.name: Animal Mastery（Animal Mastery）
Animal Mastery.description:
As a standard action, you can project your mind into the mind of an animal you can see, establishing a mental link that allows you to share the animal閳ユ獨 senses閳ユ攬earing, seeing, smelling, tasting, and touching everything the animal does. You cannot use this ability on an animal if its Hit Dice exceed your psychic level. The animal can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If it is successful, the animal is immune to this ability for 24 hours. While sharing an animal閳ユ獨 senses, your body is effectively unconscious, but you can end the effect as a free action.

  You can maintain the link for 1 hour per level, but the link is immediately severed if the animal moves beyond a range of 1 mile per psychic level you have.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 7th level, the mental link becomes stronger. Whenever you share an animal閳ユ獨 senses, you can control it, as per dominate animal, except the duration, Hit Dice limit, range, and other conditions listed above apply.

Animal Patron.name: Animal Patron（Animal Patron）
Animal Patron.description:
The vigilante gains the benefits of one minor shifter aspect for a number of minutes per day equal to 1 + half his vigilante level. He can shift into this minor aspect as a swift action.

  The vigilante must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Animal Servant.name: Animal Servant（Animal Servant）
Animal Servant.description:
The witch can use this hex to turn a humanoid enemy into an animal and rob it of its free will. The transformation works as @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II} and is negated by a successful Will save. The transformed creature retains its Intelligence score and known languages, if any, but the witch controls its mind. This effect functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物}, except the creature does not receive further saving throws to resist the hex.

  The effect can be removed only with wish or similar magic, although slaying the witch also ends the effect.

  Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Animal Skin.name: Animal Skin（Animal Skin）
Animal Skin.description: The witch can become any animal of a size from Tiny to Large whose skin she wears. This ability is similar to @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II}, except she takes on the appearance of the specific individual from which the skin came.

Animate Servant.name: Animate Servant（Animate Servant）
Animate Servant.description:
At 8th level, as a standard action, you can give life to inanimate objects. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k9iu3d82hlo7coct]{活化物体} using your cleric level as the caster level. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

Animate Trees.name: Animate Trees（Animate Trees）
Animate Trees.description:
At 13th level, you can animate a tree within 180 feet as a standard action. This functions as a treant閳ユ獨 animate trees ability, with the following exceptions.

  Each day, you can animate a number of trees equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier, and you can control up to one tree at a time, plus an additional tree at 15th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

  A tree remains animated for 10 minutes per level, or until dismissed by you or destroyed.

Any Guise.name: 一人千面（Any Guise）
Any Guise.description: 侠客可以通过他的千幻社交天赋伪装成任何一个特定的人，即使是像国王或大主教这样的知名人物也可以。除此之外，如果侠客所伪装成的能够人物通常不会被魔法手段探知到（比如这个人其实已经死了，或是被回避预言系法术的效果所保护），那么这个法术会将探知者指向侠客本身。侠客必须达到17级并且拥有千幻社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Apocalypse Final Revelation.name: Apocalypse Final Revelation（Apocalypse Final Revelation）
Apocalypse Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a herald of the apocalypse and wield the awesome power to fulf ill such prophecy. Anytime you successfully cast a spell or use an ability that bestows 1 or more negative levels, the effect bestows 1d4 additional negative levels. Whenever you confirm a critical hit against a creature (including with a melee, ranged, or spell attack), as a swift action you can curse the target of your attack, as the bestow curse spell, except the target doesn閳ユ獩 receive a Will saving throw to negate the effects and spell resistance does not apply against this ability.

Apocalypse Mystery.name: Apocalypse Mystery（Apocalypse Mystery）
Apocalypse Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the apocalypse mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Survival, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1hjxxr3k62rcpb5c]{观命术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vxi9c3xwa83xthka]{飞虫走兽} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4ywdvsm1oty8blq]{爆裂符文} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdp0mts5razk0qms]{疫病虫群} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3a162m66toj22fpa]{死亡法阵} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.iq0as5470o8q9y39]{焚云术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (18th).

Aquatic Action.name: Aquatic Action（Aquatic Action）
Aquatic Action.description:
The vigilante uses weapons, natural weapons, and unarmed strikes in aquatic environments as though under the effect of freedom of movement, including when making melee attacks against targets in the water while the vigilante is on land. The vigilante ignores limitations and penalties on ranged attacks, including thrown weapons, imposed by being underwater for the first 15 feet. (See Underwater Combat on page 432 of the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook for more information.)

  A vigilante must be at least 8th level to select this talent.

Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline（Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline）
Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The anger in your blood rises from the ocean depths, seeded by descent from undersea empires, creeping ichthyic infiltrators into remote seaside villages, or something deeper still.

奖励专长：

  • Aquadynamic Focus,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Fly),
  • Steam Spell
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.478jgozgfbt20u0q]{水流爆发} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位} (16th)

Arcane Ambush.name: Arcane Ambush（Arcane Ambush）
Arcane Ambush.description: At 9th level, as a swift action, you can expend a spell slot in order to grant you and your allies a bonus on attack and damage rolls. This bonus lasts 1 round, is equal to the level of the spell expended, and only applies to opponents your allies are flanking or opponents denied their Dexterity bonus against your allies. You grant this bonus to yourself plus up to one ally for every four sorcerer levels you possess (to a maximum of five allies at 20th level). The allies must be within 30 feet of you and you must have line of effect to each affected ally.

Arcane Backfire.name: Arcane Backfire（Arcane Backfire）
Arcane Backfire.description: When a ninja with this trick successfully attacks a creature that is holding a magic item that has a number of charges or uses per day, she can attempt a Use Magic Device check (DC = 20 + the item閳ユ獨 CL) to cause the item to lose either one daily use or a number of charges equal to the number of the ninja閳ユ獨 sneak attack dice.

Arcane Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Arcane Bloodrager Bloodline（Arcane Bloodrager Bloodline）
Arcane Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
While others of your kin may be powerful wizards and sorcerers, the eldritch nature of the blood coursing through your veins transforms you into a spell-breaking terror.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QaMwiDFQdDwycTUO]{扰法者}*
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.yE3hVOvBq9rx6TAw]{破法者}*.

  (Your bloodrager levels count as fighter levels for the purposes of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*].) This stacks with any levels in fighter you have.

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{魔法飞弹} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{闪电束} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (16th)

Arcane Bond (SOR).name: 奥术联结(术士)（Arcane Bond (SOR)）
Arcane Bond (SOR).description: 1级开始，你获得一个奥术联结，等同于同级的法师。你的术士等级与你的法师等级累加来决定魔宠或者联结物品的能力。

Arcane Crafter Susbchool.name: Arcane Crafter Susbchool（Arcane Crafter Susbchool）
Arcane Crafter Susbchool.description:
An Arcane crafter is one of the builders of the arcane world, assembling magic items with facility, skill, and power. He is intimately familiar with the craft and practice of imbuing items with arcane power, and works with precision even early in his career to help create some of the most powerful magic items.

  相关学派： Universalist.

  替代神授力量 This subschool replaces the hand of the apprentice power of the universalist school.

Arcane Discovery Exploit.name: Arcane Discovery Exploit（Arcane Discovery Exploit）
Arcane Discovery Exploit.description: An arcanist who selects this arcanist exploit learns an arcane discovery. When she learns an arcane discovery, her level must be high enough for her to qualify for that discovery, using half her arcanist level as her wizard level to determine whether she qualifies. The effects of any arcane discovery that she selects with this exploit apply only to arcanist spells that she casts, not to wizard spells, and she cannot select an arcane discovery in place of a feat (unless she also has wizard levels, in which case the discovery applies only to her wizard spells).

Arcane Hypothesis.name: Arcane Hypothesis（Arcane Hypothesis）
Arcane Hypothesis.description: At 20th level, your body surges with arcane power. You can add any metamagic feats that you know to your spells without increasing their casting time, although you must still expend higher-level spell slots. Whenever you use magic items that require charges, you can instead expend spell slots to power the item. For every three levels of spell slots that you expend, you consume one less charge when using a magic item that expends charges.

Arcane Surge.name: 奥法奔涌（Arcane Surge）
Arcane Surge.description: 当通灵者做施放一个通灵者法术时，他可以借助英灵的力量，以增加1点共鸣为代价不消耗任何法术位，并且当他这么做时，这个法术的DC+1。通灵师无法为奥法奔涌的法术添加超魔。

Archmage Arcana.name: 大法师魔术（Archmage Arcana）
Archmage Arcana.description: 你并不使用你这个等级的通灵者的每日法术来施法，而是使用Mesmerist的每日法术数量。每当你降灵大法师时，你在每个法术环位上（包括0环）都获得一个来自法师/术士法术列表的法术，视为它们在通灵者法术列表内，直到大法师英灵离去为止。当你施放这些法术时它们视为奥术魔法（但不能被用于满足其他能力的先决条件），并且你必须能够执行语言和姿势成分，而非情绪成分（Emotion，见本书）来施放这些法术。

Archmage Spirit.name: 大法师英灵（Archmage Spirit）
Archmage Spirit.description:
大法师英灵拥有丰富的学识和变幻无穷的奥法力量

  英灵同调：每当你降灵大法师时，你在专注检定，智力检定和基于智力的技能检定上获得加值。

  降灵奖励：你的伤害性法术在对目标造成伤害时，要比它们的普通版本对每一个目标额外增加2点伤害。

  偏好降灵区域：奥法堡垒，拥有异常魔法波动的地区，图书馆，学院。

  共鸣惩罚：你的躯体变得病弱无力，如同你是一个老朽的学者一般。你在力量检定，基于力量的技能检定，体质检定，攻击检定和非法术的伤害投骰上承受相当于你的英灵同调加值数量的减值。

  禁忌：选择下列禁忌之一：

  -你讨厌神棍和他们的神，你无法自愿成为神术或神授能力的目标，即使是无害的神术也会要求你进行豁免检定。

  -你不能拒绝摆在你面前的任何学习新的深奥的知识(需要进行DC20或更高的知识检定的情景)的机会。

  -你必须用魔法解决任何挑战，即使非魔法手段要简单的多。

Aristocracy Subdomain.name: Aristocracy Subdomain（Aristocracy Subdomain）
Aristocracy Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nznqmwpavfediten]{意识投影}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

Armor Piercer.name: Armor Piercer（Armor Piercer）
Armor Piercer.description: A rogue with this talent can cause her sneak attacks to pierce through natural armor. When she hits with an attack that deals sneak attack damage, she can forgo one or more of her sneak attack dice to reduce the target閳ユ獨 natural armor bonus by that amount (minimum natural armor bonus of +0) until the end of her next turn. A creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 1 minute.

Armor Ripper.name: Armor Ripper（Armor Ripper）
Armor Ripper.description: While raging, you gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks made to sunder with any of your natural attacks.

Armor Skin.name: 着甲如肤（Armor Skin）
Armor Skin.description: 侠客的铠甲在他身上如同第二层皮肤一般自然，他可以忽略因为穿戴中甲和轻甲而在特技动作，逃脱术和潜行技能上承受的护甲减值（其他技能仍然正常承受护甲减值）。在8级时，侠客的移动速度不再因为穿戴中甲而降低。

Armor of Chains.name: Armor of Chains（Armor of Chains）
Armor of Chains.description:
At 8th level, you gain resistance 5 to cold and the chains covering your body provide a +4 armor bonus to AC with no armor check penalty, maximum Dexterity bonus, or additional weight.

  At 16th level, the resistance increases to 10 and the armor bonus increases to +8.

Armored Marauder.name: Armored Marauder（Armored Marauder）
Armored Marauder.description:
Some elite slayers exchange leather and chain for plate when stalking prey. A slayer with this talent gains proficiency with heavy armor.

  In addition, the armor check penalty of any heavy armor the slayer wears is reduced by 1 for every 6 class levels he has.

Armored Mind.name: Armored Mind（Armored Mind）
Armored Mind.description:
While you are wearing Hellknight plate or a signifer mask, you gain a +2 bonus on Will saving throws to resist mind-affecting effects. Once per day at 7th level, you can reroll a Will saving throw against a mind-affecting effect and choose the more favorable result.

  At 11th level, the bonus on Will saving throws increases to +4.

Armored Swiftness.name: Armored Swiftness（Armored Swiftness）
Armored Swiftness.description:
In time, the heaviest armor can become like a second skin. A slayer with this talent can move at full speed in heavy armor. In addition, the maximum Dexterity bonus of heavy armor the slayer wears increases by 1 for every 6 class levels he has.

  A slayer must have the armored marauder slayer talent to select this talent.

Army of Darkness.name: Army of Darkness（Army of Darkness）
Army of Darkness.description: Whenever you cast a summon monster spell and summon a creature that normally has the celestial or fiendish template, you can instead summon it with the shadow creature template (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4 238). This revelation counts as having the @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻} (conjuration) feat for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Augment Summoning feat, as well as any feat that lists Augment Summoning as a prerequisite.

Aromatic Extract.name: Aromatic Extract（Aromatic Extract）
Aromatic Extract.description:
The alchemist creates an inhaled version of an extract that is shared among multiple creatures. He must decide that an extract is an aromatic extract when he makes it. When used, the extract grants its benefit to all creatures within a 10-foot spread of the extract. The aromatic extract is treated as having the minimum caster level required for the original extract. An aromatic extract expends one of the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily extracts as if it were an extract 2 levels higher. This discovery can be applied only to extracts with a range of touch.

  An alchemist must be at least 10th level and must have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

Arrest the Flow.name: Arrest the Flow（Arrest the Flow）
Arrest the Flow.description: At 15th level, once per day as an immediate action, you can attune yourself to the Astral閳ユ獨 timeless nature to halt the effects of one condition or affliction (such as paralyzed, stunned, a poison, or a curse), including permanent and instantaneous conditions, until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability even when a condition or affliction would normally prevent you from doing so, regardless of whether you閳ユ獧e targeting that prevention effect閳ユ獨 source. At the end of your next turn the condition or affliction resumes its normal effect and the round delayed by this ability does not count toward the condition or affliction閳ユ獨 duration. This ability has no effect on hit point damage, ability damage, or the dead condition. Alternatively, you can use this ability to extend the duration of any one effect affecting you until the end of your next turn; this does not extend the duration for any other creatures under the effect. At 19th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

Arson Subdomain.name: Arson Subdomain（Arson Subdomain）
Arson Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{延迟爆裂火球}

Aryzul's Curse.name: Aryzul's Curse（Aryzul's Curse）
Aryzul's Curse.description: When raging, the barbarian emanates a 5-foot-radius aura of radioactivity. Each round that another creature begins its turn within this aura, it takes a cumulative 閳? penalty to Strength (Fortitude negates, DC = 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + her Constitution modifier) for the duration of the rage. A creature閳ユ獨 Strength penalty from this ability cannot exceed the barbarian閳ユ獨 class level. At 12th level, the barbarian can choose to create a 10-foot-radius aura of radioactivity when she begins her rage.

Ash Cloud.name: Ash Cloud（Ash Cloud）
Ash Cloud.description:
As a standard action, you can surround yourself with a 10-foot-radius cloud of ash, which functions as an obscuring mist spell, except you can see through it clearly. The cloud is stationary, and remains for 1 round per oracle level. Using this ability again causes your previous cloud to fall to the ground.

  At 7th level, your ash cloud fills with embers. All creatures in the cloud except you take 1d6 points of fire damage per round and must succeed at Fortitude saves to avoid choking, as though they were breathing in heavy smoke (Core Rulebook 444).

Ask the Spirits.name: 询问英灵（Ask the Spirits）
Ask the Spirits.description: 在13级时，通灵者可以随意将自己的意识投射到星界，向居住在那里的精魂存在询问一些问题。本能力相当于使用法术异界探知联络星界，并且通灵师在使用本能力时可以自动在避免智力与魅力值降低的智力检定上成功。

Asmodeus's Boon.name: Asmodeus's Boon（Asmodeus's Boon）
Asmodeus's Boon.description: Whenever a creature fails a saving throw and takes damage from one of your spells, it is shaken for a number of rounds equal to the spell閳ユ獨 level. Spells that do not allow saves do not cause creatures to become shaken. This does not stack with other fear effects.

Aspexia's Mysticism.name: Aspexia's Mysticism（Aspexia's Mysticism）
Aspexia's Mysticism.description: The rogue has been trained in a minor occult technique. The rogue gains Psychic Sensitivity as a bonus feat.

Assume Control.name: Assume Control（Assume Control）
Assume Control.description:
At 1st level, you can attempt to gain control over a summoned creature by disrupting the bond between it and the caster who summoned it. You must make a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) equal to 10 + the summoning caster閳ユ獨 level. If you know the summoned creature閳ユ獨 name, you receive a +2 circumstance bonus on the check. If the check is successful, you can control the summoned creature as if you had summoned it for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1 round). This does not increase the duration of the original summoning. The original summoning caster can attempt to regain control of the summoned creature as a standard action by making a caster level check against your caster level + 10. When your control ends, the creature reverts to the control of its summoner.

  At 9th level, you can use this ability to bargain with called creatures as if you were the caster who conjured them. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Assumed Form.name: Assumed Form（Assumed Form）
Assumed Form.description:
You can change your appearance at will, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} with a caster level equal to your oracle level.

  At 7th level, you can choose to actually transform, which works the same way but counts as a polymorph effect instead of an illusion and doesn閳ユ獩 allow a Will save to disbelieve.

  At 11th level, the ability lasts until you dismiss it or use it again, allowing you to even keep it active while you sleep.

  At 15th level, when you use this ability as a polymorph effect, you can gain the size bonus to your ability scores and additional racial abilities as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}.

Astounding Avoidance.name: 惊奇回避（Astounding Avoidance）
Astounding Avoidance.description: 受术者能回避来自魔法和非常规攻击的伤害。当受术者尝试一次豁免检定来对抗一个攻击或法术时，而且在豁免成功时可以将伤害减半的话，催眠师能够在受术者投掷豁免之前触发该项诡计。若受术者豁免成功，那么她就不会受到伤害。若催眠师的等级为12级或更高的话，受术者在豁免失败时也仅会受到一半伤害。该诡计不会与反射闪避（Evasion）或坚定（Stalwart）职业能力叠加。

Astral Beacon.name: 星界灯塔（Astral Beacon）
Astral Beacon.description: 在20级时，通灵者成为了联通星界的道标，精魂存在可以轻易察觉他的呼唤。以一个自由动作，通灵者可以立刻招来他并未降灵的其他五个职阶的英灵之一为自己效命，这个效果持续1轮，并且通灵者可以使用该英灵的中等，高等和至高英灵之力。和三重降灵招来的临时英灵不同，这个能力招来的英灵会在通灵者使用它的能力时和通灵者产生共鸣，这些临时产生的共鸣会存在到通灵者降灵第一英灵后24小时。另外，这个能力招来的英灵如果和通灵者产生共鸣，这些共鸣将会存在于通灵者和第二英灵之间，而非堆积在第一英灵和他之间。

Astral Bloodline.name: Astral Bloodline（Astral Bloodline）
Astral Bloodline.description:
Whether you were raised on the Astral Plane, had an ancestor with a strong connection to the Astral, or simply had a freak brush with an astral conduit in your youth, you have an unusual connection to both time and space. Your senses extend through the Astral Plane to the far reaches of the multiverse, allowing you to perceive and manipulate the timeless potential that binds the multiverse together. Your ancestors may have also held a connection to one of the astral isles or conduits, or like you, may have plied this cosmic ocean閳ユ攣nd some may even survive there to this day.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{克敌机先} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{虚假生命} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7tmsbg37zr1q382]{时之沙} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ni93l43asrq29ytd]{游荡星尘} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{魔法恒定术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4br9puuneexco5hx]{触发术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wniqskqkk0cubu9u]{创造半位面} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.HVu9JzllWoLzKKqH]{锻造戒指},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：位面),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{武器娴熟}.

  血统奥秘: When you cast a spell, you can choose to enhance the next spell you cast before the end of your next turn, increasing the enhanced spell閳ユ獨 saving throw DC by 1. The level of the enhanced spell must be lower than that of the spell used to activate this ability.

Astral Caravan.name: Astral Caravan（Astral Caravan）
Astral Caravan.description:
As a full-round action, you can step into the planar border where the Astral Plane abuts the Material Plane, pulling up to one additional person per class level with you. You can閳ユ獩 travel fully into the Astral Plane or any of the other planes it borders, but while using this ability you can cover incredible distances, traversing 50 miles per hour, as per the shadow walk spell.

  You can travel for up to 1 hour per day per oracle level. This duration need not be continuous, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.

Astral Journey.name: 星界漫游（Astral Journey）
Astral Journey.description: 在14级时，通灵者可以进入一种休眠状态，同时将自己的化身传送到星界，相当于法术星界投射的效果，但他只能投射自己一个人。通灵者无法以此能力到达其他位面，也不能携带任何非魔法物品与自己一同进入星界。

Astral Voyager.name: Astral Voyager（Astral Voyager）
Astral Voyager.description: At 9th level, you can send your consciousness to the Astral Plane once per day. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk8l7i27fhfic3c1]{Astral Projection, Lesser} and allows you to bring with you up to one additional willing creature for every 2 sorcerer levels you have. At 13th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送} once per day, but only on yourself and willing targets that accompany you, and only from the Material Plane to the Astral Plane and vice versa. At 17th level, the @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk8l7i27fhfic3c1]{Astral Projection, Lesser} ability instead functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射}.

Astral Warp.name: Astral Warp（Astral Warp）
Astral Warp.description: At 1st level, you can create a sparkling field within 30 feet that distorts time within a 5-foot cube. This field lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Any creature that enters the area or that starts its turn within the cube takes 1d4 points of force damage + 1 point of force damage per 2 sorcerer levels you have (Fort negates). While within the area, a creature takes a 閳? penalty on Reflex saves and to AC. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

At Arm's Length.name: At Arm's Length（At Arm's Length）
At Arm's Length.description: At 5th level, you gain Reach Spell as a bonus feat. Additionally, when using this feat, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool for each increase in the spell閳ユ獨 range category. If you do, the spell does not use up a higher-level spell slot than normal. (For example, a spell with a range of touch increased to long range via this feat would normally use up a spell slot 3 levels higher, but if you spend 3 points from your phrenic pool, the spell does not use up a higher spell slot.)

Atheist Inspiration.name: Atheist Inspiration（Atheist Inspiration）
Atheist Inspiration.description: The investigator can use her inspiration on saving throws against divine spells without expending uses of inspiration. This talent counts as the Divine Defiance feat (Pathfinder Player Companion: Faiths & Philosophies 7) for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of other feats.

Athletic Exploit.name: Athletic Exploit（Athletic Exploit）
Athletic Exploit.description:
As a swift action, you gain the ability to overcome physical obstacles with ease. Until the beginning of your next turn, you halve your armor check penalty when attempting Acrobatics, Climb, Escape Artist, and Swim skill checks, and you gain a bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on such skill checks.

  This power replaces the Strength Surge power of the Strength Domain.

Attune Implants.name: 殖装调和（Attune Implants）
Attune Implants.description: 从五级开始，每天一次，你可以花费一个整轮动作来利用和引导你电子殖装物中的能量，并将这些能量应用到你的异能施法上面。这将会让你的异能法术的豁免DC提升一点，这将会持续等同于你异能等级的分钟数。要使用这个能力，你必须已经植入至少一件电子殖装物（科技指南 35）。额外的殖装物并不能提升持续时间也不能这个境界之力的使用次数。

Aura Sight.name: 阵营视域（Aura Sight）
Aura Sight.description: 5级起，秘学士可用标准动作阅读周遭生物的灵光。该能力类似于法术阵营视域（Aura sightACG），持续时间1轮。

Aura of Bedlam.name: Aura of Bedlam（Aura of Bedlam）
Aura of Bedlam.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot-radius aura of chaos and strife for 1 round per cleric level. Enemies in the aura take a 閳? penalty on concentration checks and are treated as experiencing vigorous motion (concentration DC = 10 + spell level) when attempting to cast spells. This penalty increases by 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have beyond 8th. This is a mind-affecting effect. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Chaos Blade power of the Chaos Domain.

Aura of Efficiency.name: Aura of Efficiency（Aura of Efficiency）
Aura of Efficiency.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot-radius aura that grants your allies a +4 bonus on all saving throws against effects that inflict the fatigued or exhausted condition. Any equipment wielded by your allies within this area gets a bonus to hardness equal to 1/2 your cleric level, and your allies閳?attacks against targets within this area ignore an equal amount of hardness. You can use this aura for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

Aura of Purity.name: Aura of Purity（Aura of Purity）
Aura of Purity.description: The witch閳ユ獨 aura purifies the air around her. Diseases, inhaled poisons, and noxious gaseous effects (such as stinking cloud) are negated in a 10-foot aura around the witch for a number of minutes equal to her level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Effects caused by spells whose level is more than half the witch閳ユ獨 class level are unaffected.

Aura of Repitition.name: Aura of Repitition（Aura of Repitition）
Aura of Repitition.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of repetition for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. All enemies within this aura must make a Will save each round or repeat their action from the previous round (if possible). Creatures that attacked on the previous round attack again on the following round, although they may change their target. Creatures that moved the previous round must take the same move action again, although they may change their route. Creatures that drank a potion must do so again, even they can only drink from an empty bottle. Actions that cannot be repeated are wasted. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

Aurora Patron.name: Aurora Patron（Aurora Patron）
Aurora Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qcjskol4ac3eemhy]{七彩喷射}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.56atnwmo4s61hi45]{Wall Of Nausea}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6lebv7569xsypp8u]{虹彩图纹}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hxgnuvkeh18untb4]{Blazing Rainbow}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o9kqm42x6xkfjem3]{预置幻影}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mb819hvwpk0zmw53]{虹光喷射}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight}

Autumn Patron.name: Autumn Patron（Autumn Patron）
Autumn Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8w67l6dzzsi6oz5f]{造坑术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vdmsaodgnbo8wjfx]{遗体防腐}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9ha7fyq951iijvt8]{Vitriolic Mist}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ky8n4yzn6kc2cume]{酸雾术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mqrflbi6p6cltdze]{Caustic Eruption}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wplgawb6aznjx7se]{女妖之嚎}

Avian Escape.name: 化鸟逃遁（Avian Escape）
Avian Escape.description: 受术者为了躲避发起攻击的敌人而改变了形态。当受术者由于一个敌人的攻击而受到伤害时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者会变形为一只鸟类，就如同野兽形态 III（Beast Shape III）一般。不过受术者能化形为任意超小型（tiny）鸟类的样子，这会使用渡鸦（raven；详见Bestiary 133页）的数据。这是一个变形（polymorph）效果。

Axiomatic Bombs.name: Axiomatic Bombs（Axiomatic Bombs）
Axiomatic Bombs.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal lawful divine damage. Chaotic creatures that take a direct hit from an axiomatic bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against neutral creatures, axiomatic bombs deal half damage, and such targets are not affected by their staggering effect. Axiomatic bombs have no effect on lawful creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

Bardic Knowledge (SKA).name: 轶闻知识(歌者)（Bardic Knowledge (SKA)）
Bardic Knowledge (SKA).description: 歌者在进行知识类技能检定时将他一半的职业等级（至少为1）加到检定结果中，并且可以使用未受训的知识技能进行检定。

Bardic Pretender.name: Bardic Pretender（Bardic Pretender）
Bardic Pretender.description: The rogue knows enough about music and performance to survive in a bardic college and can fake what she doesn閳ユ獩 know. The rogue qualifies as having the inspire competence bardic performance class feature for the purpose of meeting prestige class requirements, although this talent doesn閳ユ獩 grant her the bardic performance ability.

Bare-Hand Block (UC).name: Bare-Hand Block (UC)（Bare-Hand Block (UC)）
Bare-Hand Block (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as an immediate action when attacked with a manufactured weapon to attempt an unarmed sunder combat maneuver check against it. If he successfully sunders the weapon and grants it the broken condition, the attack deals no damage. He can spend an additional 1 ki point when using this ability to activate ki sunder as a free action.

  A monk must be at least 8th level and have the ki sunder ki power before selecting this ki power.

Basic Aerokinesis.name: 基础大空念力（Basic Aerokinesis）
Basic Aerokinesis.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你能够引起一道轻风（light breeze），让它从由你选择的方向吹向一个生物或物体，无论对方走向何方，这股轻风都会追随上去。轻风使得受术者在某些豁免中获得+2加值，这包括对抗炎热环境（very hot conditions）、高温环境（severe heat）、喷吐武器（breath weapons）、以及云雾和气体（比如死云术、臭云术和吸入性毒素）。这个念力在没有空气的地方或者水下无法生效。在同一段时间内，你只能够引起一股这样的轻风。

  你还能够使用大空念力来冲淡气味，使得灵敏嗅觉难以侦测到你或者其他人。你可以指定数量等同于你的体质调整值个生物或物体。在判断能否被灵敏嗅觉（scent）侦测到的距离时，这些生物和物体总是被视为处于下风处。该效果持续1小时或者直至你再次使用基础大空念力为止，以较早发生者为准。

Basic Chaokinesis.name: Basic Chaokinesis（Basic Chaokinesis）
Basic Chaokinesis.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can create a shadow that protects a target from bright light. You can also change gravity to increase a creature閳ユ獨 carrying capacity by half or grant a creature a +4 bonus on Acrobatics checks to jump.

  Each benefit lasts 1 hour or until you use basic chaokinesis again.

Basic Geokinesis.name: 基础地脉念力（Basic Geokinesis）
Basic Geokinesis.description:
元素：土；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你能够以移动动作将石头、松散的土壤、沙子、泥土和其他类似的物质挪动至多15尺远，这些物质的重量至多为每个操念使等级5磅重。你可以在一定距离内搜寻土质和石质区域，就如同使用搜寻术（Sift；APG）一般。

Basic Hydrokinesis.name: 基础流水念力（Basic Hydrokinesis）
Basic Hydrokinesis.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你能够如同使用造水术（Create Water）一般创造清水，也可以如同使用净化食粮（Purify Food and Drink）一般把水净化，还可以如同使用魔法伎俩（Prestidigitation）一般把物体和生物打湿或弄干。虽然你不能使用该能力把水抬升到空中，当你可以通过专注来在水体中制造水流。由此产生的水流强大到足以驱动水磨（water mill），就好像力量属性和你的体质属性相同的生物手动旋转石磨一般。

Basic Magic (1 pt).name: Basic Magic (1 pt)（Basic Magic (1 pt)）
Basic Magic (1 pt).description:
An eidolon learns to cast a basic spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eu2xv8klucttzqmd]{酸液飞溅},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zymaptg3vmnvfvxl]{舞光术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hk3xhc08blqzniv0]{晕眩术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg67vvykmv9c6j7h]{闪光术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ip9onjfp6nf1vlv9]{光亮术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n879x6fw79jiofew]{冰冻射线},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fipqx43u5blpjsvo]{稳定伤势}, or
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1w2zq5fx7mislq8]{疲乏之触}.

  This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 4th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice. The save DC for this spell is 10 + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 10 to take this evolution. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell.

Basic Phytokinesis.name: Basic Phytokinesis（Basic Phytokinesis）
Basic Phytokinesis.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can prune and otherwise tend plants within 30 feet without using gardening tools. You can search wooded areas and other plant-heavy areas from a distance as if using the sift cantrip. By concentrating, you can detect plants within 120 feet as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.65i0wc0e6fq0evk5]{侦测动植物}.

Basic Psychic Magic (UC) (1 pt).name: Basic Psychic Magic (UC) (1 pt)（Basic Psychic Magic (UC) (1 pt)）
Basic Psychic Magic (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype, Charisma 10.

  Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zymaptg3vmnvfvxl]{舞光术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z3ysa1xxmzgj14sd]{Grave Words}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yssjgukwe3dgjhf3]{指北术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.99xovzg8h1nh9o9a]{催眠曲}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug7ycubjoxgp7ppc]{开关术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6k11j4pvmkka4e9]{Telekinetic Projectile}

  The eidolon can cast that spell as a psychic spell at will. The spell requires thought and emotion components as normal for psychic magic (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 144).

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 caster level is equal to the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice 閳?2 (minimum CL 1st). The save DC equals 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 HD + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier. This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time.

Basic Pyrokinesis.name: 基础赤炎念力（Basic Pyrokinesis）
Basic Pyrokinesis.description:
元素：火；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你能够使用体内产生的火焰来复制闪光术（Flare）、光亮术（Light）、或火花术（Spark；APG）的效果，不过由你创造的光亮术效果会如同普通的火焰一般产生热量；使用三种能力的任意一种均会终止之前使用该原力提供的光亮效果。

Basic Telekinesis.name: 基础心灵念力（Basic Telekinesis）
Basic Telekinesis.description: 元素：以太；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

Bat Aspect.name: 蝙蝠拟态（Bat Aspect）
Bat Aspect.description:
蝙蝠拟态赋予了对黑暗和夜晚的掌握。虽然在战斗中不像其他拟态那么强力，但采取这拟态的变形者变得善于进行冲突战与侦察。

  次级形态：你获得60尺黑暗视觉，如果你已经拥有相同或更大范围的黑暗视觉，那么你的黑暗视觉提升30尺。8级时，你获得90尺黑暗视觉，如果你已经拥有相同或更大范围的黑暗视觉，那么你的黑暗视觉提升30尺。15级时，你获得8级起的奖励外还获得15尺盲感，如果你已经拥有15尺或更大范围的盲感，你的盲感提升10尺。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只凶暴蝙蝠（怪物图鉴 pg. 30），当处于该形态时，你获得40尺飞行速度（笨拙）和10尺盲感、1d8伤害的噬咬攻击。8级时，飞行速度提升至60尺（良好）、盲感提升至20尺和获得飞跃攻击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 315）。15级时，你的飞行速度提升至80尺（良好）和获得盘旋专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 315）。

Battle Spirit (Spirit).name: Battle Spirit (Spirit)（Battle Spirit (Spirit)）
Battle Spirit (Spirit).description:
战斗魂域的萨满所承受的每道创伤都会形成伤疤，这些战斗的残渣会布满她的全身。每次当她使用魂域能力时，她都会变得更高更壮，狂怒之貌在她脸上浮现。

魂术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{Enlarge Person} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{Magic Vestment} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{Wall Of Fire} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{Righteous Might} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8xjcrqg79ugxu5qu]{Bull's Strength, Mass} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{Control Weather} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{Earthquake} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Storm Of Vengeance} (9th)

  魂兽: 该萨满的魂兽看起来是凶暴种，有着鼓动的肌肉和结实的骨架。魂兽的AC获得+2天生AC加值。若魂兽已有天生AC加值，则改为原天生AC加值+2。

Bear Aspect.name: 熊拟态（Bear Aspect）
Bear Aspect.description:
熊拟态唤起了超乎强大的不倦耐力和狂怒力量。采取这拟态的变形者以能从严重伤害下存活，并猛烈反击回去而闻名。

  次级形态：你的体质获得+2增强加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+4。15级时，这个加值提升至+6。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只凶暴熊（怪物图鉴 pg. 31），当处于该形态时，你获得40尺基础速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、1d8伤害的啮咬攻击和2个附带攫抓能力的1d6伤害的爪抓攻击。八级时，你获得爪抓的精通天生武器攻击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 315）。15级时你的爪抓攻击的重击倍率提升1（x2变x3），至最高x4，并且你获得可怖殴击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 314）。

Beast Friend.name: Beast Friend（Beast Friend）
Beast Friend.description:
The vigilante can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his level.

  The vigilante must have the songbird talent to select this talent.

Beast Speech.name: Beast Speech（Beast Speech）
Beast Speech.description:
The vigilante can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his character level.

  The vigilante must have the songbird talent to select this talent.

Beast Tongue.name: Beast Tongue（Beast Tongue）
Beast Tongue.description: You can communicate with a single type of animal (birds, cats, snakes, fish, and so on) as if you were constantly using @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈}. Although this ability grants you the ability to converse with such creatures, it grants you no special influence over them.

Beast's Gift.name: Beast's Gift（Beast's Gift）
Beast's Gift.description: The witch can use her magic to grant her allies ferocious animal abilities. The witch can partially transform a willing ally, granting him natural attacks for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. Choose one: the creature gains one bite attack that deals 1d8 points of damage and one secondary attack of the witch閳ユ獨 choice that deals 1d6 points of damage, or the creature gains two claw attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage each. These attacks follow the standard rules for natural attacks.

Beastskin.name: Beastskin（Beastskin）
Beastskin.description: At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can cause your skin to grow thicker and more bestial. Your damage reduction from your bloodrager levels increases by 2, but it can be bypassed with silver weapons. Your natural attacks (including unarmed strikes) are then treated as silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

Beautiful Strike.name: Beautiful Strike（Beautiful Strike）
Beautiful Strike.description: At 15th level, once per day when the order of the songbird samurai confirms a critical hit against the target of her challenge, she can declare it a beautiful strike without spending an action. The damage dealt by the attack becomes nonlethal damage, and the target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half the samurai閳ユ獨 class level + her Charisma modifier) or be charmed as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (caster level equals the samurai閳ユ獨 class level).
