Beginner's Luck.name: Beginner's Luck（Beginner's Luck）
Beginner's Luck.description: The vigilante appears so harmless and innocent that onlookers dismiss his incredible abilities as nothing more than beginner閳ユ獨 luck. When the vigilante uses a vigilante talent while in his social identity, he can add the +20 circumstance bonus from seamless guise to his Disguise check to fool onlookers, so long as the number of onlookers witnessing him is no greater than his vigilante level. The vigilante閳ユ獨 PC allies do not count as onlookers (and at the GM閳ユ獨 discretion, a closely allied NPC might not count as an onlooker, either). He loses this bonus against onlookers who have already witnessed him using a vigilante talent in his social identity within the last week.

Bellflower Innuendo.name: Bellflower Innuendo（Bellflower Innuendo）
Bellflower Innuendo.description: A vigilante with this talent has learned to pass secret messages more efficiently by observing the coded messages of the Bellflower Network or another secret organization. He can pass a secret message with Bluff in the same amount of time it would normally take to convey the message without encryption. The words and meaning of his secret messages cannot be gleaned from him or those he directly delivered the message to by divinations unless the caster succeeds at a caster level check (DC = 15 + the vigilante閳ユ獨 level).

Bestial Flyer.name: Bestial Flyer（Bestial Flyer）
Bestial Flyer.description:
While raging, the barbarian閳ユ獨 fly speed increases by 10 feet and her maneuverability improves by one category.

  A barbarian must have a fly speed before raging, have the raging flyer power, and be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.

Binding Circles.name: 束缚法阵（Binding Circles）
Binding Circles.description: 12级起，当秘学士绘制魔法阵时，可以额外消耗1点心智点绘制出束缚法阵。束缚法阵处于隐形状态，视为一个陷阱。对应阵营的活物踏入法阵中时，法阵被触发将该生物束缚在法阵中。他可以在法阵内自由行走，但无法离开法阵、攻击法阵外的生物、对法阵外的生物施法（法阵阻断了内外的效果线）、使用任何离开法阵或妨碍法阵的能力。当法阵启动时，触发者可以进行一次反射豁免及时跳出法阵避免被束缚，豁免DC=10+1/2秘学士等级+秘学士智力调整值。可以看到法阵的生物豁免检定获得+4加值。若豁免失败，该生物只能留在法阵内，每待1个小时都可以进行一次DC相同的意志豁免来尝试脱出。通过DC=25+1/2秘学士等级的察觉检定可以发现法阵的存在。它可以被解除装置技能检测，DC与上述相同。任何从外至内穿过法阵边界线的行为尝试或物体，譬如武器、法术效果或特殊能力，都会立刻打破法阵，放出被束缚在内的生物。

Binding Pattern.name: 束缚图纹（Binding Pattern）
Binding Pattern.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点在一个活物心中创造出精神图纹出来，让目标麻痹。目标必须在你30尺以内，可以进行一次意志豁免免除该效果。若豁免失败，目标麻痹每2秘学士等级1轮。在目标自己每回合结束时，目标可再尝试进行意志豁免终止麻痹，改为在剩余时间内恍惚。这是一个影响心灵的胁迫效果。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Biokinetic Healing.name: 生化愈合（Biokinetic Healing）
Biokinetic Healing.description: 当异能者释放一个变化系的联结法术时，他可以支付1点精神力来回复每联结法术环级2点的生命值。

Bionetwork.name: Bionetwork（Bionetwork）
Bionetwork.description:
At 5th level, your mental influence over nature increases. Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes to mentally connect with living fungi, leaves, moss, roots, and similar plants or plantlike things. You form a temporary network that functions as an extension of your senses. The network allows you to use one of the following two effects: you can remotely view any familiar or obvious location within a range of 250 feet per psychic level, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术}; or you can attempt to locate a creature within the area, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知}. You don閳ユ獩 need a focus to use this effect, and you can閳ユ獩 cast spells through the sensor.

  This ability doesn閳ユ獩 function in areas of sparse vegetation, such as arid deserts, barren caverns, or frozen tundras. Buildings and urban areas are generally excluded from your network, but ruins reclaimed by nature are connected. While you閳ユ獧e underground, roots and fungi function as your network, but the radius of the network is only 100 feet per psychic level.

  At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you gain an additional daily use of this ability.

Bite (1 pt).name: Bite (1 pt)（Bite (1 pt)）
Bite (1 pt).description: An eidolon's maw is full of razor-sharp teeth, giving it a bite attack. This attack is a primary attack. The bite deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). If the eidolon already has a bite attack, this evolution allows it to deal 1-1/2 times its Strength modifier on damage rolls made with its bite.

Bite (UC) (1 pt).name: Bite (UC) (1 pt)（Bite (UC) (1 pt)）
Bite (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 maw is full of razor-sharp teeth, giving it a bite attack. This attack is a primary attack. The bite deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). If the eidolon already has a bite attack, this evolution allows it to deal 1-1/2 times its Strength modifier on damage rolls made with its bite.

Biting Frost.name: Biting Frost（Biting Frost）
Biting Frost.description:
The shaman turns the air frigid around a target within 30 feet for a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1). The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw at the beginning of each turn or be damaged by exposure to the extreme cold. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. On a successful save, the effect ends immediately.

  Whether or not the initial save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Bitter Pill.name: Bitter Pill（Bitter Pill）
Bitter Pill.description: The alchemist becomes bitter in flavor. Any creature that hits the bitter alchemist with a bite attack gains the sickened condition for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + the alchemist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier). Any creature that swallows the alchemist whole gains the nauseated condition for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (same DC as above). If the alchemist is trapped in the creature閳ユ獨 gullet and it becomes nauseated, the creature vomits him back out immediately as a free action at the start of the creature閳ユ獨 turn; the alchemist lands prone adjacent to the creature.

Black Blood Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Black Blood Bloodrager Bloodline（Black Blood Bloodrager Bloodline）
Black Blood Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Contact with the black blood of Orv閳ユ攤y you or one of your ancestors閳ユ敄ransformed your bloodline. This necromantic taint in your blood mutates you into something peculiar.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.to1cdmyh5rtfyg2s]{寒冷之触} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wifi44l62ymqdvt8]{Unshakable Chill} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q35l6m4pggb4y98v]{元素光环} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (16th)

Black Blood Immunity.name: Black Blood Immunity（Black Blood Immunity）
Black Blood Immunity.description: At 20th level, you gain immunity to cold, nonlethal damage, critical hits, and sneak attacks. You have this benefit constantly, even when not bloodraging.

Black Blood Resistances.name: Black Blood Resistances（Black Blood Resistances）
Black Blood Resistances.description:
At 8th level, you gain resistance 5 to cold and a +2 bonus on saving throws against ability drain, death effects, disease, energy drain, paralysis, and poison.

  At 16th level, this resistance increases to 10 and the saving throw bonus increases to +4.

Black Blood Transfusion.name: Black Blood Transfusion（Black Blood Transfusion）
Black Blood Transfusion.description: At 16th level, when you confirm a critical hit, some of your black blood seeps into the target閳ユ獨 wounds. The next time the target would be healed by positive energy, the healing burns away the black blood and ends this effect, providing no other benefit. This ability is not effective against creatures that have no blood. The black blood transfusion persists until it negates one positive energy healing effect, but it can be removed sooner with a successful DC 25 Heal check.

Black Blood.name: Black Blood（Black Blood）
Black Blood.description: At 1st level, your blood runs black with the blood of Orv. You are immune to the effects (both beneficial and destructive) of black blood. You have this benefit constantly, even while not bloodraging. When you take damage from a slashing or piercing attack while bloodraging, as an immediate action you can grant your melee attacks the frost weapon special ability for 2 rounds. You can use this ability three times per day.

Black Market Connections.name: Black Market Connections（Black Market Connections）
Black Market Connections.description:
A rogue with this talent gains better access to magic items from black market connections. She treats every settlement as one size greater for the purpose of determining the gp limit of the base value of items for sale, as well as the number of minor, medium, and major magic items for sale in the settlement. If the settlement is already a metropolis, all minor and medium magic items are for sale, as well as 3d8 major magic items. With a successful Diplomacy check, the rogue can treat the settlement as two sizes larger. If the settlement is already a metropolis and she succeeds at the check, all magic items are for sale. If the settlement is already a large city and she succeeds at the check, all minor and medium magic items are for sale, as well as 3d8 major magic items. With a successful check, the rogue can also sell stolen items on the black market. If the check fails by 5 or more, the rogue does something to spook the market, and treats the city as normal for 1 week. Furthermore, those in control of the black market may alert the authorities to the rogue閳ユ獨 presence in an act of reprisal for spooking the market or to divert attention away from their illicit activities. The DCs of the checks are by settlement size and are given in the table below.

Community Size DC
Thorp 10
Hamlet 12
Village 15
Small town 18
Large town 20
Small city 25
Large city 30
Metropolis 35

Blackstar Bomb.name: Blackstar Bomb（Blackstar Bomb）
Blackstar Bomb.description: This bomb crushes the target like a void bomb, then repels nearby creatures with a burst of gravity. The target takes damage as if hit by a void bomb. All other creatures within 5 feet of the target are subject to a bull rush. The alchemist uses his alchemist class level in place of his Combat Maneuver Bonus, and adds his Intelligence modifier in place of his Strength or Dexterity modifier to resolve the bull rush attempts. Creatures moved by a blackstar bomb are pushed directly away from the target閳ユ獨 square. An alchemist must have the void bomb discovery to create blackstar bombs.

Blade Rush Infusion.name: Blade Rush Infusion（Blade Rush Infusion）
Blade Rush Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; 等级 2; Burn 2
Prerequisite kinetic blade
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You use your element閳ユ獨 power to instantly move 30 feet in any direction (even straight up), manifest a kinetic blade, and attack once. You gain a +2 bonus on the attack roll and take a 閳? penalty to your AC until the start of your next turn. The movement doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity, though activating blade rush does.

  If you have the kinetic whip infusion, you can manifest a kinetic whip instead of a kinetic blade at the end of your movement by increasing the burn cost of this infusion by 1.

  The blade or whip vanishes instantly after the rush.

Blade Whirlwind Infusion.name: Blade Whirlwind Infusion（Blade Whirlwind Infusion）
Blade Whirlwind Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Prerequisite kinetic blade
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You create a kinetic blade and swing it in an arc around you, making a single attack against all foes within reach as if with kinetic blade. If the result is a critical threat, roll to confirm the critical hit against only the first target you hit. The blade vanishes instantly after the whirlwind.

Blazing Vitality.name: Blazing Vitality（Blazing Vitality）
Blazing Vitality.description: When tensions run high and your emotions flare, you let forth waves of restorative energy from within. At 8th level, you emit a 10-foot-radius aura of energizing fire while bloodraging. Any ally that ends their turn within this aura gains a number of temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points last for 1 minute.

Bleaching Discipline.name: Bleaching Discipline（Bleaching Discipline）
Bleaching Discipline.description:
You draw power from a void in your emotions, a yawning and empty chasm where your hopes and dreams and fears should be. It is very rare for any creature besides a gnome to have this psychic discipline閳ユ敆sually a bleachling or a gnome with a particularly strong fear of the Bleaching閳ユ攤ut in occasional cases members of other races have been known to develop such a strong nihilistic ennui or depression that they can tap into the vitality-draining effects of this discipline as well.

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7u45op4znvtkvgv3]{Decrepit Disguise} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5j7llv2nys5makeq]{Steal Voice} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ds011sdiv3d8c86w]{Cup Of Dust} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bc3nc0ri47egssht]{弱能术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c7j4fxzlxyvll2t4]{Pessimism} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jg3p4t3dv1a7nqvo]{Spell Immunity, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术} (18th).

Bleed (1 pt).name: Bleed (1 pt)（Bleed (1 pt)）
Bleed (1 pt).description:
An eidolon gains the ability to inflict bleeding wounds. Select one type of attack. Attacks of that type deal 1d6 points of bleed damage.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different attack. The bleed effect doesn閳ユ獩 stack.

Blessed Secrecy.name: Blessed Secrecy（Blessed Secrecy）
Blessed Secrecy.description: At 4th level, when you attempt a Bluff, Disguise, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth skill check, you can roll twice and take the more favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom bonus.

Blessed Surgery.name: Blessed Surgery（Blessed Surgery）
Blessed Surgery.description:
Your divine patron guides your healing hands, allowing you to perform minor miracles with mundane cures. You can use this ability as a free action when using the Heal skill in order to roll the check twice and take the higher result. When you閳ユ獧e using this ability, any use of the Heal skill requiring 1 hour instead takes at most 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Rebuke Death power of the Healing Domain.

Blind Spot.name: Blind Spot（Blind Spot）
Blind Spot.description:
The vigilante is so skilled at stealth, he can use the Stealth skill to hide from creatures with unusual senses that normally automatically detect creatures. This includes senses such as blindsense, blindsight, lifesense, scent, or tremorsense. For each such ability that the creature possesses, if the vigilante is not bypassing the sense in another way閳ユ敃uch as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.ch6iof333ghti2tj]{消除气味} spell for scent or flying for tremorsense閳ユ敄he creature gains a stacking +20 circumstance bonus on all Perception checks to notice the vigilante, rather than automatically noticing the vigilante.

  Only a stalker vigilante of at least 6th level can select this talent.

Blinding Strike.name: Blinding Strike（Blinding Strike）
Blinding Strike.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.2Gd0V8lDe6BkG7nl]{致盲重击} as a bonus feat, even if she doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. The rogue must have the obscuring blow rogue talent and be at least 15th level before choosing this talent.

Blindsense (3 pts).name: Blindsense (3 pts)（Blindsense (3 pts)）
Blindsense (3 pts).description:
An eidolon's senses become incredibly acute, giving it blindsense out to a range of 30 feet. This ability allows the eidolon to pinpoint the location of creatures that it cannot see without having to make a Perception check, but such creatures still have total concealment from the eidolon. Visibility still affects the eidolon's movement and it is still denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class against attacks from creatures it cannot see.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

Blindsense (UC) (3 pts).name: Blindsense (UC) (3 pts)（Blindsense (UC) (3 pts)）
Blindsense (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 senses become incredibly acute, giving it blindsense with a range of 30 feet. This ability allows the eidolon to pinpoint the location of creatures that it can閳ユ獩 see without having to attempt a Perception check, but such creatures still have total concealment from the eidolon.

  Visibility still affects the eidolon閳ユ獨 movement, and it is still denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class against attacks from creatures it cannot see.

Blindsight (4 pts).name: Blindsight (4 pts)（Blindsight (4 pts)）
Blindsight (4 pts).description:
An eidolon's senses sharpen even further, granting it blindsight out to a range of 30 feet. The eidolon can maneuver and attack as normal, ignoring darkness, invisibility, and most forms of concealment as long as it has line of effect to the target.

  The eidolon must possess the blindsense evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

Blindsight (UC) (4 pts).name: Blindsight (UC) (4 pts)（Blindsight (UC) (4 pts)）
Blindsight (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 11th, blindsense evolution.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 senses sharpen even further, granting it blindsight with a range of 30 feet. The eidolon can maneuver and attack as normal, ignoring darkness, invisibility, and most forms of concealment as long as it has line of effect to the target.

Blistered Caress.name: Blistered Caress（Blistered Caress）
Blistered Caress.description:
You can channel the hostile, unforgiving heat of the sun into your touch. This is a melee touch attack that deals 1d8 points of fire damage per 2 oracle levels (Fortitude half ). Against a plant creature, this touch heals or damages the creature (your choice) for 1d6 points of fire damage per oracle level.

  At 7th level, a creature that fails its save against this revelation becomes sickened for 1d4 hours in addition to taking fire damage.

  At 15th level, your touch is so intense that a creature that fails its save is also staggered for 1d6 rounds.

  You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.

Blood Debt.name: Blood Debt（Blood Debt）
Blood Debt.description: A ninja with this ability gains In Harm閳ユ獨 Way as a bonus feat, even if she doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. When the ninja intercepts an attack using this feat, she can spend 1 ki point to impose a blood debt on the aided ally. The ninja閳ユ獨 ki pool is reduced by 1 until she ends this effect, which she may do as an immediate action. If the ninja ends the blood debt in response to a successful attack against her by a creature the indebted ally threatens, the ally (who must be willing) takes full damage from that attack and any associated effects instead of the ninja.

Blood Frenzy (UC) (2 pts).name: Blood Frenzy (UC) (2 pts)（Blood Frenzy (UC) (2 pts)）
Blood Frenzy (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant, daemon, or demon subtype; summoner level 7th.

  When the eidolon is dealt damage, it enters a blood frenzy. It gains a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls and weapon damage rolls and attacks the nearest creature each round, friend or foe, although it ceases attacking its summoner after hitting once. The frenzy lasts for 5 rounds or until the eidolon can perceive no creatures. At the end of that time, the eidolon is fatigued for 1 minute. It cannot enter a blood frenzy while fatigued.

Blood Reader.name: Blood Reader（Blood Reader）
Blood Reader.description: While able to see a studied target, a slayer with this talent knows exactly how many hit points his opponent has remaining. This only works against living targets.

Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Bloodrager Bloodline（Bloodrager Bloodline）
Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Each bloodrager has a source of magic somewhere in his heritage that empowers his bloodrages, bonus feats, and bonus spells. Sometimes this source reflects a distant blood relationship to a powerful being, or is due to an extreme event involving such a creature somewhere in his family閳ユ獨 past. Regardless of the source, this influence manifests in a number of ways. A bloodrager must pick one bloodline upon taking his first level of bloodrager. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.

When choosing a bloodline, the bloodrager閳ユ獨 alignment doesn閳ユ獩 restrict his choices. A good bloodrager could come from an abyssal bloodline, a celestial bloodline could beget an evil bloodrager generations later, a bloodrager from an infernal bloodline could be chaotic, and so on. Though his bloodline empowers him, it doesn閳ユ獩 dictate or limit his thoughts and behavior.

The bloodrager gains bloodline powers at 1st level, 4th level, and every 4 levels thereafter. The bloodline powers a bloodrager gains are described in his chosen bloodline. For all spell-like bloodline powers, treat the character閳ユ獨 bloodrager level as the caster level.

At 6th level and every 3 levels thereafter, a bloodrager receives one bonus feat chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The bloodrager must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.

At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional spell derived from his bloodline. These spells are in addition to the number of spells given on Table 1閳?. These spells cannot be exchanged for different spells at higher levels.

If the bloodrager takes levels in another class that grants a bloodline, the bloodlines must be the same type, even if that means that the bloodline of one of the classes must change. Subject to GM discretion, the bloodrager can change his former bloodline to make them conform.

Bloodsmith.name: Bloodsmith（Bloodsmith）
Bloodsmith.description: At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can choose one manufactured weapon you wield, shield you wield, or piece of armor you wear to gain the benefit of @Compendium[pf1.spells.zq7xi7l5vgpqu7rt]{Magic Weapon, Greater} (weapon) or @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具}. The caster level of this effect is equal to your bloodrager level, and its effects end when your bloodrage ends or when you no longer wear or wield the weapon, shield, or armor.

Bloody Bite.name: Bloody Bite（Bloody Bite）
Bloody Bite.description:
This rage power is available to half-orc barbarians. The barbarian閳ユ獨 bite attack deals 1d6 points of bleed damage in addition to its other effects.

  The barbarian must have the animal fury rage power or a natural bite attack before selecting this power.

Bloody Fist.name: Bloody Fist（Bloody Fist）
Bloody Fist.description:
While raging, the barbarian may attempt to punch through an opponent閳ユ獨 flesh and rip out one of its vital organs. In order to do so, the barbarian must confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a natural attack or unarmed strike. The barbarian deals damage as normal for a critical hit and the opponent must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 class level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier) or take 1d4 points of Constitution damage as one of its vital organs is ripped free from its body. This power can only be used once per rage.

  A barbarian must be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

Bloody Roots.name: Bloody Roots（Bloody Roots）
Bloody Roots.description:
As a standard action, the shaman can cause a field of thick roots to burrow up from the ground. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} with a caster level equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 level. The area is centered on the shaman when she activates the ability but remains stationary if she then moves. The shaman is unaffected by the roots. Her allies treat the area as difficult terrain, but the roots don閳ユ獩 attack them. The shaman can end the effect as a free action.

  She can use this ability a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier, but these rounds do not need to be consecutive.

Boar Aspect.name: Boar Aspect（Boar Aspect）
Boar Aspect.description:
Those with the aspect of the boar are famously stubborn.

Minor Form: You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强} as a bonus feat.

  At 8th level, you add your Hit Dice to your Constitution when determining the negative number of hit points at which you die.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a dire boar . While in this form, you gain low-light vision, the scent ability, a gore attack (1d8), and a base speed of 40 feet.

  At 8th level you gain Improved Natural Attack with your gore attack, and you gain powerful charge (+1d8 on your gore attack).

  At 15th level, you gain 1 additional hit point per Hit Die you have, and you gain Awesome Blow (Bestiary 314) as a bonus feat.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Gore (P), hoof (B)

Boar's Charge.name: Boar's Charge（Boar's Charge）
Boar's Charge.description:
While raging, when you hit with a gore attack as part of a charge, you automatically score a critical threat. You must still confirm the critical hit as normal.

  You must be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

Bodily Purge.name: 以心净身（Bodily Purge）
Bodily Purge.description: 通过独自运用精神力量，你能够治愈自身所受的创伤和疾病。5级起，你获得一个治愈能量构成的能量池。这个能量池最初每日有3d8的治疗量，在5级之后每拥有2个异能者等级，都能够让这个能量池的数值额外提升d8点。以标准动作，你能够使用其中任意数额的骰子，并以此来恢复生命值，恢复数值等同于你所消耗的d8骰的投掷结果。举例说明：在5级时，你能够一次恢复3d8点生命值，或者分三次使用，每次恢复1d8点生命值。此外，你能够从这个能量池中花费2个骰子来获得次等复原术（Restoration, Lesser）的好处（仅能影响你自己）。7级起，你能够从这个能量池中花费3个骰子来获得中和毒性（Neutralize Poison）、移除疾病（Remove Disease）、或复原术（Restoration）的效果（仅能影响你自己）。要想使用复原术消除一个永久负向等级（permanent negative level），你必须从能量池中花费4个骰子以取代3个。使用你的异能者等级来作为这些效果的施法者等级。

Body of Air.name: Body of Air（Body of Air）
Body of Air.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You transform yourself into gas, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体}. You can閳ユ獩 use kinetic blasts while in this form.

Bold Stare.name: 深邃注视（Bold Stare）
Bold Stare.description: 在3级以及之后的每4个等级，催眠师的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）都能够将更进一步的效果强加于目标。每当催眠师达到上述等级获得新的深邃注视的增强项目时，可以从后述内容中选择一个选项，这种选择一经决定就无法更改。除非另有说明，否则每种深邃注视的增强项目都仅能被选取一次。只要目标受到了催眠师的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）影响，所有深邃注视的增强项目都会影响到目标。

Bolstering Touch.name: Bolstering Touch（Bolstering Touch）
Bolstering Touch.description:
You can touch a willing creature as a standard action, bracing it against frightening situations and allowing it to remain calm. The first fear effect that would affect the subject within the next hour is suppressed for the first 1d4 rounds of its effect. If you touch a creature currently suffering from an ongoing fear effect, this ability instead suppresses the ongoing fear effect for 1 round. The rounds during which the subject ignores the triggering fear effect still count against the effect閳ユ獨 duration. If the fear effect is suppressed for longer than it lasts, the subject isn閳ユ獩 affected by the fear effect at all. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Glory power of the Glory Domain.

Bolt Infusion.name: Bolt Infusion（Bolt Infusion）
Bolt Infusion.description:
Element air; Type form infusion; 等级 3; Burn 2
Associated Blasts electric blast, thunderstorm blast
Saving Throw Reflex half

  You unleash a bolt of lightning above an enemy within 30 feet and send it spiraling down with tremendous force. Each bolt is a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-long, vertical bolt, dealing your full blast damage to creatures within the line. If all squares in the bolt閳ユ獨 area are outdoors and in a storm, the blast deals an additional 1 point of damage per die. The saving throw is Dexterity-based.

Bomber's Discovery.name: Bomber's Discovery（Bomber's Discovery）
Bomber's Discovery.description: A rogue with this talent gains an alchemist閳ユ獨 discovery that modifies a bomb. A rogue must have the bomber rogue talent to select this talent.

Bomber.name: Bomber（Bomber）
Bomber.description: A rogue with this talent can make a number of bombs per day equal to her Intelligence modifier (minimum 1). These bombs act as alchemist閳ユ獨 bombs (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 28), except they deal damage equal to the damage dealt by the rogue閳ユ獨 sneak attack (the rogue doesn閳ユ獩 add her Intelligence modifier to this damage).

Bond Senses (UC).name: 连觉(掉链)（Bond Senses (UC)）
Bond Senses (UC).description: 2级起，召唤师能够以标准动作共享他的幻灵的感官，这包括幻灵所能够听到、看到、闻到、尝到以及碰到的任何事物。召唤师每日能够使用该能力的轮数等同于他的召唤师等级。该效果没有距离限制，但是幻灵和召唤师必须位于相同的位面。召唤师能够以自由动作终止该效果。

Bonded Manifestation.name: Bonded Manifestation（Bonded Manifestation）
Bonded Manifestation.description:
At 3rd level, as a swift action, a spiritualist can pull on the consciousness of her phantom and the substance of the Ethereal Plane to partially manifest aspects of both in her own body. When she does, she uses this bonded manifestation to enhance her own abilities while the phantom is still bound to her consciousness. For the spiritualist to use this ability, the phantom must be confined in the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness; it can閳ユ獩 be manifested in any other way.

During a bonded manifestation, the phantom can閳ユ獩 be damaged, dismissed, or banished. A spiritualist can use bonded manifestation a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her spiritualist level. The rounds need not be consecutive. She can dismiss the effects of a bonded manifestation as a free action, but even if she dismisses a bonded manifestation on the same round that she used it, it counts as 1 round of use.

When a spiritualist uses this ability, she must choose either ectoplasmic or incorporeal form. When she makes this choice, she gains all of the abilities based on the form she chooses and her spiritualist level.

Bonded Object.name: Bonded Object（Bonded Object）
Bonded Object.description: At 1st level, you gain an arcane bond, per a wizard equal to your sorcerer level, with an object constructed by a long-lost civilization. Your sorcerer levels stack with any wizard levels you have when determining the powers of your bonded object. This ability does not allow you to have both a familiar and a bonded object. Once per day, your bonded object allows you to cast any one of your spells known and increase the save DC of that spell by 1.

Bonded Senses.name: Bonded Senses（Bonded Senses）
Bonded Senses.description:
At 2nd level, as a standard action, a spiritualist can share the senses of her manifested phantom, hearing, seeing, smelling, tasting, and feeling everything her phantom does.

  She can use this ability a number of rounds per day equal to her spiritualist level, but those rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  There is no maximum range for this effect, but the phantom and the spiritualist must be on the same plane. The spiritualist can end this effect as a free action.

Bone-Spike Mutagen.name: Bone-Spike Mutagen（Bone-Spike Mutagen）
Bone-Spike Mutagen.description:
When the alchemist imbibes a mutagen, he mutates his skeletal structure, causing the bones on his elbows, knuckles, spine, and shoulder blades to grow massive and pierce his skin, exposing themselves as large spikes. While the mutagen is in effect, the alchemist閳ユ獨 natural armor bonus granted by the mutagen increases by 2. The spikes count as masterwork armor spikes with which the alchemist is proficient.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

Boneshard Bomb.name: Boneshard Bomb（Boneshard Bomb）
Boneshard Bomb.description:
This discovery is popular among necromancers and necrologists alike; aside from its offensive potential, necrologists sometimes use it to turn uncooperative live creatures they wish to question into pliable undead. The alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb deals piercing damage instead of fire damage, and creatures that take a direct hit from a boneshard bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or take 1d4 points of bleed damage in addition to normal damage. If a creature is killed by a boneshard bomb or the resulting bleed effect, its corpse immediately reanimates as an undead creature with the skeleton template. Skeletons that are created in this manner count as undead created by @Compendium[pf1.spells.8uwmrygxgih1fb57]{操纵死尸} for the purposes of determining how many undead the alchemist can control.

  An alchemist must possess the alchemical zombie discovery to select this discovery.

Bonus Feat (UMK).name: 奖励专长(掉链僧)（Bonus Feat (UMK)）
Bonus Feat (UMK).description:
在1级，2级，和之后的每4级，武僧可以获得一个奖励专长。这些专长必须出自以下列表:

  @Compendium[pf1.feats.bZ1YdzkT8NtRIEJ4]{随手武器}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.ACEQfonKVqh0fwkK]{拨挡飞箭}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{精通擒抱}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.2AfSIVge3bg8r6wr]{蝎形拳}, and @Compendium[pf1.feats.gGfXQq0IZrxdcZDx]{随手投掷}.

  6级时，以下专长可以加入表中：

  @Compendium[pf1.feats.nhUawPP4jfED3CYV]{蛇形拳}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{精通冲撞}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.tocde3sKG1O3GKgd]{精通虚招}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{精通绊摔}, and @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}.

  10级时，以下专长可以加入表中：

  @Compendium[pf1.feats.TbOPtIL8Fv8obXtP]{精通重击}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.sOCyCmNxe2MBbEaI]{万蛇出洞}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.bHcqTC4Lf3aVl3VO]{抓取飞箭}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.ugQyUpqPBDsqLyra]{跳跃攻击}.

  武僧无须拥有这些专长的先决条件便可以选取它们。

Bonus Feats (WIZ).name: 奖励专长(法师)（Bonus Feats (WIZ)）
Bonus Feats (WIZ).description: 在5，10，15，20级时，法师都可以获得一个奖励专长。在每次获得这些专长时他可以挑选超魔专长、物品制造专长或者@Compendium[pf1.feats.KlE26ofz7uAkd0IJ]{法术熟稔}. 专长。法师依然必须达到这些专长的前提要求，包括最低施法者等级。这些奖励专长是对因角色升级而获得专长的补充。当法师选择角色升级专长时，他不受法师奖励专长的限制。

Botanical Plasticity.name: Botanical Plasticity（Botanical Plasticity）
Botanical Plasticity.description: At 8th level, as a swift action you can bend and twist the plant life within your body to elongate your limbs. Your reach increases by 5 feet until the end of your turn.

Boundaries Patron.name: Boundaries Patron（Boundaries Patron）
Boundaries Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.skgjjub1hng29nwo]{防护邪恶}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0vmz2klcfvkc3h0v]{次元锚}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lqbbvb9w0rby8hse]{Control Summoned Creature}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.trl849bibbe760xo]{放逐术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ef75tkrzjuotgra2]{次元锁}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ursm11405zobemi3]{异界之门}

Bounding Gloom.name: Bounding Gloom（Bounding Gloom）
Bounding Gloom.description:
The alchemist gains the ability to travel between shadows as if by means of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} spell. The limitation is that the alchemist閳ユ獨 beginning and ending locations must be areas of dim light or darker, or within the radius of an umbral gloom that is lowering the light level. The alchemist can travel up to a total of 100 feet each day in this way. This distance must be used in 10-foot increments; for example, the alchemist can make a single jump of 100 feet or 10 jumps of 10 feet each. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the distance the alchemist can jump each day doubles (200 feet at 12th level, 400 feet at 14th level, and so on).

  An alchemist must be at least 10th level before selecting this discovery.

Bowling Infusion.name: 强击注能（Bowling Infusion）
Bowling Infusion.description:
元素：以太或土；类别：性质注能；等级：2；超载：2

  关联念袭类别：岩击，熔岩流，轰钢，硬泥团，念动

  豁免：无

  你使用带有绝对质量的念袭轰翻敌人。尝试一次摔绊（trip）战技检定对抗每个被你的注能念袭伤害的目标，在判断你的战技加值（Combat Maneuver Bonus）时，使用你的体质调整值替代力量调整值进行调整。

Brachiation.name: Brachiation（Brachiation）
Brachiation.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0

  You can gain a climb speed equal to your base speed when moving through forested terrain.

Branch Runner (UC).name: Branch Runner (UC)（Branch Runner (UC)）
Branch Runner (UC).description:
A monk with this ability adds half the base speed bonus from his fast movement ability to his racial climb speed. In addition, when he uses the sudden speed ki power, he adds the base speed bonus from that ki power to his racial climb speed for 1 round.

  The monk must have the sudden speed ki power before selecting branch runner.

Brawler's Strike.name: Brawler's Strike（Brawler's Strike）
Brawler's Strike.description:
At 5th level, a brawler閳ユ獨 unarmed strikes are treated as magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 9th level, her unarmed attacks are also treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 12th level, she chooses one alignment component: chaotic, evil, good, or lawful; her unarmed strikes also count as this alignment for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. (This alignment component cannot be the opposite of the brawler閳ユ獨 actual alignment, such as a good brawler choosing evil strikes.)

  At 17th level, her unarmed attacks are also treated as adamantine weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and bypassing hardness.

Brawler, Greater.name: Brawler, Greater（Brawler, Greater）
Brawler, Greater.description:
狂暴时野蛮人的徒手攻击被视为如同有 @Compendium[pf1.feats.Ee7JHADKEK37tTHs]{双武器格斗} 专长

  野蛮人必须习得【斗殴】的野蛮人才能选择此狂暴之力。

Brawler.name: Brawler（Brawler）
Brawler.description: 狂暴时野蛮人被视为如同有 @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打}. 如果他已经拥有专长，他徒手打击造成1d6点伤害（小型1d4）。

Break (UC).name: Break (UC)（Break (UC)）
Break (UC).description: The monk combines a writhing twist with a violent strike against a foe that is grappling him. If the monk閳ユ獨 attack is successful, he can attempt a grapple combat maneuver check or Escape Artist check as a free action to escape a grapple, adding the strike閳ユ獨 damage as a bonus on his check.

Break Stupor.name: Break Stupor（Break Stupor）
Break Stupor.description:
The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject is under an effect such as the fascinated condition or magical slumber as per the sleep spell that would be ended by the subject taking damage or by an obvious threat. The trick sends a momentary phantom threat and sensation of pain, ending the effect. This ability works fast enough to prevent a sleeping creature from falling prone or dropping what it is holding, if the mesmerist uses it immediately.

  The mesmerist can also trigger the trick if the subject becomes confused as per confusion, but if he does so, the subject attacks the mesmerist on its next turn, as if the mesmerist attacked the subject.

Breaking Down Koan (UC).name: Breaking Down Koan (UC)（Breaking Down Koan (UC)）
Breaking Down Koan (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to present a paradox, riddle, or complicated question to a creature within 30 feet. The creature must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the monk閳ユ獨 level + his Wisdom modifier) or be confused for 1 round. This is a mind-affecting, language-dependent effect.

  A monk must be at least 8th level before selecting this ki power.

Breath Weapon (4 pts).name: Breath Weapon (4 pts)（Breath Weapon (4 pts)）
Breath Weapon (4 pts).description:
An eidolon learns to exhale a cone or line of magical energy, gaining a breath weapon. Select either acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The eidolon can breathe a 30-foot cone (or 60-foot line) that deals 1d6 points of damage of the selected type per HD it possesses. Those caught in the breath weapon can attempt a Reflex save for half damage. The DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Constitution modifier.

  The eidolon can use this ability once per day. The eidolon can use this ability 1 additional time per day by spending an additional 1 evolution point (maximum 3/day).

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

Breath Weapon (UC) (4 pts).name: Breath Weapon (UC) (4 pts)（Breath Weapon (UC) (4 pts)）
Breath Weapon (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon learns to exhale a cone or line of magical energy, gaining a breath weapon. Select acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The eidolon can breathe a 30-foot cone (or 60-foot line) that deals 1d6 points of damage of the selected type per Hit Dice it possesses. Those caught in the breath weapon can attempt a Ref lex save for half damage. The DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier. The eidolon can use this ability once per day.

  The eidolon can gain additional uses of this ability per day by spending 1 evolution point per additional use (to a maximum of three total uses per day).

Breath of Creation.name: Breath of Creation（Breath of Creation）
Breath of Creation.description: Volcanic vapors elevate your mind even as they ravage your body. When you take Constitution damage from volcanic gases, you gain a bonus to your Charisma equal to the damage taken. This bonus lasts for 1 hour or until the ability damage is healed. The maximum bonus to your Charisma is +2, increasing to +4 at 10th level, and to +6 at 15th level.

Breath of the Ancestors.name: Breath of the Ancestors（Breath of the Ancestors）
Breath of the Ancestors.description: The ninja chooses one imperial dragon type (forest, sea, sky, sovereign, or underworld; Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 3 92-103) when she gains this trick, and the choice can閳ユ獩 be changed. She can use supplies similar to those used for ninja smoke bombs to produce an alchemical breath weapon that deals the same kind of damage as the selected dragon (piercing damage for forest dragons, fire for sea dragons, and so on). The breath weapon deals the same amount of damage as the ninja閳ユ獨 sneak attack, with a Reflex save allowed for half damage. The breath weapon is a 15-foot cone (or a 30-foot line if the underworld dragon is selected). The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the ninja閳ユ獨 class level + the ninja閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Using this ability is a standard action that expends up 2 ki points, and once used it cannot be used again for 1d4 rounds.

Breathtaker.name: Breathtaker（Breathtaker）
Breathtaker.description: The barbarian閳ユ獨 blows take the air from her foes閳?lungs. While raging, whenever the barbarian makes a successful melee attack against an opponent that is holding its breath, in addition to any other effects caused by that attack, the opponent loses a number of rounds of breath equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier.

Brilliant Infusion.name: 光辉注能（Brilliant Infusion）
Brilliant Infusion.description:
元素：火；类别：性质注能；等级：6；超载：4

  前置：闪光注能（flash infusion）

  关联念袭类别：蓝焰击，火冲，太阳风

  豁免：无

  你的念袭会留下一片余辉驱逐黑暗。以你的远程攻击念袭所经路径的每个方格、近战攻击念袭的目标方格、或者区域效果的念袭指向的区域作为持续性火焰效果的中心，此效果会持续至你的下个回合结束为止。该效果被视为具有光亮描述符（light descriptor）的6级法术。

Brutal Maneuver.name: Brutal Maneuver（Brutal Maneuver）
Brutal Maneuver.description: The first time each round that the vigilante uses a weapon, including a natural attack or unarmed strike, to perform a combat maneuver in place of making an attack (such as by performing a disarm, sunder, or trip combat maneuver in place of making a melee attack), he can choose to take a 閳? penalty on all his attack rolls during the round. If he does so and succeeds at his combat maneuver check, the vigilante deals damage to the target of his combat maneuver as if he had hit that target with a normal hit from his weapon.

Building-Up Koan (UC).name: Building-Up Koan (UC)（Building-Up Koan (UC)）
Building-Up Koan (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points as a swift action to ask himself a koan, which he then tries to answer. The monk must attempt a Will save (DC 15 + 1/2 the monk閳ユ獨 level). If successful, he gains an insight bonus equal to his Wisdom modifier to AC and on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks and until the end of the round. If he fails, the monk is instead confused for 1 round. This is a mind-affecting, language-dependent effect.

  A character who can閳ユ獩 become confused can閳ユ獩 benefit from this ability.

  A monk must be at least 8th level before selecting this ki power.

Bull Aspect.name: 公牛拟态（Bull Aspect）
Bull Aspect.description:
公牛是凶猛的冲锋者，擅长于践踏它的敌人，将他们撞到血肉模糊。

  次级形态：你的力量获得+2增强加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+4。15级起，这个加值提升至+6。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只大型公牛（见本书 pg. 179 家牛（Cattle）），当处于该形态时，你获得40尺基础速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉和一个附带强力冲锋能力（使用抵撞攻击时+1d8）的1d8伤害的抵撞攻击。8级时，你获得“践踏”通用怪物能力（造成抵撞外加1.5倍力量调整值的伤害）。15级时，你的抵撞伤害提升至2d8并且你获得可怖殴击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 314）。

Burden of the Beast.name: Burden of the Beast（Burden of the Beast）
Burden of the Beast.description:
The shaman causes one creature within 30 feet to become heavy and lethargic. The creature is treated as if it were carrying a medium load (see Table 7閳? of the Core Rulebook). If the creature is already carrying a medium load, it is instead treated as if it were carrying a heavy load. If the creature is carrying a heavy load, its maximum Dexterity bonus to AC is reduced to +0, it takes a 閳? armor check penalty, and its movement is reduced to 5 feet. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 level.

  A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Burning Infusion.name: 灼烧注能（Burning Infusion）
Burning Infusion.description:
元素：火；类别：性质注能；等级：1；超载：1

  关联念袭类别：蓝焰击，火冲，熔岩流，太阳风

  豁免：反射，通过则无效

  你的念袭会点燃敌人。每当你的念袭命中敌人并克服了它的法术抗力时，无论该名敌人是否会受到伤害，它都会被点燃（catches on fire）。被点燃的敌人每轮会受到1d6点火焰伤害，直至火焰被熄灭为止。在对抗被灼烧注能引燃的生物时，任何火念袭（fire kinetic blasts）均会在攻击检定、DC、和用于克服法术抗力的施法者等级检定上获得+2加值。

Burn.name: 超载（Burn）
Burn.description: 1级起，操念使能够超负荷地运用身体，并引发比平时更强大的力量，冒险跨过安全的界限并承受力量的反噬。操念使的部分原力允许她通过超载以获得更强的效果，而有的原力则要求她接受某种程度的超载才可以使用。对于操念使所承受的每一点超载，她都必须受到每角色等级1点的非致命伤害（nonlethal damage）。除了经过整夜休息（full night’s rest）之外，这些伤害无法以任何方式移除，而休息会移除所有可用的超载点数以及与之相关的非致命伤害。超载造成的非致命伤害无法被减免或转移给他人，而且无法承受非致命伤害的操念使不得进行超载。操念使每轮只能进行1点超载，此限制在6级时提升至2点，并在之后的每3个等级额外提升1点。若操念使在尝试超载时会使她当天进行超载的总点数高于3 + 她的体质调整值，则无法进行此次超载（她仍然会由于不受自身操控的外部影响而强制超载）。如果操念使通过能力获得了某些效果，而这些效果会忽略或者改变操念使承受的非致命伤害，则在此情况下，操念使无法从超载中获得任何好处。

Burrow (3 pts).name: Burrow (3 pts)（Burrow (3 pts)）
Burrow (3 pts).description:
An eidolon grows thick and gnarled claws, allowing it to move through the earth. The eidolon gains a burrow speed equal to 1/2 its base speed. It can use this speed to move through dirt, clay, sand, and earth. It does not leave a hole behind, nor is its passage marked on the surface.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

Burrow (UC) (3 pts).name: Burrow (UC) (3 pts)（Burrow (UC) (3 pts)）
Burrow (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon grows thick and gnarled claws, allowing it to move through the earth. The eidolon gains a burrow speed equal to 1/2 its base speed. It can use this speed to move through clay, dirt, earth, and sand. It does not leave a hole behind, nor is its passage marked on the surface.

Caging Strke.name: Caging Strke（Caging Strke）
Caging Strke.description: With a devastating weapon strike, spectral chains wrap around your target for a short period of time. Whenever you confirm a critical hit with a melee or ranged weapon attack (including spells that require attack rolls), you can choose to also entangle that target for 1d4 rounds (Fortitude negates). You may use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Call Ancestor.name: Call Ancestor（Call Ancestor）
Call Ancestor.description: At 9th level, once per day, you can spend a standard action to grant a long-dead relative a brief facsimile of life. This functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.wy8c3at9nrhjfavm]{Simulacrum, Lesser} spell, except the simulacrum lasts only 1 round per sorcerer level you have, has the same statistics as you, and always has the likeness of an ancestor. In addition, the simulacrum has lost knowledge from the past. When summoning the simulacrum, select one 知识skill. The simulacrum is considered trained in that skill and has a bonus on 知识checks of this type equal to twice your level plus your Intelligence modifier. The simulacrum is under your control, but it cannot attack or take hostile actions. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day. You cannot have more than one ancestor simulacrum active at any one time.

Call Spirit.name: 呼唤死魂（Call Spirit）
Call Spirit.description: 在16级时，每天一次，唤魂师可以以类法术能力的形式施放法术呼唤魂魄(Call Spirit)（本书）。

Call to Arms.name: Call to Arms（Call to Arms）
Call to Arms.description: At 20th level, you can summon a ghostly army from a fallen civilization once per day. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{灵能盟友} with a caster level equal to your level, except that it summons a number of allies equal to your Constitution modifier, and the allies use your Strength modifier for attack rolls. You can direct all of these allies with a single swift action. Each ally can attack a different target or the same target, as you direct. The allies remain until the spell閳ユ獨 duration ends or your bloodrage ends, whichever comes first.

Calm Spirit.name: 安灵法（Calm Spirit）
Calm Spirit.description: 在7级时，每天一次，唤魂师可以以类法术能力的形式施放法术安抚魂魄(Calm Spirit)（本书）。在11级以及之后每提升4级时，唤魂师可以多使用本能力一次（最多在19级达到4次）。

Calming Presence.name: 静心之容（Calming Presence）
Calming Presence.description: 5级起，你化身为一股让人静心的力量。你能够以类法术能力使用安定心神（Calm Emotions），每日使用次数等同于你的感知调整值。

Camouflage (RNG).name: 伪装(游侠)（Camouflage (RNG)）
Camouflage (RNG).description: 12级或更高等级的游侠可以在其偏好地形中使用隐匿技能，即使该地形没有提供掩蔽或隐蔽物。

Camouflage (ROG).name: 伪装(盗贼)（Camouflage (ROG)）
Camouflage (ROG).description: 每日1次，盗贼可以利用他的天赋才能进行一次简单有效的化妆，使他看起来和周围的碌碌之人一样毫不起眼。盗贼需要至少一分钟的准备时间进行伪装，除非在一次针对区域性法术伤害的豁免检定中失败（例如火，冰，或是酸），否则伪装效果将维持一天而不失效。当处于伪装状态时，盗贼获得+4加值到隐匿上。这一加值在周围没有普通民众时无法生效。

Cannibalism Subdomain.name: Cannibalism Subdomain（Cannibalism Subdomain）
Cannibalism Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{魔牙术}
  • 2nd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.wmcrke29frt5k3di]{Enemy's Heart}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bgtmki0xl4xl4y91]{Magic Fang, Greater}

Capricious Misdirection.name: Capricious Misdirection（Capricious Misdirection）
Capricious Misdirection.description:
Your ever-changing nature allows you to misdirect aura-reading divinations with ease. You are constantly under the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.8nrt26t37v7koqr8]{误导术} spell, except that you can take a standard action to select a creature or object within 60 feet to serve as the target of detection spells used against you until you select a different creature or object.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Captivation Subdomain.name: Captivation Subdomain（Captivation Subdomain）
Captivation Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6lebv7569xsypp8u]{虹彩图纹}

Card Sharp.name: Card Sharp（Card Sharp）
Card Sharp.description: The rogue gains Deadly Dealer as a bonus feat, even if she does not meet the prerequisites. Thrown cards are treated as darts, but the rogue cannot imbue cards with additional power unless she has the Arcane Strike feat. This talent otherwise functions as the Deadly Dealer feat.

Careful Stab.name: Careful Stab（Careful Stab）
Careful Stab.description: When a rogue with this talent reduces a creature to fewer than 0 hp with precision damage, she can choose to leave that creature at 閳? hp and stable.

Case the Joint.name: 未雨绸缪（Case the Joint）
Case the Joint.description: 如果侠客在处于他的社交身份时事先检视过一个特定的地点，那么他就可以了解一些关于本区域的关键信息，为他之后以侠客身份的形象来此执行任务提供帮助。如果侠客在处于社交身份的状态下花费至少1小时检视一个地点，那么他可以尝试进行一个DC20的知识（工程学）检定。如果他的检定成功，那么在此之后他回到该地点时可以在此地重投一个失败的涉及该地点地形和布置方面的技能检定（比如尝试潜入特定地点的潜行检定，解除警报系统的解除装置检定，从展柜中悄悄顺走一件展品的手上功夫检定，诸如此类）。每在这个知识检定上获得的结果超过DC10点，侠客就可以在之后获得一次额外的重投机会。如果侠客在进行过检视之后一星期内没有回到该地点并使用这次重投，那么他会失去这次重投的机会（在侠客离开的期间该地发生了太多变化）。侠客每周最多能对某一地点进行一次检视。

Caster's Bane.name: Caster's Bane（Caster's Bane）
Caster's Bane.description: At 20th level, spellcasters with a caster level lower than your bloodrager level always provoke attacks of opportunity within your threatened area, even when casting defensively. You have this ability constantly, even while not bloodraging.

Caster's Scourge.name: Caster's Scourge（Caster's Scourge）
Caster's Scourge.description: At 12th level, you gain a number of extra attacks of opportunity equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1). You can use these attacks of opportunity only against spellcasters in your threatened area who cast or attempt to cast defensively. The @Compendium[pf1.feats.yE3hVOvBq9rx6TAw]{破法者} feat, the caster閳ユ獨 bane bloodrage power (see below), or some similar effect is still required to make attacks of opportunity against spellcasters who are casting defensively. You have this ability constantly, even while not bloodraging.

Casting Focus.name: 法器强化（Casting Focus）
Casting Focus.description: 该灵器增强持有者与世界彼岸的联系，允许他施放的法术持续更长时间。持有者可以将该灵器作为额外的器材施法成分，用在任何持续时间为轮每级的咒法系法术上。若如此做，灵气内每填充有2点心智点，该法术的有效施法者等级就增加1（最高施法者等级加值等于秘学士等级）。该施法者等级加值仅在计算法术持续时间时有效。若有其它更改法术持续时间的效果，比如法术延时超魔存在时，该效果仅在最后计算。

Castling.name: Castling（Castling）
Castling.description: The rogue treats soft cover granted by creatures of her size or larger as though it were cover instead. Cover the rogue gains from this talent does not allow her to attempt Stealth checks.

Catfolk Rogue Talent.name: Catfolk Rogue Talent（Catfolk Rogue Talent）
Catfolk Rogue Talent.description:
A catfolk slayer can select one of the following catfolk rogue talents (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide 92) in place of a slayer talent:

  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.gSRBNwvD3ooZ895d]{Deadly Scratch}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.kzjPnNt5iNWMyAQD]{Graceful Faller}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.YuSHmEqdkDqQ08Hx]{Nimble Climber}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.fsolfNh28jx9C33e]{Vicious Claws}

  Any talent effects based on rogue level use the slayer閳ユ獨 class level. The slayer must fulfill any prerequisites.

Celebrity Discount.name: 熟人价（Celebrity Discount）
Celebrity Discount.description: 在他活动的地方，侠客的身份现在都成为了相当知名的人物 - 只要侠客身处自己拥有声誉的地区，人们就会慷慨地为他的购物提供折扣。每当侠客在他拥有声誉影响的地区购买一件价格不超过500GP的物品时他可以自动享受10%的折扣而非必须付全价。如果侠客拥有高级声誉天赋的话，这个GP限制上升到2000GP；如果侠客拥有超卓声誉天赋的话，这个GP限制上升到8000GP。侠客必须达到3级并且拥有声誉社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Celebrity Perks.name: 众人敬仰（Celebrity Perks）
Celebrity Perks.description: 在他活动的地方，侠客的身份成为了当地人崇拜和信赖的对象 – 只要侠客身处自己拥有声誉的地区，敬仰人们就会在他需要的时候为侠客提供基本的帮助。每当侠客在他拥有声誉影响的地区活动，他就可以免费获得基本程度的食宿（不超过1GP一餐或是1GP一晚）；他可以不必自掏腰包支付1GP以下的税款，小费或贿赂；如果他需要任何特定的价格不超过1GP的非魔法物品，那么侠客可以花费1d10分钟时间联系他在当地的崇拜者为他搞来这么一件东西（当然如果他要是之后把这件礼物卖掉了，他会永久性失去本天赋的好处）。如果侠客拥有高级声誉天赋的话，他可以获得的礼物的价格上限提升到5GP，他能获得精美的餐饮和住宿服务（每餐或每晚不超过10GP）；如果侠客拥有超卓声誉天赋的话，他可以获得的礼物的价格上限提升到25GP，他能获得豪华的餐饮和住宿服务（每餐或每晚不超过100GP）。侠客必须达到5级并且拥有声誉社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Celerity.name: 疾速（Celerity）
Celerity.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：0

  你可以把盟友体内的电流活性化并以此来增强他们的速度。它的功能就如同仅持续1轮的加速术（Haste）一般。你可以承受1点超载来使得持续时间延长至每个操念使等级1轮。

Celestial Appearance (3 pts).name: Celestial Appearance (3 pts)（Celestial Appearance (3 pts)）
Celestial Appearance (3 pts).description:
The eidolon appears as a celestial creature and manifests some of the abilities of a celestial. Spells and effects that target creatures with the good subtype or have specific effects against such creatures affect the eidolon as if it were a celestial. The eidolon gains a +2 bonus on saves against disease, petrification, poison, and electricity spells and effects. It also gains spell resistance equal to 5 + its HD against spells with the evil descriptor.

At 7th level, by spending 2 additional evolution points, this bonus on saves is increased to +4 and the spell resistance is extended to affect any spells and effects from evil creatures.

At 12th level, by spending 2 additional evolution points, this protection is increased to immunity against these attacks and the spell resistance is increased to 11 + its HD (the summoner must pay for the 7th-level upgrade before paying for this 12th-level upgrade).

  The summoner must be good-aligned to select this evolution.

Celestial Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Celestial Bloodrager Bloodline（Celestial Bloodrager Bloodline）
Celestial Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
By way of a celestial ancestor or divine intervention, the blood of angels fills your body with a holy potency, granting you a majestic visage and angelic powers when you enter your bloodrage.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{骑乘战斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.liPAO5urMI9chctT]{骑乘掠击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{抵抗能量伤害} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{圣光击} (16th)

Celestial Poisons.name: Celestial Poisons（Celestial Poisons）
Celestial Poisons.description:
The alchemist is able to infuse poisons with celestial power so they can affect evil creatures that are normally immune to poison. Any poison the alchemist administers to a weapon can affect undead and evil outsiders, bypassing their inherent immunities. Magical effects that negate poisons still apply. If a creature fails its save, the poison acts as normal, but may have no effect on the creature, depending on the effect of the poison (such as dealing Constitution damage to undead).

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

Celestial Totem, Greater.name: Celestial Totem, Greater（Celestial Totem, Greater）
Celestial Totem, Greater.description:
While raging, the barbarian gains spell resistance equal to 11 + the barbarian閳ユ獨 class level against spells with the evil descriptor. She also gains a +2 bonus on all saving throws against spells and effects from evil creatures.

  A barbarian must have the celestial totem rage power and be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

Celestial Totem, Lesser.name: Celestial Totem, Lesser（Celestial Totem, Lesser）
Celestial Totem, Lesser.description: While raging, the barbarian benefits from increased magical healing. Whenever she is subject to a spell that cures hit point damage, she heals 1 additional point of damage per caster level. In the case of non-spell healing effects (such as channeled energy or lay on hands), she heals a number of additional points equal to the class level of the character performing the magical healing. This does not affect fast healing or regeneration.

Celestial Totem.name: Celestial Totem（Celestial Totem）
Celestial Totem.description: While raging, the barbarian shines with a righteous light. This effect bestows upon the barbarian a halo of gleaming light that shines as if it were @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} and triggers an @Compendium[pf1.spells.xsecnbuvc3rbrefu]{消除隐形} effect in the barbarian閳ユ獨 square and each adjacent square. The@Compendium[pf1.spells.xsecnbuvc3rbrefu]{消除隐形} only affects nongood creatures. A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

Chain Infusion.name: 连锁（Chain Infusion）
Chain Infusion.description:
元素：气；类别：塑形注能；等级：5；超载：3

  关联念袭类别：电刺

  豁免：无

  你的电刺（electric blast）会在目标之间跃动。当你使用注能念袭命中一个目标后，可以尝试一次远程接触攻击对抗一名额外的目标，额外目标必须在最初目标周围30尺的范围内。每次额外的攻击都会源自先前的目标，因此可能会改变掩蔽（cover）和其他状态。每个额外目标承受的伤害都会比上个目标减少1d6点（例如：3d6降低至2d6），而且你无法把念袭链回到先前的目标身上。你可以持续让念袭发动连锁攻击，直至攻击失手（miss）、没能造成伤害或者直到念袭的伤害降低至单个伤害骰为止。

Chain of Eyes.name: Chain of Eyes（Chain of Eyes）
Chain of Eyes.description:
The subject can share her senses with the mesmerist. The mesmerist triggers chain of eyes by closing his eyes and concentrating on the implanted subject, allowing the mesmerist to see and hear everything the target experiences with her own senses of sight and hearing (including any special senses or magical effects).

  Once triggered, chain of eyes lasts for 1 minute per mesmerist level or until the mesmerist shifts his field of vision back to himself as a free action. While viewing events from the target閳ユ獨 perspective, the mesmerist is flat-footed, even if he can see himself from another perspective.

Chameleon Aspect.name: Chameleon Aspect（Chameleon Aspect）
Chameleon Aspect.description:
As a swift action, you can subtly alter the color of your scales, blending them with the surrounding environment. While under the effect of this power, you gain concealment from creatures more than 10 feet away (attacks have a 20% miss chance), and total concealment from creatures more than 40 feet away (attacks have a 50% miss chance). You can use this ability a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Copycat power of the Trickery Domain.

Chameleon.name: Chameleon（Chameleon）
Chameleon.description: An alchemist with this discovery can shift the colors of his skin and equipment to blend in with the surrounding terrain. He gains a +4 enhancement bonus on Stealth checks. At 10th level, the bonus on Stealth checks increases to +8.

Champion Spirit.name: 勇士英灵（Champion Spirit）
Champion Spirit.description:
勇士英灵强悍异常，娴熟于无数兵刃。

  英灵同调：每当你降灵勇士时，你在攻击检定，力量检定，基于力量的技能检定，强韧豁免检定以及非法术的伤害投骰上获得加值。

  降灵奖励：你造成的所有非魔法伤害+2。

  偏好降灵区域：竞技场，战场，暴力环境，训练场。

  共鸣惩罚：你热衷于暴力，喜好用刀剑而非魔法和思考解决问题。你在智力检定，基于智力的技能检定，以及施法者等级上承受相当于你的英灵同调加值数量的减值（最低降低为CL0，可能会使你无法施法），并且你无法获得任何提升施法者等级的好处。

  禁忌：选择下列禁忌之一：

  -你对魔法有近乎于迷信的憎恶，你无法自愿成为奥术或奥法能力的目标，即使是无害的奥术也会要求你进行豁免检定。

  -你只允许自己用特定的人造武器（比如“老爷的家传+2弯刃大刀”）战斗，你必须在遵守此禁忌时选择这件武器，并且它不可以是徒手击打。

  -你必须在战斗中展现自己的武艺，并且必须接受单挑——如果在此情况下你的盟友出手，则视为你打破了禁忌。

Champion's Prowess.name: Champion's Prowess（Champion's Prowess）
Champion's Prowess.description: You gain proficiency in all martial weapons and in one exotic weapon of your choice, which you choose each time you channel a champion spirit.

Change Alignment, Greater.name: Change Alignment, Greater（Change Alignment, Greater）
Change Alignment, Greater.description:
The effects of the alchemist閳ユ獨 change alignment infusion become permanent and can only be reversed by a@Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}. A permanent, forced change of alignment may be devastating, and some believe it is little better than zealous slavery or mind control. Others consider a good alignment brought about by any means but purity of heart an affront to freedom. This discovery remains controversial at best.

  An alchemist must take the change alignment discovery and the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

Change Alignment.name: Change Alignment（Change Alignment）
Change Alignment.description:
Once per day as part of his preparation of infusions, the alchemist can brew an infusion that shifts the imbiber閳ユ獨 alignment to good. This change in alignment lasts for 10 minutes per alchemist level. An unwilling creature receives a Will save to resist this change. The alchemist may have only one such infusion at any one time. The effects of this infusion may have serious repercussions for a creature suddenly struggling with a new outlook. Many see it as little more than forced insanity, and some good faiths outlaw its use.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level and have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

Channel Resistance (2 pts).name: Channel Resistance (2 pts)（Channel Resistance (2 pts)）
Channel Resistance (2 pts).description:
An eidolon becomes less easily affected by the channel energy ability of clerics or paladins. The eidolon gains a +2 bonus on any saves that are made to resist the effects of channel energy, including effects that rely on the use of channel energy (such as the Command Undead feat).

  At 7th level, this bonus can be increased to +4 by spending 2 additional evolution points.

  The eidolon must possess the undead appearance evolution to take this evolution.

Charming Smile.name: Charming Smile（Charming Smile）
Charming Smile.description: At 8th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} as a swift action, with a DC of 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier. You can only have one creature charmed in this way at a time. The total number of rounds of this effect per day is equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive, and you can dismiss the charm at any time as a free action. Each attempt to use this ability consumes 1 round of its duration, whether or not the creature succeeds on its save to resist the effect.

Chase Master.name: 追逐大师（Chase Master）
Chase Master.description: 无论是他狩猎目标还是逃离他人的追捕，侠客都是这一娱乐的个中好手。侠客在使用追逐（Chase，地下城主手册第232页）规则进行追逐对抗时，他可以在所有的追逐检定上获得加值，数值相当于+4或是他的侠客等级的一半（取其高者）。

Child of Winter.name: Child of Winter（Child of Winter）
Child of Winter.description: You gain the constant benefit of @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境}, but only against cold temperatures. You can move across regular snow without penalty, and heavy snow costs you only 2 squares of movement instead of 4. You can move across icy surfaces without penalty, and never need to make Acrobatics checks to run or charge on ice. You leave no trail in ice or snow, and cannot be tracked (you may choose to leave a trail if you so desire). During winter months, you gain a +2 insight bonus on Initiative checks and Reflex saving throws.

Chilling Infusion.name: 僵寒注能（Chilling Infusion）
Chilling Infusion.description:
元素：水；类别：性质注能；等级：5；超载：3

  关联念袭类别：风卷雪，霜打，冰枪

  豁免：强韧，通过则无效

  你的念袭会让敌人感受到深入骨髓的寒冷，让它们变得行动迟缓。每当注能念袭对敌人造成寒冷伤害时，该名敌人便会恍惚（staggered）1轮。

Chimeric Aspect.name: 奇美拉拟态（Chimeric Aspect）
Chimeric Aspect.description: 9级起，当变形者使用她的变形者拟态能力进入一个次级形态，她可以选择两种拟态并同时展现两者的次级形态。

Chivalry Subdomain.name: Chivalry Subdomain（Chivalry Subdomain）
Chivalry Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.eu4u4mr1naoiqohz]{移除恐惧}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概}

Chosen Victim.name: Chosen Victim（Chosen Victim）
Chosen Victim.description: Once per day, you can designate a creature as your chosen victim. You gain a +2 bonus on Diplomacy checks to gather information about your target, on Bluff and Intimidate checks against your target, and on Survival checks to track your target. The benefits of your destruction, piercing, purity, and smiting judgments against your chosen victim increase as if your inquisitor level were 3 higher.

City Sight.name: City Sight（City Sight）
City Sight.description:
The witch curses a target with the simple vision of urban mortals. On a failed Fortitude save, the subject loses the use of darkvision, greensight, low-light vision, see in darkness, and other visual abilities beyond simple sight, but not nonvisual means of perception like blindsight, scent, or tremorsense. This effect lasts 1 minute.

  At 8th level, this effect lasts for 10 minutes instead. Whether or not the creature succeeds at the saving throw, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Claimed Turf.name: Claimed Turf（Claimed Turf）
Claimed Turf.description: The rogue is well known in a specific community in which she gains the benefits of renown. She gains the renown vigilante social talent (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue 12). This community can be an entire settlement or portions of a settlement (such as a particular district or neighborhood), depending on the population as allowed by the renown social talent. Anytime she could select another rogue talent, the rogue can also select from the following list of social talents (from pages 10閳?3 of Ultimate Intrigue), using her rogue level as her vigilante level for the purpose meeting of prerequisites: celebrity discount, celebrity perks, gossip collector, great renown, incredible renown, loyal aid, and safe house. For the purposes of vigilante social talents, the rogue does not have a vigilante identity and is always considered to be in her social identity.

Clandestine Inquisition.name: Clandestine Inquisition（Clandestine Inquisition）
Clandestine Inquisition.description: 神授力量: Secrecy is required of the faithful in lands where your deity閳ユ獨 worshipers are hunted. Sleight of Hand is a class skill for you.

Claws (1 pt).name: Claws (1 pt)（Claws (1 pt)）
Claws (1 pt).description:
An eidolon has a pair of vicious claws at the end of its limbs, giving it two claw attacks. These attacks are primary attacks. The claws deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge). The eidolon must have the limbs evolution to take this evolution. This evolution can only be applied to the limbs (legs) evolution once

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the limbs evolution.

Claws (UC) (1 pt).name: Claws (UC) (1 pt)（Claws (UC) (1 pt)）
Claws (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  The eidolon has a pair of vicious claws at the ends of its limbs, giving it two claw attacks. These attacks are primary attacks. The claws deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge). The eidolon must have the limbs evolution to take this evolution. This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of limbs evolutions the eidolon possesses.

  This evolution can be applied to any number of limbs (arms) evolutions, but no more than one limbs (legs) evolution.

Cleansing Flames.name: Cleansing Flames（Cleansing Flames）
Cleansing Flames.description:
As a swift action, you can take 1d4 points of damage per oracle level to gain a new saving throw against a single ongoing effect. The effect must be one for which you already failed a saving throw. If you succeed, the effect is removed.

  At 7th and 15th levels, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Cleansing Flame.name: Cleansing Flame（Cleansing Flame）
Cleansing Flame.description: At 9th level, twice per day, you can use fire to restore the health of yourself or your allies. As a standard action, you can wreathe your hand in a halo of flame and touch yourself or another creature. The touch heals 2d8 + your character level points of damage. You can also remove one of the following conditions affecting the target: 1d6 points of ability damage, blinded, confused, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, or sickened. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

Climb (1 pt).name: Climb (1 pt)（Climb (1 pt)）
Climb (1 pt).description: An eidolon becomes a skilled climber, gaining a climb speed equal to its base speed. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon's climb speed by 20 feet.

Climb (UC) (1 pt).name: Climb (UC) (1 pt)（Climb (UC) (1 pt)）
Climb (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon becomes a skilled climber, gaining a climb speed equal to its base speed.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon閳ユ獨 climb speed by 20 feet.

Cloak Image.name: 幻象遮蔽（Cloak Image）
Cloak Image.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点用幻术遮掩你的真实样貌，如同法术易容术。该效果持续每秘学士等级1分钟。5级时，你可以改为消耗2点心智点，变成另一种不同生物类型的生物样貌，体型不变。7级时，你可以再额外消耗1点心智点，用该能力改变一个自愿生物的样貌。

Clockwork Heart.name: Clockwork Heart（Clockwork Heart）
Clockwork Heart.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

  You have used your power over metal to add clockwork components to your own body. So long as these clockwork components are kept wound (per the winding ability of the clockwork subtype), you gain the benefits of both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射} feats.

Clockwork Puppet.name: Clockwork Puppet（Clockwork Puppet）
Clockwork Puppet.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

  You can weave metal into clockwork parts, creating clockwork constructs to attack your foes. This functions as the aether puppet wild talent, except the object animated gains the clockwork subtype and cannot have the stone Construction Point ability.

Close the Gap.name: 见缝插针（Close the Gap）
Close the Gap.description: 每轮一次，当到他的回合时侠客可以选择一个距离他20尺内且未邻接他的敌人。当侠客进行移动时，如果他结束移动的方格邻接这个敌人，那么该敌人不能因此移动而触发对他的藉机攻击。如果侠客对该敌人发动冲锋，那么在该敌人之后攻击他时侠客不会在防御等级上承受-2减值。

Cloud Infusion.name: 云形（Cloud Infusion）
Cloud Infusion.description:
元素：气或水；类别：塑形注能；等级：7；超载：4

  前置：增距（extended range）

  关联念袭类别：风卷雪，霜打，冰枪

  豁免：无

  你将力量释放成云团。你能够以距离自身120范围内的任意位置为中心创造这股半径20尺扩散范围的云形念袭。当你创造云团时，所有在云内的生物和物体都会自动无豁免地承受伤害，数值相当于念袭正常伤害的四分之一。无论何时，进入云团的生物都会承受正常念袭伤害数值一半的伤害，在回合结束时仍处于云团中的生物也是如此。你创造的云团会如同隐雾术（Obscuring Mist）一般遮蔽视线。它所持续的轮数等同于你的体质调整值，或者直至你再次使用云形注能为止。

Cloud Mind.name: 蒙蔽心灵（Cloud Mind）
Cloud Mind.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点蒙蔽30尺内一个敌人的心灵。若目标HD小于等于你秘学士等级，目标眩晕1轮。若目标HD大于你秘学士等级，目标则只会恍惚轮。目标可进行一次意志豁免免除该效果。无论目标豁免成功与否，目标将免疫该效果1轮。这是一个影响心灵的效果。

Cloying Shades.name: Cloying Shades（Cloying Shades）
Cloying Shades.description: When a rogue with this talent uses dimension door as a spell or spell-like ability, including the abundant step or shadow jump class feature, then all creatures adjacent to the rogue at the start and end of her teleportation are entangled by grasping shadows for 1 round (although the creatures are not anchored in place). A successful Reflex saving throw negates this effect. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence or Charisma modifier (whichever is higher). The rogue must have dimension door as a spell or spell-like ability (including the abundant step or shadow jump class feature) before choosing this talent.

Cognatogen (PSY).name: 异变药剂(异能者)（Cognatogen (PSY)）
Cognatogen (PSY).description: 每日1次，你能够制作出一剂类突变药剂（mutagen-like）的混合物，服用它会在强化你的一项精神属性（mental ability score）的同时削弱一项体能属性（physical ability scores）。当你摄入异变药剂之后，会获得+2天生防御加值，并且让一项由你选择的属性获得+4炼金加值，持续时间为每个异能者等级1分钟。此外，当异变药剂生效时，你的一项体能属性会受到-2减值。若异变药剂增强智力，减值会应用至你的力量；若增强感知，则会削弱敏捷；若增强魅力，则会削弱体质。在其他方面，该能力都与炼金术士的突变药剂（Mutagen）能力一般生效。当异变药剂的效果结束后，受到异变药剂削弱的那个属性会受到2点属性伤害。若你同时具有炼金术士和异能者等级，那么在判断异变药剂的持续时间以及非炼金术士饮用了异变药剂后需要进行的豁免检定DC时，两个职业的等级叠加计算。若你获得了科研发现（Discovery），便可以选择究极异变（Grand Cognatogen）和高级异变（Greater Cognatogen）科研发现来强化你的异变药剂。灌注突变（Infuse mutagen）科研发现和长效突变药剂（Persistent Mutagen）职业能力也能够应用到异变药剂上。此外，即便你具有炼金术士等级，只要不具有异变药剂科研发现（cognatogen discovery）的话，异变药剂的持续时间也仍然是每等级1分钟（以取代每等级10分钟），而且每日也仅能制作一剂异变药剂（以取代无限的制作次数）。

Cold Adaptation.name: 适应酷寒（Cold Adaptation）
Cold Adaptation.description:
元素：火或水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你会持续性地收到忍受环境（endure elements）的保护，不过仅限用于对抗低温（cold temperatures）。你会获得一定数量的寒冷抗力，具体数值等同于当前超载数值的两倍。

Cold Aura.name: Cold Aura（Cold Aura）
Cold Aura.description:
As a swift action, you can cause waves of cold to radiate from your body. This cold deals 1d6 points of cold damage per 2 oracle levels to all creatures within 10 feet. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage. In addition, a flurry of snow momentarily surrounds you, granting you concealment until your next turn.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter.

Cold Snap.name: 寒流（Cold Snap）
Cold Snap.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：1

  前置：适应酷寒（cold adaptation），水之护罩（shroud of water）

  你可以让水之护罩变得寒冷刺骨，并让这些寒气环绕着你，在身边创造出让人寒冷麻木的灵光。直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止，你能够以迅捷动作随意启动或终止寒流灵光。在你周围30尺范围的区域内，温度均会下降每个操念使等级5华氏度，最低将温度调整值-10华氏度。若这会让区域内的的温度降低至40华氏度，那么所有距离你5尺范围内的生物的敏捷均会受到-4减值。你免疫这些效果，免疫寒冷（immune to cold）生物或者从忍受环境（endure elements）之类的效果中获益而变得能够抵御此类温度的生物也可以免疫该效果。

Cold-Blooded Curse.name: Cold-Blooded Curse（Cold-Blooded Curse）
Cold-Blooded Curse.description:
Your blood turns sluggish without sufficient heat, and you must seek warmth and shelter earlier than most. This oracle curse is common among lizardfolk and other oracles with the reptilian subtype. You take a 閳? penalty on saves against cold spells and effects, and whenever you fail such a saving throw, you are staggered for 1 round. You can survive without food four times longer than a typical creature of your species before you begin to starve.

  At 5th level, poisons affecting you have their onset time doubled and last half as long if they end after a set time (for example, a poison with a frequency of 1/round for 6 rounds would instead have a frequency of 1/round for 3 rounds). Poisons with no onset time gain an onset time of 1 round.

  At 10th level, whenever an action you have readied is triggered, you can take an additional move action at half your speed閳ユ攣long with your readied action閳ユ攨ven if you have already taken a move action that round.

  At 15th level, you can take an additional move action a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier. You can take these additional move actions only on your turn, and can take only one of these extra move actions per turn.

Collective Memory.name: Collective Memory（Collective Memory）
Collective Memory.description:
While under the effects of a cognatogen, the alchemist adds half his class level on all Knowledge skill checks and may attempt all Knowledge skill checks untrained. This bonus does not stack with the second Intelligence bonus granted by the mindchemist archetype閳ユ獨 perfect recall class feature.

  An alchemist must have the cognatogen discovery before selecting this discovery.

Color Beam.name: 虹彩射线（Color Beam）
Color Beam.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点对30尺内任一目标射出彩色射线。命中需要进行一次远程接触攻击检定。若命中，当目标HD小于等于秘学士等级时，目标目盲1轮。若目标HD大于秘学士等级，则只目眩1轮。目标可进行一次意志豁免检定以免除该效果。无论豁免成功与否，目标免疫该效果1天。这是一个影响心灵的幻术效果。

Combat Expertise (VIG).name: Combat Expertise (VIG)（Combat Expertise (VIG)）
Combat Expertise (VIG).description: The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{寓守于攻} as a bonus feat, even if he doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. If he already has Combat Expertise, he instead gains another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Combat Expertise. If the vigilante閳ユ獨 Intelligence score is less than 13, it counts as 13 for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of combat feats.

Combat Hypnosis.name: Combat Hypnosis（Combat Hypnosis）
Combat Hypnosis.description: The witch can lull her enemies into a trance, even in the chaos of combat. This hex functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术}, except it can affect only one creature at a time, and the target creature does not receive the usual +2 bonus on its saving throw while in combat. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Combat Skill.name: 战斗技巧（Combat Skill）
Combat Skill.description: 侠客可以任意选择一个战斗专长作为奖励专长。侠客必须满足获得该专长的先决条件才能选择此战斗专长，但他可以将自己的侠客等级的一半视为战士等级来作为获得这些专长的先决条件。只有选择复仇骑士之道的侠客才能选择本天赋，但侠客可以多次选择本天赋，每次选择均需要获得一个不同的战斗专长。

Combat Swipe.name: Combat Swipe（Combat Swipe）
Combat Swipe.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains Improved Steal as a bonus feat.

Companion to the Lonely.name: Companion to the Lonely（Companion to the Lonely）
Companion to the Lonely.description:
Whether religiously motivated, as are followers of Arshea, Calistria, or Shelyn, or for purely carnal reasons, physical intimacy helps the vigilante cope with the loneliness of his double life. Once per day, the vigilante can spend at least 1 hour engaged in acts of physical pleasure with a willing partner to gain a pool of morale points equal to his Charisma bonus or his partner閳ユ獨 Charisma bonus, whichever is higher.
