You can see beyond the mundane, and are capable of visualizing the improbable, and even the impossible. If this expanded perception doesn閳ユ獩 drive you mad, you may learn to make the impossible into reality.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：工程.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]次级困惑术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.x23pz2agjub1eh89]{完全修复术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gvfrhibwwuar2rcf]{缩物术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rxk9rk8gvqau3f3l]{鬼斧神工} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k9iu3d82hlo7coct]{活化物体} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2sa3881har33geo1]{变形万物} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} (19th).

  奖励专长： 

  • Craft Construct,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.4hNO4OAWYF5vXphH]{制造魔法武器和防具},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SMyexRzOm5PfjT5I]{妙手},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.HMCAM3Zyo77kG8Yg]{远程射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{近距射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：工程).

血统奥秘: Constructs are susceptible to your 惑控系 (compulsion) spells as if they were not mind-affecting.

  Constructs are treated as living creatures for the purposes of determining which spells affect them.

Improved Damage (1 pt).name: Improved Damage (1 pt)（Improved Damage (1 pt)）
Improved Damage (1 pt).description:
One of the eidolon's natural attacks is particularly deadly. Select one natural attack form and increase the damage die type by one step.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Improved Damage (UC) (1 pt).name: Improved Damage (UC) (1 pt)（Improved Damage (UC) (1 pt)）
Improved Damage (UC) (1 pt).description:
One of the eidolon閳ユ獨 natural attacks is particularly deadly. Select one natural attack form and increase the damage die by one step.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time the eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Improved Divine Inks.name: Improved Divine Inks（Improved Divine Inks）
Improved Divine Inks.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 unique dyes allow him to create images accompanied by sound. If he expends an additional daily use of his bombs, the image he creates with the divine inks discovery also produces minor sounds, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影}.

  The alchemist must be at least 4th level and must have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.

Improved Evasion (Talent).name: 精通反射闪避(盗贼天赋)（Improved Evasion (Talent)）
Improved Evasion (Talent).description: 有些攻击效果若通过反射检定可以减少一半伤害，如果盗贼遭到此类攻击，在通过反射检定后他将不受伤害，如果检定失败他也只受到一半伤害。无助状态下的盗贼不能获得精通反射闪避的收益。

Improved Fire Steed.name: Improved Fire Steed（Improved Fire Steed）
Improved Fire Steed.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite fire steed

  When using fire steed, the mount閳ユ獨 fire resistance increases to 20 and its speed increases by an additional 10 feet. The mount can move over lava without difficulty or a decrease in speed.

Improved Natural Armor (1 pt).name: Improved Natural Armor (1 pt)（Improved Natural Armor (1 pt)）
Improved Natural Armor (1 pt).description:
An eidolon's hide grows thick fur, rigid scales, or bony plates, giving it a +2 bonus to its natural armor.

  This evolution can be taken once for every five levels the summoner possesses.

Improved Natural Armor (UC) (1 pt).name: Improved Natural Armor (UC) (1 pt)（Improved Natural Armor (UC) (1 pt)）
Improved Natural Armor (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon閳ユ獨 hide grows thick fur, rigid scales, or bony plates, giving it a +2 bonus to its natural armor.

  This evolution can be taken once, plus one additional time for every 5 levels the summoner possesses. Each additional time it閳ユ獨 taken, the bonus increases by 2.

Improved Shadow's Chill.name: Improved Shadow's Chill（Improved Shadow's Chill）
Improved Shadow's Chill.description: When a rogue with this talent hits a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, the sneak attack damage is cold damage. Normal weapon damage is unaffected. The rogue must have cold resistance from a racial trait and the shadow閳ユ獨 chill rogue talent before choosing this talent.

Improvised Weapon Proficiency (UC).name: Improvised Weapon Proficiency (UC)（Improvised Weapon Proficiency (UC)）
Improvised Weapon Proficiency (UC).description:
A monk with this ability does not take a penalty on attack rolls for using an improvised weapon.

  By spending 1 ki point, the monk can fight with a broken weapon without taking any penalties on attack rolls or damage rolls for 1 round.

In Accordance with Prophecy.name: In Accordance with Prophecy（In Accordance with Prophecy）
In Accordance with Prophecy.description: A number of times per day equal to your Intelligence modifier, you can publicly declare that your next spell is guided by prophecy. When you do, the next spell you cast has a 20% chance of fizzling (1閳?0 on a d%). If the spell does not fail, treat the spell as if it had been modified by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效} feat, even if you do not have that feat. At 12th level, the chance that the spell fizzles is reduced to 15% (1閳?5 on a d%). At 16th level, the chance is reduced to 10% (1閳?0 on a d%).

In Vogue.name: 头牌（In Vogue）
In Vogue.description: 侠客的手艺或专业技能永远可以在他自己的专业领域属于领头的流行趋势，这让他可以比别人多赚不少钱。侠客在使用他拥有社会人之优雅的手艺技能制造产品时，他的产品可以多赚1/3的收入；侠客在使用他拥有社会人之优雅的专业技能工作时，他的工作可以多赚一倍的收入。侠客必须达到5级并且拥有专业赶工和社会人之优雅社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Incendiary Charge.name: Incendiary Charge（Incendiary Charge）
Incendiary Charge.description:
An incendiary charge is a bomb specifically designed to overcome the effects of any nonmagical object閳ユ獨 hardness. As a full-round action, the alchemist can place an incendiary charge that burns and eats away at an object, dealing normal bomb damage to it. (The damage is not halved against an object with hardness, unlike most energy damage.) Furthermore, the incendiary charge ignores the first 5 points of hardness of the material being damaged.

The alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

Incorporeal Bonded Manifestation.name: 虚灵态显形（Incorporeal Bonded Manifestation）
Incorporeal Bonded Manifestation.description:
在3级时，以一个迅捷动作，唤魂师可以将自己魅影的一部分意识与灵界的物质编织起来，暂时以自己的身体为媒介显形魅影的一部分。在此时，魅影的完全状态仍然只存在于唤魂师的意念中。当唤魂师使用本能力时，她的魅影无法离开唤魂师的意念，也不能以任何方法继续显形。

  在附身显形的状态下，魅影本身无法受到伤害，不能被驱逐或放逐。唤魂师每天可以发动附身显形的时间为3+她的唤魂师等级轮，这些轮数无需持续。唤魂师可以以一个自由动作解除附身显形，不过即使她在同一轮内进行然后解除附身显形，这仍然计为1轮使用。

  当唤魂师使用附身显形能力时，她还是需要选择以灵质态或是虚灵态显形。当她选择了合适的形态以后，她可以通过附身显形和自己的唤魂师等级获得以下的好处。

  如果唤魂师在使用附身显形时使用虚灵态显形，一层如同迷雾般的魂涌会缠绕在她的身上，使她在对抗远程攻击时获得掩蔽（Concealment）的好处。在8级时，唤魂师可以利用虚灵化的魅影肢体更有效的打击虚体生物，所有她的近战攻击与徒手击打将视为拥有幽冥武器特殊品质。在13级时，以一个标准动作，唤魂师可以选择隐身，如同法术隐形术的效果，持续到她的下一轮开始时为止；在18级时，当他发动附身显形且选择虚灵态显形时，唤魂师获得虚体亚种和30尺飞行速度（机动性良好）。

Incorporeal Flight.name: 幽魂飞行（Incorporeal Flight）
Incorporeal Flight.description: 当魅影处于虚灵态形态时，它获得40尺飞行速度（机动性完美）。

Incorporeal Form (4 pts).name: Incorporeal Form (4 pts)（Incorporeal Form (4 pts)）
Incorporeal Form (4 pts).description:
Once per day, an eidolon can become incorporeal for 1 round per summoner level. While in this form, the eidolon gains the incorporeal subtype and incorporeal quality. It only takes half damage from corporeal sources as long as they are magic (it takes no damage from nonmagical weapons and objects). Likewise, its spells or spell-like abilities deal only half damage to corporeal creatures. Spells and other effects that do not deal damage function normally.

  The summoner must be at least 15th level before selecting this evolution.

Incorporeal Phantom Manifestation.name: 虚灵态（Incorporeal Phantom Manifestation）
Incorporeal Phantom Manifestation.description: 如果唤魂师要求魅影以虚灵态显形，魅影会以类似于鬼魅的形态出现在她身周30尺内的某个方格中。虚灵态的魅影获得虚体亚种（Incorporeal Subtype）特性，它在防御等级上会获得相当于魅力调整值的偏斜加值，但生物类型并不会变成不死生物，也不会受到圣水和正能量攻击的伤害。和其他虚体生物不同，虚灵态的魅影并不能直接攻击实体生物，但它可以通过传递法术能力以接触攻击传导唤魂师的魔法。虚灵态的魅影可以对其他虚体生物发动正常的挥击攻击，如同它在灵质态一般。

Incredible Renown.name: 超卓声誉（Incredible Renown）
Incredible Renown.description: 侠客的多重身份已经极为有名。侠客现在可以在人口数量最多不超过25000人的地区或社群（通常相当于一个大城市）或是灵感人口不超过10000人（相当于小城市）的地区或社群中建立声誉。他通过社交身份而获得的好处不会变化，但他在侠客身份下在威吓技能上的加值提升到+8。侠客必须达到13级并且拥有高级声誉社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Industry Subdomain.name: Industry Subdomain（Industry Subdomain）
Industry Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4k32l03rzxgyifkx]{匠人祝福}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9fd7mcoint902oyb]{树界降诞}

Infernal Bargain.name: Infernal Bargain（Infernal Bargain）
Infernal Bargain.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite tiefling or Planar Infusion (Hell)
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  As a swift action before using a utility talent on a willing target, you can add the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdl22oblfph0n33]{Conditional Favor}, except that it applies to any beneficial utility talent instead of to spells of certain schools.

Infernal Binder Subschool.name: Infernal Binder Subschool（Infernal Binder Subschool）
Infernal Binder Subschool.description:
Associated School: Conjuration.

  Suggested Opposition Schools: Divination, illusion, or transmutation.

  Alignment: Lawful Evil, Lawful Neutral, Neutral Evil, or Neutral.

  Requirements: An infernal binder must choose a familiar as her arcane bond at 1st level.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the acid dart and dimensional steps powers of the conjuration school.

Infernal Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Infernal Bloodrager Bloodline（Infernal Bloodrager Bloodline）
Infernal Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The Pit lives in your blood. Maybe one of your ancestors was seduced by the powers of Hell or made a deal with a devil. Either way, its corruption seethes within your lineage.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{精通破武}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.71g6nmvy8qnodwyz]{防护善良} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{灼热射线} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (16th)

Infested Curse.name: Infested Curse（Infested Curse）
Infested Curse.description:
Insects, spiders, grubs, and other vermin plague you constantly. They crawl in your hair, fill your clothes, and f ly or crawl into your mouth, nose, and ears. You take a 閳? penalty on Diplomacy checks, and when you first meet someone, the person閳ユ獨 initial attitude toward you starts one level lower than normal. Animals shy away from you閳ユ敎ou take a 閳? penalty on Handle Animal checks. You gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves versus poisons from insects, scorpions, and spiders, as well as the distraction ability of swarms of such creatures.

  At 5th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.zus1nsp7k2nvol9t]{喷吐虫群} to your list of spells known.

  At 7th level, your bonus on poison and distraction saves increases to +4, and you gain DR 10/閳?against all swarm damage.

  At 13th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{血肉虫群} to your list of spells known.

  At 17th level, you become immune to the swarm damage and the distraction ability of insect, scorpion, and spider swarms.

Infiltration (Stare).name: Infiltration (Stare)（Infiltration (Stare)）
Infiltration (Stare).description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to the target閳ユ獨 Perception checks and CMD.

Infusion Specialization.name: 注能熟稔（Infusion Specialization）
Infusion Specialization.description: 5级起，每当操念使对念袭使用1项或更多的注能时，她会将注能相关的超载消耗降低1点。这不会让注能所使用的总消耗降低至0点以下。在8级、11级、14级、17级和20级，她会让超载消耗额外再降低1点。

Innocent Facade.name: Innocent Facade（Innocent Facade）
Innocent Facade.description: Once per day, a rogue with this talent can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.4w51afqi5d9t8nl4]{无罪术} as a spell-like ability, using her rogue level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. A rogue must have the minor magic talent before selecting this talent. An investigator can select the innocent facade rogue talent in place of an investigator talent. She must have the underworld inspiration investigator talent before selecting this talent, instead of minor magic.

Innocuous Servant.name: Innocuous Servant（Innocuous Servant）
Innocuous Servant.description: The rogue is an expert at appearing to be an unimportant servant, be it an attach鑼? bodyguard, driver, maid, kitchen assistant, or similar staff member. The rogue gains a +2 bonus on Disguise checks to appear to be a servant, but not to impersonate a particular servant. She also gains a +2 bonus on Bluff checks to lie to maintain this guise. While disguised as a servant, she gains a +2 bonus on Diplomacy checks to gather information among servants. Because she is easily overlooked as a servant, she can gather information from those she serves without asking them questions directly or alerting them to her interest. Doing so takes 1d4 days and requires a successful Bluff check instead of a Diplomacy check. At 8th level, the bonuses granted by this talent increase to +4.

Innuendo Subdomain.name: Innuendo Subdomain（Innuendo Subdomain）
Innuendo Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tkvnbxbmbqe49bg0]{Sow Thought}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术}

Insect Subdomain.name: Insect Subdomain（Insect Subdomain）
Insect Subdomain.description:
替代神授力量 The domain spells provided by the Insect domain affect vermin rather than animals, treating them as if they were not immune to spells with the mindaffecting descriptor. Any such spell that allows a Will save can instead be negated by the target vermin with a successful Fortitude save at the same DC.

  替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{巨虫术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j8fufy7sr3bty5du]{Vermin Shape II}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnpyf5gwn8m21y02]{召唤自然盟友 VIII} (1d3 goliath stag beetles; Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 44)

Inside Agent.name: Inside Agent（Inside Agent）
Inside Agent.description: At 9th level, you can reroll any 察觉 check you just attempted by allowing your possessing spirit to take further control. You take a 閳? penalty on all other skill checks for the following minute as the spirit interferes with your concentration. At 13th level, you can reroll any other skill check, but the penalty for using the ability in this way increases to 閳? for the following 10 minutes. You must reroll the check before you learn the result of your original check, and cannot use this power while the skill check penalty associated with inside agent is imposed on you.

Inspire Devotion.name: Inspire Devotion（Inspire Devotion）
Inspire Devotion.description: By spending at least 1 hour engaged in acts of physical pleasure with a willing partner, you can attempt a Diplomacy check to improve that partner閳ユ獨 attitude or increase your influence with that partner (or reduce a rival閳ユ獨 influence with that partner) with no maximum on the number of steps by which you can change that partner閳ユ獨 attitude or disposition.

Inspired Assault.name: 激励进攻（Inspired Assault）
Inspired Assault.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点激励一名活物。目标的攻击检定获得1+每6秘学士等级1点的士气加值（最高18级+4）。该加值同时适用于对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定。该效果持续1分钟。

Inspired Vigilante.name: 侠客灵感（Inspired Vigilante）
Inspired Vigilante.description: 侠客现在可以运用过人的灵感力来帮助他解决超常规的问题。这个能力类似于调查员ACG的灵感职业能力，但侠客的灵感池大小永远等同于他的侠客等级（不会加上智力调整值），并且侠客在任何使用灵感能力的情况下都必须消耗灵感点数。在任何涉及灵感职业能力的情况下，本天赋不视为灵感职业能力。

Inspiring Call.name: 振奋呼声（Inspiring Call）
Inspiring Call.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以使所有可以听见和看见你的盟友在豁免检定或在攻击和伤害检定上获得相当于你的英灵同调的表现加值，持续1轮时间。如果你已经拥有了果断出击英灵之力，那么你可以以一个移动动作使用振奋呼声；如果你拥有传奇统帅英灵之力，那么这个动作下降到一个迅捷动作。

Inspiring Prediction.name: Inspiring Prediction（Inspiring Prediction）
Inspiring Prediction.description: A number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, you can predict an ally閳ユ獨 success, bolstering others閳?resolve. As a swift action, you can shout an inspiring prediction, granting each ally within 50 feet who can hear you a +4 luck bonus on her next attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

Instant Armor.name: Instant Armor（Instant Armor）
Instant Armor.description:
Choose one type of heavy armor. You gain proficiency in that armor.

  At 3rd level, twice per day as an immediate action, you can instantly don or remove a suit of your chosen armor that you touch, causing it to teleport onto or off of your body.

  At 11th level, you can spend 1 minute placing a suit of your chosen armor into an extradimensional space. You can use this ability to immediately don or remove that armor, calling it from or removing it to that extradimensional space. While in the extradimensional space, the armor regains 1 hit point per hour when damaged.

Instant Plan.name: Instant Plan（Instant Plan）
Instant Plan.description: The vigilante can quickly manage a situation that seems to be spiraling out of control. Once per day, the vigilante can state a plan of action. All allies within 30 feet that can hear him gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects and are immune to being demoralized. They also gain a +1 morale bonus on skill checks or combat maneuver checks of the vigilante閳ユ獨 choice. The benefits last for 1 round per vigilante level.

Instant Recognition.name: 如鱼入水（Instant Recognition）
Instant Recognition.description: 侠客的大名几乎无人不知无人不晓，无论他走到哪里人们都会立刻知晓一个重要人物研究来到他们中间。侠客现在只需要4小时的就可以将他在某一社区中的声誉好处转移到一个新的社区。侠客必须达到13级并且拥有超卓声誉和英雄归来社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Intense Focus (OCC).name: Intense Focus (OCC)（Intense Focus (OCC)）
Intense Focus (OCC).description: The implement channels and enhances the effects of damaging evocations. A spellcaster who bears the implement can add the implement as an additional focus component for any of his damaging evocation spells that have an instantaneous duration or focus powers with an instantaneous duration. If he does so, the spell or focus power deals 1 additional point of damage of the same type to each creature for every 2 points of mental focus invested in the implement, to a maximum of 1 + 1 for every 2 occultist levels you possess.

Intense Focus (PSY).name: 精神集中(异能者)（Intense Focus (PSY)）
Intense Focus (PSY).description: 异能者能够从精神力池中花费1点精神力，来使得她在施放联结法术时，以施法的一部分来尝试的任何专注检定获得+2加值。她也可以选择花费2点精神力来使得该加值提升至+4点。

Intercessor.name: Intercessor（Intercessor）
Intercessor.description:
The shaman can invoke an ancestor spirit into an intact, humanoid or monstrous humanoid corpse to learn what the body knew in life. The acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈}, but the shaman may ask only a single question. If an animated corpse or undead is targeted with this ability, the hex immediately fails.

  Once a corpse has answered a single question, it cannot be targeted with this ability again.

Intermediate Psychic Magic (UC) (2 pts).name: Intermediate Psychic Magic (UC) (2 pts)（Intermediate Psychic Magic (UC) (2 pts)）
Intermediate Psychic Magic (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype; basic psychic magic evolution; Charisma 11; summoner level 5th.

  The eidolon gains 2 points of psychic energy that it can spend each day. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e185z4g1taqtaq9d]{Compel Hostility}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]次级困惑术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rvf2gxyy1d4strae]{Mind Thrust I}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c11olzqztodz5o5x]{渐隐术}

  The eidolon can use that spell thereafter as a psychic spell by spending 1 point of psychic energy. The caster level and save DC are the same as for basic psychic magic.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time. The eidolon閳ユ獨 amount of psychic energy available to spend each day does not stack閳ユ攰t uses only the highest number of points granted by its most powerful psychic magic evolution.

Internal Buffer.name: 储念器（Internal Buffer）
Internal Buffer.description: 6级起，操念使对自己身体与元素念力进行了长时间的研究，这让她可以在体内构筑出内在储念器用以存贮额外的能量。储念器最开始是空的并且不会随时间得到补充，但是操念使能够以整轮动作承受1点超载，并将这1点存入储念器，总量最高为1点。11级起总量上限提升至2点，16级提升至3点。一旦操念使将超载点数存入储念器，这些点数便可以无限期地储存下去，直至她主动使用为止。当操念使要承受超载时，她可以从储念器内花费1点来避免自身所要的承受1点超载。在使用单个原力时，操念使至多只能以此方式从储念器内提取1点超载点数。从储念器花费的点数不会激活元素满溢或者使它添加效果。同样地，储念器可以用于突破操念使在单个回合内所能所能承受的超载点数限制。

Intimidating Display.name: Intimidating Display（Intimidating Display）
Intimidating Display.description: The shaman can call upon some of the majesty and power of dragons to cow her enemies. The shaman gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} as a bonus feat, even if she does not meet the prerequisites, and she can use it even when not wielding a weapon.

Intrigue Feats.name: Intrigue Feats（Intrigue Feats）
Intrigue Feats.description:
The vigilante gains one of the following feats as a bonus feat:

  Blustering Bluff, But a Scratch, Call Truce, Confabulist, Criminal Reputation, Cutting Humiliation, Esoteric Linguistics, Intoxicating Flattery, Ironclad Logic, Nerve-Racking Negotiator, Orator, Persuasive Bribery, Play to the Crowd, Quick Favor, Rhetorical Flourish, Sense Assumptions, Sense Relationships, or Street Smarts.

  He must meet the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites.

  This talent can be selected multiple times; each time, the vigilante gains a new feat from the above list.

Intrigue Final Revelation.name: Intrigue Final Revelation（Intrigue Final Revelation）
Intrigue Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of intrigue. You can apply @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发} to any spell you cast without increasing the level or casting time. You do not need to possess these feats to use this ability.

Intrigue Mystery.name: Intrigue Mystery（Intrigue Mystery）
Intrigue Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the intrigue mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.swkw2yoee6d9ldcd]{False Belief} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0d86z521shpman1]{短讯术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1m5rpvirt48brv71]{说服徽记} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (18th).

Intuitive Understanding.name: Intuitive Understanding（Intuitive Understanding）
Intuitive Understanding.description:
If the alchemist drinks an extract of the divination school while under the effects of a cognatogen (Ultimate Magic 15), his effective caster level temporarily increases by 2. In addition, while under the effects of a cognatogen, the alchemist may use augury once as a spell-like ability (caster level equal to his alchemist level). At 10th level, he can use divination instead.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level and must have the cognatogen discovery before selecting this discovery.

Inured to Terror.name: Inured to Terror（Inured to Terror）
Inured to Terror.description:
Samsaran only.

  With their knowledge of the cyclical nature of existence, there are few experiences that can daunt samsaran slayers for long. As an immediate action when a slayer fails a saving throw against a fear effect, he can attempt the saving throw a second time to reduce the severity of the effect from panicked to frightened, frightened to shaken, or shaken to unaffected. Additionally, the DC of Intimidate checks to demoralize him increases by 2.

Inured to the Dead.name: Inured to the Dead（Inured to the Dead）
Inured to the Dead.description:
Once per rage, when the barbarian fails a saving throw against an effect created by an undead creature, she can reroll the saving throw. She must use the second result, even if it is worse. This does not require spending an action.

  A barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

Invoke Primal Magic.name: Invoke Primal Magic（Invoke Primal Magic）
Invoke Primal Magic.description: When an event within 30 feet of the arcanist would trigger a chance for a primal magic effect, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as an immediate action to increase the chance to 100%.

Invoke the Harrow.name: Invoke the Harrow（Invoke the Harrow）
Invoke the Harrow.description: At 9th level, you can draw a random harrow card from a complete harrow deck you own as a standard action and channel the aspects of the card into your body. You take on superficial traits featured on the card and gain a +4 enhancement bonus to the ability score associated with the card閳ユ獨 suit. You can invoke the harrow for a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level; the duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

Iomedae's Boon.name: Iomedae's Boon（Iomedae's Boon）
Iomedae's Boon.description:
As a move action, you can call upon your deities to grant you courage. You gain a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, damage rolls, and Will saving throws against fear effects for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma bonus.

  At 7th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 14th level this bonus increases to +3.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level, and every 5 levels thereafter.

Iron Order.name: Iron Order（Iron Order）
Iron Order.description:
Once per day, you can issue an order as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}. Any creature of chaotic alignment has difficulty defying your command, taking a 閳? penalty on its saving throw to resist it.

  At 15th level, your command function as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术}. If you are wearing Hellknight plate or a signifer mask, your command閳ユ獨 target takes an additional 閳? penalty on its saving throw to resist the order (regardless of the target閳ユ獨 alignment; this stacks with the penalty chaotic creatures take).

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Irori's Boon.name: Irori's Boon（Irori's Boon）
Irori's Boon.description:
Once per day as an immediate action, whenever you fail a saving throw that causes you to become blinded, deafened, frightened, panicked, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned, you can attempt that saving throw again with a +4 insight bonus on the roll. You must take the second result, even if it is worse.

  At 7th and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Isolation Subdomain.name: Isolation Subdomain（Isolation Subdomain）
Isolation Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{极度绝望}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fb38vn4hm4rur6gm]{Wall Of Force}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙}

It Is My Nature.name: It Is My Nature（It Is My Nature）
It Is My Nature.description: At 20th level, your poisoned blood protects you, reflexively conjuring an ethereal stinger to lash out at foes who come too close. Three times per day when an enemy moves into a square adjacent to you, you can make a melee touch attack against the creature as an immediate action. On a hit, the creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier) or die. A creature that succeeds at this Fortitude save is immune to this effect for 24 hours. This is a poison and death effect. You can use this ability even when you are surprised or flat-footed.

It was Meant to Be.name: It was Meant to Be（It was Meant to Be）
It was Meant to Be.description: At 9th level, you may reroll any one attack roll, critical hit confirmation roll, or level check made to overcome spell resistance. You must decide to use this ability after the first roll is made but before the results are revealed by the GM. You must take the second result, even if it is worse. At 9th level, you can use this ability once per day. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

Jagged Flesh.name: 锯齿皮肤（Jagged Flesh）
Jagged Flesh.description:
元素：土；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：1

  前置：顽石之肤（flesh of stone）

  伴随着痛苦，你在肌肤之上塑造出粗糙的岩石。直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止，在你的启动了顽石之肤的时候，任何使用徒手攻击或天生武器命中你、或者擒抱你的生物均会受到1d6点穿刺伤害。攻击你的武器也会受到这个伤害，不过这个伤害通常无法克服武器的硬度。

Jaguar's Grace.name: Jaguar's Grace（Jaguar's Grace）
Jaguar's Grace.description:
A slayer with this talent does not take the normal 閳? penalty when dealing nonlethal damage using a weapon that normally deals lethal damage. Attacks made this way can apply nonlethal sneak attack damage.

  The slayer must be at least 4th level to select this talent.

Jaguar's Pounce.name: Jaguar's Pounce（Jaguar's Pounce）
Jaguar's Pounce.description:
When a slayer with this talent deals sneak attack damage, he can attempt a disarm or trip combat maneuver as an immediate action as if the target were flat-footed (losing its Dexterity bonus to CMD). This combat maneuver does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  The slayer must have the jaguar閳ユ獨 grace talent to select this talent.

Jaguar's Protection.name: Jaguar's Protection（Jaguar's Protection）
Jaguar's Protection.description:
When a slayer with this talent deals sneak attack damage, he draws the target閳ユ獨 attention away from his allies. The affected enemy takes a 閳? penalty on attack rolls made against anyone other than the slayer for 1 minute.

  The slayer must have the jaguar閳ユ獨 pounce talent to select this talent.

Judgment Subdomain.name: Judgment Subdomain（Judgment Subdomain）
Judgment Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h8zit03e88jxrg9t]{严加斥责}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qq0r0sldae6ole7n]{叱责}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3jaumkutti1ytulq]{审判烙印}

Juju Final Revelation.name: Juju Final Revelation（Juju Final Revelation）
Juju Final Revelation.description:
At 20th level, you become a master of the connections between the mortal world and the spirit world. Your knowledge enables you to gain incredible insight and control over others by manipulating spiritual energy. You gain an insight bonus equal to your Charisma modifier to your AC and on all saving throws and Knowledge checks.

  Additionally, once per day, you may cast extended dominate monster as a spell-like ability. With this ability, you may dominate a number of creatures equal to double your Charisma modifier.

Juju Mystery.name: Juju Mystery（Juju Mystery）
Juju Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the juju mystery adds Bluff, Intimidate, Knowledge ：自然, Perform（演讲）, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{恐惧术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (as a 6th-level spell) (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{召唤自然盟友 VII} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q2r6jrgsbwjgssdg]{Charm Monster, Mass} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (18th).

Juju Senses.name: Juju Senses（Juju Senses）
Juju Senses.description:
When casting detect magic and identify, you gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge ：神秘 and Spellcraft checks to recognize auras and identify their properties. You also gain a +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks made against spirit creatures, such as outsiders, fey, and incorporeal undead.

  At 10th level, this bonus increases to +4.

Jury-Rigged Bomb.name: Jury-Rigged Bomb（Jury-Rigged Bomb）
Jury-Rigged Bomb.description:
Unlike normal bombs, jury-rigged bombs can be created from whatever materials the alchemist has on hand; this makes them particularly handy in situations where the alchemist might find himself imprisoned or stripped of his equipment. Jury-rigged bombs can be crafted and thrown as a swift action (this counts against the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily use of bombs), and they deal only 1d4 points of damage + additional damage equal to half the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier on a direct hit. This damage increases by 1d4 at 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter. Despite being useful in a pinch, jury-rigged bombs are nonetheless crudely crafted and highly unstable; if the alchemist閳ユ獨 attack roll results in a natural 1, the bomb explodes as he is creating it, and he takes damage as if he had taken a direct hit.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

Just a Face in the Crowd.name: Just a Face in the Crowd（Just a Face in the Crowd）
Just a Face in the Crowd.description: The rabble-rousers of Galt can blend into a crowd and are able to hide and spot others who appear to be hiding. The rogue gains a bonus equal to half his class level on Disguise and Perception checks when 10 or more creatures of his size are within 30 feet of him.

Jynx Patron.name: Jynx Patron（Jynx Patron）
Jynx Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.q63jn0kbrrb6t3ea]{粉碎音波}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.a73dq2t8pd5n0y1g]{惩戒}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3jaumkutti1ytulq]{审判烙印}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mi4y3g4n8adtfl3]{嫌恶术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术}

Kalistocrat's Acumen.name: Kalistocrat's Acumen（Kalistocrat's Acumen）
Kalistocrat's Acumen.description:
A vigilante with this talent must follow the dietary and sexual prohibitions of the Prophecies of Kalistrade (Pathfinder Campaign Setting: The Inner Sea World Guide 237) in his social identity or he loses the talent閳ユ獨 benefit until he atones. He can treat settlements as one size category larger when determining their base values and purchase limits.

  At 9th level, the vigilante can treat settlements as two size categories larger for the above purposes.

  At 15th level, the vigilante can treat settlements as four size categories larger for the above purposes.

Kami Warden.name: Kami Warden（Kami Warden）
Kami Warden.description: Ninjas can act as bodyguards as well as assassins or spies; some mystically emulate the relationship between kami and their wards when protecting their charges. A ninja with this trick gains Bodyguard and as bonus feats, ignoring their prerequisites. When using In Harm閳ユ獨 Way to intercept an attack, the ninja can spend 1 ki point to gains DR 10/cold iron and resistance 10 to acid, electricity, and fire for that attack.

Kamikaze.name: Kamikaze（Kamikaze）
Kamikaze.description:
A ninja with this ability strikes without concern for her own well-being. The ninja can spend 1 point from her ki pool to give her unarmed strikes and any weapons she wields the vicious weapon special ability for 1 round per level.

  The ninja can spend 1 ki point to dismiss this effect.

Kawarimi.name: Kawarimi（Kawarimi）
Kawarimi.description: Once per day when a successful attack is made against a ninja with this ability, as an immediate action she can spend 1 ki point to attempt a Stealth check opposed by the attacker閳ユ獨 Perception check. The ninja can attempt this check while being observed as long as she has cover or concealment (or an ability that allows her to attempt Stealth checks without cover or concealment). If she閳ユ獨 successful, the opponent閳ユ獨 attack hits an inanimate object that the attacker mistook for the ninja, and the ninja may move into an adjacent square and is hidden from the attacker.

Keen Scent (2 pts).name: Keen Scent (2 pts)（Keen Scent (2 pts)）
Keen Scent (2 pts).description:
An eidolon's sense of smell becomes even more acute. The eidolon can notice other creatures by scent in a 180-foot radius underwater and can detect blood in the water at ranges of up to a mile.

  The eidolon must possess the gills and scent evolutions to take this evolution.

Keep the Corners.name: Keep the Corners（Keep the Corners）
Keep the Corners.description:
Once per day when you fail a Reflex saving throw, you can reroll the saving throw with a +4 insight bonus. You must take the second result, even if it is worse.

  At 7th level and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Kelizandri's Tide.name: Kelizandri's Tide（Kelizandri's Tide）
Kelizandri's Tide.description: When the barbarian rages, enemies find it difficult to escape the vortex of her fury. As a full-round action while raging, the barbarian can attempt a single combat maneuver check against each creature within 10 feet of her. If her roll equals or exceeds a creature閳ユ獨 CMD, she moves that creature 5 feet closer to her. Once per day after attempting this maneuver, she can attack each adjacent creature as a free action as if using the @Compendium[pf1.feats.UnmST9BvRhxT4vq3]{旋风攻击} feat. If she has the @Compendium[pf1.feats.UnmST9BvRhxT4vq3]{旋风攻击} feat, she can also use it as a free action in this way one additional time per day.

Ki Meditation (UC).name: Ki Meditation (UC)（Ki Meditation (UC)）
Ki Meditation (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points to meditate as a full-round action, as if using Combat Meditation.

  Alternatively, he can spend 4 ki points to meditate as a move action instead.

  Using these ki points does not count as one of the monk閳ユ獨 daily uses of Combat Meditation, but it grants him the usual benefits he would gain from his meditation feats for doing so.

  The monk must have the Combat Meditation feat before selecting this ki power.

Ki Pool (ROG).name: 气池(盗贼)（Ki Pool (ROG)）
Ki Pool (ROG).description: 盗贼得到一个类似忍者的气池，不过这个小小的气池并不支持额外的攻击次数。此气池的大小等同于盗贼的感知修正（至少为1），并且在每天开始时自动恢复。如果他已经拥有气池或是在之后得到气池，那么该气池的大小增加相当于他感知修正的一半。他可以透过消耗1点气池中的气来增加自身的移动速度10尺直到他的回合结束。

Ki Sunder (UC).name: Ki Sunder (UC)（Ki Sunder (UC)）
Ki Sunder (UC).description: A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a free action when attempting a sunder combat maneuver check to add his monk level as a bonus to the damage roll.

Ki Venom.name: Ki Venom（Ki Venom）
Ki Venom.description:
A ninja with this trick knows how to make poisons from innocuous herbs or minerals. Creating ki venom is a full-round action that costs 1 ki point. The poison lasts for 24 hours before becoming inert. The poison deals either Strength or Dexterity damage, chosen when the venom is created. The ninja can spend additional ki as part of the process of creating the ki venom to improve the venom in one or more of the following ways: spend 1 ki point to increase the damage die to a d6, spend 1 ki point to change the ability damage dealt to Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma damage, or spend 1 ki point to increase the number of saves required to cure the poison by 1.

Ki Venom

  Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC = 10 + 1/2 the ninja閳ユ獨 level + her Charisma modifier
Frequency 1/round for rounds equal to the ninja閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier.
Effect 1d4 ability damage (see above); Cure 1 save

Ki metabolism (UC).name: Ki metabolism (UC)（Ki metabolism (UC)）
Ki metabolism (UC).description:
A monk with this ability uses his ki to control his metabolism. As long as he has at least 1 point remaining in his ki pool, the monk needs to eat and drink only 1/4 as often as normal, needs only 2 hours of sleep each night (including to replenish his ki pool), and can hold his breath for up to 1 hour per point of Constitution.

  As a move action, he can spend 1 ki point to enter a state of suspended animation, falling unconscious and appearing dead to all senses. At the time he enters this state, he indicates a preset period of time or a triggering condition, after which he awakens.

Kin to the Old Tales.name: Kin to the Old Tales（Kin to the Old Tales）
Kin to the Old Tales.description: At 20th level, your soul becomes host to the otherworldly energies of the harrow. You gain DR 10/cold iron and immunity to curses, paralysis, and sleep. You can always act in the surprise round of combat, and you cannot be caught flat-footed. You gain unlimited use of your invoke the harrow ability.

Kinetic Awe.name: Kinetic Awe（Kinetic Awe）
Kinetic Awe.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  You create a terrifying display of elemental power. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧}, except you can use this ability as a standard action and you add half your kineticist level as a bonus on your Intimidate check if you閳ユ獫e used gather power during the same round; doing so expends the gathered power. This ability otherwise counts as the @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} feat; feats and other effects which affect @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} (such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.kn854Ovz0BDA2Dgz]{粉碎防御}) apply to it, and it counts as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} for the purpose of meeting combat feat prerequisites.

Kinetic Blade Infusion.name: 念刃（Kinetic Blade Infusion）
Kinetic Blade Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：1；超载：1

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：无

  你使用念袭能力塑造出一把武器。你在手中创造出一个不属于长触及（non-reach）的、轻型或单手武器，它由纯粹的能量或者元素物质构成。若你使用的是心灵念力（即以太），则变为将念袭的力量注入任何单手可以持握的物体中作为替代。念刃的形状仅是单纯的装饰，它不会影响念刃的伤害骰（damage dice）、重击威胁范围（critical threat range）、或重击倍率（critical multiplier），也不会让念刃获得任何武器特殊特性。使用心灵念力的操念使手中的物体如果处于这个塑形注能的影响下，便不会妨碍念力凝聚（Gather Power）的使用。

  为了使用你的念刃进行近战攻击，你可以以一次攻击动作（attack action）、冲锋动作（charge action）、或者全力攻击动作（full-attack action）的一部分使用这个塑形注能。由于这是其他动作的一部分（而且其本身并非是一个动作），使用这个原力不会引起任何额外的藉机攻击。念刃每次命中均会造成你的念袭伤害（如常应用所有念袭带来的调整值，而非你的力量调整值）。念刃会在你的回合结束时消失。武器造成的伤害类型与你的念袭相同。即便使用心灵念力的操念使将这股力量用在魔法武器或其他不寻常的物体上，由此作出的攻击也不会使用任何魔法武器的加值或效果，而且只会造成念袭的伤害。念刃不会获得元素满溢（Elemental Overflow）带来的伤害加值。

Kinetic Cover.name: 念力掩体（Kinetic Cover）
Kinetic Cover.description:
元素：以太、土或水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  你呼唤出元素物质保护自己和盟友免受攻击。以标准动作，你能够选择30尺内一个方格的一面，并将元素物质堵在那里，对于来自方向的攻击提供全掩蔽（total cover）。你选择的那面方向必须有地面支撑，而且念力掩体也无法支撑超过5磅的重量。水、冰和心灵念力是透明的，土、金属、泥和类似的物质是不透明的，并且会遮挡视觉线。攻击掩体的生物可以轻松摧毁它。无论掩体是由什么构成的，它的硬度均为0点，AC为5，生命值总和为每个操念使等级2点。你可以让多个念力掩体同时存在，数量等同于你的体质调整值 + 你的操念使等级的一半。

Kinetic Dissolution.name: Kinetic Dissolution（Kinetic Dissolution）
Kinetic Dissolution.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite wayang, chosen racial trait

  Choose either the dissolution閳ユ獨 child alternate racial trait or the light and dark racial trait. You can use the chosen racial trait by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that racial trait remaining.

Kinetic Fist Infusion.name: 念拳（Kinetic Fist Infusion）
Kinetic Fist Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：1；超载：1

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：无

  你用来自念袭能力的能量或者元素物质围绕着身体。你可以以一次攻击动作（attack action）、冲锋动作（charge action）、或者全力攻击动作（full-attack action）的一部分来使用这个塑形注能，以此来将伤害添加到你的每个天生攻击（natural attacks）和徒手打击（unarmed strikes）上，直至你的下个回合开始为止。由于念拳是其他动作的一部分，使用这个原力不会引起任何额外的藉机攻击。你的念袭每具有3个伤害骰，便可以附加额外1d6点伤害（最低1d6点），这个伤害与你的念袭的伤害类型相同。这些额外伤害会忽略法术抗力（spell resistance），而且不会受到任何你的念袭伤害的调整，比如你的体质调整值。

Kinetic Form.name: 念力之躯（Kinetic Form）
Kinetic Form.description:
元素：通用；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：5；超载：1

  你能让自己的身体漂浮在大量的元素物质中。直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止，你能够以标准动作将自身的体型变为大型或者恢复到原有的体型。这不会以任何方式改变你的属性。16级起，你能够额外承受1点超载来使得自身的体型变为超大型（Huge）作为替代。你不能使用念力之躯来缩小自身的体型。

Kinetic Healer.name: 念力医者（Kinetic Healer）
Kinetic Healer.description:
元素：以太或水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：1；见后文

  豁免：无；法术抗力：可

  通过一次接触，你能够治疗一名自愿的活物，恢复的数值等同于念袭的伤害量。你可以让接受者承受1点超载，来取代你自己承受的超载消耗。若你这么做的话，接受者会受到等同于自身生命骰数量的非致命伤害，就好像承受了超载一般；这个伤害无法被任何方式治愈，接受者只有经过整夜（full night）的休息才可以恢复超载带来的伤害。

Kinetic Restoration.name: Kinetic Restoration（Kinetic Restoration）
Kinetic Restoration.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 1

  You recover from 1d4 points of ability score damage to one of your physical ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution). This also eliminates any fatigue that you suffer, and improves an exhaustion condition to fatigued.

If you have the kinetic healer utility wild talent, you can use both kineticist restoration and kinetic healer on the same target with one standard action.

Kinetic Revivification.name: Kinetic Revivification（Kinetic Revivification）
Kinetic Revivification.description:
Element aether, water; Type utility (Su); Level 6; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite kinetic healer

  You can bring an ally who died within 1 round back from the dead with your kinetic healer wild talent similarly to the breath of life spell, except the ally regains the normal number of hit points from the kinetic healer utility wild talent instead of the amount healed by breath of life. An ally revived in this way takes 1 point of burn + any points of burn from the kinetic healer utility wild talent (if you choose to have the ally take points of burn instead of taking it yourself).

If you have the metahealer ability (such as from the kinetic chirurgeon kineticist archetype found on page 90 of Occult Adventures), this feat instead allows you to bring an ally back who died within a number of rounds equal to 3 + the ally閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier (minimum 0) 閳?the number of points of burn the ally had taken before it died. For each round that the ally was dead, when it is brought back to life in this way, it takes 1 additional point of burn + any points of burn from the kinetic healer talent.

Kinetic Whip Infusion.name: 念鞭（Kinetic Whip Infusion）
Kinetic Whip Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：3；超载：2

  前置：念刃（kinetic blade）

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：无

  你用能量和元素物质塑造出长而卷曲的鞭子。该效果的功能如同念刃一般，但是被视为符合你的体型的长触及武器（reach weapon）。与大多数长触及武器不同，念鞭也能够攻击邻近的生物。念鞭会在你的下个回合开始时消失，但是在此之前的期间内，它会威胁触及范围内的所有方格，使得你可以做出藉机攻击，并造成长鞭（whip）的正常伤害。

Knockout Queen.name: Knockout Queen（Knockout Queen）
Knockout Queen.description: Sabriune has passed on the secret of swiftly manufacturing drow poison. Once per day, the rogue can create 1 or more doses of drow poison by spending 25 gp per dose; this process takes 30 minutes of work, regardless of the number of doses she creates. She can create no more than 1 dose for every 3 rogue levels she has (minimum 1 dose). Creating drow poison in this way does not require a skill check, but the created poison spoils if not used within 24 hours. (This spoilage means that selling doses of this poison for a profit to unsuspecting merchants might well result in unwanted repercussions and reprisals!)

Kobold Bloodline.name: Kobold Bloodline（Kobold Bloodline）
Kobold Bloodline.description:
The following bloodline is available to kobold sorcerers.

  While many kobold sorcerers tout their purely draconic bloodline, over generations of eldritch training, some such spellcasters have created a bloodline that, while tinged with some draconic magic, is the embodiment of the race閳ユ獨 virtue distilled into arcane form. Many practitioners of this bloodline go on to lead powerful kobold tribes.

  本职技能: Disable Device

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nee6cxpoekp3aklq]{魔法警报} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8w67l6dzzsi6oz5f]{造坑术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4ywdvsm1oty8blq]{爆裂符文} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cdedzw5d9ui73ua7]{龙息术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bdyr9oebse6haser]{化石为泥} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8z4tlk1fojr9t9yb]{铜墙铁壁} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{延迟爆裂火球} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv14vemq9gduhyhu]{Form Of The Alien Dragon III} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{防御式战斗训练},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell against a creature that is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC, increase that spell閳ユ獨 DC by +2.

Kundalini Infusion.name: Kundalini Infusion（Kundalini Infusion）
Kundalini Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite ki pool, kinetic fist
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw Fortitude partial

  You infuse your elemental energy with kundalini serpent fire. Choose a chakra you can currently open; you must accept an amount of burn equal to the chakra閳ユ獨 number (1 for root, 2 for sacral, and so on). Your unarmed strikes with the infused blast cause the target to suffer the effects of blocking the chosen chakra as per the Block Chakras or Block Upper Chakras feat. You can use this infusion only while also using the kinetic fist form infusion.

Kyton Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Kyton Bloodrager Bloodline（Kyton Bloodrager Bloodline）
Kyton Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
In the shadowy land of Nidal, the influence of Zon-Kuthon and the Midnight Lord閳ユ獨 favored servants閳ユ敄he kytons閳?taints the land and its inhabitants. Just as an eclipse drives animals wild, so too does the darkness unleash a madness from deep within you.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器} (spiked chain),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • Improved Dirty Trick,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijtqp1h3hka5kive]{Persuasive Goad} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jy64xofud29j5ju6]{痛苦打击} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{恐惧术} (16th)

Kyton Immunities.name: Kyton Immunities（Kyton Immunities）
Kyton Immunities.description: At 20th level, you gain immunity to cold and DR 10/good and silver. You have this benefit constantly, even when not bloodraging.

Kyton Subdomain.name: Kyton Subdomain（Kyton Subdomain）
Kyton Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6zv90r375b5ha994]{Delay Pain}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.429wzxjzm1chnsq7]{Instrument of Agony}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kna8nhxmk5b6m6e8]{Agonize}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k6nfhf1wvik082wu]{痛苦徽记}

Labyrinthine Words.name: Labyrinthine Words（Labyrinthine Words）
Labyrinthine Words.description: You add your Wisdom modifier in addition to your Charisma modifier on Bluff checks to lie and Diplomacy checks to influence other creatures.

Large (4 pts).name: Large (4 pts)（Large (4 pts)）
Large (4 pts).description:
An eidolon grows in size, becoming Large. The eidolon gains a +8 bonus to Strength, a +4 bonus to Constitution, and a +2 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to its Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to its AC and on attack rolls, a +1 bonus to its CMB and CMD, a 閳? penalty on Fly skill checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth skill checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, it also gains 10-foot reach. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. The eidolon must be Medium to take this evolution. The summoner must be at least 8th level before selecting this evolution.

If 6 additional evolution points are spent, the eidolon instead becomes Huge. The eidolon gains a +16 bonus to Strength, a +8 bonus to Constitution, and a +5 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to its Dexterity. This size change also give the creature a 閳? size penalty to its AC and attack rolls, a +2 bonus to its CMB and CMD, 10-foot reach, a 閳? penalty on Fly skill checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth skill checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, its reach increases to 15 feet (10 feet for all other base forms). Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. These bonuses and penalties replace, and do not stack with, those gained from becoming Large.

  The summoner must be at least 13th level before selecting this option.

The ability increase evolution costs twice as much (4 evolution points) when adding to the Strength or Constitution scores of a Large or Huge eidolon.

Large (UC) (4 pts).name: Large (UC) (4 pts)（Large (UC) (4 pts)）
Large (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 8th (13th for Huge), Medium size.

  The eidolon grows in size, becoming Large. The eidolon gains a +4 bonus to Strength, a +2 bonus to Constitution, and a +2 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to AC and on attack rolls, a +1 bonus on combat maneuver checks and to CMD, a 閳? penalty on Fly checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, it also gains a reach of 10 feet. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total.

If 6 additional evolution points are spent, the eidolon instead becomes Huge. The eidolon gains a +8 bonus to Strength, a +4 bonus to Constitution, and a +5 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to AC and on attack rolls, a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks and to CMD, a 10-foot reach, a 閳? penalty on Fly checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, its reach increases to 15 feet instead of 10 feet. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. These bonuses and penalties replace, and do not stack with, those gained from becoming Large.

The ability increase evolution costs twice as much (4 evolution points) when adding to the Strength or Constitution scores of a Large or Huge eidolon.

Last Ditch Effort.name: Last Ditch Effort（Last Ditch Effort）
Last Ditch Effort.description: Once per day, a rogue with this ability who accidentally activates a trap while attempting to disarm it may immediately attempt another Disable Device check to disarm it, albeit at a 閳? penalty. The result of the second check is taken even if the result is lower.

Lasting Tinctures.name: Lasting Tinctures（Lasting Tinctures）
Lasting Tinctures.description: The alchemist knows how to make tinctures that last much longer than normal. The durations of the effects of any tinctures the alchemist brews using the Craft skill are doubled. When the alchemist uses this discovery to brew a longer-lasting tincture, the tincture imposes its normal penalties on the alchemist even if the alchemist has an ability that reduces tinctures閳?penalties (such as the substance tolerance ability of the fermenter alchemist archetype presented in this section). An alchemist with this discovery can brew tinctures with normal durations.

Lava Walk.name: Lava Walk（Lava Walk）
Lava Walk.description:
You can walk across lava, magma, and similarly heated stone at your normal movement speed. You are immune to any fire damage caused by the surface while you walk above it, even if it radiates damage at a distance. While using lava walk, you never slip or fall from poor or slippery footing. You can use lava walk for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration doesn閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.

Lay to Rest.name: Lay to Rest（Lay to Rest）
Lay to Rest.description:
The witch may target a single undead creature with this hex as if with an @Compendium[pf1.spells.lllhr9py6w44cxjm]{亡灵归亡} spell. A Will save negates this effect.

  Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Leadership.name: Leadership（Leadership）
Leadership.description: 在8级时，你获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力} 作为额外专长。此外，只要你一直遵守你的神祇的教义（若你不信仰特定神祇则改为神圣信条），你的领导力数值就拥有+2加值。

Leap and Bound.name: Leap and Bound（Leap and Bound）
Leap and Bound.description:
A vigilante with this talent adds his Strength bonus on Acrobatics checks in addition to his Dexterity modifier. He is always treated as having a running start when jumping, and his high jumps are treated as long jumps when determining the DC. When the vigilante jumps, he does not fall until the end of his turn, allowing him to attack or perform other actions in midair. If the vigilante grapples a creature capable of bearing his weight, he does not fall, instead remaining adjacent to the creature as it moves.

  A vigilante must be at least 10th level to select this talent.

Leathery Skin.name: Leathery Skin（Leathery Skin）
Leathery Skin.description: At 3rd level, you gain cold resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus to AC. At 9th level, your cold resistance increases to 10 and natural armor bonus increases to +2. At 15th level, your natural armor bonus increases to +4.

Leave an Opening.name: Leave an Opening（Leave an Opening）
Leave an Opening.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 hidden strike leaves an unbalancing opening in a foe閳ユ獨 defenses, setting up the foe to be attacked again. At the beginning of the foe閳ユ獨 next turn, if the vigilante threatens the foe, the foe provokes an attack of opportunity from the vigilante. Multiple attacks against the same foe don閳ユ獩 create multiple attacks of opportunity in the same round (but attacks against several foes can cause each to provoke one attack of opportunity).

  Only a stalker vigilante can select this talent.

Legacy Conduit.name: Legacy Conduit（Legacy Conduit）
Legacy Conduit.description: At 16th level, when using the legacy style bloodline power, you can expend a spell slot as a swift action to share the benefits of the selected style feat with all allies within 30 feet. The benefits last for 1 round per level of the spell slot expended. Allies must still enter the style閳ユ獨 stance as a swift action.

Legacy Style.name: Legacy Style（Legacy Style）
Legacy Style.description: At 8th level, select any one style feat. You can use this style feat while bloodraging; however, if you do not meet all of the style feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites, you must expend a spell slot when entering the style閳ユ獨 stance, and the benefits last for only 1 round per level of the spell slot expended or for the duration of your bloodrage, whichever is shorter. If you already have this style feat, you can enter the style閳ユ獨 stance as part of the free action to bloodrage.

Legacy Weapon.name: 武器馈赠（Legacy Weapon）
Legacy Weapon.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点触摸一个武器给予它增强加值。该加值等于1+每6个秘学士等级1点（最高18级+4）。本能力给予的增强加值可以与武器本身的叠加，但最高不得超过+5。你也可以不直接给予武器增强加值而是给予武器特殊属性，用特殊属性等效增强加值替换你本应给予的增强加值同额数值。在被赋予特殊属性前，目标物必须至少有+1增强加值（来自物品本身或武器馈赠能力）。一般而言，该能力的增强加值持续1分钟。

Legend Subdomain.name: Legend Subdomain（Legend Subdomain）
Legend Subdomain.description:
替代神授力量 In campaigns that use the optional hero point system (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 322), you gain Hero閳ユ獨 Fortune (Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 324) as a bonus feat. Otherwise, you gain Marked for Glory (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 69) as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet its prerequisites.

  替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{援助术}, 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wcvosazm31i8758]{Contagious Zeal}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dm52jk1e37b05v9d]{正义狂热}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.p4h6ocn0axh59xrc]{Unshakable Zeal}
  • If you are evil, replace the domain spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{圣光击}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.osi62mwn6rpkwlm6]{圣剑术}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{圣洁灵光} with @Compendium[pf1.spells.okui7mft5bquqfrg]{邪影击}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.ftrg3ira8jwicetv]{Unholy Sword}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{邪恶灵光} respectively.

Legendary Archmage.name: 传奇大法师（Legendary Archmage）
Legendary Archmage.description: 每天一次，你可以施放任意一个在法师/术士列表内的法术，无需使用法术位，无视环数限制，也不会增加英灵的共鸣。

Legendary Champion.name: 传奇勇士（Legendary Champion）
Legendary Champion.description: 每当你降灵勇士时，你就可以获得两个战斗专长（每次降灵可更改）。在决定专长的先决条件和它们的效果时，将你的通灵者等级视为你的基础攻击加值。在选择这两个专长时，你还可以将你的通灵者等级视为某一满基础攻击加值（如战士，野蛮人，杀手）的等级以决定先决条件。

Legendary Guardian.name: 传奇守护者（Legendary Guardian）
Legendary Guardian.description: 每天一次，你可以以一个即时动作忽略对你发动的单次攻击，包括目标为你或是范围包括你的法术效果。但是你无法保护其他生物。

Legendary Hierophant.name: 传奇大祭司（Legendary Hierophant）
Legendary Hierophant.description: 每天一次，你可以召唤一次神迹，这个效果必须符合不消耗钻石尘的法术奇迹术的限制，影响与奇迹术相同。这个英灵所侍奉的神祇或其他类似存在决定是否赐予你这个神迹。

Legendary Marshal.name: 传奇统帅（Legendary Marshal）
Legendary Marshal.description: 你在使用较弱的英灵时使用灵力奔涌不会再增加任何共鸣，但这样使用灵力奔涌会使它的增加数值永久性固定为1d6，无法通过任何途径提升。较弱英灵的灵力奔涌仍然受到每轮最多一次的限制，但不再造成任何共鸣增长，也不计入其他可以避免共鸣增加而使用灵力奔涌的次数中。

Legendary Trickster.name: 传奇诡术师（Legendary Trickster）
Legendary Trickster.description: 每天一次，你在进行一次技能检定时可以不必投骰，直接选择一个随意d20的结果。除此之外，你可以随意变化自身的形象，如同法术高等变形术（Greater Polymorph）的效果，但你无法变形成一个特定角色的样子。

Legislation Subdomain.name: Legislation Subdomain（Legislation Subdomain）
Legislation Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mmdypasgl5us00wb]{Forbid Action}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gn1u9cjc9phsczec]{Forbid Action, Greater}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fjekm39re35y3kot]{Hold Monster, Mass}

Leshy Caller.name: Leshy Caller（Leshy Caller）
Leshy Caller.description:
You can spontaneously swap out any of your domain spells for a summon nature閳ユ獨 ally spell of the same level or lower, to a maximum of summon nature閳ユ獨 ally VII. If you do, you must use the spell to summon one or more leshys. Add leaf leshy, gourd leshy, fungus leshy, seaweed leshy, and lotus leshy to your summon nature閳ユ獨 ally I, II, III, IV, and V lists, respectively. You count as a plant creature for the purpose of creating leshys (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 3 176).

As a standard action, you can grant a single leshy within 30 feet a +4 sacred bonus on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Wooden Fist power of the Plant Domain.

Leshy Subdomain.name: Leshy Subdomain（Leshy Subdomain）
Leshy Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ho3wsspkqkhypt0]{树化术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.icjrw9y6pa1uatlz]{问道自然}

Leshy Summoning Hex.name: Leshy Summoning Hex（Leshy Summoning Hex）
Leshy Summoning Hex.description: The witch counts as a plant creature for the purpose of growing leshys. She adds leaf leshys, gourd leshys, fungus leshys, seaweed leshys, and lotus leshys to the list of creatures she can summon with @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{召唤怪物 I}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.26vm5jhjkxpq1xm3]{召唤怪物 II}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zmn8vqy3s5l9kiv]{召唤怪物 III}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{召唤怪物 V}, respectively.

Lethal Grace.name: 致命优雅（Lethal Grace）
Lethal Grace.description: 侠客的攻击兼具破坏性的蛮力和巧妙的运用平衡与速度，在他想要的时候能够造成可怕的创伤。侠客获得武器娴熟作为奖励专长。如果他已经拥有了武器娴熟专长，那么侠客可以转而获得一个他在获得武器娴熟的那个等级上满足先决条件的任意专长。当侠客使用武器娴熟专长，以自己的敏捷调整值决定攻击加值但是以力量调整值决定伤害加值的情况下，他可以在伤害检定上获得相当于他的侠客等级一半的加值。这个加值不会因为侠客使用双手武器或是副手使用武器攻击而受到任何影响。

Lethality (Stare).name: Lethality (Stare)（Lethality (Stare)）
Lethality (Stare).description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to the target閳ユ獨 Fortitude saves versus poison and diseases.

Levitation Buffer.name: 念力救援（Levitation Buffer）
Levitation Buffer.description: 催眠师的念力会突然袭向受术者周边的敌人，从而让她避开威胁。当一名敌人移动至与受术者相邻的位置、或者当受术者的回合开始时有一个或更多敌人与其相邻时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。催眠师能够让受术者身边相邻的所有敌人漂浮到空中，或者把敌人推离受术者。抬起敌人会让他们的移动速度减半，并且在对抗冲撞（rush）、拖拽（drag）和移位（reposition）的尝试时CMD受到-4减值（意志豁免，通过则无效）。移动速度的减少和CMD受到的减值不会与恶意浮空（Hostile Levitation；UC）法术带来的惩罚叠加。推离敌人需要催眠师尝试一次冲撞战技检定，使用他的等级 + 他的魅力调整值作为该次检定的CMB。成功以该诡计从受术者身边推开的任何敌人都按照冲撞的正常规则进行判定。

Life Link (SHA).name: Life Link (SHA)（Life Link (SHA)）
Life Link (SHA).description:
The shaman creates a bond between herself and another creature within 30 feet. Each round at the start of the shaman閳ユ獨 turn, if the bonded creature is wounded for 5 or more hit points below its maximum hit points, it heals 5 hit points and the shaman takes 5 points of damage. The shaman can have one bond active per shaman level. The bond continues until the bonded creature dies, the shaman dies, the distance between her and the bonded creature exceeds 100 feet, or the shaman ends it as an immediate action.

  If the shaman has multiple bonds active, she can end as many as she wants with the same immediate action.

Life Revier.name: Life Revier（Life Revier）
Life Revier.description: The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts an Intelligence or Knowledge check to remember a previous experience. The subject receives flashes of her entire life up to this point. She can use the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier in place of her Intelligence modifier on the check, and she can attempt the check untrained. The subject cannot learn information that she has not previously read, heard, or otherwise experienced at some point during her life when using this ability.

Lifesense (4 pts).name: Lifesense (4 pts)（Lifesense (4 pts)）
Lifesense (4 pts).description:
An eidolon can pinpoint living creatures with ease. The eidolon notices and locates living creatures within 60 feet, just as if it possessed the blindsight evolution.

  The eidolon must possess the undead appearance evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

Light Matrix.name: 光之矩阵（Light Matrix）
Light Matrix.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出听从命令环绕你的光球。光球如同光亮术一般发光。光球可以命令停留在你肩膀上一同移动。以一个移动动作，你可以直接命令它移动最远到离你30尺的位置。若它距离你超过30尺，会立刻返回肩膀上盘旋。若你至少有5级，你可以命令它（如上移动动作）对30尺内一个生物进行近战接触攻击。若攻击命中，目标必须进行强韧豁免检定，失败则目盲1d4轮。若攻击命中，无论目标豁免是否成功，光球消失。光之矩阵持续每秘学士等级1小时。同一时间你无法用用多余1个的光球。若你在有效期间再次使用该能力，第一个光球立刻消失。

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod（Lightning Rod）
Lightning Rod.description:
As a swift action when you cast a spell with the electricity descriptor, you can designate one creature within line of sight. The spell閳ユ獨 damage against that creature increases by 50%, as if affected by the Empower Spell feat. This additional damage results from divine power that is not subject to being reduced by electricity resistance, and you take an equal amount of electricity damage immediately after you cast the spell. The spell can deal this additional damage only once, even if it could affect the target multiple times. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every 4 cleric levels you have beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Electricity Resistance power granted by the Air Domain.

Limbs (2 pts).name: Limbs (2 pts)（Limbs (2 pts)）
Limbs (2 pts).description:
An eidolon grows an additional pair of limbs. These limbs can take one of two forms. They can be made into legs, complete with feet. Each pair of legs increases the eidolon's base speed by 10 feet. Alternatively, they can be made into arms, complete with hands. The eidolon does not gain any additional natural attacks for an additional pair of arms, but it can take other evolutions that add additional attacks (such as claws or a slam). Arms that have hands can be used to wield weapons, if the eidolon is proficient.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

Limbs (UC) (2 pts).name: Limbs (UC) (2 pts)（Limbs (UC) (2 pts)）
Limbs (UC) (2 pts).description:
The eidolon grows an additional pair of limbs. These limbs can take one of two forms. They can be made into legs, complete with feet. Each pair of legs increases the eidolon閳ユ獨 base speed by 10 feet.

  Alternatively, they can be made into arms, complete with hands. The eidolon does not gain any additional natural attacks for an additional pair of arms, but it can take other evolutions that add additional attacks (such as claws or slam). Arms that have hands can be used to wield weapons, if the eidolon is proficient.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

Lingering Plague.name: Lingering Plague（Lingering Plague）
Lingering Plague.description:
Any creature that must make a save against a disease caused by the alchemist閳ユ獨 extract or other class ability must make a second save 1 round later to avoid doubling the duration of the disease effect. If the disease doesn閳ユ獩 have a duration, this discovery reduces its onset time and frequencies by half.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

Lingering Poison.name: Lingering Poison（Lingering Poison）
Lingering Poison.description: A rogue with this talent can have a poison remain inert until a later time. When she delivers a contact or injury poison, instead of the poison閳ユ獨 normal onset time, the rogue can delay the poison閳ユ獨 effects until up to 1 day from when it is delivered (minimum 1 round). The delayed poison can be detected as normal by spells such as detect poison and similar abilities.

Lingering Spirits.name: Lingering Spirits（Lingering Spirits）
Lingering Spirits.description:
Numerous minor spirits find themselves attracted to you. Your connection with these spirits allows you to manifest any of the following spell-like abilities as a swift action: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z3ysa1xxmzgj14sd]{Grave Words}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6k11j4pvmkka4e9]{Telekinetic Projectile}

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Lingering Venom.name: Lingering Venom（Lingering Venom）
Lingering Venom.description:
Poisons that the investigator personally applies to weapons and traps, or otherwise inflicts upon foes, require one additional successful save to cure.

  An investigator must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Link (SPI).name: 连结(唤魂师)（Link (SPI)）
Link (SPI).description: 魅影与唤魂师共享精神连结，并允许他们在任何距离互相沟通（只要他们在同一个位面）。沟通是一个自由动作，允许唤魂师随时对魅影下达指令。此外，唤魂师的魔法物品也会干涉魅影——这使得唤魂师与其魅影共享魔法物品的装备位。譬如，当唤魂师佩戴一只戒指，那么她的魅影也最多只能佩戴一只戒指。若两者发生冲突，唤魂师的魔法物品依然生效，而魅影的则会失效。魅影必须有合适的肢体来装备魔法物品。

Linked Reaction.name: 应激联结（Linked Reaction）
Linked Reaction.description: 一种集体意识联通了催眠师和一名盟友，让他们能够共享彼此的反应力。当受术者或者催眠师被突袭（surprised）且另一方没有被突袭时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计（即便在通常情况下催眠师由于被突袭而无法执行动作，他也能触发这项诡计）。催眠师以及受术者都可以在这个突袭轮（surprise round）中行动。催眠师不能为自己植入该项诡计。

Lion Aspect.name: Lion Aspect（Lion Aspect）
Lion Aspect.description:
Lions hunt in prides, cooperating to bring down large opponents and defend their territory. A lion閳ユ獨 alternate attack is bite (B, P, S).

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Intimidate checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a dire lion. While in this form, you gain a base speed of 40 feet, low-light vision, and scent (30 feet). Once per day for every 2 shifter levels you have, you can utter a mighty roar, allowing you to attempt an Intimidate check with a +5 circumstance bonus to demoralize enemies within 30 feet. Allies gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls against creatures affected by this ability.

  At 8th level, you gain one of the following teamwork feats as a bonus feat: Outflank, Pack Attack, Paired Opportunists, or Shake It Off. You can grant allies within 30 feet the benefits of this feat as a swift action for a number of rounds equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  At 15th level, you provide a flanking bonus to any ally who threatens the same opponent as you do, and you can change places with an adjacent ally as a move action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity, as if using the Swap Places feat.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

Live On.name: 苟延残喘（Live On）
Live On.description: 5级起，你能够使用圣疗（lay on hands），就如同你是一名等级为异能者等级-3的圣武士一般。你还可以使用恩惠（Mercy），就如同你是一名等级为异能者等级-3的圣武士一般。通过苦痛精神境界获得的圣疗和恩惠仅能以你自己为目标。该能力与其他来源获得的圣疗能力叠加。

Living Capacitor.name: Living Capacitor（Living Capacitor）
Living Capacitor.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 2; Burn 0

  You store electricity damage you take within your body, as if you constantly had @Compendium[pf1.spells.0g0pgsbjns61ovln]{Body Capacitance} active. Once you discharge this electricity damage via a touch attack, you must take electricity damage again before you can discharge it again.

Living Paradox.name: Living Paradox（Living Paradox）
Living Paradox.description: At 20th level, your outward appearance remains the same, but beneath your skin lies not flesh and blood but clockwork gears, miniature galaxies, or something equally uncanny. You gain immunity to disease and poison. You take no additional damage from bleed effects, critical hits, and sneak attacks.

Living Pigment.name: Living Pigment（Living Pigment）
Living Pigment.description: The alchemist infuses his inks and dyes with a spark of animating force. As a standard action, he can expend one daily use of his bombs and a 1st-level extract he has prepared to create a creature, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{召唤怪物 I}, using his level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. The extract is expended as if the alchemist had consumed it. The alchemist can expend a higher-level extract when using this ability to create a creature using a summon monster spell of a level equal to the level of extract expended. For example, if the alchemist expends a 4th-level extract, he can create a creature as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}. Additionally, the alchemist can expend an additional use of his daily bombs when creating a creature in this way to grant the creature the celestial or fiendish template. The alchemist must have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.

Living Shield.name: 人盾（Living Shield）
Living Shield.description: 如果侠客正擒抱着一个生物且他自己被一次攻击指定为目标，那么侠客可以以一个即时动作，对被他擒抱的生物发动一次战技检定（这个战技检定不视为擒抱战技检定）将正在被他擒抱的生物拉到自己身前。如果战技检定成功，那么被侠客擒抱的这个生物会成为这次攻击的新目标；如果战技检定失败，那么被擒抱的生物会立刻逃脱并且侠客正常被攻击。这个天赋必须在侠客被宣告为一次攻击的目标，但攻击者的攻击检定结果得出之前使用。

Living Swarm.name: Living Swarm（Living Swarm）
Living Swarm.description: At 20th level, you and the machines within you become one. Your nanites consume and replicate your body, allowing swift and radical physical alterations with little more than a thought. You become immune to bleed effects, diseases, and poisons, and gain DR 5/閳? At will, you can break down your body and move in a shimmering stream of flying nanites, as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体}.

Lizard Aspect.name: 蜥蜴拟态（Lizard Aspect）
Lizard Aspect.description:
蜥蜴拟态是迅捷且优雅运动的代名词，给予了能以惊人灵活性与平衡性来突进急转的能力。

  次级形态：你的特技检定获得+4表现加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+6。15级时，这个加值提升至+8。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只灵敏的色彩斑斓的巨大蜥蜴（如同怪物图鉴 pg. 194 巨伞蜥，但有如下改动）。当处于该形态时，你获得40尺基本移动速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、附带攫抓能力的1d8伤害的啮咬攻击（主要天生武器）和附带绊摔的1d6伤害的尾扫攻击（次要天生武器）。8级时，你的基本移动速度提升至60尺和获得30尺攀爬速度。15级时，你获得啮咬和尾扫的精通天生武器攻击专长，并且你的尾扫攻击的触及提升至10尺。

Location Channel.name: 呼唤地缚灵（Location Channel）
Location Channel.description: 在5级时，通灵者可以在某人死去——或是他曾经生活过的地点执行一次特殊的降灵仪式，暂时将死者的魂灵唤回并寄宿在他的体内，使生者可以与他交流。这个能力的效果相当于一个法术Call Spirit（见本书），不过死者之魂只能停留相当于每通灵者等级1轮的时间，并且凭依在通灵者的身体上而不是独立以游魂的状态现形。每当通灵者尝试呼唤地缚灵后，他将在24小时内无法呼唤同一个魂灵。降灵后每轮之中通灵者都可以通过一个一个成功的意志检定（DC=20+通灵者等级的一半）结束地缚灵的凭依。

Loci Sentry.name: 区域哨兵（Loci Sentry）
Loci Sentry.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出守卫区域的哨兵。区域最大半径为10尺+每秘学士等级5尺。当有生物进入区域内时，由你灵魂显化的哨兵立刻出现并攻击入侵者。受影响者必须通过意志豁免，失败则眩晕1轮。你会立刻得知哨兵被触发。哨兵最高持续每秘学士等级1小时，或直到被触发。当你设置哨兵时，你可以设置任意数目的生物免疫哨兵不会触发它。

Lore Discipline.name: 学识境界（Lore Discipline）
Lore Discipline.description:
通过收集专门的讯息和阅读各类神秘学相关的著作和书籍，你习得了适宜的技巧和仪式用以强化自身的精神能力。力量会随着你的研究和知识的积累而日益变强，而不是凭藉着自身的本能来强化。

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{通晓语言} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pyr472hvqn8c8es2]{Hypercognition} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vrzgrnmiz8kmz6di]{Mind Probe} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nv20ki8uteao1vqv]{Retrocognition} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ln4jpuurxbrfxw5j]{Arcane Sight, Greater} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q8nety5obvbbd5xs]{Divide Mind} (18th).

Low-Light Vision (1 pt).name: Low-Light Vision (1 pt)（Low-Light Vision (1 pt)）
Low-Light Vision (1 pt).description: An eidolon gains low-light vision, enabling it to see twice as far as a human in conditions of dim light.

Loyal Aid.name: 忠诚助手（Loyal Aid）
Loyal Aid.description: 侠客拥有一群对他忠心耿耿的伙伴，这些盟友可以帮他搜集情报，掩饰他的双重身份，或是打理些侠客无暇顾及的事务。如果侠客身处在他拥有声誉影响的地区之中时，他会在用于搜集信息的交涉检定上获得相当于他的侠客等级一半的加值。

Loyalty Subdomain.name: Loyalty Subdomain（Loyalty Subdomain）
Loyalty Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.eu4u4mr1naoiqohz]{移除恐惧}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术}

Luminous Form.name: Luminous Form（Luminous Form）
Luminous Form.description:
You can transform your body into churning light, granting you the effects of blur and causing your body to shed light as a sunrod.

  At 7th level, creatures that end their turn adjacent to your luminous form become blinded for 1 round (Fortitude negates).

  At 13th level, creatures that end their turn adjacent to your luminous form are blinded for 1d4 rounds (Fortitude reduces to 1 round).

  At 18th level, your luminescence is as bright as natural sunlight, and creatures affected by natural sunlight are so affected if they end their turn adjacent to your luminous form.

  You can maintain your luminous form for up to 1 minute per day per oracle level; this duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments. You can forgo the blur and blinding aspects of this ability to instead simply shed light as a torch, though this still counts against the ability閳ユ獨 duration for the day.

Lunar Final Revelation.name: Lunar Final Revelation（Lunar Final Revelation）
Lunar Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of the primal world閳ユ攽art humanoid, part beast. Once per day, you can transform into a lycanthrope of your choice for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier, gaining all the powers of a natural lycanthrope of that type, including the ability to change shape between human, animal, and hybrid form. In addition, you become immune to mind-affecting and language-dependent effects, as well as effects that specifically target only humanoids.

Lunar Mystery.name: Lunar Mystery（Lunar Mystery）
Lunar Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the lunar mystery adds Acrobatics, Knowledge (Nature), Perception, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dol5wzpsk7m6gxsc]{Fumbletongue} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ech2cibcsmsms9s7]{Dust Of Twilight} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knjoprwzcm3jygwk]{狼之型} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cxp0vodhvuwnfmye]{Litany Of Madness} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8rf2ucrtzmxooyw6]{Lunar Veil} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1btrja5u0cz66cy8]{Blood Mist} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (18th).

Lycanthropy Curse.name: Lycanthropy Curse（Lycanthropy Curse）
Lycanthropy Curse.description:
You suffer from a minor form of lycanthropy. The exact animal your body and mind are aligned with can vary, but you should choose an animal that matches your faith thematically. In times of stress or unease, you cannot speak閳ユ攼nly growl and snarl like an animal. This ability works similarly to the tongues curse, but whenever you are in combat, you cannot speak at all. This does not interfere with spellcasting but does apply to spells that are language dependent. A character under the effects of speak with animals can understand you, and you can communicate with such characters normally. You can speak with animals when in this condition. Choose one type of animal commonly associated with lycanthropy (such as rats, wolves, or bears); you gain a +4 bonus on Handle Animal checks with these creatures.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{动物信使} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.
