  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjdfluulncmqacc3]{野兽形态 I} to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/silver, and if you already have this type of damage reduction, it increases in value by 5 (to a maximum of DR 15/silver).

Mad Rush.name: 一往无前（Mad Rush）
Mad Rush.description: 当他发动冲锋时，侠客可以在冲锋结束时发动整轮攻击，但作为代价他会直到自己的下回合开始前在防御等级上承受-4减值（与正常冲锋的-2AC罚值叠加）。只有达到12级并且选择复仇骑士之道的侠客才能选择本天赋。

Maddening Whispers.name: Maddening Whispers（Maddening Whispers）
Maddening Whispers.description:
At will as a standard action, the shaman can invoke whispers from spirits of the Dark Tapestry to speak directly into the mind of a single target within 30 feet. These whispers utilize no known language, yet the victim nevertheless feels convinced that, somehow, it was almost able to comprehend the message. The target must succeed at a Will saving throw or be confused for 1 round.

  At 8th level and again at 16th level, the confusion caused by this hex lasts for 1 additional round.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the shaman cannot target that creature with this hex again for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting effect.

Maelstrom Infusion.name: Maelstrom Infusion（Maelstrom Infusion）
Maelstrom Infusion.description:
Element water; Type substance infusion; Level 8; Burn 4
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts charged water, water
Saving Throw Reflex partial

  You create a 20-foot-radius whirling maelstrom in a body of water within 120 feet (the area of the maelstrom does not include any squares in the radius that aren閳ユ獩 in the water). Any creature in the maelstrom immediately takes one-quarter your blast閳ユ獨 normal damage regardless of whether it succeeds at its save. A creature that succeeds at its Reflex save can choose to exit the area at the closest space.

  A creature in the maelstrom must succeed at a DC 35 Swim check in order to swim, and any creature that enters the maelstrom or ends its turn in the maelstrom takes half your blast閳ユ獨 normal damage. As a free action at the beginning of your turn, you can position each creature in the maelstrom anywhere you choose within the affected area.

  This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier or until you use this infusion again. You can use grappling infusion with this infusion.

Maelstrom Jump.name: Maelstrom Jump（Maelstrom Jump）
Maelstrom Jump.description: The arcanist can call upon the randomness of the Maelstrom to move in unpredictable ways. She can expend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as a swift action to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} for 1 minute and move 10 feet in a random direction. For the next minute, she moves 10 feet in a random direction at the end of each of her turns. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity or count against her movement for the round. If the movement would end her movement in an occupied space, she instead travels to the nearest unoccupied space.

Mage of the Veil Subschool.name: Mage of the Veil Subschool（Mage of the Veil Subschool）
Mage of the Veil Subschool.description:
Rather than controlling the elements or transforming the environment, mages of the veil focus on much more subtle magic閳ユ攤lending into their surroundings to watch, observe, and gather secrets, or fading from view completely for the sake of solitude. Most graduates of this college become spies, scouts, or infiltrators.

  相关学派： Illusion.

  Requirements: A mage of the veil must select disguise self as one of his spells known at 1st level.

  本职技能: A mage of the veil gains 唬骗, Disguise, and 隐匿 as class skills.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the blinding ray and invisibility field powers of the illusion school.

Magic Attacks (1 pt).name: Magic Attacks (1 pt)（Magic Attacks (1 pt)）
Magic Attacks (1 pt).description:
An eidolon is infused with magic, allowing it to treat all of its natural attacks as if they were magic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the summoner is 10th level or higher, all of the eidolon's weapons are treated as the alignment of the eidolon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

Magic Attacks (SPI).name: Magic Attacks (SPI)（Magic Attacks (SPI)）
Magic Attacks (SPI).description:
When the phantom manifests in ectoplasmic form, it treats its slam attacks as if they were magic for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the spiritualist is 10th level or higher, all of the phantom閳ユ獨 weapons are treated as the alignment of the phantom for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

Magic Attacks (UC) (1 pt).name: Magic Attacks (UC) (1 pt)（Magic Attacks (UC) (1 pt)）
Magic Attacks (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon is infused with magic, allowing it to treat all of its natural attacks as if they were magic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the summoner is 10th level or higher, all of the eidolon閳ユ獨 natural attacks are treated as the alignment of the eidolon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

Magic Circles.name: 魔法阵（Magic Circles）
Magic Circles.description: 8级起，秘学士习得绘制魔法阵的方法。绘制魔法阵时，他必须拥有粉笔、盐、血、银粉或其他合适的物质在手（然而也有在软性地面如泥土或黏土上用画阴文的方式画魔法阵的方法）。绘制魔法阵需要1分钟并消耗1点心智点（灵器内心智点或共用心智点皆可）。完成后，魔法阵如同永久的反阵营法阵一般运作，但需完成时选择对抗的具体阵营。该魔法阵无法对抗秘学士所处的阵营（比如秘学士为守序善良，则他画的魔法阵无法是反善良法阵或反守序法阵）。该法阵在被物理破坏（比如图纹被涂抹或盐粉被吹散）前一直存在。只有活物可以物理破坏法阵，环境效果不会破坏它。秘学士同一时间只有一个魔法阵可以生效。若他绘制第二个魔法阵，第一个将会立刻失去效果。该魔法阵能力不能用来对内以禁锢异界生物。

Magic Item Skill.name: 魔装知识（Magic Item Skill）
Magic Item Skill.description: 2级起，秘学士的魔装知识让他可以更轻松启动魔法装置。他的使用魔法装置技能检定获得等同于1/2秘学士等级的加值。

Magical Familiarity.name: Magical Familiarity（Magical Familiarity）
Magical Familiarity.description:
The vigilante taps into a past life閳ユ獨 arcane secrets. He selects a 0-level spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list. The vigilante can cast the chosen spell three times per day as a spell-like ability, using his vigilante level as his caster level.

  At 6th level, he chooses a second 0-level spell that he can also use three times per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 12th level, in addition to these 0-level spells, he chooses a 1st-level spell that he can cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 18th level, he can cast his 1st-level spell three times per day and his 0-level spells at will.

  The vigilante must have an Intelligence score of at least 10 to select this talent.

Magical Hoarder.name: Magical Hoarder（Magical Hoarder）
Magical Hoarder.description:
At 13th level, whenever a creature within 30 feet of you casts a spell intended to benefit its targets, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool as an immediate action to include yourself as a target of that spell. If the creature is not your ally, you must be able to clearly see the spell閳ユ獨 effects and you must succeed at a Spellcraft check (DC = 15 + the spell閳ユ獨 level) to identify the spell before using this ability.

  If you are not within the normal range of the spell, then you must spend 1 additional point from your phrenic pool to use this ability.

  If the spell has a range of personal, then you must instead spend 2 additional phrenic points from your pool to use this ability.

  This ability does not affect spells with an instantaneous or permanent duration.

Magma Form.name: Magma Form（Magma Form）
Magma Form.description:
As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Small magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.pawbnw1nm4f0b98e]{元素身躯I}. You gain the same abilities as if you had chosen an earth elemental閳ユ獨 form, except your earth glide functions as the earth glide ability of a magma elemental.

  At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Medium magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{元素身躯II}.

  At 11th level, you can assume the form a Large magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{元素形态 III}.

  At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Huge magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV}.

  You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour per oracle level.

  You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.

Magnetic Infusion.name: 磁化注能（Magnetic Infusion）
Magnetic Infusion.description:
元素：气或土；类别：性质注能；等级：3；超载：2

  关联念袭类别：带电水，电刺，轰钢，太阳风，风雷击

  豁免：无

  你的念袭会让敌人产生轻微的磁性。每当注能念袭对一个敌人造成伤害后，直至你的下个回合结束之前，金属武器（包括金属念袭）对该名敌人做出的攻击会获得+4加值，而且敌人会在避免金属物体的反射豁免检定中承受-4减值。

Magnetism, Greater.name: Magnetism, Greater（Magnetism, Greater）
Magnetism, Greater.description:
Element air, earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0
Prerequisite magnetic infusion, magnetism
Saving Throw none; SR no

  You can repel or attract metal objects in a vast line with a magnetism so strong that there is no hope of escaping. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{驱离金石}, except only for metal objects, and you can also pull the objects toward you instead of pushing them away. The effect lasts for 1 round, and the pulling version of the effect can閳ユ獩 pull objects into the air unless they are already airborne.

  You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 1 round per kineticist level you have.

Magnetism.name: Magnetism（Magnetism）
Magnetism.description:
Element air, earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite magnetic infusion
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  You can push and pull metal objects using magnetism. This functions as telekinetic maneuvers but you can make only bull rush and drag combat maneuvers, and can do so only against metal objects or creatures.

  If you use this ability on an attended metal object, you must exceed the creature閳ユ獨 CMD as normal, and if it閳ユ獨 holding the object, it must drop it or this ability pushes or pulls the creature.

Major Ameliorating.name: Major Ameliorating（Major Ameliorating）
Major Ameliorating.description:
The witch can touch a creature to suppress or protect it from more debilitating negative conditions. Each time she uses this hex, the witch either chooses the blinded or deafened condition, or chooses a type of effect: curse, disease, or poison. If the target is or later becomes afflicted with the chosen condition or effect, that condition or effect is suppressed for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. Alternatively, for 24 hours the witch can grant her target a +4 circumstance bonus on saving throws against effects that cause any two of the above conditions or effects (witch閳ユ獨 choice; she can choose any combination of conditions or effects, as long as she chooses only two total).

  At 15th level, the witch can choose up to two total conditions or types of effects to suppress or three total conditions or types of effects to grant a circumstance bonus against each time she uses the major ameliorating hex.

  Once a creature has benefited from this hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.

Major Amplifications.name: 高等精神增幅（Major Amplifications）
Major Amplifications.description: 在11级以及之后的每4个等级，异能者都可以高等精神增幅中进行选择，以取代精神增幅列表中的选项。

Major Magic (3 pts).name: Major Magic (3 pts)（Major Magic (3 pts)）
Major Magic (3 pts).description:
An eidolon learns to cast a major spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wh9zc2reqneafxro]{强酸箭}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e67esdjp4nojtbr7]{治疗中度伤}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{黑暗术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y69de8y5ddrhuue5]{怪物晕眩术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d8yy4njnr25hacek]{滑翔术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (self only), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.plou8h168bfn5hq6]{浮空术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{灼热射线}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{蛛行术}

  This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

At 10th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice 閳?2. The save DC for this spell is 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 12 and must possess the minor magic evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell from the above list.

Maker's Call (UC).name: 主宰呼唤(掉链)（Maker's Call (UC)
Maker's Call (UC).description: 6级起，以标准动作，召唤师能够将幻灵召唤到自己的身边。这个效果的功能就如同任意门（Dimension Door）一般，使用召唤师的施法者等级。在使用该能力之后，幻灵会出现在与召唤师相邻的位置（如果所有与召唤师相邻的空间都被占据，则尽可能地靠近召唤师）。若幻灵在该能力的范围之外，则该次能力被浪费掉。召唤师在6级时每日能够使用1次主宰呼唤，在6级之后的每4个等级，该能力的每日使用次数会额外增加1次。

Malignant Poison.name: Malignant Poison（Malignant Poison）
Malignant Poison.description: As a full-round action, the alchemist can increase the save DC of any poison by 4 and increase its duration by 2 frequency increments (for example, large scorpion venom lasts 8 rounds instead of 6 and drow poison lasts 4 minutes instead of 2). Additionally, malignant poisons take effect immediately and do not have an onset time. This alchemical change lasts until the poison閳ユ獨 extended duration ends or for a number of minutes equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level, whichever comes first. After that, the poison reverts back to its original state. An alchemist must be at least 10th level before selecting this discovery.

Malleable Flesh.name: Malleable Flesh（Malleable Flesh）
Malleable Flesh.description:
Whether through mutation or alchemy, some vigilantes have flesh that is as moldable as clay and as fluid as ink. A vigilante with this talent gains the shapechanger subtype and the compression universal monster rule. In addition, the vigilante can alter his appearance as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术}, except that the changes are physical rather than illusory. However, aspects of the vigilante閳ユ獨 aesthetic persist in all forms, halving the bonus on Disguise checks gained from this effect and from seamless guise.

  At 12th level, the vigilante can pass through narrow openings, even mere cracks, along with any item he wears or carries (to a maximum of his light load).

Mammoth Hide.name: Mammoth Hide（Mammoth Hide）
Mammoth Hide.description:
The shaman can touch a willing ally and cause its skin to thicken and sprout thick, shaggy fur. The creature gains a +2 enhancement bonus to natural armor and cold resistance 5 for 10 minutes.

  At 9th level, the enhancement bonus increases to +3 and the cold resistance to 10.

  At 15th level, this enhancement bonus increases to +4 and the cold resistance to 15.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma bonus.

Mammoth Spirit Manifestation.name: Mammoth Spirit Manifestation（Mammoth Spirit Manifestation）
Mammoth Spirit Manifestation.description: At 20th level, the shaman can transform into any animal listed under the megafauna or elephant heading. This ability works as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{野兽形态 IV}, but the shaman can activate and dismiss the ability as often as she likes and the duration is permanent.

Mammoth Spirit.name: Mammoth Spirit（Mammoth Spirit）
Mammoth Spirit.description:
A shaman who selects the mammoth spirit is abnormally tall and stocky, with thick shaggy hair. When she uses a special ability of this spirit, her muscles ripple and flex, and her stature seems even greater than before. At times, particularly when she uses her most powerful abilities, a ghostly image of a mammoth may seem to rise around her as a visible aura of ghostly power.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hzkaqaa8n6ygwmub]{Tar Pool} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{召唤自然盟友 VII} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (9th).

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal appears more primal and prehistoric than an ordinary animal of its kind. It gains a +2 inherent bonus to its Strength score. The spirit animal loses this bonus when it manifests as a megafauna companion from the true spirit ability.

Maneuver Mastery (ORA).name: 战技熟稔(先知)（Maneuver Mastery (ORA)）
Maneuver Mastery (ORA).description: 选择一种类型的战技。当使用你选择的战技时，将你的先知等级当做你的基本攻击加值计算战技加值。7级你获得精通专长（例如“精通绊摔”）以给你的战术提供加值。11级你获得高级专长（例如“高级绊摔”）给你的战术进一步提供加值。你不需要达到这类专长的先决条件。

Maneuvering Dodge.name: Maneuvering Dodge（Maneuvering Dodge）
Maneuvering Dodge.description: Whenever a foe of the rogue閳ユ獨 size or larger misses the rogue with a melee attack, the rogue gains a +2 bonus on any Acrobatics, Climb, Fly, and Swim checks she attempts for 1 round. At 8th level, this bonus increases to +4.

Manifest Memory.name: Manifest Memory（Manifest Memory）
Manifest Memory.description: At 20th level, you can overlay portions of your mindscape onto the world around you. This functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{海市蜃楼} spell, except all structures and terrain created must be places appearing within your mindscape. You can use this ability at will, but you can maintain only a single manifest memory at any one time. You can allow any creature you can see who has previously entered your mindscape to automatically disbelieve the illusion as a free action.

Manifold Tricks.name: 多重诡计（Manifold Tricks）
Manifold Tricks.description: 5级起，催眠师能够同时保有两个被植入的诡计。自5级之后，催眠师每拥有4个催眠师等级，同时保有的被植入的诡计数量就可以再增加1个。每个生物在同一时间仍旧只能成为一个诡计的受术者。若同时被植入的诡计数量已经达到极限，催眠师仍要植入新的诡计的话，他必须选择一个已经植入的诡计，让这个诡计在未被触发的情况下被解消掉（被解消的诡计仍旧会消耗催眠师诡计的每日使用次数）。

Mantis Aspect.name: Mantis Aspect（Mantis Aspect）
Mantis Aspect.description:
The aspect of the mantis imparts uncanny patience and unsettling speed.

Minor Form: You gain Lunge as a bonus feat.

  At 12th level, your reach increases by 5 feet.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant mantis. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, a +2 racial bonus on initiative checks, and two primary claw attacks (1d6) with the grab ability.

  At 8th level, you can always act in the surprise round, but if you fail to notice your foes, you act last, regardless of your initiative result (you act in the normal order in subsequent rounds).

  At 15th level, whenever you roll for initiative, you can roll three times and use any one of the results.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

Mantle Against Chaos.name: Mantle Against Chaos（Mantle Against Chaos）
Mantle Against Chaos.description: You can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.md6ltvqh9paadsm4]{Protection From Chaos} on yourself or another creature as a spell-like ability. You can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to your inquisitor level (minimum 1). This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1 minute increments.

Many Guises (NIN).name: Many Guises (NIN)（Many Guises (NIN)）
Many Guises (NIN).description:
A ninja with this trick gains the vigilante social talent of the same name.

  The ninja must have the deep cover ninja trick before selecting this trick.

Many Guises.name: 百变（Many Guises）
Many Guises.description: 侠客维持着一些路人的假身份。当侠客选择转换自己的身份时，他可以在侠客身份和社交身份之外选择第三种身份：一般人身份。一般人身份没有独立的设定和背景，侠客可以在选择成为一般人的时候自己随意创造一个属于他的身份，并且在他不再伪装成一般人的时候可以立刻忘记自己一般人的身份设定。处于一般人身份的时候侠客不能获得社交身份和侠客身份为他提供的好处，但他可以伪装成属于自己种族的一个平头百姓（比如工人，农民，等等），一般人身份视为属于绝对中立阵营。当处于该身份的时候侠客可以在伪装成与他同种族的普通人的易容检定上获得+20环境加值。在此时，用来探知他的法术和能力（无论探知目标的侠客本身还是他的一般人身份）会自动失败。侠客必须将自己伪装的尽可能普通和平凡才能进入一般人身份，虽然一些魔法物品（比如易容帽）可以为他提供一些帮助，但侠客的一般人身份永远不能超出一个社会或是较大社群中最平凡无奇的那个群体的程度（由GM裁定）。侠客必须达到5级才能选择本天赋。

Many Roads.name: Many Roads（Many Roads）
Many Roads.description: You gain an insight bonus on Fly and Survival checks equal to 1/2 your oracle level. Further, you learn to speak and read three languages in addition to those you already know.

Many Throw Infusion.name: 多重念动（Many Throw Infusion）
Many Throw Infusion.description:
元素：以太；类别：塑形注能；等级：8；超载：4

  前置：增距（extended range）

  关联念袭类别：念动

  豁免：无

  你操控大量物体并同时将它们投掷出去。你能够使用你的念动做出攻击检定对抗120尺内的复数目标，数量等同于你的操念使等级，但是任意两个目标之间的距离不得超过30尺。

Marksman's Shot.name: Marksman's Shot（Marksman's Shot）
Marksman's Shot.description: Those who seek to slay with a single shot must have keen eyes and perfect poise. As an attack action, the slayer makes a single ranged attack at his highest attack bonus with a ranged weapon he wields. The target of the attack must be the slayer閳ユ獨 studied target. On a successful hit, the slayer doubles the number of sneak attack dice applied to the attack; if the attack was not a sneak attack, this benefit does not apply.

Marshal Spirit.name: 统帅英灵（Marshal Spirit）
Marshal Spirit.description:
统帅英灵拥有超群的领导能力，懂得人心，一呼百应。

  英灵同调：每当你降灵统帅时，你在魅力检定，基于魅力的技能检定和灵力涌动投骰上获得加值。若你在魅力检定或基于魅力的技能检定上使用灵力涌动，这允许此加值［注：指英灵同调，因为原本是同源不叠］在计算总结果时应用2次。

  降灵奖励：获得一个其他英灵职阶的降灵奖励，如果你召开降灵会，则每一个参与者都可以选择一个任意降灵奖励。

  偏好降灵区域：会议室，舞台，剧院，宫廷。

  共鸣惩罚：你过于关注他人而往往漏掉一些重要的事正在发生。你在感知检定和基于感知的技能检定上承受相当于你的英灵同调加值数量的减值。除此之外，如果你不是盟友队伍（至少是名义上的）领导者，你失去英灵同调和降灵奖励的好处。

  禁忌：选择下列禁忌之一：

  -你和你的盟友必须至少放走一个逃跑的敌人，让他们去宣扬你们的恐怖（如果他是跑去发出警告则不在此列）。

  -你必须确保每一个盟友都能从危险中平安撤离，你不能牺牲任何盟友来达到目的，包括召唤生物。

  -你必须竭力颂扬你和盟友的滥强故事，即使有时候需要保持低调也是一样。

Marshall's Order.name: Marshall's Order（Marshall's Order）
Marshall's Order.description: You can use your spirit surge on attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, concentration checks, and skill checks rolled by you or any allies who participated in your seance as long as you have line of sight and line of effect, and are within 30 feet of the chosen ally. You can still use spirit surge only once per round.

Martial Discipline.name: Martial Discipline（Martial Discipline）
Martial Discipline.description: Through meditation and study of monastic forms of combat, you have learned a lethal form of unarmed combat. You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打} as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. You gain the unarmed strike damage of a monk of your oracle level. If you also have monk levels, those levels stack for the purpose of determining your unarmed strike damage.

Martyr's Resistances.name: Martyr's Resistances（Martyr's Resistances）
Martyr's Resistances.description:
At 4th level, you gain fire resistance 5 and you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against fear and pain effects.

  At 8th level, your fire resistance increases to 10, and the bonus on saving throws against fear and pain effects increases to +4.

Martyred Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Martyred Bloodrager Bloodline（Martyred Bloodrager Bloodline）
Martyred Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
One of your ancestors paid the ultimate price for her beliefs. This distant relative martyred herself out of a devout dedication to some specific cause, and that sacrifice has infused you with power that you can use for good閳ユ攼r for ill. When you bloodrage, an inspiring fury conjures echoes of your forebear閳ユ獨 incredible determination and selfless dedication, both offering you protection and amplifying your ability to punish any who dare incur your wrath.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • Heroic Defiance,
  • Heroic Recovery,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c81jnlmi4976g7sz]{Surmount Affliction} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.scyklgov72pvw884]{Blessing Of Fervor} (16th)

Mask Misery.name: 掩饰苦难（Mask Misery）
Mask Misery.description: 受术者能够在承受一个状态之前短暂忽视它。当受术者受到接触疗法（Touch Treatment）能力中列出的一个次级状态（Minor Conditions）影响时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者能够在1d4轮内忽略该状态带来的效果，在此之后受术者会承受完整的效果。除了触发该项诡计的状态以外，该能力对任何正在影响受术者的状态没有效果，即便这些效果也在接触疗法职业能力中列出了也一样。受术者忽略触发诡计的效果的轮数也被算在效果的持续时间内；如果掩饰苦难的持续时间比效果还长，那么受术者就完全不会受到该状态的影响。若一个产生多重状态的效果触发了该项诡计，那么受术者会忽略所有合适的状态。若催眠师的等级为6级或更高的话，则可以将中级状态（Moderate Conditions）加到掩饰苦难可以忽略的状态中，而且该项诡计会完全终止次级状态（Minor Conditions），以取代原本的暂时压制。催眠师不需要具有接触疗法（Touch Treatment）就能使用或选取该项催眠师诡计。

Masquerade.name: 假面化妆（Masquerade）
Masquerade.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点将外貌变成所触碰的生物的样子。若目标生物对你不友善，你需要进行近战接触攻击检定，不过目标不能进行豁免检定来抵抗。你在易容检定上获得10+秘学士等级的加值，但只对易容成触碰生物的外貌有效。该加值不与易容术的加值叠加。当你处于该能力效果时，可以随时通过标准动作触碰别的生物改变自己的样貌。你可以随时结束该能力效果。该能力持续每秘学士等级10分钟，但你可以随时消耗额外1点心智点刷新时效。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Master Bloodsmith.name: Master Bloodsmith（Master Bloodsmith）
Master Bloodsmith.description:
At 16th level, you can affect up to two items simultaneously with your bloodsmith bloodline power.

  At 20th level, you can affect up to three items.

Master of the Deep.name: Master of the Deep（Master of the Deep）
Master of the Deep.description:
As a standard action, the barbarian commands an aquatic creature to do her bidding. The barbarian selects a creature with the aquatic type within 30 feet and gives a terse command from those listed in the command spell. Alternatively, if the creature has an Intelligence of 1 or 2, the barbarian may instead command the creature to attack the closest creature to it as a standard action. The creature must succeed at a Will save (DC equal to 10 + half the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + her Strength modifier) or obey the command to the best of its ability on its next turn. Once a creature has attempted a saving throw against master of the deep (successful or not), it is immune to this power for 24 hours. This ability is a mind-affecting effect, but it is not language dependent; the creature need not understand the barbarian giving the command.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level before selecting this power.

Master of the Veil.name: Master of the Veil（Master of the Veil）
Master of the Veil.description: At 8th level, you can create an illusion that hides the appearance of yourself and any number of allies within 30 feet for 1 round per wizard level. This ability otherwise functions like the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱}. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.

Master's Yoke.name: Master's Yoke（Master's Yoke）
Master's Yoke.description:
At 8th level, you can attempt to assert your dominance over any visible creature within 30 feet by declaring the target your property. The target can resist this effect with a successful Will save (DC = 10 + half your class level + your Wisdom modifier). If the target fails the save, it is affected as if by dominate monster for a number of rounds equal to half your class level. The target can choose to ignore any order you give and instead take 2 points of Constitution damage and become staggered for 1 round. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th. This is a language-based mind-affecting effect.

  This power replaces the Staff of Order power of the Law Domain.

Master-Thought Koan (UC).name: Master-Thought Koan (UC)（Master-Thought Koan (UC)）
Master-Thought Koan (UC).description:
A monk with this ability can spend an additional 2 ki points when using either the breaking-down koan or building-up koan ki powers. When combined with master-thought koan, breaking-down koan affects a number of characters of your choice within 30 feet equal to the monk閳ユ獨 wisdom modifier. When combined with master-thought koan, building-up koan can be used on an ally within 30 feet.

  A monk must be at least 12th level and have either the breaking-down koan or the building-up koan ki power before selecting this ki power.

Masterful Tricks.name: 大师诡计（Masterful Tricks）
Masterful Tricks.description: 12级起，催眠师能够选择后述大师诡计中选择一个来替代一个催眠师诡计。在之后的每2个等级，他都可以选择一个大师诡计来替代一个催眠师诡计。使用大师诡计会消耗2次催眠师诡计职业能力的使用次数，而非1次。【译注：大师诡计的第一句描述为“At 12th level, a mesmerist can choose one of the following masterful tricks in place of a mesmerist trick. He gains an additional masterful trick every 2 levels thereafter.”前半句表达的是替换，而后半句却说额外获取。因为感觉原文可能哪里出问题又找不到相关勘误，所以以第一句替换的描述为准。】

Material Mastery.name: Material Mastery（Material Mastery）
Material Mastery.description: Your superior knowledge of the nature of matter enables you to ignore spell requirements more easily when crafting magic items. By expending an extract of the same school and level as a spell prerequisite when crafting a magic item, you take only a 閳? penalty for ignoring that requirement, instead of 閳?.

Medicine Subdomain.name: Medicine Subdomain（Medicine Subdomain）
Medicine Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nji43xhlbpr4hk6o]{Diagnose Disease}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0wahvj06h5eak2fk]{Placebo Effect}

Medusa Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Medusa Bloodrager Bloodline（Medusa Bloodrager Bloodline）
Medusa Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
No magical creature is more iconic in Iblydan lore than the medusa. Perhaps your lineage traces back to a medusa, or an ancestor survived a medusa閳ユ獨 petrifying gaze and was forever changed by the experience. However the medusa閳ユ獨 influence entered your bloodline, when you bloodrage, you gain fearsome and ancient powers.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{惊恐术} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{抵抗能量伤害} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.78kwl5t99j9e8tzh]{人类定身术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (16th)

Meek Facade.name: 怯弱表象（Meek Facade）
Meek Facade.description: 受术者会由于魔法而看起来弱小异常，由此驱使敌人对她发动攻击。当受术者对一个生物做出一次攻击并且失手（即便这是在全力攻击中的一次攻击，而且其他攻击都命中了也可以）时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。该名敌人必须攻击受术者，而且受术者在对抗触发诡计的那次攻击的敌人时，AC会获得+2闪避加值。这些效果都仅会持续1轮。催眠师每拥有5个等级，AC的加值便会增加1点。这是一个影响心灵（mind-affecting）的胁迫（compulsion）效果。

Megafauna Companion.name: Megafauna Companion（Megafauna Companion）
Megafauna Companion.description: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal transforms into a megafauna animal companion, using the shaman閳ユ獨 shaman level as her effective druid level. The shaman must choose an arsinoitherium, baluchitherium, brontotherium, chalicotherium, deinotherium, elasmotherium, glyptodon, mastodon, megaloceros, megatherium, uintatherium, or another mammalian megafauna (including most dire animals) that has animal companion statistics. It retains its Intelligence score and the special abilities it gains from the spirit animal class feature, but it also has the statistics and abilities of an animal companion. If the animal companion is dismissed, lost, or dies, it can be replaced in the same way as a normal spirit animal.

Melancholy Bomb.name: Melancholy Bomb（Melancholy Bomb）
Melancholy Bomb.description: Your anguish bombs are filled with memories of sadness and regret. Creatures who take damage from your anguish bombs are also affected as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{极度绝望} for 1 round per alchemist level, or a single round if the target succeeds at a Will saving throw. An alchemist must be 10th level and have the anguish bomb class feature or the anguish bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.

Memory Palace.name: 记忆宫殿（Memory Palace）
Memory Palace.description:
13级起，你在精神层面上构筑起超维度的图书馆，并以此来储存精神世界中代表着你所学到的知识的具现体。该法术的功能如同法师豪宅（Mage's Magnificent Mansion）一般，但是具有以下改变：记忆宫殿所占的空间大小等同于数量相当于异能者等级个10尺边长的立方体；你的记忆宫殿中只有书柜和可供你与访客研习时使用的书桌和沙发，不会包含其他的家具；记忆宫殿里也没有食物，不过这里包含着数个隐身仆役，数量等同于你的异能者等级的一半，它们仅会作为图书管理员而工作。每当你召唤图书馆时，其中的布局都会保持一致，不过你可以在每次获得新的等级时、或者花费15分钟进行专注之后改变它的外观。你能够在心中重塑记忆宫殿，因此你不需要唤出记忆宫殿就可以改变它。每日仅能够创造一次记忆宫殿。

  当你获得该能力时，选择一种类型的知识技能。任何人——包括你自己——在你的记忆宫殿中研习均会在此类知识技能检定中获得+4环境加值，而且对于在此类知识上未受训的人来说，你的记忆宫殿还被视同为一间图书馆。当你没有在记忆宫殿中寻求知识时（包括没有呼唤出记忆宫殿的时候），你也会在前面所选择的那项知识技能中获得+2环境加值。在14级以及之后的每个等级中，你都能够选择另一个知识技能，并将你的记忆宫殿的图书馆加值应用在上面。

Mental Discord.name: 心智不谐（Mental Discord）
Mental Discord.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点扰乱30尺内一个活物的内心。目标必须进行一次意志豁免，成功免除效果。若豁免失败，目标无法专注任何法术效果，且在施法时必须通过DC=15+双倍法术环级的专注检定。若法术包括思维成分，该专注检定承受-4罚值。当目标处于该效果影响下时，所有意志豁免承受-2罚值。该效果持续每秘学士等级1轮。

Mental Fallback.name: 接管意识（Mental Fallback）
Mental Fallback.description: 精神指令被埋藏在受术者的内心深处，这让她能在遭受精神控制之时让催眠师接管身体。当受术者受到了由敌人制造的魅惑（charm）或胁迫（compulsion）效果时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者会如同受到了催眠师施放的法术影响一般，以取代受到敌人影响。举例说明：假设受术者被敌人施放的魅惑怪物（Charm Monster）法术影响，但是该名敌人无法给受术者下达命令，而此时催眠师却能命令受术者。若魅惑或胁迫效果会导致惩罚或状态，比如困惑术（Confusion）、极度绝望（Crushing Despair）或人类定身术（Hold Person）这样的效果的话，受术者能够忽略其中任何由催眠师选择的惩罚或状态。该项诡计能劫持魅惑或胁迫效果的轮数等同于催眠师的等级，或者直至触发诡计的效果持续时间结束为止，以较早发生者为准。催眠师不能为自己植入该项诡计。

Mental Focus.name: 心智点（Mental Focus）
Mental Focus.description:
秘学士每日可选择将自己的心智点填充进所选灵器中，根据填充进的数值和对应灵器学派发动不同的特殊能力。秘学士的心智点等于秘学士等级+智力调整值，每日恢复至满。他可以任意分配自己的心智点到各灵器中。若某灵器遗失或被摧毁，填充进该灵器的心智点亦会消失，不过下一次恢复心智点时会正常恢复。

  填充进了心智点的灵器会根据学派不同给予不同的共鸣之力，并且秘学士可以通过消耗灵器内的心智点激活该学派中已习得的灵器之力。共鸣之力给予的加值会根据填充的心智点数目不同而增减，但该加值只会在每日最初填充心智点时决定，而不会因使用灵器之力消耗掉心智点后随之减少共鸣之力的加值。但若灵器内所有心智点皆用尽，该灵器学派所赋予的共鸣之力将会失去，直到重新填充心智点为止。

  灵器将会为该灵器的占有者提供共鸣之力，因此秘学士可以将填充好心智点的灵器借给盟友以给予盟友共鸣之力。如此做会让秘学士自己很难施放一系列法术，并且无法通过该灵器使用灵器之力，直到他寻回灵器或重新恢复心智点。

  秘学士每天一次只会在进行至少8小时睡眠后恢复心智点。之后必须花费1小时时间准备灵器和填充心智点。每次恢复心智点时，之前未曾用掉的心智点将会消失。

  秘学士可以选择将心智点留存在自己体内，而非填充进灵器中，称为共用心智点。用共用心智点启动灵器之力时，会消耗更多点数。任何秘学士用共用心智点启动使用（或维持）的灵器之力，会消耗双倍的心智点数额。共用心智点可以用来启动使用任何灵器学派中已习得的灵器之力，但不会对共鸣之力造成影响。任何没有在日初填充入心智点的灵器将不会给予共鸣之力。

Mental Placidity.name: 心平气和（Mental Placidity）
Mental Placidity.description: 以直觉动作，你能够在将要尝试的意志豁免检定中获得+2加值。这个加值在对抗附魔系（enchantment）法术或效果时提升至+4点。任何尝试豁免检定以对抗同一个效果的盟友会在意志豁免检定中获得+1加值，如果该效果为附魔系效果则为+2加值。若你成功通过豁免，那么你的精神力池会恢复1点精神力。每日能够使用该能力恢复的精神力数量等同于你的感知调整值。

Mental Potency.name: 心智潜能（Mental Potency）
Mental Potency.description: 5级起，催眠师能够使用精神效果影响更多数量的生物或者更为强大的存在。他所施放的每个附魔系（enchantment）或幻术系（illusion）法术所能影响的生命骰限制以及总生命骰数量均会增加1个。对于由催眠师所施放的附魔系和幻术系法术来说，如果这个法术目标数量多于一个生物的话，该法术能够影响的生物数量也会增加一个（因此目标为“每等级一个生物”的法术会受到影响，但是目标为“一个生物”的法术就不会受到影响）。举例说明：5级的催眠师所施放的睡眠术（Sleep）能够影响共计5个生命骰的生物，催眠术（Hypnotism）能够影响2d4 + 1个生命骰的生物，七彩喷射（Color Spray）法术所产生的效果会以“3个生命骰或更低”、“4或5个生命骰”以及“6个生命骰或更多”来分类。额外生命骰的数量或者影响生物数量的增加会在5级之后的每5个等级再增加1个，最高为20级时的增加4个。

Merciful Foliage.name: Merciful Foliage（Merciful Foliage）
Merciful Foliage.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 0

  The First World is a place of rampant life, and you can use some of its energy to ease the danger of your attacks. You can deal nonlethal damage without taking a penalty on attack rolls with your wood blasts or composite blasts that include wood.

Mercy Patron.name: Mercy Patron（Mercy Patron）
Mercy Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{治疗轻伤}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.d4oubr5bdoo8w1ev]{鹰之威仪}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o87h8gjxevcbztgd]{移除诅咒}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.anya5qwdjhdfyk8u]{复原术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sbhij6pdo24wkm48]{清洁术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.82z60xtalr9fzkwb]{化敌为友}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{完全复生术}

Merge Forms (UC).name: 融合型态(掉链)（Merge Forms (UC)
Merge Forms (UC).description:
16级起，以整轮动作，召唤师能够接触他的幻灵，之后两者融为一体。这种变化也包含了召唤师的所有装备。当两者以此方式进行融合时，召唤师会受到保护免受伤害，而且无法成为法术或效果的目标。所有当前以召唤师为目标的效果和法术均被压制（suspended），直至召唤师从幻灵中分离出来为止（不过在此期间仍旧计算持续时间）。

  召唤师在融入幻灵体内之后，仍旧可以通过操控幻灵施放法术。任何用于这些法术的材料成分均取自召唤师的装备，尽管这些材料目前无法直接取出也没有影响。召唤师在融合形态下能够直接指挥幻灵的所有动作，能够通过幻灵的感官进行感知，还能够通过幻灵的声音进行交谈。

  召唤师每日能够使用该能力的轮数等同于他的召唤师等级。他能够随时以迅捷动作结束该效果。若可能的话，召唤师会出现在与幻灵相邻的空间里。若幻灵在召唤师融入其体内的期间返回原属位面，那么召唤师会被立即排出，受到4d6点伤害，并且被震慑（stunned）1轮。

Mesmeric Mirror.name: 催眠镜像（Mesmeric Mirror）
Mesmeric Mirror.description: 一个幻象出现在受术者周围，让她能够摆脱攻击。当受术者被攻击（attacked）或者成为了一个需要攻击检定的法术的目标时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。一个受术者的复制体会出现，攻击者必须随机决定击中哪个目标，就如同镜影术（Mirror Image）一般。催眠师每拥有5个职业等级，就能够额外产生一个幻象，最高为20级时的5个幻象。每个幻象均会持续每个催眠师等级1分钟，或者直至被摧毁为止。这是一个幻术系（illusion）虚假幻觉（figment）效果。

Mesmeric Pantomime.name: 催眠哑剧（Mesmeric Pantomime）
Mesmeric Pantomime.description: 通过精心编排盟友的身体运作，催眠师能够将自己的身体技巧赋予盟友。当受术者尝试一次基于力量或基于敏捷的技能检定时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者可以使用催眠师在技能检定上的加值来取代自己的加值，或者获得相当于催眠师魅力调整值的士气加值，以能为结果带来较高调整的一方为准。催眠师不能为自己植入该项诡计。

Mesmerist Tricks.name: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Tricks）
Mesmerist Tricks.description:
催眠师可以与他的盟友之间设立催眠联结，在他们的意识中植入可以在稍后触发的魔法暗示。催眠师每日可以植入的催眠师诡计数量等同于1/2他的催眠师等级（最低为1）外加他的魅力加值（若有的话）。催眠师在同时只能保有一个被植入的催眠师诡计，植入一个新诡计会结束已经植入的诡计（催眠师仍旧会失去植入先前那个诡计时所花费的使用次数）。

  为了植入一个催眠师诡计，催眠师必须用一个标准动作接触自己或一名自愿的生物。同一时间，一个生物仅能成为一个催眠师诡计的受术者。催眠师能以自由动作在满足诡计的触发条件（见各催眠师诡计的描述）时触发一个已植入的诡计，即使此时并非催眠师的回合也可以。催眠师在触发诡计时，受术者必须位于中距范围内（100尺 + 每等级10尺）。催眠师能通过一种敏锐的心灵感应联系来监察诡计的触发条件，因此他不需要有视觉线相连就能触发催眠师诡计——但任何会阻碍心灵感应的情况也能阻止诡计的发动。一个已经植入的催眠师诡计会持续至催眠师再次恢复每日法术为止。

  被触发的催眠师诡计不再处于植入状态，直至催眠师再次植入诡计为止，它便无法被再次触发。被触发的诡计所带来的效果之持续时间为立即（instantaneous）或者标注在诡计的描述中。催眠师诡计（mesmerist trick）或大师诡计（masterful trick）的豁免检定DC或技能检定DC为10 + 1/2催眠师等级 + 催眠师的魅力调整值。

  催眠师在1级时知晓一个催眠师诡计，在2级以及之后的每2级均学会另一个诡计（最高为20级的11个）。催眠师诡计的每个每日使用次数可以用于植入任意一个催眠师已知的诡计。除非在催眠师诡计的具体描述中另有说明，否则每个催眠师诡计仅能被催眠师选取一次。

Mesmerizing Elementalist.name: Mesmerizing Elementalist（Mesmerizing Elementalist）
Mesmerizing Elementalist.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite nagaji

  You gain the hypnotic gaze nagaji alternate racial trait. If you already have this trait, add +1 to the trait閳ユ獨 save DC instead. You can use the hypnotic gaze racial trait by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that racial trait remaining.

Metacharge.name: Metacharge（Metacharge）
Metacharge.description: As an Arcane crafter, you gain a bonus feat at 3rd level, which must be an item creation feat or metamagic feat. You must still meet all prerequisites for a bonus feat, including caster level minimums. When using metamagic feats to create magic items, your skill and understanding of the principles involved in the item閳ユ獨 creation give you a +2 bonus on the skill check made to create the item.

Metakinesis.name: 超念（Metakinesis）
Metakinesis.description: 5级起，操念使获得通过承受超载来如同使用超魔专长（metamagic feats）一般调整念袭的能力。通过承受1点超载，操念使能够把她的念袭进行强效，就如同使用了法术强效（Empower Spell）专长一般。9级起，通过承受2点超载，她能够把念袭进行极效，就如同法术极效（Maximize Spell）专长一般。13级起，通过承受3点超载，她能够瞬发念袭，就如同使用法术瞬发（Quicken Spell）专长一般。17级起，通过承受4点超载，操念使能够使用同一个标准动作将她的念袭使用2次，如果她在此基础上结合使用超念进行瞬发，则可以以迅捷动作做到双发。当她使用双发念袭时，所有调整，比如超念和注能，都会应用到两发念袭上，但是操念使仅需要支付单次的超载消耗。

Metakinetic Master.name: 超念大师（Metakinetic Master）
Metakinetic Master.description: 19级起，操念使选择一种超念，比如强效或瞬发。她会将此类超念的超载消耗降低1点（最低降至0点）。

Method to the Madness.name: Method to the Madness（Method to the Madness）
Method to the Madness.description: The alchemist has learned to channel his madness into one of his alchemist class abilities. When the alchemist takes this discovery, he chooses one of either bombs or extracts. If he selects bombs, he uses his Charisma bonus in place of his Intelligence bonus when determining the bonus to damage and the saving throw DCs of his bombs. If the alchemist selects extracts, he uses his Charisma bonus in place of his Intelligence bonus to calculate bonus extracts per day. The alchemist must have the madness extraordinary ability to take this discovery. This discovery can be taken twice, allowing the alchemist to select both bombs and extracts.

Metmorphosis.name: Metmorphosis（Metmorphosis）
Metmorphosis.description:
By meditating for 1 hour, you can trigger a slow, physical metamorphosis that takes 24 hours to complete (during which you do not gain the benefits of this new form). This ability cannot change your type or subtype, grant new abilities or natural weapons, or change your size category, but otherwise allows you to transform your appearance into anything possible for creatures of your type and subtype. You gain a +1 enhancement bonus to one physical ability score of your choice (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution) while in this altered form. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 psychic levels you have. Your shape and ability score bonus persist until you assume a new form or your current altered form ends.

  When meditating to begin your metamorphosis, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool either to change your size category to Small or Medium, or to gain a new ability from those provided by the alter self spell. If you do so, your altered form lasts only 1 hour per level.

Mien of Despair.name: Mien of Despair（Mien of Despair）
Mien of Despair.description: When a rogue with this talent successfully demoralizes an opponent using the Intimidate skill or performs a successful feint against an opponent, the opponent loses any morale bonuses and cannot benefit from any morale bonuses for 1d4+1 rounds.

Might of the Fallen.name: Might of the Fallen（Might of the Fallen）
Might of the Fallen.description:
The shaman can call upon the ancestral heroes of her family to bolster ailing allies. As a standard action, the shaman can cure 1 point of temporary ability damage affecting the creature touched.

  At 7th level, this increases to 1d4 points of temporary ability damage.

  Once a creature has been the target of this hex, it cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Might of the Godclaw.name: Might of the Godclaw（Might of the Godclaw）
Might of the Godclaw.description:
You gain Deific Obedience (Pathfinder Campaign Setting Inner Sea Gods 210) as a bonus feat, even if you don閳ユ獩 meet its prerequisites. When you gain the feat, choose one Godclaw deity; you can perform that deity閳ユ獨 daily obedience to gain its benefits. Whenever you would gain one of your deity閳ユ獨 boons, you can instead gain the benefits of another Godclaw deity閳ユ獨 obedience. You can choose to gain the benefits of a maximum of four Godclaw deities閳?obediences if you choose to forgo all three of your god閳ユ獨 boons. You never need to spend more than 1 hour per day to perform your obedience.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.

Mighty Ambush.name: Mighty Ambush（Mighty Ambush）
Mighty Ambush.description:
Once per round, when the vigilante succeeds at a hidden strike, he can instantly drop the damaged enemy unconscious for 1d4 rounds. A successful Fortitude saving throw negates this effect (DC = 10 + 1/2 the vigilante閳ユ獨 class level + the higher of the vigilante閳ユ獨 Strength and Dexterity modifiers). Whether or not a creature閳ユ獨 saving throw is successful, it can閳ユ獩 be affected by that vigilante閳ユ獨 mighty ambush again for 24 hours.

  Only a stalker vigilante of at least 10th level can select this talent.

Mighty Bash.name: Mighty Bash（Mighty Bash）
Mighty Bash.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier does not provoke attacks of opportunity when she attacks foes while unarmed so long as she is dealing nonlethal damage. In addition, the cavalier閳ユ獨 unarmed strikes deal more nonlethal damage than usual; she is treated as having a number of monk levels equal to her cavalier level for the purpose of determining how much nonlethal damage her unarmed strikes deal. For example, a 12th-level cavalier of the order of the hammer would deal 2d6 points of nonlethal damage with her unarmed strike. The cavalier must still select the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打} feat if she wants to deal lethal damage with her unarmed strike, and lethal damage dealt with her unarmed strike is not increased by this ability.

Mimic Metamagic.name: 模拟超魔（Mimic Metamagic）
Mimic Metamagic.description: 当异能者获得此项精神增幅时，她要选择两个超魔专长（metamagic feats）；她不必具有这些专长便可以进行选择。当异能者施放法术时，能够从自己的精神力池中花费精神力，使得自身选择的一个超魔专长应用至联结法术上，而且还不会增加法术等级或施法时间。异能者所要花费的精神力为超魔专长在正常情况下增加的法术等级的两倍（最低为2点）。若超魔专长本身在自发施法者使用时，会以标准规则之外的不同方式调整法术的施法时间——比如法术瞬发（Quicken Spell），那么这也会相应地改变施法时间。在使用这项精神增幅时，异能者仍旧能够将自身已知的超魔专长应用至法术上，如常增加施法时间和法术等级。此项精神增幅仅能联结到异能者所选择的超魔专长在正常情况下可以影响的法术上，而且仅有在异能者能够施放等级足够高的法术时，才能够将超魔专长应用至联结法术上。举例说明：11级的异能者可以花费8点精神力来将法术瞬发应用至1级法术上，但是无法以此方式瞬发2级法术，因为她还不能够施放6级法术。该能力不需要任何可用的相关等级的法术位，也就是说，例子中的异能者即便用完了当日的5级法术位，也可以使用此项精神增幅来瞬发1级法术。异能者可以多次选取此项精神增幅，每次选择都可以选取两个超魔专长来添加到此项精神增幅可用的超魔专长列表中。

Mind Barrier.name: 念力护壁（Mind Barrier）
Mind Barrier.description: 以一个迅捷动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出纯粹的精神能量护盾，保护自己免受伤害。该护盾抵消每秘学士等级2点的伤害。护盾持续到你下一轮开始或直到耗尽。举个例子，5级秘学士的念力护壁抵消10点伤害；如果被命中受到12点伤害，则护壁耗尽抵消10点，角色仅受2点伤害。你也可用直觉动作启动念力护壁，此举会消耗2点心智点而非1点。

Mind Eye.name: 心之眼（Mind Eye）
Mind Eye.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出心眼——你可以通过它来看听的魔力传感器。心眼隐形，体型为超微型，AC18。只要对心眼造成伤害就会摧毁它，但它只会被法术或魔法武器所伤。心眼飞行速度60尺有着完美机动性，可以离开你最高1英里远。你必须用标准动作专注于控制心眼移动和接收传送过来的感官。通过心眼看如同自己亲眼看，因此可应用你拥有的感官能力（暗视或识破隐形）。心眼持续每秘学士等级1分钟。你必须至少5级才能选择该灵器之力。

Mind Fear.name: 恐惧之心（Mind Fear）
Mind Fear.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点唤起一个活物心中的恐惧。目标必须距离你30尺以内，且可进行意志豁免检定免除该效果。若豁免失败，HD小于等于你的目标将会惊惧1d4轮，HD大于你的目标则只战栗1d4轮。这是一个影响心灵的恐惧效果。

Mind Heist.name: 劫取思维（Mind Heist）
Mind Heist.description: 5级起，你能够潜入昏睡目标（sleeping target）的潜意识中。你能够以类法术能力向着任何与你相邻的昏睡生物施放侦测思想（Detect Thoughts）。此外，对于你所施放的托梦术（Dream）、弱效托梦术ARG（Minor Dream）和梦魇（Nightmare）的目标来说，你会如同花费3轮时间研究了目标一般获得侦测思想的好处。若你施放了窥视梦境（Dream Scan；见本书第四章），那么你能够了解到自身是否从梦境中获取到了错误信息。成功通过意志豁免会使得劫取思维无效。每日使用该能力的次数等同于你的魅力调整值。

Mind Over Gravity.name: 御体于心（Mind Over Gravity）
Mind Over Gravity.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点给予自己60尺飞行速度，机动性完美。该效果持续每秘学士等级1分钟。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Mind Patron.name: Mind Patron（Mind Patron）
Mind Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ojtxej8ir6nycrtr]{Mindlink}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sh36xp1aey9ipk65]{Mental Block}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.90xaelj2ncuzq62n]{Mindscape Door}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nn4gjuby3uovsv78]{Create Mindscape}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v8jb71nag8rwiwps]{Psychic Asylum}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c14tjrds5emxk417]{Create Mindscape, Greater}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21yha04trfhj0ehd]{心智手术}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.esugpfcs3zwbujt1]{Microcosm}

Mind Slumber.name: 心理睡眠（Mind Slumber）
Mind Slumber.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点，让30尺内一个活物陷入心理睡眠。目标必须进行一次意志豁免检定，成功则免除该效果。若豁免失败，目标会陷入心理睡眠，将现实世界视为自己的梦境。目标不会倒地，但会丢掉所有持握的东西。该状态下目标不会进行任何动作，但并非无助——她还是能察觉到梦中的危险。目标在受到任何伤害立刻清醒之前，会一直睡眠最多等于秘学士等级的轮数。在目标每轮结束时，都可进行意志豁免检定以尝试结束效果。目标可以被搜身或检查而不会清醒，但无法在不惊醒目标的情况下将目标移出方格。无论目标豁免成功与否，目标免疫该效果24小时。你必须至少3级才能选择该灵器之力。

Mind Steed.name: 心念铁蹄（Mind Steed）
Mind Steed.description: 以标准动作，你消耗1点心智点召唤出幽灵马来。幽灵马可中型可大型，如同法术坐骑术一般运作。若你至少为5级秘学士，幽灵马的基本陆地移动速度增加20尺。若你至少为9级秘学士，你可以额外消耗1点心智点，让幽灵马获得60尺飞行速度，机动性良好，但如此做会让幽灵马的持续时间缩短为每秘学士等级1分钟。

Mind's Eye.name: Mind's Eye（Mind's Eye）
Mind's Eye.description:
Some psychics train their visual and psychic senses, binding them together into a unified focus to better guide their ranged spells and place them with uncanny precision. While casting a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, the psychic can spend 2 points from her phrenic pool and gain a +4 insight bonus on the attack roll.

  The psychic can spend 1 additional point to ignore penalties from cover (but not total cover).

Mindshield.name: 心智护盾（Mindshield）
Mindshield.description: 异能者能够从精神力池中花费1点精神力，来使得联结法术的目标获得强化，法术目标的意志豁免获得+2士气加值，持续时间为每个异能者等级1轮（最高10轮）。异能者能够花费2点精神力作为替代，来使得加值增加至+4点。若联结法术影响的生物数量超过1名，那么异能者便可以选择为每个她想要附加此项精神增幅的额外生物花费1点精神力。异能者必须选择为每个生物花费1点还是2点的精神力（来决定心智护盾的效果）；她无法为不同的目标分别提供不同的加值。

Mindtech Discipline.name: 心灵科技境界（Mindtech Discipline）
Mindtech Discipline.description:
你生来就和电子机械以及类似的科技物品有着联系，而且还能与它们进行交流。你能让你的精神力像流水一样穿过这些科技物品。你可以使用你身边的科技来增强和集中你的精神力量——即使有些种类的科技对于其他人来说并不是那么明显。

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.iag7mp0kgnmql2mz]{Technomancy} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lygujduijp64f0wj]{Protection From Technology} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vhnguobyolslgepm]{Irradiate} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1yt3bidqyhkdf6a1]{Malfunction} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wp6qm9gnjxoqww4h]{Lightning Arc} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wph6xwqvqekl7ph9]{Destroy Robot} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.snrnhiwqet5dmas0]{Memory Of Function} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止} (18th).

Mindtouch.name: 触探心智（Mindtouch）
Mindtouch.description: 异能者能够从精神力池中花费1点精神力，来窥探一个目标的精神，不过前提是该目标受到了联结法术的影响。若目标在对抗联结法术的豁免中失败、或者被法术命中的话，异能者能够侦测它的表层思维，就如同侦测思想（Detect Thoughts）法术第三轮的效果一般。若联结法术本身并不需要进行攻击检定或者豁免检定的话，目标便可以尝试一次意志豁免来避免侦测思想的效果（也仅限避免侦测思想的效果）；豁免DC的按照联结法术的等级进行计算（外加所有其他可以应用的加值，就如同联结法术原本便允许进行意志豁免一般）。此项精神增幅仅能联结到影响一个目标或一片区域的法术上。若联结法术能够影响多名生物，异能者能够通过为每个初始目标之外的额外生物分别额外花费1点精神力来侦测复数目标的思想。异能者必须在施放法术时决定受此精神增幅影响的目标，并消耗相应的精神力。这是个影响心灵（mind-affecting）的效果。

Minor Figment.name: 弱效幻象（Minor Figment）
Minor Figment.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出弱效幻象。该能力如同幻音术或者弱效幻影之一一般运作。一般而言，该能力持续轮数等于秘学士等级。若秘学士等级为7级或更高，幻象持续分钟等于秘学士等级，且你可以提出详细的要求后，改变幻象显现的内容一次。

Minor Magic (2 pts).name: Minor Magic (2 pts)（Minor Magic (2 pts)）
Minor Magic (2 pts).description:
An eidolon learns to cast a minor spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{通晓语言}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{治疗轻伤}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.17eskras8cjynj10]{侦测混乱}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{侦测邪恶}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkgysr5o92kxxn59]{侦测善良}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jo67xdocgdmk5hhh]{侦测秩序}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{魔法飞弹}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{无声幻影}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c11olzqztodz5o5x]{渐隐术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0onqjy8gfgop1xsi]{腹语术}

  This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 7th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice 閳?2. The save DC for this spell is 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 11 and must possess the basic magic evolution to take this evolution.

The summoner must be at least 4th level before selecting this evolution. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell from the above list.

Minor Prophecy.name: Minor Prophecy（Minor Prophecy）
Minor Prophecy.description: The witch can call on her prophetic ancestors to cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.d1wxnax51cecplm4]{占卜术} once per day. She can spend a full hour casting the spell to negate the need for material components, but this reduces the accuracy of the spell by 5%.

Mirage.name: 海市蜃楼（Mirage）
Mirage.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点将一片区域覆盖上幻象，让你改变区域内的景象。你可以影响最多每秘学士等级5尺立方的区域，将区域内景色改变成你所想的一样，具体如何改变由GM判断。你可以，例如，隐藏门或者过道，让桌子上放慢食物，甚至创造一个坑的幻象。你无法用该能力让物品或者生物隐形，但你可以改变物品或生物的外貌来隐藏它们。该法术如同强效幻影，那些与幻影有任意物理互动的生物可以进行意志豁免来看穿海市蜃楼。你必须至少5级才能选择该灵器之力。

Mirrored Retreat.name: Mirrored Retreat（Mirrored Retreat）
Mirrored Retreat.description:
Once per day as a full-round action, your form ripples and releases seven illusory duplicates, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jsss37x0pplib8f]{镜影术}, and then you can move up to your speed in any direction, while the duplicates move in seven other directions. The duplicates continue to retreat in their chosen direction, avoiding walls and other barriers but unable to open doors or interact with objects. The duplicates last for 1 minute per oracle level or until they take damage (they have the same AC as your touch AC and the same Reflex save as you, and they are immune to effects that allow a Fortitude or Will save). You can use this ability an additional time per day at 11th level and every 4 levels thereafter. This is a figment effect.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Misdirection Mastery.name: Misdirection Mastery（Misdirection Mastery）
Misdirection Mastery.description:
You gleefully evade attacks and confound foes with your capricious misdirection. You receive Misdirection Tactics as a bonus feat.

  At 10th level, you receive Misdirection Redirection as a bonus feat.

  At 15th level you receive Misdirection Attack as a bonus feat.

  You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.

Misdirection.name: 方向误导（Misdirection）
Misdirection.description: 你让受术者的攻击产生了偏移，敌人因为对攻击轨迹的误判而难以招架。当受术者作出一次攻击或者使用了一个需要攻击检定的法术时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。催眠师要尝试一次唬骗检定来进行虚招（feint），对抗受术者攻击的单个目标。和普通的虚招不同，该能力可以用于非近战攻击。若虚招成功，目标在对抗触发诡计的攻击时会失去AC上的敏捷加值。目标不会由于该能力而承受催眠师或受术者在通常的虚招或唬骗检定上能附加的任何额外效果。这是一个幻术系（illusion）五官幻觉（glamer）效果。

Mists Shroud.name: Mists Shroud（Mists Shroud）
Mists Shroud.description:
The shaman touches a willing creature (including herself ) and enshrouds that creature in mist. This grants the creature concealment as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{朦胧术} spell. The mist dissipates after it causes an attack to miss because of concealment or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the mist lasts for one additional attack.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

Mnemonic Cache.name: 记忆之匣（Mnemonic Cache）
Mnemonic Cache.description:
你能够熟记一段讯息，并在以后完美地回忆起来。记忆之匣大致能够存储10页的书面信息，这包含图像和地图，或者30分钟的等量音乐或演讲。（记忆音乐并不能让你获得相应的演奏能力。）你能够存储的记忆量会在2级以及之后的每个异能者等级中得到提升，每级增加5页或者5分钟的容量。同一时间，你只能将一页信息存入记忆之匣中。在你回想信息时，这些信息并不会就这样消失，但是当你将新的一页信息存入记忆之匣，被替换的原有那页信息会变为不完美的记忆。记忆魔法文字（比如卷轴或法术书上的某一页文字）不会让你获得模仿、复制或保留文字中的魔法的能力。你可以把法术的文字重新写出，用以让依靠法术书准备法术的其他人来准备法术，不过这对于他人来说就好像在使用借来的魔法书一般。若你正通过心灵沟通和其他生物进行交流（比如使用心灵连线）的话，则可以通过自由动作直接将信息传入他人的大脑。对于该名生物来说，这些信息就好像普通的记忆一般，并没有那么清晰准确。

  你能够用记忆之匣尝试隔绝一个文字型魔法陷阱（written magical trap）并将其摧毁，比如爆裂符文（Explosive Runes）或蛇纹法印（Sepia Snake Sigil）。这被视同为实用解除装置检定解除一个魔法陷阱，就好像你具有寻找陷阱（Trapfinding）职业能力一般。你在这个检定中的加值等同于你的解除装置技能调整值，或者5 + 你的异能者等级 + 你的感知调整值，以较高者为准。若检定成功，这个陷阱便会被抹除（erased）和摧毁，以取代原本的被解除掉。该能力不能摧毁徽记（Symbol）陷阱；它仅对与书面文本（written text）相关的陷阱生效。

Mnemonic Esoterica.name: 记忆秘籍（Mnemonic Esoterica）
Mnemonic Esoterica.description: 回想起你前世的记忆，你获得比大多数异能者所学更多的知识。选择单一个施法职业，每天一次，当你准备法术时，你从这个职业的法术列表中选择一个法术加入到你当天的已知法术和职业法术列表中，持续24小时。此法术必须比你可以施放的最高环级的法术低一环，你可以将它视为异能魔法来施放。每当你获得新等级的时候，你可以在你准备法术时把当前所选的施法职业替换成另外一个。

Mobile Blast Infusion.name: 灵动（Mobile Blast Infusion）
Mobile Blast Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：3；超载：2

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：反射，通过则无效

  你将一团元素物质、能量球或物体送往30尺内的特定方格里，对方格内的所有生物造成正常数值的四分之一的伤害（对于能量念袭来说则是正常伤害的一半）。灵动念袭会持续下去，直至你以自由动作主动解消、你失去意识、或者移动至距离灵动念袭30尺之外的位置为止。每轮在你的回合内，你能够以移动动作把灵动念袭移动至范围内的另一个方格内；无论如何，它每轮都会继续对最后停下的方格内的所有敌人造成伤害——如果这些生物没能通过豁免检定的话。同一时间只能有单个由你操控的灵动念袭存在着。若灵动念袭的总超载消耗在使用念力凝聚（Gather Power）之前减免之后便降低到了0点，那么它便不会有持续时间的限制。否则，灵动念袭的持续轮数等同于你的体质调整值，而且在与灵动念袭存在的轮数数量相同的分钟数内无法创造出另一个灵动念袭。灵动念袭总是会发出声响且肉眼可见。该豁免DC基于敏捷。

Mobile Wall.name: Mobile Wall（Mobile Wall）
Mobile Wall.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier receives @Compendium[pf1.feats.Mz8ZG6nqW3NKFZhK]{快步跟进} as a bonus feat. He can use this feat while mounted by succeeding at a DC 15 Ride check, directing his mount to move rather than himself. The cavalier gains a +1 bonus to his CMD against attempts to tumble through squares he threatens. At 6th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by an additional +1.

Mockery.name: Mockery（Mockery）
Mockery.description:
The vigilante gains Antagonize as a bonus feat. He can target a creature with the Intimidate version of Antagonize twice each day, rather than just once.

  At 12th level, the effects of the Intimidate version of Antagonize last a number of rounds equal to the vigilante閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

Mockingbird.name: 百舌鸟（Mockingbird）
Mockingbird.description: 侠客可以模仿几乎任何种类的声音，甚至是动物的叫声和其他奇怪的声音都可以。并且，侠客可以将自己发出的的声音投射出一段距离。这个能力的效果如同法术幻音术，腹语术和扭曲嗓音（Vocal Alteration）UM的集合。侠客必须达到5级才能选择本天赋。

Modify Onset.name: Modify Onset（Modify Onset）
Modify Onset.description: At 3rd level, you can increase the onset time of poisons you use by up to 1 hour per level. At 9th level, you can alter a poison so that it does not have an onset time, but you can trigger it as a swift action to take effect at any time, regardless of distance. If you do not trigger this poison within 1 week of poisoning a target, the poison dissipates harmlessly. The poison can be detected and removed before it is triggered using any normal methods of detecting and removing poison.

Molten Wings.name: Molten Wings（Molten Wings）
Molten Wings.description:
At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage you can choose to have wings of flame sprout from your back, giving you a fly speed of 60 feet with average maneuverability.

  At 16th level, your fly speed increases to 80 feet with good maneuverability.

Monkey Aspect.name: 猿猴拟态（Monkey Aspect）
Monkey Aspect.description:
猴子是专精于机动性和双手灵活性的攀爬骗子。

  次级形态：你的攀爬检定获得+4表现加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+6。15级时，这个加值提升至+8。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只大型猿猴（参照怪物图鉴 pg. 17 凶暴猿）。当处于该形态时，你获得30尺攀爬速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、1d6伤害的啮咬攻击、2个1d6伤害的爪击攻击和你仍然可以用你的手持用（wield）武器，持握（hold）物品，并如常操作物品。8级时，你的攀爬速度提升至50尺，并且你可以用你的尾巴持握（hold）和操作物品就好像你有了第三只手，但你不能用它持用（wield）武器或盾牌。15级时，你获得撕扯攻击，当你的两个正常变形者利爪均攻击命中敌人后，造成的额外伤害等同变形者利爪攻击加上1.5倍力量调整值。

Monkey's Paws.name: Monkey's Paws（Monkey's Paws）
Monkey's Paws.description:
The vigilante gains a climb speed equal to his base speed and a +4 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

  The vigilante must have the rooftop infiltrator talent and be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Monsoon Subdomain.name: Monsoon Subdomain（Monsoon Subdomain）
Monsoon Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.478jgozgfbt20u0q]{水流爆发}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9s5oseou738k2qif]{Fickle Winds}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{津波}

Monstrous Graft.name: Monstrous Graft（Monstrous Graft）
Monstrous Graft.description: The alchemist can replace up to four of his own amputated limbs with those of a monstrous beast of the same size category. If the grafted limb is an arm, the alchemist gains either a climb speed of 15 feet or a claw or slam natural attack that deals 1d6 points of damage (1d4 for a Small alchemist). If the grafted limb is a leg, the alchemist gains one of the following benefits: a +5 bonus to land speed, a swim speed of 15 feet, or a +5 bonus on Acrobatics checks when jumping. For each limb the alchemist replaces in this manner, he takes a 閳? penalty to Wisdom as he loses his sense of self. Derros are immune to this penalty.

Moon Subdomain.name: Moon Subdomain（Moon Subdomain）
Moon Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{托梦术}

Moon Totem, Greater.name: Moon Totem, Greater（Moon Totem, Greater）
Moon Totem, Greater.description:
While raging, the barbarian ignores the miss chance for concealment and treats total concealment as concealment.

  She must have the moon totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

Moon Totem, Lesser.name: Moon Totem, Lesser（Moon Totem, Lesser）
Moon Totem, Lesser.description: While raging, the barbarian gains darkvision with a range of 30 feet. If the barbarian already has darkvision, the range of her darkvision increases by 30 feet while she is raging.

Moon Totem.name: Moon Totem（Moon Totem）
Moon Totem.description:
While raging, the barbarian gains a bonus equal to half her level on Perception checks to pinpoint the location of an unseen creature, and unseen attackers gain no bonus on attacks against the barbarian.

  A barbarian must have the lesser moon totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Moonbeam.name: Moonbeam（Moonbeam）
Moonbeam.description:
You can fire a ray of moonlight as a ranged touch attack at any creature within 30 feet. This ray deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 for every 2 oracle levels you possess. In addition, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or become blinded for 1 round.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

Moonlight Script.name: Moonlight Script（Moonlight Script）
Moonlight Script.description:
Once per night while you sleep, your hands produce mysterious writing that pertains to the future.

  At 1st level, the prophetic writing manifests as an @Compendium[pf1.spells.d1wxnax51cecplm4]{占卜术} spell with 90% effectiveness.

  At 5th level, the writing takes the form of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术} with 90% effectiveness.

  At 8th level, the writing manifests as a casting of @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术} with no material component required.

Moral Crisis.name: Moral Crisis（Moral Crisis）
Moral Crisis.description: As a standard action, you can target a living creature within 30 feet of you, reminding it of its moral failings. The target must succeed at a Will save or be staggered for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. The target can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end this effect. This is a mind-affecting emotion effect.

More for Me.name: More for Me（More for Me）
More for Me.description:
When another character within 30 feet casts a spell with a range greater than touch, you can attempt a caster level check as an immediate action (DC = 15 + the spell閳ユ獨 level). If you succeed at the check, you receive the spell閳ユ獨 benefit instead of one of the spell閳ユ獨 intended targets (chosen by you). If you are already a target of the spell, you are affected as though you were targeted by the same spell twice (which may or may not benefit you; remember that bonuses from the same source do not stack). This ability does not grant you knowledge of the spell being cast. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Copycat power of the Trickery Domain.

Morphic Form.name: 形态构成（Morphic Form）
Morphic Form.description:
5级起，当你让黑暗半身占据主导时，你会获得DR 5。每当你唤出自己的黑暗半身时，都会变换伤害减免，使它可以被某种随机的伤害类型所克服，具体见下表。

   %d 伤害减免类型

  1 - 35 DR 5/钝击

  36 - 60 DR 5/寒铁

  61 - 100 DR 5/魔法

Morphic Mask.name: Morphic Mask（Morphic Mask）
Morphic Mask.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 physical form in his vigilante identity can differ significantly from that of his social identity, within the norms for his race閳ユ敄his can include changes to the vigilante閳ユ獨 proportions, coloration, gender characteristics, and other physical characteristics. This increases the vigilante閳ユ獨 bonus from seamless guise by 2 for every significant change, as per the Disguise skill. The vigilante always assumes the same form when using this ability.

  A vigilante with multiple natural forms, such as a kitsune, can alter each of his forms using this talent.

Morphic Weaponry.name: Morphic Weaponry（Morphic Weaponry）
Morphic Weaponry.description:
The vigilante can shape his body into weaponry. This acts as the oozemorph shifter閳ユ獨 morphic weaponry ability, treating the vigilante閳ユ獨 level as his shifter level.

  The vigilante must have the shapechanger subtype to select this talent.

Mother's Embrace.name: Mother's Embrace（Mother's Embrace）
Mother's Embrace.description:
The hag閳ユ獨 call grows stronger as you grow more desperate, promising protection and release if only you would succumb. When you would fail a Will save, you can add 1d4 to your result; whether or not this causes you to succeed at the saving throw, you take 2 points of Wisdom damage.

  When you perform an act of cruelty, you regain 1 phrenic pool point. You can use each aspect of this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

Mother's Eye.name: Mother's Eye（Mother's Eye）
Mother's Eye.description:
The witch can see through plant matter, as the greensight universal monster ability (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4 295), for a number of minutes per day equal to her witch level.

  These minutes do not need to be consecutive, but must be spent in 1-minute increments.

Mount (1 pt).name: Mount (1 pt)（Mount (1 pt)）
Mount (1 pt).description:
An eidolon is properly skilled and formed to serve as a combat-trained mount. The eidolon must be at least one size category larger than its rider.

  This evolution is only available to eidolons of the quadruped and serpentine base forms.

Mount (UC) (1 pt).name: Mount (UC) (1 pt)（Mount (UC) (1 pt)）
Mount (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Daemon, demon, devil, elemental, or protean subtype; quadruped or serpentine base form.

  The eidolon is properly skilled and formed to serve as a combat-trained mount.

  The eidolon must be at least one size category larger than its rider.

Mountain Patron.name: Mountain Patron（Mountain Patron）
Mountain Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.879sdozw7ca7ci9k]{石拳术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gqtg9ruv8kkd0knf]{召岩术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g1evszmk8wfgnsv5]{塑石术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hfyycpn0wdimx1n9]{刺石术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l83djt5019ujasjh]{石墙术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.361rc74674l3zt9a]{石化术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{石言术}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{驱离金石}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o8jhvddxgunzx94i]{巨石碾压}

Mountainside Ambush.name: Mountainside Ambush（Mountainside Ambush）
Mountainside Ambush.description:
Samsaran only.

  Fighting in the mountains of Zi Ha has trained samsaran slayers to strike the unwary with deadly attacks from above. If a slayer deals sneak attack damage to a creature that is unaware of his presence while he is standing on higher ground than his target, he does not have to roll sneak attack damage; instead, the sneak attack deals maximum damage. The samsaran must be standing on solid ground to use this ability.

Mouse Aspect.name: 老鼠拟态（Mouse Aspect）
Mouse Aspect.description:
老鼠拟态提供了能进入到难以到达的地方，同时避开许多攻击与效果的能力。

  次级形态：你获得反射闪避（evasion），如同盗贼职业能力。12级时，此能力提升至精通反射闪避，如同高级盗贼天赋。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只超小型老鼠（参照怪物图鉴 pg. 232 凶暴鼠，但是你拥有2.5尺占据和0尺触及）。当处于该形态时，你获得20尺攀爬速度、20尺游泳速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、1d4伤害的啮咬攻击和在攀爬和游泳检定上使用你的敏捷调整值取代力量调整值。8级时，你的攀爬和游泳速度均提升至40尺。15级时，当你穿过或离开一个生物的威胁区域（threatened area）或进入它的空间时，不会引起藉机攻击，但当你离开它的空间时仍会引起藉机攻击。

Mucilaginous Gloom.name: Mucilaginous Gloom（Mucilaginous Gloom）
Mucilaginous Gloom.description: The gloom leaves a chilly gray residue that turns each square in its splash radius into difficult terrain. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level.

Mud Witch.name: Mud Witch（Mud Witch）
Mud Witch.description:
A witch with this hex can assume the form of viscous brown mud. The witch閳ユ獨 type changes to ooze and she is able to squeeze through even the smallest cracks, but she can閳ユ獩 make attacks or cast spells with verbal, somatic, material, or focus components while in this form, and she loses her supernatural abilities. If the witch has a touch spell ready to use, that spell is discharged harmlessly when she uses this hex. While the witch is in mud form, her speed becomes 10 feet and she gains a swim speed of 20 feet. The witch gains DR 10/slashing and cold resistance 10.

  At 10th level, while the witch is in mud form, her speed increases to 20 feet and her swim speed increases to 40 feet. She can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to her level.

  The duration doesn閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. This hex affects only the witch.

  The witch must have the swamp hag hex to select this hex.

Murksight.name: Murksight（Murksight）
Murksight.description:
The witch can see through natural fog, mist, and rain without penalty, ignoring any concealment bonuses gained from such effects. If the effect is created by magic, the witch can see up to 15 feet without penalty, with normal penalties and effects applying beyond that distance.

  This ability functions underwater as well, allowing the witch to see in murky water as though it were clear.

  This does not allow the witch to see anything she could not see otherwise, such as an invisible creature.

Mutable Flesh.name: Mutable Flesh（Mutable Flesh）
Mutable Flesh.description: At 3rd level, once per day when you cast a transmutation spell with a duration of 1 minute per level that affects only you, you can increase its duration to 10 minutes per level. At 9th level, you can increase the duration to 1 hour per level.

Mutagen (Discovery).name: 突变药剂(科研发现)（Mutagen (Discovery)）
Mutagen (Discovery).description: 选择此能力的炼金术师得到“突变药剂”职业特性。此能力详见炼金术师基础职业。【译注：这是给某些职业变体补回“突变药剂”特性用的。】

Mystic Veil.name: Mystic Veil（Mystic Veil）
Mystic Veil.description:
Samsaran only.

  Samsaran slayers are adept at obscuring the passes of their mountain homes from intruders. The slayer can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{无声幻影} as a spell-like ability once per day for every 2 slayer levels he has, using his slayer level as his caster level. The slayer uses his Intelligence modifier on concentration checks when using this ability, and the DC to disbelieve the illusion is equal to 11 + the slayer閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier.

  The slayer must have an Intelligence score of at least 11 to select this talent.

Naga Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Naga Bloodrager Bloodline（Naga Bloodrager Bloodline）
Naga Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The blood of the powerful, serpentine aberrations known as nagas runs through your veins, fueling your bloodrage.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{隐秘}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{闪电束} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术} (16th)

Naga Defenses.name: Naga Defenses（Naga Defenses）
Naga Defenses.description:
At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus and a +4 bonus on saves against poison.

  At 16th level, the bonus to your natural armor increases to +4 and the bonus on saves against poison increases to +8.

  At 20th level, the bonus to your natural armor increases to +6, and you gain immunity to poison.

Naga Form.name: Naga Form（Naga Form）
Naga Form.description: At 16th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can assume the form of a naga (as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8mgf91fcmsi0kdk]{Naga Shape III}).

Naga Thoughts.name: Naga Thoughts（Naga Thoughts）
Naga Thoughts.description: At 20th level, when entering a bloodrage, you become immune to charm effects and all forms of mind reading, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against other mind-affecting effects, you gain the effects of the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}, and you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想} at will.

Nanite Bloodline.name: Nanite Bloodline（Nanite Bloodline）
Nanite Bloodline.description:
Your conception was marked by alien influences.

  本职技能(s): @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：工程.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.22xn589bmr7ginow]{Defensive Shock} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.frp3ioj2ny5br5ti]{Miasmatic Form} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wuispaydz8jvw3io]{Echolocation} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4nlrm44ubsyzuhz]{液体形态} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.u0qadkpm7dglk6kz]{Magnetic Field}(15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{寓守于攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  •  Eldritch Heritage, 
  • Expanded Arcana,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：工程).

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell from the transmutation school and target only yourself, increase the spell閳ユ獨 duration by 50%. This does not stack with metamagic feats or abilities such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时}.

Nanite Resurgence.name: Nanite Resurgence（Nanite Resurgence）
Nanite Resurgence.description:
At 9th level, once per day as an immediate action upon being reduced to one-quarter your maximum hit points, you can force the mechanical swarm living inside you to keep you alive. This ability functions like a @Compendium[pf1.spells.u7y6niex9e7tbhyp]{转灵强愈剂} spell using your sorcerer level as the caster level, except it is an extraordinary ability and cannot be dispelled.

  At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day (though using this ability twice in one 24-hour period entails a chance of system shock and death; see the spell閳ユ獨 description for more details).

  At 20th level, you never die of system shock from using this ability.

Nanite Strike.name: Nanite Strike（Nanite Strike）
Nanite Strike.description:
At 1st level as a free action, you can cause nanites to flow from your body and coat the striking end of any manufactured melee weapon you wield. When you hit with a melee attack using this weapon, some of the nanites infect the blood of the victim (Poison閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Con modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str damage; cure 1 save).

  At 5th level, weapons you use with this ability are treated as magical for the purposes of overcoming DR, and the poison also deals 1 point of Constitution damage. At 7th level, the damage increases to 1d2 points of Constitution damage and 1d2 points of Strength damage. At 11th level, the cure becomes two successful saves.

  You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier; these rounds need not be consecutive.

Nanite Surge.name: Nanite Surge（Nanite Surge）
Nanite Surge.description:
At 3rd level, once per day as an immediate action, you can cause your nanites to surge, granting you a bonus equal to 3 + your sorcerer level on any one d20 roll; this ability must be activated before the roll is made. If you already possess the nanite surge ability from another source (such as from being an android), you can use your nanite surge an additional time per day.

  At 9th level, you can use this ability an additional time per day.

Nature's Gifts.name: Nature's Gifts（Nature's Gifts）
Nature's Gifts.description: Once per day, the shaman can command trees and other plants to yield magical berries and fruit. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{神莓}, except the maximum number of hit points it can restore to a subject in a 24-hour period from this hex is equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1 hit point per day).

Nature's Thorns.name: Nature's Thorns（Nature's Thorns）
Nature's Thorns.description: At 16th level, creatures that hit you in melee (other than those using manufactured reach weapons) take 4d6 points of piercing damage. A creature takes this damage only on its first successful attack against you in a combat round, and not on subsequent attacks in that round.

Necromancy Resonant School.name: 死灵灵器（Necromancy Resonant School）
Necromancy Resonant School.description:
死灵灵器从死灵魔法中汲取操控死者伤害活物的力量。

  灵器（Implements）：骨骼、硬币、玩偶、鼓、长袍、骷髅头。

Necromantic Focus.name: 死灵专精（Necromantic Focus）
Necromantic Focus.description: 灵器给予持有者更强的操控不死之力。灵气内每填充入1点心智点，持有者就可以额外操控2HD的不死生物（最高额外为4X秘学士等级个HD）。施法者释放创造不死生物的死灵系法术时，可以将该灵器作为额外的器材施法惩罚。如此做会创造出额外HD的不死生物，额外HD数额等于可额外控制的不死生物HD数（计算该效果在亵渎术等双倍HD限制之后）。另外，灵器内每填充有4点心智点，不死生物对抗持有者的法术时豁免检定就承受-1罚值。

Necromantic Servant.name: 死灵仆人（Necromantic Servant）
Necromantic Servant.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点唤起一个人类骷髅或人类僵尸，为你服务每秘学士等级10分钟或直到被摧毁。该仆人hp等于你最大hp的一半（不计入临时hp或其它临时调整）。它使用你的基本攻击加值，伤害获得1/2秘学士等级的加值。5级时，当死灵仆人被摧毁时，若你在它中距范围内（100尺+每等级10尺），你可以用直觉动作消耗1点心智点让死灵仆人回复满生命值。9级时，你可以选择给予它血腥或燃烧简易模板（如果是骷髅）或快速简易模板（如果是僵尸）。13级时，当你用直觉动作为仆人回复生命值时，它会分裂成两个。最多可同时存在等于你1/2秘学士等级个数的死灵仆人。17级时，你选择一个团队专长，你所有死灵仆人都会获得该团队专长。

Neutralizing Bomb.name: Neutralizing Bomb（Neutralizing Bomb）
Neutralizing Bomb.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to give it the potential to end certain ongoing effects instead of dealing damage. Each creature in the splash radius can attempt a new saving throw against any poison afflicting it and any ongoing conditions or ongoing acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. (If an effect did not allow a saving throw, this bomb doesn閳ユ獩 allow affected creatures to attempt one.) Success counts as one successful save toward ending poison and immediately ends other conditions. Exposed poison in the splash radius is also rendered harmless. A creature with poison abilities that is directly struck by the bomb finds those abilities useless for 1d4 rounds unless it succeeds at a Fortitude saving throw.

  This discovery doesn閳ユ獩 stack with any other that modifies bombs.

Night Terror.name: Night Terror（Night Terror）
Night Terror.description:
You send your spirit to torment another being閳ユ獨 dreams. Once per day, you may target a creature with the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇} spell. Instead of the spell閳ユ獨 normal damage, you make a full attack, using your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength modifier, against the victim閳ユ獨 touch AC. You deal 1d10 damage for each successful hit.

  You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.

Nightblindness (Stare).name: Nightblindness (Stare)（Nightblindness (Stare)）
Nightblindness (Stare).description: The darkvision range of the hypnotic stare閳ユ獨 target decreases by 10 feet.

Nightmare (Stare).name: Nightmare (Stare)（Nightmare (Stare)）
Nightmare (Stare).description: The target of the hypnotic stare rolls twice on all Will saves versus fear, taking the lower result.

Nightmares Patron.name: Nightmares Patron（Nightmares Patron）
Nightmares Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3plb67e51webutdz]{睡眠术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j7mhkhixnvd0amye]{Oneiric Horror}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{魅影杀手}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.laz5zb1cdfb9jzit]{Dream Travel}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ylewzn5nlzy7ugdm]{Symbol Of Weakness}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{短讯暗示}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight}

Nimble Walker.name: Nimble Walker（Nimble Walker）
Nimble Walker.description: At 20th level, you gain a +5 racial bonus on Reflex saving throws and on Acrobatics checks made to move through a creature閳ユ獨 threatened area or through its space. You also gain the ability to breathe while passing through earth using your earth glide ability.

Nine-Tailed Kineticist.name: Nine-Tailed Kineticist（Nine-Tailed Kineticist）
Nine-Tailed Kineticist.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite kitsune

  You can cast a spell-like ability granted to you by any Magical Tail feat you have by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that spell-like ability remaining. You must be able to use wild talents of a level equal to the number of extra tails required to use a spell-like ability granted by a Magic Tail feat to use this ability to cast that spell-like ability (for example, you would need to be 15th level and able to use 8th-level wild talents to use this talent to cast the dominate person spell-like ability granted by Magical Tail).

  In addition, you can learn a Magical Tail feat that you qualify for in place of gaining a new infusion or utility wild talent.

No Breath (4 pts).name: No Breath (4 pts)（No Breath (4 pts)）
No Breath (4 pts).description:
An eidolon no longer needs to breathe. The eidolon does not breathe, and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as inhaled poison). This does not give immunity to cloud or gas attacks that do not require breathing.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

No Breath.name: No Breath（No Breath）
No Breath.description:
Element void; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite emptiness
