  You gain no breath, as per the universal monster ability, and you can survive in the vacuum of space.

No Place Like Home.name: No Place Like Home（No Place Like Home）
No Place Like Home.description:
The witch fills an ally with the safety he feels at home or inflicts pangs of homesickness to hamper an enemy閳ユ獨 defenses. She chooses a target for the hex within 30 feet. If she chooses an ally, that ally gains a +2 dodge bonus to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. If she chooses an opponent, that opponent takes a 閳? penalty to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. Either way, the effects last for 1 minute. The target can attempt a Will save to negate the effects of the hex.

  At 8th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 4.

  At 16th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 6.

  A creature targeted by this hex cannot be targeted again by this hex for 1 day.

Noble Visage.name: Noble Visage（Noble Visage）
Noble Visage.description:
You gain a +1 bonus on Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks against creatures that share your creature type (and subtype, if you are a humanoid). This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.

As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant her your noble visage bonus against creatures that share her creature type (or subtype) for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your noble visage bonus for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Inspiring Word power of the Nobility Domain.

Nostrum.name: Nostrum（Nostrum）
Nostrum.description:
When the alchemist creates an infusion, he can mask a delayed poison within the mixture. A nostrum can contain only an ingested poison, and the save DC of the poison is reduced by 2. The poison takes effect a number of hours after being imbibed equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus (minimum 0) decided by the alchemist at the creation of the nostrum. The poison within a nostrum can be detected as normal by spells such as detect poison and similar abilities. Until the nostrum is consumed or destroyed, it continues to occupy one of the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily extract slots.

  An alchemist must have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

Nothing Can Stop Me.name: 打倒一切（Nothing Can Stop Me）
Nothing Can Stop Me.description: 每轮一次，当侠客在进行移动时，他可以以自由动作发动一次攻击来击碎挡在在他前进路线上的无主物品，比如门和桌子。如果侠客造成的伤害成功地摧毁了该物品，那他可以接着继续移动；如果他未能击破该物品，那么侠客的移动会被迫停止。侠客的这次攻击视为他移动动作的一部分并且不计入他在该轮的攻击次数。如果侠客不小心打的是一个生物（比如一只伪装成物品的拟形怪），那么侠客的攻击尝试自动失手，他被迫停止移动（但侠客仍然可能在结束移动后正常对该生物发动攻击）。只有选择复仇骑士之道的侠客才能选择本天赋。

Notorious Fool.name: Notorious Fool（Notorious Fool）
Notorious Fool.description:
While in his social identity, the vigilante can feign absentmindedness, clumsiness, drunkenness, or eccentricity very convincingly. When he fails an opposed Sleight of Hand or Stealth check while in his social identity, he can immediately attempt a Bluff check opposed by the onlookers閳?Sense Motive checks to appear as though he had only blundered or stumbled in a spectacular fashion. If he succeeds at this Bluff check, the onlookers do not realize the vigilante was attempting the action that prompted him to attempt a Sleight of Hand or Stealth check, although being in the wrong place or behaving in an inappropriate manner may still have negative consequences.

  This talent is ineffective against any onlooker who has already witnessed the vigilante faking a blunder within the last 24 hours.

Numb to the Pain.name: Numb to the Pain（Numb to the Pain）
Numb to the Pain.description: You gain a morale bonus equal to your Charisma bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting spells and effects. This bonus cannot exceed your psychic level.

Numerical Alchemy, Greater.name: Numerical Alchemy, Greater（Numerical Alchemy, Greater）
Numerical Alchemy, Greater.description:
The investigator can calculate his movements and account for his reactions to danger or unexpected situations with lightning speed. He can expend a use of inspiration to mix an extract as a standard action.

  The investigator must have the numerical alchemy talent and be at least 11th level to select this talent.

Numerical Alchemy.name: Numerical Alchemy（Numerical Alchemy）
Numerical Alchemy.description: The investigator閳ユ獨 skill with mental mathematics allows him to know exactly which muscle movements are necessary to mix an extract in the quickest, most efficient way. The investigator can expend one use of inspiration to mix an extract in 1 round (as opposed to 1 minute).

Numerical Strike, Greater.name: Numerical Strike, Greater（Numerical Strike, Greater）
Numerical Strike, Greater.description:
Once per day, when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal the strike閳ユ獨 maximum damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike. He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day. Using this ability doesn閳ユ獩 require an action.

  The investigator must have the numerical strike talent and be at least 13th level to select this talent.

Numerical Strike, Masterful.name: Numerical Strike, Masterful（Numerical Strike, Masterful）
Numerical Strike, Masterful.description:
The investigator can use both numerical strike and greater numerical strike three times per day. The investigator doesn閳ユ獩 need to expend uses of inspiration to use either ability, but he can never use either more than three times per day each.

  The investigator must have the numerical strike and greater numerical strike talents and be at least 17th level to select this talent.

Numerical Strike.name: Numerical Strike（Numerical Strike）
Numerical Strike.description:
Once per day when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal average damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike.

  He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day.

  Using this ability doesn閳ユ獩 require an action.

  The investigator must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Oaken Skin.name: Oaken Skin（Oaken Skin）
Oaken Skin.description:
At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, your skin thickens like bark and you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor.

  At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1.

Obey.name: 服从（Obey）
Obey.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点灵器之力命令一个活物遵守你的命令。该效果如同命令术法术一般。目标必须在你30尺以内且能听懂你的命令。目标可进行意志豁免免除该效果。若目标与你为同一生物类型，该次豁免承受-2罚值。

Object Reading.name: 触物感知（Object Reading）
Object Reading.description: 2级起，秘学士习得如何通过调查物品阅读信息。用此法调查物品需要他花费1分钟时间操弄该物品。若物品为魔法物品，他会知道它的特性和命令字，如同成功使用侦测魔法并且法术辨识检定成功一般。若秘学士职业等级低于物品的施法者等级，他将不会揭露出诅咒物品的存在。如果物品有任何历史意义，秘学士可得知一部分关于过去的信息（由GM决定）。最后，若某物品距离最后一次使用时的天数不超过每秘学士等级1天，他可得知该物品最后一个使用者的部分信息。这种信息可以是使用者外表的一瞥，关于最后一次使用时的短暂景象或者最后一次使用时使用者的心情。由GM决定到底会获得何种什么信息。这种效果类似于psychometry异能技能解放（见本书196页），但无需技能检定且可以任意使用。

Object Seer.name: 物寻其源（Object Seer）
Object Seer.description: 以一个整轮动作，你消耗1点心智点观察到一件你所拥有物品的过去。你可以询问一个必须关于该物品的问题，比如“你的力量是什么”、“你最后一个主人的身份”或“发生事件时你在哪”这样。你会从物品的精神印象中获得答案，大多数时候都是模糊不清的影像或误导。该能力其它方面如同通神术法术。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Obliterate Memory.name: Obliterate Memory（Obliterate Memory）
Obliterate Memory.description:
As a standard action, you can target a creature within 30 feet and eliminate all memory of an event the target experienced, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆}. A target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. In addition, you can cause an account of the memory erased by this ability to appear on a blank page of any book you are carrying.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

  You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.

Obscuring Blow.name: Obscuring Blow（Obscuring Blow）
Obscuring Blow.description: Once per day, the rogue can forgo her potential to deal sneak attack damage to attempt to cloud an opponent閳ユ獨 vision. She must declare the use of obscuring blow before she makes the attack. If the attack hits, it does normal damage but, instead of dealing sneak attack damage (and any effect that triggers when the rogue deals sneak attack damage), the target treats all other creatures as if they had concealment, suffering a 20% miss chance on all attack rolls for a number of rounds equal to half the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this effect to 1 round. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier.

Obscurity.name: Obscurity（Obscurity）
Obscurity.description:
The vigilante is relatively unknown socially. In fact, he makes a point of keeping the life of his social identity as ordinary as possible. This social talent functions exactly as the renown social talent, but instead of improving the starting attitude of all NPCs within the community, it empowers the vigilante so that he no longer needs to succeed at Disguise checks to appear as his social identity while assuming that identity within his area of obscurity. He still has to attempt Disguise checks when NPCs within this settlement are confronted with indisputable proof that the vigilante could be more than he appears to be, such as when he uses a vigilante talent while in his social identity. This social talent counts as renown for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of social talents that list renown as a prerequisite and can be improved by such talents.

  A vigilante with this talent cannot select renown, nor can he select any social talent that requires him to be famous (such as celebrity discount or celebrity perks).

Occult Dungeoneer.name: Occult Dungeoneer（Occult Dungeoneer）
Occult Dungeoneer.description: Street thieves in Absalom expect wares to be securely locked, and sometimes it takes high-quality tools and magic training to ensure there閳ユ獨 a meal at the end of the day. A rogue with this ability can use spell-trigger and spell-completion items as if the following spells were on a spell list to which he has access: detect secret doors, detect traps, knock, locate object, and obscure object. If the spell-trigger device allows a wielder to apply his own caster level (such as with a staff ), the rogue may use his class level as his caster level. The rogue may also use knock as a supernatural ability once per day, using his rogue level as his caster level.

Occult Final Revelation.name: Occult Final Revelation（Occult Final Revelation）
Occult Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits. You become immune to death effects, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea, negative levels, and the sickened condition. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} once per day as spell-like abilities without requiring material components. Should you die, you rise again 2d4 days later as a ghost.

Occult Mystery.name: Occult Mystery（Occult Mystery）
Occult Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the occult mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Knowledge ：神秘, and Use Magic Device to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oplskt3tgws8ujv8]{幽灵手}(4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (18th).

Occulted Soul.name: Occulted Soul（Occulted Soul）
Occulted Soul.description: A ninja with this trick can still her mind to bypass magical detection. The ninja can spend 1 ki point to cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} on herself as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to her ninja level.

Octopus Aspect.name: Octopus Aspect（Octopus Aspect）
Octopus Aspect.description:
The octopus is a cunning hunter, able to contort its malleable body with ease.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

  It increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of an octopus. While in this form, you gain the aquatic subtype, a swim speed of 30 feet, low-light vision, a bite attack (1d3), a tentacles attack (no damage) with the grab ability, and Multiattack as a bonus feat.

  At 8th level, you gain the jet ability (200 feet).

  At 15th level, you gain the ability to produce an ink cloud (see below) and deal an amount of bludgeoning damage with your tentacles attack equal to the damage dealt by your shifter claws.

Ink Cloud (Ex): While within water, you can emit a 10-foot-radius sphere of ink once per minute as a swift action. This ink provides total concealment and persists for 1 minute.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tentacle (B)

Omnikinesis.name: 万力全能（Omnikinesis）
Omnikinesis.description: 20级起，操念使会超越不同元素间的界限，可以按照自身的意志塑造一切。通过承受1点超载（在她所选择的任何念袭所要求的超载之外），她能够使用任意自身并不了解的念袭原力（blast wild talent）。通过以标准动作承受1点超载，她能够选择将任何已知的原力变为任意一个类别相同的其他原力（比如简易念袭或护身原力），持续24小时，这会忽略任何关于元素的要求或者制约（但并不能无视其他先决条件和制约）。

One Body, Two Minds.name: One Body, Two Minds（One Body, Two Minds）
One Body, Two Minds.description: At 15th level, once per day, you can improve the effectiveness of a single spell by having your possessing spirit channel that spell. The spell acts as though it were affected by both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发} metamagic feats. If the spell chosen is a mind-affecting spell, it also benefits from the @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时} metamagic feat. This ability does not use up a spell slot higher than the level of the base spell, nor does it increase the level of the base spell.

One of Those Faces.name: One of Those Faces（One of Those Faces）
One of Those Faces.description: Each day, you can use disguise self as a spell-like ability for up to 10 minutes per character level. This duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 10-minute increments. Additionally, once you have used this ability, whenever you use it for the next 24 hours you must take the same alternate appearance.

One with Nature.name: One with Nature（One with Nature）
One with Nature.description: At 16th level, creatures of the animal or plant types don閳ユ獩 attack you unless compelled to do so by magic or you attack them first. Three times per day, you can transport yourself from one tree to another tree, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林} with half the transport range. Moving from one tree to another in this manner is a move action. You gain these abilities even while not bloodraging.

Oneiromancy.name: 圆梦（Oneiromancy）
Oneiromancy.description: 以标准动作，你能够干预昏睡生物的精神。你向着昏睡生物的精神中植入一段潜意识，这需要尝试一次交涉或威吓检定来改变该生物的态度或者提出一个要求（request a service）。若检定成功，当该生物醒来时，它的行为举止会按照你说的来表现，不过这也要遵循交涉或威吓技能的正常限制。圆梦的目标不会意识到自己遭受了操控，但如果你对目标进行的交涉检定失败，它对你的起始态度可能会变得更差，就如同正常情况一般。你必须与昏睡的生物相邻才能使用该能力。作为一种选择，你可以在施放托梦术（Dream）、弱效托梦术ARG（Minor Dream）或梦魇（Nightmare）时，以施法的一部分使用该能力。在此情况下，圆梦的效果会在法术施放时发生。每日使用该能力的次数为3 + 你的魅力调整值。不会做梦的生物免疫该效果。

Ongoing Defense.name: 持续防护（Ongoing Defense）
Ongoing Defense.description: 异能者能够增强那些强化自身心智防护力的法术，延长它们的持续时间。她能够在施放任何智能壁垒（Intellect Fortress），精神屏障（Mental Barrier），思维护盾（Thought Shield）或意志钢塔（Tower of Iron Will）法术（均出自本书）的时候，从精神力池中花费1点精神力，来使得法术的持续时间延长1轮。

Ooze Blight.name: Ooze Blight（Ooze Blight）
Ooze Blight.description: A target hit by the alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb loses the split special quality for 1d4 rounds. In addition, against creatures with the ooze type, this bomb deals untyped damage that bypasses all resistances.

Order of the Reins.name: Order of the Reins（Order of the Reins）
Order of the Reins.description:
The cavaliers of the order of the reins hold a strong rapport not just with their mounts, but with all tamed and domesticated animals on Golarion. From camels and horses to teams of sled dogs, these cavaliers hold themselves honor-bound to protect these creatures for their labor and loyalty. Cavaliers of the order of the reins often serve as the commanders of caravans or other expeditions, using their unique skills to ensure that the caravan and its wares safely reach their intended markets.

守则： The cavalier must do everything in his power to keep a caravan or traveling group safe once he has agreed to protect it. He must see that any allied animal injured under his watch is healed, or personally give it a merciful death if survival is not an option. He must not let any animal under his command suffer needlessly.

挑战： Whenever an order of the reins cavalier issues a challenge, all allied animals, animal companions, familiars, and mounts within 60 feet gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +2 bonus to AC against the target. This bonus increases by 1 for every additional 4 levels the cavalier has.

技能： An order of the reins cavalier adds Appraise and Perception to his list of class skills. Any animal that the cavalier is riding can use the cavalier閳ユ獨 Handle Animal modifier in place of its own Acrobatics and Swim skill modifiers as long as the cavalier is mounted on it.

Order of the Scales.name: Order of the Scales（Order of the Scales）
Order of the Scales.description:
Members of this cavalier order serve the cause of legal integrity. Many order of the scales cavaliers track down and apprehend fleeing lawbreakers so that these vagrants may answer for their crimes and make good on their debts. They often serve as judges or stakeholders, and work to ensure that wherever a bargain is made閳ユ敋hether it is monetary, a life debt, or an oath to be upheld閳ユ攤oth ends make good on their promises.

守则：The cavalier must fulfill all binding agreements he makes with others. If a bargain becomes impossible to fulfill, he must satisfactorily compensate all aggrieved or adversely affected parties involved in the bargain. When serving as a judge or arbiter, the cavalier must make fair, impartial judgments, and if unable to do so, must recuse himself at the earliest possibility. If authorized to enforce an agreement, the cavalier must wholeheartedly strive to accomplish this, remaining unswayed by threats, bribery, and other deterrents.

挑战： Whenever an order of the scales cavalier issues a challenge, he receives a +1 morale bonus on combat maneuvers and attacks of opportunity made against the target of his challenge. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the cavalier possesses.

技能： An order of the scales cavalier adds Knowledge ：地方 (Int) and Linguistics (Int) to his list of class skills. He gains a bonus equal to half his level (minimum +1) on Sense Motive checks to determine whether someone is bluffing and to determine whether a creature閳ユ獨 behavior is being inf luenced by an enchantment.

Order of the Songbird.name: Order of the Songbird（Order of the Songbird）
Order of the Songbird.description:
Samurai of the order of the songbird are artists, scholars, and poets. They treat battle as a beautiful art form; many of these samurai seek pacifistic means of defeating their foes. Even samurai of this order who kill their opponents do so with respect, considering such a fight to be an act of poetic tragedy. These samurai are most common in lands where beauty is treasured, such as Hwanggot, Jinin, and Tianjing.

守则： The samurai must never destroy art unless doing so is part of an artful act or performance of her own. She must respect the skill of her opponents and never desecrate or purposefully humiliate a foe. If she takes a sapient life, she must create a piece of art, performance, or poem in honor of the fallen creature or creatures in order to memorialize what she has taken from the world.

挑战： An order of the songbird samurai gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC and a +1 sacred bonus on saves against the attacks and abilities of the target of her challenge. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 class levels the samurai has. The samurai must be wearing light or no armor, not using a shield, and carrying no more than a light load to gain this benefit.

技能： An order of the songbird samurai adds Knowledge ：宗教 (Int) and Perform (Cha) to her list of class skills. The samurai adds half her level to Craft checks and Profession (gardener) checks.

Orderly Casting.name: Orderly Casting（Orderly Casting）
Orderly Casting.description: The arcanist can tie her spells to the rigid order of Axis, giving them predictable results. As a swift action, she can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir. For the next minute, her spells deal damage as if she had rolled exactly average on all of the dice, rounded down. To find the average, treat the arcanist as if she had rolled 2-1/2 on all d4s, 3-1/2 on all d6s, 4-1/2 on all d8s, 5-1/2 on all d10s, and 6-1/2 on all d12s. For example, if a 3rd-level arcanist used this exploit and cast burning hands, the spell would deal a total of 7 points of damage.

Oscillation (Stare).name: Oscillation (Stare)（Oscillation (Stare)）
Oscillation (Stare).description: The target of the hypnotic stare treats all enemies beyond 30 feet (except the mesmerist) as having concealment (20% miss chance).

Outside Contact.name: 异界接触（Outside Contact）
Outside Contact.description:
8级起，秘学士将知晓一名特定异界生物的真名。该异界生物的HD不能超过3。当秘学士绘制魔法阵时，他可以额外消耗1点心智点让魔法阵改为对内防护，并于阵内呼唤出该异界生物，如同使用次级异界束缚。该生物最多被束缚10分钟。时限内，秘学士可以与它进行交易以获得信息。他需要支付至少20gp（或至少价值这个数值的该生物感兴趣的物品）。交易需要秘学士以一次交涉或威吓检定对抗该生物的察言观色检定开始。检定结果成功5点或更高会将代价降低为10gp。失败则代价增长为30gp，而失败5点或更多会让该生物逃离而得不到任何信息（或是吞了代价）。所要获得的信息必须是可以通过预言术法术获得的信息。该信息一定是正确的，但经常为隐语或暗喻。交易谈妥后该生物需要1d3小时来收集信息，并在之后返回魔法阵内完成交易。就算该生物与秘学士为同一阵营，也会对如此驱使感到愤怒。在信息与代价皆交付完毕后，魔法阵会失去效果，该生物返回它的本源位面。

  12级及之后的每4级时，秘学士将会得知一个额外的同类型或非同类异界生物的联系方式。尽管同一时间他只能呼唤来一名异界生物，但他在8级后每有4个等级，就可以额外询问一个问题（最高20级时4个问题），而代价不变。不过，所有问题必须互相之间有所关联。

  16级时，若选择不询问问题，秘学士可以让该生物给自己亲身所知的友善生物传递一段信息作为替代。或者，秘学士可以拜托该生物帮忙运送不重于1磅的一件物品。此两种用法都需要进行前文所述的技能对抗检定。两种传送都需要1d4小时，但若接受者在秘学士1里以内（或者接受者在视线内），则传送耗时降低为1d6分钟。秘学士必须精准无误地描述接受者的外貌和姓名。该能力无法将物品传送到地点上，也无法传送给对秘学士敌对的生物或敌人手上。

Overbearing Assault (UC).name: Overbearing Assault (UC)（Overbearing Assault (UC)）
Overbearing Assault (UC).description: The monk attacks relentlessly, backing his foe into a corner. If the attack hits, the monk can perform a free reposition combat maneuver against the target of the strike (using the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe) with a 閳? penalty. This reposition attempt does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

Overflowing Grace.name: Overflowing Grace（Overflowing Grace）
Overflowing Grace.description: When you heal a creature to full hit points or a creature already at full hit points with your positive or negative energy, that creature gains a +1 sacred bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round. The bonus is sacred if you use positive energy and profane if you use negative energy. If you destroy or kill one or more creatures with positive or negative energy, you gain a +1 bonus of the same type on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round.

Overpowering Mind.name: 意念压迫（Overpowering Mind）
Overpowering Mind.description: 异能者能够从精神力池中花费2点精神力，来使得联结法术的意志豁免DC增加1点。8级起，她能够选择花费4点精神力来使得DC增加2点。15级起，她能够选择花费6点精神力来使得DC增加3点。此项精神增幅仅能联结到具有影响心灵（mind-affecting）描述符、而且需要进行意志豁免的法术上。

Owl Aspect.name: 夜枭拟态（Owl Aspect）
Owl Aspect.description:
夜枭拟态是沉默安静的。这个掠食者在黑夜中无声地滑翔，隐匿攻击的大师。

  次级形态：你的隐匿检定获得+4表现加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+6。15级时，这个加值提升至+8。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只中型猫头鹰（见本书 pg. 181）。当处于该形态时，你获得60尺飞行速度（一般）、2个1d6伤害的爪击攻击、60尺黑暗视觉和隐匿检定+2种族加值。8级时，你获得飞跃攻击（怪物图鉴 pg. 315）作为奖励专长，并且黑暗视觉提升至120尺。15级时，你能变成大型猫头鹰形态并获得攫抓专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 316）的好处，但是你只能用它擒抱比体型你细至少一个级别的生物，而且你还能在使用此能力时挤压（squeeze）一个被擒抱的生物，无论它的体型如何。

Owl's Sight.name: Owl's Sight（Owl's Sight）
Owl's Sight.description:
The vigilante gains low-light vision. If he already has low-light vision, he gains a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks in low light.

  The vigilante also gains a +2 competence bonus on Sleight of Hand and Stealth checks at night.

Pack Range.name: Pack Range（Pack Range）
Pack Range.description:
When a barbarian with this rage power enters a rage, any barbarian within 30 feet who also has this rage power can enter a rage. A barbarian that enters a rage outside of her turn spends 1 round of rage immediately and then spends another round of rage to maintain her rage at the beginning of her next turn.

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.

Pageantry Discipline.name: Pageantry Discipline（Pageantry Discipline）
Pageantry Discipline.description:
The act of ritual, no matter how ostentatious, can be a route to mental strength. By engaging in esoteric and intricate routines, you have unlocked potent psychic power.

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{安定心神} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcr72piqo6g549e1]{缓慢术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.weyfn0mg2oifasq1]{伪装术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zi1fpl4essgw5bbc]{神圣化身} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ueuz3ymuz8pxpzr6]{Heroic Invocation} (18th).

Pain Discipline.name: 苦痛境界（Pain Discipline）
Pain Discipline.description:
心智会阻碍你那与生俱来的精神能量的自由流动。只有在承受苦痛时，你才能释放出强大的力量。

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijtqp1h3hka5kive]{Persuasive Goad} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jy64xofud29j5ju6]{痛苦打击} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{吸血鬼之触} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1dkzhi78je32sbrr]{Pain Strike, Mass} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jddpsd5pkky0qjg]{Synapse Overload} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nqrpfidjuzllqa9z]{Inflict Pain, Mass} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6yeorbvt5ysym3nh]{Suffocation, Mass} (18th).

Pain Wave.name: 痛苦波动（Pain Wave）
Pain Wave.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出痛苦波。该波命中半径20尺爆发范围内所有活物，爆发点在你100尺以内。所有活物都会被痛苦缠绕，在每秘学士等级1轮的时间内进入恶心状态。受影响的生物可以进行意志豁免检定，成功则将恶心时间降低为1轮。这是一个影响心灵的痛苦效果。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Pain is Power.name: Pain is Power（Pain is Power）
Pain is Power.description:
At 8th level, after taking damage from any source, you may attempt a DC 25 concentration check as an immediate action. If you succeed, you gain the benefits of a blessing of fervorAPG spell for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level. If you fail, this ability is expended with no effect. You can use this ability once at 8th level, plus an additional time for every 4 levels you are beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Scythe of Evil power of the Evil Domain or the Staff of Order power of the Law Domain.

Painful Reminder.name: 回味痛苦（Painful Reminder）
Painful Reminder.description: 从你的上个回合开始算起，如果你用法术对敌人造成了伤害，则能够以迅捷动作让该名敌人承受1d6点非致命伤害（nonlethal damage）。每日能够使用该能力的次数等同于3 + 你的魅力调整值。此伤害会在8级提升至2d6点，并且在15级时提升至3d6点。

Painful Stare.name: 痛苦注视（Painful Stare）
Painful Stare.description: 若催眠师的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）的目标被一次造成伤害的攻击命中的话，催眠师能够让目标承受额外的伤害，数值相当于催眠师的职业等级的一半（最低为1点）。催眠师能够以自由动作使用该能力，而且即便不在自己的回合内也可以使用。若催眠师使用该能力增加自身造成的伤害，那么额外伤害会增加，增加量为催眠师每拥有3个职业等级增加1d6点。该伤害为精准伤害（precision damage）而且不会随着重击而翻倍。催眠师每轮仅能触发一次该能力，不过单个生物可能会在一轮内被多个催眠师的痛苦注视所伤害。

Painful Strike.name: Painful Strike（Painful Strike）
Painful Strike.description: At 1st level, when you confirm a critical hit, the target is sickened for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your bloodrager level (minimum 1). During this time, the creature must succeed at a concentration check (DC = 15 + the spell閳ユ獨 level) in order to cast a spell.

Pale Horse.name: Pale Horse（Pale Horse）
Pale Horse.description:
You can summon a @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpwd0f19q1lm04p3]{魅影驹}, as the spell, to serve you for a number of hours per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

Papercraft Tools.name: Papercraft Tools（Papercraft Tools）
Papercraft Tools.description: Traditional thieves閳?tools might be suspicious, but no guard looks twice at a common deck of cards. So long has the rogue has access to a deck of cards, she can destroy one card to attempt a single Disable Device check as if she had a set of thieves tools. If she uses a harrow card for this purpose, she can treat the card as a set of masterwork thieves閳?tools (granting her a +2 circumstance bonus on the Disable Device check), though the card is still destroyed after use.

Pariah.name: Pariah（Pariah）
Pariah.description: The witch can cause a creature within 60 feet to be shunned by its allies for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Any other creature attempting to directly assist the target with a harmless spell or aid another action must attempt a Will save. If the save succeeds, the aiding creature is unaffected by this hex. If the save fails, the aiding creature can閳ユ獩 follow through, the action is lost, and the aiding creature can閳ユ獩 directly aid the target for the duration of this hex. This hex does not prevent the target from benefiting from area of effect spells.

Pass the Torch.name: Pass the Torch（Pass the Torch）
Pass the Torch.description: Once per day as a swift action, you can channel the energy of the apocalypse into your body, causing you to ignite. You take 1d4 points of fire damage when you activate this ability and again at the beginning of your turn until you end the effect. Any creature that begins its turn adjacent to you takes 1d6 points of fire damage as the fire spreads, plus 1 additional point of fire damage for each previous round you have had this ability active. For example, adjacent creatures take 1d6+5 points of damage if you have had this ability active for 5 rounds. You can use this ability for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level, and you can end this ability as a free action. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Past Life Evoker.name: Past Life Evoker（Past Life Evoker）
Past Life Evoker.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite samsaran

  Once per day, you can accept 1 point of burn to choose one simple blast wild talent belonging to any element. You gain the chosen simple blast wild talent for 1 minute, using your kineticist level 閳?2 to determine the blast talent閳ユ獨 damage.

  The simple blast wild talent you gain in this way does not allow you to meet any prerequisites.

Past-Life Memories.name: 前世记忆（Past-Life Memories）
Past-Life Memories.description: 你的知识技能检定获得等同你异能者等级一半的加值（最少为1），即使未受训，你也可以进行知识检定。

Path of the Snake.name: Path of the Snake（Path of the Snake）
Path of the Snake.description:
Once per day, as a standard action, you can become incorporeal. While in this form, you gain a +10 bonus on Stealth checks and can move in any direction and through any object (except for those made of force). You can take no action other than to move while in this form. You remain in this form for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level, but you can end this effect prematurely with a standard action.

  At 15th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

  You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.

Patient Insight.name: 耐心洞察（Patient Insight）
Patient Insight.description: 当你尝试进行医疗，知识，察言观色，或生存技能检定时，你可以支付1点精神力来骰掷2次检定并使用较高的结果。

Peace Patron.name: Peace Patron（Peace Patron）
Peace Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{安定心神}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{风墙术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k3zn13pbr5tr9zac]{驱逐术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8hhy7qitegvb7a4]{Serenity}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.r37k9siiazcdqkc7]{回返真言}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5h7qpvgnqof7oku7]{力场监牢}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mi4y3g4n8adtfl3]{嫌恶术}

Peacebond.name: Peacebond（Peacebond）
Peacebond.description:
A witch can use this hex on a creature to prevent it from drawing a weapon for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. This hex has no effect on natural weapons or weapons already in a creature閳ユ獨 hands, but does prevent an archer from drawing arrows.

  A Will save negates this effect, and whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Peafowl Aspect.name: Peafowl Aspect（Peafowl Aspect）
Peafowl Aspect.description:
Peafowl are popular ornamental birds due to their spectacular colors, and they are often symbols of royalty or the divine. A shifter using the alternate natural attacks rules on page 8 of Pathfinder Player Companion: Wilderness Origins can select a bite (B, P, S) or tail slap (B) attack.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your Charisma score.

  At 8th level the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level it increases to +6.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Small peafowl. While in this form you gain low-light vision, a fly speed of 40 feet (clumsy), two talon attacks (1d3 damage), and a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks. A peafowl can閳ユ獩 use its fly speed to hover and must end any flying move action by landing or perching on a solid surface. A peafowl can perform a captivating dance targeting all creatures within a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone that can see your dance must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Charisma modifier) or be stunned for 1 round.

  At 8th level, the stunned effect lasts for 2 rounds, and at 15th level the duration increases to 4 rounds. Whether or not it succeeds at the initial save, a creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 24 hours.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tail slap (B)

Peerless Speed.name: Peerless Speed（Peerless Speed）
Peerless Speed.description:
At 3rd level, you can tap into the power of the Astral閳ユ獨 enhanced magical nature to gain the ability to accelerate your spellcasting dramatically.

  Once per day as a swift action, you can cast one cantrip you know as though it were augmented by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发} metamagic feat, without altering the cantrip閳ユ獨 level.

  At 5th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the maximum level of the spell you can augment with this ability increases by 1, to a maximum of an 8th-level spell at 19th level. If you use this ability while on the Astral Plane or on any plane whose enhanced magic trait allows you to cast a spell as if augmented by @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发}, you can instead choose to augment the spell as though you had applied the @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.J1yi4hFKYdXqZE3h]{法术极效} metamagic feats instead.

Penetrating Bite.name: Penetrating Bite（Penetrating Bite）
Penetrating Bite.description:
When using the animal fury rage power while raging, the barbarian閳ユ獨 bite is able to pierce most resistances.

  At 4th level, her bite is treated as a magic weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 7th level, her bite is also treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 10th level, her bite is also treated as a chaotic weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 16th level, her bite is treated as an adamantine weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and bypassing hardness.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power and be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

Penetrating Charge.name: Penetrating Charge（Penetrating Charge）
Penetrating Charge.description: A penetrating charge is a bomb specifically designed to disable locks and similar mechanisms, though not other means of sealing a door, a container, or other sorts of devices. As a full-round action, the alchemist can place a penetrating charge on a lock. Instead of dealing damage, the penetrating charge seeps into the mechanism and eats away at it, granting a +5 circumstance bonus on any subsequent Disable Device checks against the mechanism. A creature can spend 10 minutes and attempt an appropriate Craft check (DC 15) to fix the lock and remove this bonus.

Penetrating Infusion.name: Penetrating Infusion（Penetrating Infusion）
Penetrating Infusion.description:
Element air, fire, water; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts blue flame, cold, electric, fire
Saving Throw none

  The intensity of your blasts allows you to break through your foes閳?resistances. Treat your foe閳ユ獨 cold, electricity, or fire resistance as if it were 5 lower for the purpose of determining the infused blast閳ユ獨 damage; this doesn閳ユ獩 stack with the reduction from searing flame.

  You can increase the burn cost of this infusion to further reduce the foe閳ユ獨 resistance against the infused blast by 5 per additional point of burn accepted. This has no effect on creatures with immunity.

Perfect Aid.name: Perfect Aid（Perfect Aid）
Perfect Aid.description:
You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. You gain Bodyguard as a bonus feat, and whenever you use the aid another action to provide a bonus on attack rolls or to AC to one of your allies, the bonus you provide increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of +5 at 19th level). It doesn閳ユ獩 stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action.

  This revelation also counts as the Combat Expertise feat, but only for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Swift Aid feat and any feat that lists Swift Aid as a prerequisite.

Perfect Body.name: Perfect Body（Perfect Body）
Perfect Body.description: Some practitioners of psychic techniques extend their training to improve their bodies as well as their minds. When the psychic casts a linked transmutation spell, she can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to gain a +2 bonus on her next Reflex or Fortitude save.

Perfect Fall.name: 猫落（Perfect Fall）
Perfect Fall.description: 只要侠客在坠落时身边有触手可及的墙壁或其他支点，侠客就不会承受任何坠落伤害；即使侠客找不到这些支点，他在坠落时也只承受一半伤害且不会倒地。

Perfect Vulnerability.name: 直取要害（Perfect Vulnerability）
Perfect Vulnerability.description: 以一个标准动作，侠客可以发动一次精确的突袭直击敌手的心脏。这次攻击对抗目标的接触防御等级而非正常防御等级，而且目标在防御等级上失去敏捷加值。一旦一个敌人成为了侠客直取要害的目标，他就会在接下来的24小时内免疫同一个侠客的直取要害攻击。侠客必须要达到8级才能选择本天赋。

Perfected Form.name: Perfected Form（Perfected Form）
Perfected Form.description:
You maintain an unshakable sense of who you are, and no force can compel you to be anything else. You gain a +1 sacred (if your patron is good or neutral) or profane (if your patron is evil) bonus on saving throws against polymorph, petrification, and transmutation effects. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 cleric levels you have (maximum +5). Once per day when you succeed at a saving throw against such an effect, you can gain a surge of self-confidence as an immediate action that grants you a number of temporary hit points equal to your cleric level and a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws; both effects last for 1 minute.

  This power replaces the Liberation power of the Liberation Domain or the Strength Surge power of the Strength Domain.

Petrification Subdomain.name: Petrification Subdomain（Petrification Subdomain）
Petrification Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wvpa1pt2gyh75g3x]{石化之触}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.361rc74674l3zt9a]{石化术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g52zx1t1giteg5h1]{雕像术}

Petrifying Strike.name: Petrifying Strike（Petrifying Strike）
Petrifying Strike.description: Whenever the rogue damages a creature with one of her sneak attacks, she also deals 2 points of Dexterity damage to that creature as its body petrifies.

Phantasmagoric Display.name: Phantasmagoric Display（Phantasmagoric Display）
Phantasmagoric Display.description: The shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.mb819hvwpk0zmw53]{虹光喷射}, each once per day with a caster level equal to her shaman level.

Phantasmal Assault.name: Phantasmal Assault（Phantasmal Assault）
Phantasmal Assault.description:
At 13th level, you learn to harness your psychic force against all forms of haunts and undead creatures. Your mind-affecting spells that deal damage can now be used against haunts and undead normally immune to mind-affecting effects (including mindless undead). These spells are treated as though they dealt positive energy damage. This affects only spells that deal purely psychic-based damage (such as psychic crush, mind thrust, or synapse overload); effects based on physical effects (such as telekinetic projectile or telekinetic storm) don閳ユ獩 benefit from this ability. Additional non-damaging effects from such spells don閳ユ獩 affect the haunt, unless it would be normally affected.

  When you use a mind-affecting effect that deals damage against a possessed creature, the possessing entity takes a 閳? penalty on the saving throw against the mind-affecting attack.

Phantom Limb.name: Phantom Limb（Phantom Limb）
Phantom Limb.description:
The alchemist can manifest a ghostly, incorporeal arm that juts out from his torso. This phantom limb does not grant the alchemist any extra attacks or actions per round, and it cannot hold or grab anything (including incorporeal objects). The alchemist may use his phantom limb to make a touch attack against a foe as a standard action, scraping away at the very fibers of the victim閳ユ獨 soul. This attack deals 1d4 points of damage per alchemist level (Fortitude half ). Creatures that are immune to incorporeal attacks are immune to this damage, but otherwise the damage bypasses all forms of damage reduction except DR/ epic. The alchemist may suppress or activate this ability as a free action, and can use his phantom limb for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + his Intelligence modifier (these rounds need not be consecutive).

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level to select this discovery.

Phantom Recall.name: 魅影呼唤（Phantom Recall）
Phantom Recall.description:
在6级时，以一个迅捷或即时动作发动，唤魂师可以立刻使自己的魅影在身侧显形或返回意念空间。这个能力的效果类似于法术次元门，使用她的唤魂师等级作为法术的施法者等级。当唤魂师以此法显形魅影时，魅影会出现在她的一个邻接方格（或是距离最近的方格，如果唤魂师的邻接方格被占据的话）。

  当唤魂师以此法将魅影收回意念中时，她可以用同一个地址启动附体显形能力，但这样做会额外消耗一轮附体显形的持续时间。

  在6级时，唤魂师每天可以使用一次本能力；在之后她每提升4个唤魂师等级时再增加一次。

Phantom Stampede.name: Phantom Stampede（Phantom Stampede）
Phantom Stampede.description:
The shaman summons a host of ghostly herd beasts to trample a single creature. These phantom beasts affect only the target creature, which is buffeted and pummeled by their passing. The creature takes no damage from the ability, but takes a 閳? penalty to its CMD against bull rush, overrun, and trip attempts. Additionally, spellcasters under the effect of this ability take a 閳? penalty on concentration checks. The target receives no saving throw to negate this effect.

  This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 level.

  The creature can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Phantom.name: 魅影（Phantom）
Phantom.description:
在开始冒险时，唤魂师便拥有一只随侍于她，拥有强大的力量和多变能力的精魂生物——魅影。魅影必须永远地跟随以意念塑造与连结它的唤魂师，它必须选择停留在唤魂师的意念中，或是后者希望它以灵质态（Ectoplasmic）或是虚灵态（Incorporeal）的形象显形。魅影的阵营总是与唤魂师相同，并且它会说所有他的唤魂师主人的语言。在与唤魂师缔结羁绊以后，魅影可以暂时寄居在唤魂师的意识中（见下：共享意识能力），只将自己的一部分投射到现世（见下：附体显形能力）或完全的显形。完全显形的魅影被视为从灵界位面召唤而来生物，但在它生命被降到低于负的体质值之前它不会被送回原属位面。

  使魅影显形的的仪式耗时1分钟。当它显形时，唤魂师必须以一个会导致藉机攻击的整轮动作决定自己的魅影的显形形态（灵质态或虚灵态）。当它显形的时候，魅影保持在上一次显形时的生命点数，除非它是被杀死的；被杀死的魅影重新显形时它具有最大生命值的一半。魅影无法自然恢复伤势，只有医疗魔法或是当它在处于灵质态时进行的合适的医疗技能检定才能恢复它的生命值。显形后的魅影会留到唤魂师用一个标准动作让它返回自己的意念空间内或是被放逐会灵界。如果魅影被放逐到灵界，那么它需要24小时才能找到回到唤魂师意念的道路。

  当它完全显形以后，魅影不能藉由法术解除魔法被送回灵界位面，但是法术驱逐术(Dismissal)与放逐术（Banishment）仍如常运作。当唤魂师失去意识时或睡眠时，魅影将立刻自动返回她的意念中如果唤魂师死亡，她的魅影会被打回灵界位面，并且无法与唤魂师重聚，直到唤魂师被复活后过去了24小时。当居留在唤魂师的意念中时，魅影无法被任何手段（无论是法术还是能力）驱逐或放逐——它被唤魂师的异能力量保护着。

  完全显形的魅影可以使用符合其体形的护甲和物品（但它不能使用武器）。所有魅影持有，携带或穿着的物品在它返回唤魂师的意念时都会掉一地，并且如果魅影再次显形时要使用它们，它必须重新一件件装备这些物品。

  从某种意义上来说，魅影是一种傲娇的生物，它不情愿和其他召唤生物共事。如果魅影的唤魂师主人同时拥有幻灵或其他召唤生物，魅影将拒绝显形（无论是完全还是部分显形）。除此之外，如果在它显形以后魅影的主人召唤了一个生物，那么它会立刻回到唤魂师的意念中，在那个幻灵或类似的召唤生物离开前绝不出现。

  完全显形的魅影拥有独立的属性值，HD，豁免加值与技能点数，这些数据会随着唤魂师的等级增长而同时增长。见本职业后章的魅影介绍部分。

Pheremones.name: Pheremones（Pheremones）
Pheremones.description: The alchemist exudes an imperceptible musk that grants him a permanent +3 competence bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate checks.

Philologist.name: Philologist（Philologist）
Philologist.description: A rogue with this talent can reroll any Linguistics skill check made to decipher writing in an unfamiliar language, and never risks drawing a false conclusion from a failed Wisdom check after a failed Linguistics check. A rogue with this talent is allowed only one reroll per inscription, message, or text encountered.

Philosopher's Touch.name: Philosopher's Touch（Philosopher's Touch）
Philosopher's Touch.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus and touch a weapon, causing it to gain the properties of a special material. You can cause the weapon to be treated as cold iron or silver for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction for 1 minute per occultist level you possess.

  At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you can touch an additional weapon as part of using this ability to grant that weapon the same benefit (still expending only 1 point of mental focus).

  At 11th level, you can cause any weapon affected by this ability to act as if it were adamantine instead (but only for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction, not for overcoming hardness).

Phoenix Bloodline.name: Phoenix Bloodline（Phoenix Bloodline）
Phoenix Bloodline.description:
One of your ancestors bore witness to a phoenix閳ユ獨 resurrection and formed a bond with the magical creature.

  The resurrecting flames still course through your veins, surging with power.

  本职技能: 知识(Arcana).

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qcjskol4ac3eemhy]{七彩喷射} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pgsw180d62ekw83m]{Path Of The Winds} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hfca2lb4tlmrzoxm]{火焰纹章} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}, 
  • Elemental Focus (fire),
  •  Fast Healer,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (@JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：奥秘).

  血统奥秘: When casting any spell that deals fire damage, you can instead heal your targets. The spell deals no damage, and living creatures affected by the spell instead regain a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage the spell would normally deal.

Phoenix Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Phoenix Bloodrager Bloodline（Phoenix Bloodrager Bloodline）
Phoenix Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
One of your ancestors may have witnessed the fiery resurrection of a phoenix or been healed by the grace of this legendary bird. Whatever the case, the flames of the phoenix burn brightly within your soul, filling you with an inextinguishable vitality that can withstand the most harrowing of assaults. When you bloodrage, vibrant energy boils forth from beneath your skin, granting you both the soothing warmth to heal a friend閳ユ獨 wounds and the brutal power to burn flesh from bone. Your rage is an awesome and terrible thing to behold, as the raw power of your untamed life force can allow you to pull yourself back from the grasp of death itself.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JNlMhMhcDO8wkXiw]{重击专攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.norn02g8zdsspf2j]{治疗重伤} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (16th)

Phoenix Fire.name: Phoenix Fire（Phoenix Fire）
Phoenix Fire.description: The power of the phoenix brings righteous destruction to any who oppose it. At 20th level, while bloodraging, you gain the following effects: your melee attacks deal an additional 2d6 points of fire damage, any enemies within 20 feet of you must succeed at a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier) or take 4d6 points of fire damage at the start of their turn, and any creature that attacks you with a natural or non-reach weapon takes 1d6 points of fire damage (no save) with each successful hit.

Photokinetic Infusion.name: Photokinetic Infusion（Photokinetic Infusion）
Photokinetic Infusion.description:
Element wood; Type substance infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Prerequisite positive blast
Associated Blasts positive
Saving Throw none

  Your blast damages living creatures with light. This deals normal damage to undead creatures but also deals minimum damage (1 point of damage per d6, can閳ユ獩 be increased by the 9th-level improvement to metakinesis) to living creatures.

  Undead creatures that are particularly vulnerable to sunlight, such as vampires, take 1 extra point of damage per die from the infused blast.

Phrenic Amplifications.name: 精神增幅（Phrenic Amplifications）
Phrenic Amplifications.description: 异能者开发出一种被称为精神增幅的特殊技巧来强化施法。异能者可以在使用精神魔法施放一个法术的时候启动一个精神增幅，这会对法术的效果或施法过程进行调整。被施放的法术称为联结法术（linked spell）。每当异能者施放一个法术时，她仅能启动一个精神增幅，而且这么做是施放该法术的动作的一部分。除非精神增幅的说明中注明了仅能与某些特定种类的法术进行联结，否则异能者可以对任何异能者法术（psychic spell）使用任何已知的精神增幅。异能者会在1级获得一个精神增幅，从后述列表中进行选择。在3级以及之后的每4个等级，异能者都能够再学会一个新的精神增幅。每个精神增幅仅能被选择一次。一旦选定了精神增幅，便无法更改。精神增幅需要异能者从精神力池花费1点或更多点的精神力才能够生效。

Phrenic Pool.name: 精神力池（Phrenic Pool）
Phrenic Pool.description: 异能者具有一个由超自然精神能量组成的能量池，在施放异能者法术（psychic spells）时，异能者能够从精神力池中抽取精神力对法术加以操控。精神力池的最高上限为异能者等级的1/2 + 她的感知或魅力调整值，具体使用哪个调整值取决于异能者的精神境界（psychic discipline）。精神力池会在经过8个小时休息或冥想后的每个早晨恢复；这些小时不必连续。根据精神境界的不同，异能者可能具有其他向精神力池补充精神力的方法或情况。超过精神力池上限的精神力会被浪费掉。

Phrenic Strike.name: 精神打击（Phrenic Strike）
Phrenic Strike.description: 只要异能者的精神力池里至少还有1点精神力，他就可以通过一次徒手打击代替原来的接触攻击来引导一个距离为接触的联结法术。除非灵能者的徒手打击不会引发藉机攻击，否则这次徒手打击依旧会引发对手的藉机攻击。

Physical Composite Blast.name: Physical Composite Blast（Physical Composite Blast）
Physical Composite Blast.description: Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts. Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st; energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

Physical Kinetic Blade.name: Physical Kinetic Blade（Physical Kinetic Blade）
Physical Kinetic Blade.description:
Element(s) universal; Type form infusion; 等级 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

You form a weapon using your kinetic abilities. You create a non-reach, light or one-handed weapon in your hand formed of pure energy or elemental matter. (If you閳ユ獧e a telekineticist, you instead transfer the power of your kinetic blast to any object held in one hand.) The kinetic blade閳ユ獨 shape is purely cosmetic and doesn閳ユ獩 affect the damage dice, critical threat range, or critical multiplier of the kinetic blade, nor does it grant the kinetic blade any weapon special features. The object held by a telekineticist for this form infusion doesn閳ユ獩 prevent her from using gather power.

You can use this form infusion once as part of an attack action, a charge action, or a full-attack action in order to make melee attacks with your kinetic blade. Since it閳ユ獨 part of another action (and isn閳ユ獩 an action itself), using this wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 provoke any additional attacks of opportunity. The kinetic blade deals your kinetic blast damage on each hit (applying any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage as normal, but not your Strength modifier). The blade disappears at the end of your turn. The weapon deals the same damage type that your kinetic blast deals, and it interacts with Armor Class and spell resistance as normal for a blast of its type. Even if a telekineticist uses this power on a magic weapon or another unusual object, the attack doesn閳ユ獩 use any of the magic weapon閳ユ獨 bonuses or effects and simply deals the telekineticist閳ユ獨 blast damage. The kinetic blade doesn閳ユ獩 add the damage bonus from elemental overflow.

Physical Kinetic Blast.name: Physical Kinetic Blast（Physical Kinetic Blast）
Physical Kinetic Blast.description:
At 1st level, a kineticist gains a kinetic blast wild talent of her choice. This kinetic blast must be a simple blast that matches her element. Simple blasts are listed with their corresponding elements.

  As a standard action, the kineticist can unleash a kinetic blast at a single target up to a range of 30 feet. She must have at least one hand free to aim the blast (or one prehensile appendage, if she doesn閳ユ獩 have hands). All damage from a kinetic blast is treated as magic for the purpose of bypassing damage reduction. Kinetic blasts count as a type of weapon for the purpose of feats such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}. The kineticist is never considered to be wielding or gripping the kinetic blast (regardless of effects from form infusions; see Infusion), and she can閳ユ獩 use @Compendium[pf1.feats.26k1Gi7t5BoqxhIj]{要害打击} feats with kinetic blasts. Even the weakest kinetic blast involves a sizable mass of elemental matter or energy, so kinetic blasts always deal full damage to swarms of any size (though only area blasts deal extra damage to swarms). A readied kinetic blast can be used to counterspell any spell of equal or lower level that shares its descriptor. A kinetic blast that deals energy damage of any type (including force) has the corresponding descriptor.

  Each simple blast is either a physical blast or an energy blast.

  Physical blasts are ranged attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6+1 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6+1 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st. Spell resistance doesn閳ユ獩 apply against physical blasts.

  Energy blasts are ranged touch attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. All composite blasts are listed after the kineticist elements.

  Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts.

  Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  • A complete listing of kinetic blasts and composite blasts can be found within the Kineticist Elements page, here: Kineticist Elements

Physical Push.name: 体能强化（Physical Push）
Physical Push.description: 通过引导精神力量，你能够让身体展现出更强的体能。当你尝试力量、敏捷或体质属性检定或者基于上述属性的技能检定时，能够在检定中获得加值，该加值的数值等同于你的感知加值。每日能够使用该能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值。使用该能力是尝试此类检定的动作（若有的话）的一部分。若成功通过检定，你的精神力池便会恢复1点精神力。

Physical Regression.name: 实体回归（Physical Regression）
Physical Regression.description: 在13级，每天一次，你可以支付2点精神力，通过一个标准动作，你变化成你的其中一个前世。该能力如同变形术，但其距离为个人，且持续时间为每施法者等级10分钟。

Pickled Quasit.name: Pickled Quasit（Pickled Quasit）
Pickled Quasit.description:
The alchemist has learned how to seal a quasit in a bottle, which he can prepare for use as an extract. When the alchemist activates the extract, he throws the bottle at a square within 30 feet, releasing the quasit. The quasit is not under the alchemist閳ユ獨 control, but is otherwise treated as a summoned creature. The quasit remains for 1 round per caster level, then collapses into its associated elements. If the alchemist has the infusion discovery, another character can use the infused specimen. Creating a pickled quasit requires a 4th-level extract.

  An alchemist must be at least 10th level to select this discovery.

Pierce the Darkness.name: Pierce the Darkness（Pierce the Darkness）
Pierce the Darkness.description: The rogue can extend her senses of hearing and smell in darkness or when blinded. She gains blindsense out to a range of 5 feet, but only against creatures concealed by darkness or her own blindness. She still suffers the normal miss chance for attacking creatures with concealment.

Pillar.name: Pillar（Pillar）
Pillar.description:
Element earth, water, wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite kinetic cover

  You create a 5-foot-by-5-foot pillar of ice, packed dirt, or tangled roots with a height of up to 15 feet. This takes 1 full round, during which time the ground within the affected area rumbles conspicuously, but it rises only at the end of the round. You can閳ユ獩 create a pillar in an area occupied by or adjacent to any creatures unless all such creatures are willing, and if an unwilling creature moves into the area before the pillar finishes rising, it can disrupt and foil the pillar. As the pillar springs into existence, willing creatures and objects within the affected area are lifted with it.

The pillar can閳ユ獩 be used to crush creatures or objects against the ceiling; if insufficient room is available for the pillar and any creatures or objects on it, the pillar reaches only the maximum possible height. You can閳ユ獩 create a pillar under a Large or larger creature.

The pillar has AC 4, hardness 0, and 3 hit points per kineticist level. Scaling the pillar閳ユ獨 rough edges requires a successful DC 15 Climb check. When destroyed, when you create a new pillar, or when a number of rounds equal to your Constitution bonus (minimum 1) have elapsed, the pillar crumbles, melts, or withers away, gently lowering anything on it back to the ground.

Pincers (1 pt).name: Pincers (1 pt)（Pincers (1 pt)）
Pincers (1 pt).description:
An eidolon grows a large pincers at the end of one pair of its limbs, giving it two pincer attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The pincers deal 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). Eidolons with the grab evolution linked to pincers gain a +2 bonus on CMB checks made to grapple. The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with pincers (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the limbs evolution.

Pincers (UC) (1 pt).name: Pincers (UC) (1 pt)（Pincers (UC) (1 pt)）
Pincers (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  An eidolon grows large pincers at the ends of one pair of its limbs, giving it two pincer attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The pincers deal 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). Eidolons with the grab evolution linked to their pincers gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to grapple.

  The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with pincers (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of limbs (arms) evolutions the eidolon possesses.

Pitiful Foe.name: Pitiful Foe（Pitiful Foe）
Pitiful Foe.description:
You can temporarily curse one target within 30 feet as a standard action, making it pitiful and ineffective in battle. While this ability is in effect, the target is never considered to be threatening you or your allies, even if it is armed and you or your allies are standing in a square into which it can make a melee attack. If the target rolls a natural 20 on an attack roll or saving throw, the attack or saving throw is not an automatic success (as would be normal) and whether it is successful is instead determined normally. Additionally, the target automatically fails all rolls to confirm critical hits. This curse lasts for 1 round per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1). A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. This is a mind-affecting curse effect.

  You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 7th and 15th levels.

Plague Subdomain.name: Plague Subdomain（Plague Subdomain）
Plague Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c3iz720zjv922b6j]{Ray of Sickening}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{疫病术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7l7wofgz2iafjsdr]{Plague Storm}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}

Plague Vector.name: Plague Vector（Plague Vector）
Plague Vector.description:
The effects of the alchemist閳ユ獨 plague bomb operate as normal except for the following changes. The chosen disease閳ユ獨 save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier. Any creatures affected by the chosen disease become vectors for it, spreading the disease to any creatures they come in physical contact with for a number of days equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier (minimum 1). The save DC to avoid contracting the disease from the vector is the same as the DC used for this discovery.

  An alchemist must be at least 14th level and must have the plague bomb discovery to select this discovery.

Plague's Caress.name: Plague's Caress（Plague's Caress）
Plague's Caress.description: At 1st level, you can make a melee touch attack as a standard action that causes a living creature閳ユ獨 flesh to break out into rancid-smelling pustules and sores for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your sorcerer level (minimum 1 round). These sores cause the victim to become sickened for the duration of the effect; this is a disease effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Plagued Curse.name: Plagued Curse（Plagued Curse）
Plagued Curse.description:
You suffer from minor ailments and sicknesses. While you struggle to resist new diseases, you have grown accustomed to the many inconveniences of sickness. You take a 閳? penalty on all saving throws against disease or infestation effects, but you are immune to the sickened condition.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.y7aqxf7alib6ld6t]{疱疹咒} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, increase the save DC of any disease effect you create by +2, and you raise the number of saves required to recover naturally from these diseases by 1.

  At 15th level, you are immune to the effects of disease and infestations, but you can still function as a carrier for sickness.

Planar Knowledge.name: Planar Knowledge（Planar Knowledge）
Planar Knowledge.description: As an infernal binder, you gain a +3 bonus on @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面 checks.

Planar Scent.name: Planar Scent（Planar Scent）
Planar Scent.description: You can intuitively sense disruptions in the cosmos. This ability functions as a constant detect magic, but only for effects of the conjuration (calling), conjuration (summoning), conjuration (teleport), and illusion (shadow) subschools. You gain a +2 insight bonus on Spellcraft checks to identify such effects.

Planar Ward.name: 位面结界（Planar Ward）
Planar Ward.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗2点心智点在周身包裹上位面结界。非本位面的生物攻击你时承受-4攻击罚值，且你在对抗该种生物的法术、类法术、超自然能力时的豁免检定上获得+4环境加值。该结界持续1分钟。

Planar haze.name: Planar haze（Planar haze）
Planar haze.description:
You can fill an area with the smoky miasma of the Outer Rifts. Once per day when you cast a spell that has an area, as a swift action you may also fill that area with a thick haze that acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}, except it originates at the center of your spell effect and cannot expand beyond the spell閳ユ獨 area.

  At 10th level, the haze functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}.

  You may use this ability one additional time per day at 7th level, and one additional time per day at 14th level.

Plant Disguise.name: Plant Disguise（Plant Disguise）
Plant Disguise.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You can assume the shape of an immobile plant, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ho3wsspkqkhypt0]{树化术} but transforming into any ordinary Small or Medium plant.

Plant Patron.name: Plant Patron（Plant Patron）
Plant Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3fkwj6d8s65ufwar]{加速毒发}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7jqqoorcwq9ro81m]{步步生莲}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0sssdtv0tkbns2r3]{喘息之林}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ipc85wy0f0lmr0l4]{驱离木材}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qt0xmkag6ahtvesm]{活化植物}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{操控植物}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bp4s030vn5iwwf58]{蔓生术}

Plant Puppet.name: Plant Puppet（Plant Puppet）
Plant Puppet.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You can control plants, causing them to attack your foes. This functions as the aether puppet wild talent, except it controls plants instead of objects.

  At 12th level, you can grant hardness 5 to Large and larger animated plants.

Poetic Inspiration.name: Poetic Inspiration（Poetic Inspiration）
Poetic Inspiration.description: At 8th level, an order of the songbird samurai can speak a few words as a swift action, inspiring allies to great deeds. Allies within 30 feet who can hear the samurai gain a competence bonus equal to her Charisma modifier on attack and weapon damage rolls for 1 round. This ability can be used once per combat.

Poetic Vengeance.name: Poetic Vengeance（Poetic Vengeance）
Poetic Vengeance.description:
You constantly plot and scheme to take your revenge against those who wrong you. Once per day as an immediate action, after an enemy successfully affects you with an attack (whether with a spell, a physical attack, or any other sort of attack), you can force the enemy to take half the effects of its own attack unless it succeeds on a Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier). Any damage from the attack is halved, and non-damaging effects have a 50% chance to apply. If the non-damaging effect has a DC, the enemy receives a saving throw against it, at either the DC of the original effect or the DC of this ability, whichever is lower.

  At 10th level, you can use this ability twice per day, and at 20th level you can use it three times per day.

Poison (2 pts).name: Poison (2 pts)（Poison (2 pts)）
Poison (2 pts).description:
An eidolon secretes toxic venom, gaining a poison attack. Pick one bite or sting attack. Whenever the selected attack hits, the target is poisoned. 

  Eidolon poison閳ユ敄ype poison (injury); save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d4 Str damage; cure 1 save. The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Constitution modifier. For 2 additional evolution points, this poison deals Constitution damage instead. This poison can be used no more than once per round.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

Poison (UC) (2 pts).name: Poison (UC) (2 pts)（Poison (UC) (2 pts)）
Poison (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th; daemon, demon, devil, elemental, or protean subtype; bite or sting evolution.

  The eidolon secretes toxic venom, gaining a poison attack. Select one bite or sting attack. Whenever the selected attack hits, the target is poisoned.

Eidolon Poison: Injury; save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d4 Str damage; cure 1 save.

The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier.

  For 2 additional evolution points, this poison deals Constitution damage instead. This poison can be used no more than once per round.

Poison Fangs.name: Poison Fangs（Poison Fangs）
Poison Fangs.description:
At 12th level, you gain the poison special attack, tied to your bite attack. Your poison is as follows:

  bite閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Con damage; cure 1 save.

Poison Lore.name: Poison Lore（Poison Lore）
Poison Lore.description: An investigator has a deep understanding and appreciation for poisons. At 2nd level, he cannot accidentally poison himself when applying poison to a weapon. If the investigator spends 1 minute physically examining the poison, he can attempt a @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：自然 check to identify any natural poison or @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：神秘 check to identify any magical poison (DC = the poison閳ユ獨 saving throw DC). Lastly, once a poison is identified, he can spend 1 minute and attempt a 工艺： (alchemy) check (DC = the poison閳ユ獨 saving throw DC) to neutralize 1 dose of the poison. Success renders the dose harmless. The investigator has no chance of accidentally poisoning himself when examining or attempting to neutralize a poison.

Poison Resistance (INV).name: 毒素抗力(调查员)（Poison Resistance (INV)）
Poison Resistance (INV).description: 在2级时，调查员在所有对抗毒素的豁免检定上获得+2加值。在5级时，这个加值上升为+4，在8级时上升为+6。在11级时，调查员将免疫毒素。

Poison Use (ALC).name: 用毒(炼金术师)（Poison Use (ALC)）
Poison Use (ALC).description: 炼金术师学习过如何安全的使用毒药，从2级开始，炼金术师在给武器上毒时不会因意外而中毒。

Poison Use (ROG).name: Poison Use (ROG)（Poison Use (ROG)）
Poison Use (ROG).description: The rogue is trained in the use of poison, and can’t accidentally poison herself when applying poison to a weapon.

Poisoned Explosive.name: Poisoned Explosive（Poisoned Explosive）
Poisoned Explosive.description:
When an alchemist creates a bomb, he can apply a dose of contact or injury poison to it, as if applying poison to a weapon. If the poisoned bomb hits its target, the bomb deals damage as normal, but the target must also succeed at a saving throw against the poison or be affected by that poison. No other creatures are affected by the poison.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level and have the poison use class feature before selecting this discovery.

Poisoner.name: Poisoner（Poisoner）
Poisoner.description:
The vigilante gains the alchemist閳ユ獨 poison use class feature. At 6th level, when he has 5 doses of a single kind of poison, he can synthesize a dose of that poison once per day at no cost. This process takes 1 minute. It doesn閳ユ獩 expend the 5 doses of poison, but the doses must be in the vigilante閳ユ獨 possession to perform the synthesis. The poison produced requires careful storage and special skill to use. It becomes inert if it leaves the vigilante閳ユ獨 possession and can閳ユ獩 be sold.

  The vigilante can maintain only 1 dose of synthesized poison for every 5 doses of that poison in his possession.

Politics Inquisition.name: Politics Inquisition（Politics Inquisition）
Politics Inquisition.description: 神授力量: Your divine guidance twists agreements, laws, and policies to suit the interests of the faith.

Pollute Water.name: Pollute Water（Pollute Water）
Pollute Water.description:
The witch can corrupt bodies of water with foul energies. This functions as the blight hex, except it affects only either an area of standing water or a creature with the aquatic or water subtype. A creature of any type that drinks water from a polluted area must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or become nauseated for 1d3 rounds and afflicted as if blighted with the blight hex curse.

  A creature that succeeds at this saving throw is immune to the effects of polluted water from this area for 24 hours.

  Polluted water does not quench thirst.

Polluting Glance.name: Polluting Glance（Polluting Glance）
Polluting Glance.description:
The witch can corrupt nonmagical liquid items (such as alchemical remedies) with a look. The witch can choose one liquid item she can see within 30 feet and change its contents into polluted water as per her pollute water hex (see above). The number of polluting glance hexes the witch can have active at one time is equal to her Intelligence bonus (minimum 1).

The witch must have the pollute water hex to select this hex.

Portal Subdomain.name: Portal Subdomain（Portal Subdomain）
Portal Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jve8s6ut5yp4hht3]{Open And Shut}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2o9tacbz7tbrlhvv]{敲击术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v1nropy1tvj0476l]{Urban Step}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.if867t28tu6zxaei]{传送法阵}

Possessed Bloodline.name: Possessed Bloodline（Possessed Bloodline）
Possessed Bloodline.description:
Possessed sorcerers channel their magic potential through a unique bond with a possessing spirit rather than through blood alone. These spirits take numerous forms, but such is their tenaciousness that they bond in a way that prevents their banishment from the host. Instead, both possessor and sorcerer work together, their joint nature allowing the sorcerer to unlock many unnatural abilities.

  The magical nature of a sorcerer閳ユ獨 bloodline means the sorcerer herself does not even need to be the creature initially possessed to have this particular bloodline. It may be that one of your ancestors was possessed by a powerful spirit, one whose presence was so overwhelming that it sends ripples of power down through the generations.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：宗教.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja1p1uuf8fp6fiox]{Anticipate Peril} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9hi94t05i449j5ul]{Share Memory} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l8xwrepcmkdgb2wf]{Purge Spirit} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.flqg043abb5xryh5]{Entrap Spirit} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4mw83czf7b62rar3]{Possession} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lovx4kiq18gbvg4e]{Telepathy} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q8nety5obvbbd5xs]{Divide Mind} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师}, 
  • Fearsome Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.cKxfEL5XOWuzLhfO]{精通钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家}, 
  • Selective Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻}(唬骗 ),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻}, 
  • Traumatic Spell.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a non-cantrip spell, you can roll the next Will save you attempt against a mind-affecting effect before your next turn twice and take the better result. If you have already failed a save against a mind-affecting effect, you can instead attempt another Will save against that ongoing mind-affecting effect after successfully casting your spell. You can use this ability only once against a given mind-affecting effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Pounce (1 pt).name: Pounce (1 pt)（Pounce (1 pt)）
Pounce (1 pt).description:
An eidolon gains quick reflexes, allowing it to make a full attack after a charge.

  This evolution is only available to eidolons of the quadruped base form.

Pounce (UC) (3 pts).name: Pounce (UC) (3 pts)（Pounce (UC) (3 pts)）
Pounce (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th, quadruped base form.

  The eidolon gains quick reflexes, allowing it to make a full attack after a charge.

Power Over Undead.name: Power Over Undead（Power Over Undead）
Power Over Undead.description: You receive @Compendium[pf1.feats.CjLNTqNGz4zU4zpp]{命令死灵} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.O7Dn4bXZtMW0UstG]{驱散死灵} as a bonus feat. You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, but only to use the selected feat. You can take other feats to add to this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.pgRX4VpFemwv9R0E]{额外引导} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.1HfwfBOSWtdxFQ2s]{精通导能}, but not feats that alter this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5rgOsdDlseGr4o5]{元素导能} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.ieww7CP6JK5pwtpg]{阵营导能}. The DC to save against these feats is equal to 10 + 1/2 your wizard level + your Charisma modifier. At 20th level, undead cannot add their channel resistance to the save against this ability.

Power from Pageantry.name: Power from Pageantry（Power from Pageantry）
Power from Pageantry.description: When casting a spell with a casting time of 1 standard action or less, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool to extend the casting time to 1 full round. If you do, the caster level and saving throw DC increase by 2.

Power from Pain.name: 疼痛之力（Power from Pain）
Power from Pain.description: 若你的回味痛苦至少造成了5点伤害，那么你的精神力池会恢复1点精神力。每日能够以此方式恢复的精神力的最大数值等同于你的感知调整值。

Power of the Fallen.name: Power of the Fallen（Power of the Fallen）
Power of the Fallen.description:
You can touch a dying creature and channel its life energy into another living creature. This ability acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k0k8gvqyy3rd5gke]{死亡丧钟}, except you can choose any ally (including yourself ) within 30 feet to gain the benefit of this effect, and you can apply the +2 enhancement bonus to either Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

Power of the Giants.name: Power of the Giants（Power of the Giants）
Power of the Giants.description: At 15th level, you may grow to Large size as a standard action. At this size you gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a 閳? penalty to Dexterity, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, and a +4 natural armor bonus. You may return to your normal size as a standard action. You may remain in this size for up to 1 minute per character level per day; this duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1 minute increments.

Powerful Bond.name: Powerful Bond（Powerful Bond）
Powerful Bond.description:
As a free action, you can open a link to communicate telepathically with a single ally within 60 feet. The telepathic link is two-way and lasts for 1 minute. Unlike normal telepathy, this ability requires a shared language. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Good power of the Good Domain.

Powerful Connection.name: 强力连接（Powerful Connection）
Powerful Connection.description: 当你施放预言系法术（比如探知）时，若目标会因物理上的联系而在对抗该预言系法术时的豁免检定承受罚值，你可以消耗1点心智点加倍这个因财物、衣服或身体部分等物理联系而造成的罚值。另外，当你释放其它需要目标进行豁免检定的预言系法术时，若你拥有目标的物理部分（比如物品、衣服或身体部分）作为法器成分且消耗1点心智点，该法术的豁免DC+2。

Powerful Smash.name: Powerful Smash（Powerful Smash）
Powerful Smash.description:
As a standard action, the shaman can attack an enemy with an unarmed strike as if she had the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打} feat.
