If the shaman hits a creature in this way, that creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the shaman閳ユ獨 class level + her Charisma modifier) or be dazed for 1 round.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

Pranked Curse.name: Pranked Curse（Pranked Curse）
Pranked Curse.description:
Capricious fey constantly bedevil you, playing pranks on you such as tying your shoelaces together, hiding your gear, making inappropriate noises or smells at formal events, and mimicking your voice to tell embarrassing lies. In addition to any social consequences of such mischief, you take a 閳? penalty on initiative checks. Furthermore, whenever you attempt to retrieve a stored item from your gear, there閳ユ獨 a 25% chance that you fail to find it with that action. Add @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术} to your list of spells known.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{闪光尘} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} to your list of spells known as a 5th-level spell.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} to your list of spells known. A possessed oracle can select this curse in place of the haunted curse.

Prayer Aura.name: 祈祷灵光（Prayer Aura）
Prayer Aura.description: 13级起，以自由动作，你能够在自身展开一个灵光，来支持盟友和削弱敌人。每日使用这个灵光的轮数等同于你的异能者等级。这些轮数不必连续。该能力的功能就如同祈祷术（Prayer）一般，使你的所有盟友在攻击检定、武器伤害检定、豁免和技能检定中获得+1幸运加值，并让敌人的这些检定受到-1减值。若你的阵营为混乱、守序、善良或邪恶，那么灵光对对立阵营的生物所产生的减值提升至-2点。即便敌人的阵营在两个阵营轴上都与你是对立的（比如混乱邪恶的生物对守序善良的异能者），灵光所引起的减值也不会进一步增加。

Precise Poison.name: Precise Poison（Precise Poison）
Precise Poison.description: The alchemist is adept at delivering poison to the most vulnerable areas of his targets. When the alchemist confirms a critical hit with a poisoned weapon, he increases the save DC of the poison by an amount equal to the weapon閳ユ獨 critical multiplier.

Presence of Dragons.name: Presence of Dragons（Presence of Dragons）
Presence of Dragons.description:
Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

  You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.

Primal Aether.name: Primal Aether（Primal Aether）
Primal Aether.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0

  You can gather strands of aether twisted and warped by your experiences in the Spellscar Desert, and wind them so tightly that they explode, creating a primal magic event with a CR equal to your kineticist level. See pages 12閳?3 of Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic for more information on primal magic events.

Primal Companion.name: Primal Companion（Primal Companion）
Primal Companion.description: You gain the service of a faithful animal of the night. You can select from a bear, boar, crocodile, shark, tiger, or wolf. This animal functions as a druid閳ユ獨 animal companion, using your oracle level as your effective druid level.

Primal Fury.name: 原始狂怒（Primal Fury）
Primal Fury.description: 13级起，以一个自由动作，你能释放出自己更为原始的形态。除了以下方面，此功能如同转变术（Transformation）。你能使用此能力的轮数等同你的异能者等级。这些轮数不需要连贯使用。你能以一个自由动作结束此效果。在使用此能力后，你陷入疲乏（Fatigued），持续的轮数等同使用原始狂怒的轮数的2倍。你不能在陷入疲乏（Fatigued）或力竭（Exhausted）状态时启动新一次原始狂怒。若你失去意识（fall unconscious），你的原始狂怒将立即中止。

Primal Speaker.name: Primal Speaker（Primal Speaker）
Primal Speaker.description:
The shaman can speak with mammoths and any other megafauna or elephant creatures as if she were under the effects of speak with animals.

  At 5th level, the shaman gains a bonus on Handle Animal checks when dealing with those animals equal to half her shaman level.

  At 10th level, the shaman can affect one such animal within 30 feet as if she閳ユ獓 cast charm animal (Will negates).

  Whether or not the target succeeds at the saving throw, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Profane Bomb.name: Profane Bomb（Profane Bomb）
Profane Bomb.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal evil divine damage. Good creatures that take a direct hit from a profane bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against a neutral creature, a profane bomb deals half damage, and the target is not affected by the bomb閳ユ獨 staggering effect. A profane bomb has no effect against evil-aligned creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level to select this discovery.

Progenitor's Sting.name: Progenitor's Sting（Progenitor's Sting）
Progenitor's Sting.description:
You can magically apply your toxic essence onto your weapon or onto the weapon of a willing ally within 30 feet as a standard action. (Poison閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str, Dex, or Con damage [chosen when this ability is used]; cure 1 save).

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 5th level, the ability damage of your poison increases to 1d3.

  At 7th level, each time you apply your progenitor閳ユ獨 sting, you can choose two ability scores for your bloodline poison to affect.

  At 11th level, whenever you apply your progenitor閳ユ獨 sting to a weapon, you can magically apply it onto all willing allies閳?weapons within 20 feet as well. This counts as one use of your bloodline ability.

Prohibition.name: Prohibition（Prohibition）
Prohibition.description:
As a standard action, you can command a creature within 30 feet to refrain from committing a particular action (including any referenced in the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.mmdypasgl5us00wb]{Forbid Action}). If the creature performs the named action before the beginning of your next turn, it takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every 2 cleric levels you possess and the effect ends. This is a language-dependent effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

If you have the spell rune domain power, you can attach a spell effect to the prohibition as if it were the spell rune domain ability; the spell takes effect if the creature performs the named action. This spell must be of at least 1 level lower than the highest-level cleric spell you can cast, and it must target one or more creatures. Regardless of the number of targets the spell can normally affect, it affects only the creature that triggers the rune. Attaching a spell in this way extends the duration of the prohibition by a number of rounds equal to the spell閳ユ獨 level, or until it is discharged.

  This power replaces the Touch of Law power of the Law Domain or the Blast Rune power of the Rune Domain.

Project Psyche.name: Project Psyche（Project Psyche）
Project Psyche.description:
You can project your psyche into another vessel. Once per day, you can possess another creature as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.8ai7fslz4zu8xe9s]{魔魂壶} spell, though this does not require a receptacle. You must be adjacent to the target creature, which receives a Will save against the effect.

  You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.

Promethean Curse.name: Promethean Curse（Promethean Curse）
Promethean Curse.description:
Your body is falling apart, forcing you to rely on mechanical augmentations or replacements to keep yourself alive. You take 1 point of Constitution damage each day, but you also ignore the first point of Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage you take for the remainder of that day.

  At 5th level, you gain a +2 bonus on all saving throws on effects that cause ability damage, ability drain, or ability score penalties.

  At 10th level, this bonus increases to +6.

  At 15th level, any effect that would normally deal ability drain on you instead deals ability damage whenever you successfully save against the effect.

Prophecy Subschool.name: Prophecy Subschool（Prophecy Subschool）
Prophecy Subschool.description:
Associated School: Divination.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the forewarned and scrying adept powers of the divination school.

Prophecy.name: Prophecy（Prophecy）
Prophecy.description: The witch can call on her prophetic ancestors and cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术} once per day. She can spend a full hour casting the spell in place of providing the usual material components.

Prophetic Armor.name: Prophetic Armor（Prophetic Armor）
Prophetic Armor.description: You are so in tune with your primal nature that your instincts often act to save you from danger that your civilized mind isn閳ユ獩 even aware of. You may use your Charisma modifier (instead of your Dexterity modifier) as part of your Armor Class and all Reflex saving throws. Your armor閳ユ獨 maximum Dexterity bonus applies to your Charisma, instead.

Propitiation.name: 慰灵之术（Propitiation）
Propitiation.description: 在9级时，通灵者学习了一些秘密的术式和祭仪，让他可以安抚英灵，缓解英灵附体造成的负担。每天一次，通灵者可以通过本能力减少1点自己承受的共鸣（最少降低到1）。每一个英灵都有属于自己的独有慰灵法，无论哪一种都需要至少10分钟时间来执行，但是不需要物质献祭（比如财产和祭品）。

Protection Patron.name: Protection Patron（Protection Patron）
Protection Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{抵抗能量伤害}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1gz3zdpxu7uic5ky]{狂怒斗篷}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wu4y1ilg6iq28cr6]{护身掌}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.odel1qsctfkp8rdm]{禁制术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jg3p4t3dv1a7nqvo]{Spell Immunity, Greater}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kdzx88z16gs8l392]{解锢术}

Protective Luck.name: Protective Luck（Protective Luck）
Protective Luck.description:
The witch can cause fate to twist so that it benefits a creature within 30 feet for 1 round. Whenever that creature is targeted by an effect that requires an attack roll, including weapon attacks, the attacker must roll twice and take the worse result.

  At 8th level and 16th level, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round.

  A witch cannot use this ability on herself.

  Hexes that affect the fortune hex, such as cackle, also affect protective luck.

Psychedelia Discipline.name: 迷幻药境界（Psychedelia Discipline）
Psychedelia Discipline.description:
你会使用致幻剂来拓展自身的心智。通过实验与研究，你已经掌握了对自己来说能够产生最佳效果的药物剂量。服用药剂会让你的精神飞向与他人截然不同的层次，遗憾的是普通人绝对无法理解你的行为。

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.azyo7xhfwdtjchtm]{Polypurpose Panacea} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d4mp0m5xfnu9hbhn]{Mad Hallucination} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk334ykycwiwb0gn]{Synesthesia} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{海市蜃楼} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2ip53auf03bqxkl1]{Joyful Rapture} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ni0okhagwuk0jbe9]{Waves of Ecstasy} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (18th).

Psychic Curse.name: 精神诅咒（Psychic Curse）
Psychic Curse.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点用异能魔法诅咒30尺内一个活物。你选择下列一个效果：记忆流逝、心理闭锁或疼痛混乱。记忆流逝效果为目标失去过去每秘学士等级1小时的记忆；心理闭锁效果为你指定一个特定动作，比如“用某种武器攻击”“施放一个特定法术”或“某种合适的选项（由GM裁定）”，目标若无法通过意志豁免检定，则无法进行所选的动作，若目标接下来的轮内依然想进行该动作，那么直到成功为止，接下来的豁免检定会获得+2加值；疼痛混乱效果为当目标被确认重击时，会混乱1d4轮。目标可以进行意志豁免检定来免除该效果。该效果持续每秘学士等级1天时间。单一生物无法承受超过一个的该效果。这是一个影响心灵的诅咒效果。你必须至少5级才能选择该灵器之力。

Psychic Defense.name: Psychic Defense（Psychic Defense）
Psychic Defense.description: Reading small, invisible cues allows the psychic to take advantage of social circumstances and subtly influence her target. Casting a linked spell during a social encounter and spending 1 point from her phrenic pool allows the psychic to add a +4 bonus on her next Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, or Sense Motive check.

Psychic Discipline.name: 精神境界（Psychic Discipline）
Psychic Discipline.description:
每名异能者都可以通过一种特殊的理念来强化自身的精神力量，比如进行严格缜密的研究或者让自己达到某种特别的心理状态。这种理念被称作她的精神境界。异能者会根据自身所选择的精神境界来获得额外的已知法术。精神境界的选择必须在1级时做出；一旦选定，便无法更改。每个精神境界都会赋予异能者数个境界之力（在1级、5级和13级获得），而且会赋予她额外的已知法术。此外，精神境界也决定了异能者的精神力池和精神增幅所使用的属性类别。对抗精神境界能力（psychic discipline ability）的豁免检定DC为10 + 异能者的等级的一半 + 异能者的智力调整值。

  1级起，异能者能够根据自身的精神境界学会一个额外的法术。她会在4级以及之后的每2个等级再学会一个额外法术，直至18级时学会最后一个。这些法术不计入在表：异能者已知法术的数量中。通过精神境界知晓的法术无法在更高的等级时更换为其他不同的法术。

Psychic Fog.name: 精神迷雾（Psychic Fog）
Psychic Fog.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出云雾来。云雾持续每秘学士等级1分钟。它如同云雾术般运作，只不过不会被风吹散。7级时，你可以在创造云雾时额外消耗1点心智点，让它变得粘稠，如同重雾术，但它不会减速具有异能之力或可施放异能法术的生物。以重雾术方式施放的精神迷雾持续时间缩短为每秘学士等级1轮。你必须至少3级才能选择该灵器之力。

Psychic Impression.name: Psychic Impression（Psychic Impression）
Psychic Impression.description: Objects retain psychic impressions of those who come in contact with them, and a powerful mind can read these impressions. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject touches an object that another creature with an Intelligence score of 3 or more has touched in the last 10 minutes. The mesmerist receives a psychic impression of the emotional state of the last such creature to touch the object. This impression contains no images or languages and can閳ユ獩 show the mesmerist who the creature was if the mesmerist doesn閳ユ獩 already know.

Psychic Inception (Stare).name: 开启心智（Psychic Inception (Stare)）
Psychic Inception (Stare).description: 催眠注视以及它所带来的惩罚还能影响无心智（mindless）或者免疫影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果的生物（比如不死生物或虫类）。当此类生物受到催眠注视的影响时，催眠师还能够用影响心灵的法术和能力对其产生一定的作用；目标会在豁免检定中获得+2加值（若允许豁免的话），而且就算受到影响，此类生物每轮还有50%的概率能够忽略效果。忽略效果并不意味着效果的结束，但这让目标生物能够在该轮内正常行动。

Psychic Safeguard.name: 心灵屏障（Psychic Safeguard）
Psychic Safeguard.description: 13级起，你能构建出持续性的精神防护，这会让你获得法术抗力（spell resistance），数值为8 + 你的施法者等级。当你唤出黑暗半身后，这个法术抗力会增加至16 + 你的施法者等级。

Psychoactive Bomb.name: Psychoactive Bomb（Psychoactive Bomb）
Psychoactive Bomb.description:
Psychoactive bombs are mixed with neurotoxic extracts that heighten certain sensations. A creature struck by a psychoactive bomb takes a 閳? penalty on saving throws against charm, emotion, fear, and pain effects, and the DC for Intimidate checks against the victim decreases by 2. This effect lasts for 1 hour per alchemist level. These penalties do not stack, and a creature can only be affected by a single psychoactive bomb at a time. A psychoactive bomb deals 1d6 fewer hit points of damage than normal.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

Psychofeedback.name: 精神反馈（Psychofeedback）
Psychofeedback.description: 异能者支付2点精神力及牺牲一个2环或以上的联结法术，他的力量，敏捷或体质属性会获得每牺牲法术环级1点的增强加值，持续每异能者等级1分钟。

Psychokinetic Tincture.name: Psychokinetic Tincture（Psychokinetic Tincture）
Psychokinetic Tincture.description:
Once per day, the alchemist can concoct a foul-tasting tincture that harnesses the power of the spirit. By drinking this tincture as a standard action, the alchemist can invite the latent spirits in the area to surround him. The alchemist can channel one spirit for every 4 alchemist levels he possesses. Each spirit channeled this way grants the alchemist a +1 deflection bonus to AC as the spirits whirl around his body. As a standard action, the alchemist can launch one of these spirits toward a target as a ranged touch attack. Launching a spirit this way reduces this discovery閳ユ獨 deflection bonus to AC by 1. As a launched spirit passes through its target閳ユ獨 body, it emits a terrible wail heard only in the target閳ユ獨 mind, causing the target to become frightened for 1 round per alchemist level (Will negates). This is a mind-affecting fear effect. A creature that successfully saves against the wail cannot be affected by this discovery again for 24 hours. The spirits whirl around the alchemist閳ユ獨 body for 10 minutes per alchemist level, or until the alchemist has launched all of the spirits.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level to select this discovery.

Psychopomp Subdomain.name: Psychopomp Subdomain（Psychopomp Subdomain）
Psychopomp Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s72y6ioltjbpucz0]{Chain of Perdition}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友} (psychopomps only)
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{锢魂术}

Psychopomp Totem, Greater.name: Psychopomp Totem, Greater（Psychopomp Totem, Greater）
Psychopomp Totem, Greater.description:
While raging, the barbarian can detect and locate undead creatures within 30 feet, just as if it had the blindsight ability, and any weapons she wields are treated as if they had the ghost touch special ability.

  A barbarian must have the psychopomp totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

Psychopomp Totem, Lesser.name: Psychopomp Totem, Lesser（Psychopomp Totem, Lesser）
Psychopomp Totem, Lesser.description: While raging, the barbarian gains a +1 deflection bonus to AC against the attacks of undead creatures and a +1 bonus on saving throws against death effects, diseases, and poisons. This bonus increases by 1 for each psychopomp totem rage power she has, excepting this one.

Psychopomp Totem.name: Psychopomp Totem（Psychopomp Totem）
Psychopomp Totem.description:
The first time each round a creature with regeneration or fast healing is struck by the barbarian while she is raging, the creature must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half the barbarian's level + the barbarian's Strength modifier) or that ability is suppressed for 1 round.

  A barbarian must have the lesser psychopomp totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Psychosomatic Surge.name: 以心疗身（Psychosomatic Surge）
Psychosomatic Surge.description: 精神魔法抚慰着受术者，暂时性地缓解了她所受到的创伤。当受术者受到伤害时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者会获得临时生命值，数值相当于1d8 + 1/2催眠师的等级。若触发诡计的攻击所造成的伤害让受术者的生命值降至0点或更低的话，该项诡计能额外赋予1d8点临时生命值。这些临时生命值持续1小时或者直至耗散为止。

Pull (1 pt).name: Pull (1 pt)（Pull (1 pt)）
Pull (1 pt).description:
An eidolon gains the ability to pull creatures closer with a successful attack. Select one type of natural attack. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If successful, the target of the attack is pulled 5 feet closer to the eidolon. This ability only works on creatures of a size equal to or smaller than the eidolon. Creatures pulled in this way do not provoke attacks of opportunity. The eidolon must have a reach of 10 feet or more to select this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Pull (UC) (1 pt).name: Pull (UC) (1 pt)（Pull (UC) (1 pt)）
Pull (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Reach of 10 feet or more.

  The eidolon gains the ability to pull creatures closer with a successful attack. Select one type of natural attack. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If the eidolon succeeds at this check, it pulls the target of the attack 5 feet closer to it. This ability works only on creatures of a size category equal to or smaller than the eidolon. Creatures pulled in this way do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Pull into the Shadows.name: 拖走（Pull into the Shadows）
Pull into the Shadows.description: 以一个整轮动作，侠客可以移动最多相当于他移动速度的距离并且对一个尚未发现他的存在（或是将他视为盟友）的目标发动一次近战攻击。如果他的攻击成功命中，那么侠客可以对该目标发动一次拖拽战技攻击，这次战技攻击获得+4加值且不触发藉机攻击。如果拖拽战技成功，那么即使侠客在本轮中已经没有更多的移动距离，他也可以如同正常情况一般拖着他的敌人移动移动。侠客不能对自己真正的盟友或是一个自愿的目标使用本天赋。

Pulling Infusion.name: Pulling Infusion（Pulling Infusion）
Pulling Infusion.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts gravity, void
Saving Throw none

  Your kinetic blast pulls foes toward you. Attempt a drag combat maneuver check against each target damaged by your infused blast (the blast always drags the foe closer to you), using your Constitution modifier instead of your Strength modifier to determine your CMB.

  This infusion can pull a foe a maximum of 5 feet. You can increase the maximum distance pulled by 5 feet per additional point of burn accepted.

Pure Body.name: 纯净之身（Pure Body）
Pure Body.description: 13级起，你获得免疫疾病（immunity to diseases）和免疫毒素（immunity to poisons）。

Pure Whimsy.name: Pure Whimsy（Pure Whimsy）
Pure Whimsy.description:
Once per day, you can release a stream of errant chaos from the First World as a standard action. When you do so, identify a target within 90 feet and generate a random effect as from a rod of wonder (or, at the GM閳ユ獨 discretion, another random or unusual effect of similar power). The DC of any required saving throw is 10 + half your oracle level + your Charisma modifier, and no effect from this ability persists for more than 1 day.

  You can use this ability once per day at 7th level and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 7th. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Pure of Mind.name: Pure of Mind（Pure of Mind）
Pure of Mind.description: At 3rd level, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against charm effects and a +4 bonus on saving throws against spells with the evil descriptor. At 9th level, your bonus on saving throws against charm effects increases to +4 and your bonus on saving throws against spells with the evil descriptor increases to +6.

Pure-Flame Infusion.name: 纯焰注能（Pure-Flame Infusion）
Pure-Flame Infusion.description:
元素：火；类别：性质注能；等级：7；超载：4

  关联念袭类别：蓝焰击

  豁免：无

  你打开一条直接连接着最纯粹的火焰的通道，让它喷涌出来。你的注能念袭会忽略法术抗力（spell resistance）。

Purge Corruption.name: 净化腐浊（Purge Corruption）
Purge Corruption.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点从生物体内抽出浊物来。你必须用灵器触摸目标来使用该能力。该能力如同中和毒素或移除疾病一般运作，用秘学士等级作为施法者等级。使用该能力单次只能治疗一种毒素或一种疾病。你必须至少5级才能选择该灵器之力。

Purge Disquiet.name: Purge Disquiet（Purge Disquiet）
Purge Disquiet.description:
At 13th level, you can banish mental distress. You become immune to fear spells and effects and to the confused condition.

  As a standard action, you can choose a willing creature that is either within 30 feet or in telepathic contact with you. For 1 round per psychic level you possess, you suppress any fear effect or confused, cowering, frightened, panicked, or shaken condition affecting that creature.

  You can suppress only one effect at a time with this ability, and choosing a new target ends the suppression for the character you previously chose.

Purging Flame.name: Purging Flame（Purging Flame）
Purging Flame.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 6; Burn 1

  You can purge yourself or another with flame, removing all impurities. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界} on a single target. The target must be willing and takes 2 points of fire damage per character level as well as 1 point of burn (you do not need to accept burn unless you are the target). You can use this ability even when affected by an effect that denies you actions, so long as this effect is one that break enchantment could remove.

  If you burn rare incense or igneous rocks from Mount Kumijinja worth 100 gp or 1,000 gp as part of using purging flame, your target also benefits from restoration, as if the spell were cast using diamonds of equal value as a material component.

Purging Mutagen.name: Purging Mutagen（Purging Mutagen）
Purging Mutagen.description: The alchemist閳ユ獨 mutagen combines ipecac and other purgative components. A non-alchemist who consumes the mutagen is nauseated for only 1 round, during which time her body rapidly metabolizes or expels all extant toxins, granting her an immediate second saving throw against each ongoing disease and poison currently affecting her. Each successful save counts as two consecutive successful saving throws for the purpose of curing the affliction. Any failed saving throws do not result in additional damage or other effects. A non-alchemist who consumes a second purging mutagen in a 24-hour period is instead nauseated for 1 hour. When an alchemist drinks the mutagen, he can choose whether or not to also be affected by this discovery in addition to the mutagen閳ユ獨 other effects.

Purifying Flames.name: Purifying Flames（Purifying Flames）
Purifying Flames.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 1

  You use fire to burn poison from within a creature閳ユ獨 veins. You must attempt a caster level check (1d20 + your kineticist level) against the DC of each poison affecting the target. Success means that the poison is neutralized, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6l904edkt8jv9jor]{中和毒性}.

  When you attempt to neutralize poison in this way, you can choose to deal a number of points of fire damage to the poisoned creature equal to the amount of damage you normally take from accepting burn in order to reduce the DC of one poison affecting the target by 2. This reduction remains until the end of your next turn.

Push (1 pt).name: Push (1 pt)（Push (1 pt)）
Push (1 pt).description:
An eidolon gains the ability to push creatures away with a successful attack. Select one type of natural attack. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If successful, the target of the attack is pushed 5 feet directly away from the eidolon. This ability only works on creatures of a size equal to or smaller than the eidolon. Creatures pushed in this way do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Push (UC) (1 pt).name: Push (UC) (1 pt)（Push (UC) (1 pt)）
Push (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon gains the ability to push creatures away with a successful attack. Select one type of natural attack. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If the eidolon succeeds at this check, it pushes the target of the attack 5 feet directly away from it. This ability works only on creatures of a size category equal to or smaller than the eidolon. Creatures pushed in this way do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

Pushing Infusion.name: 推行注能（Pushing Infusion）
Pushing Infusion.description:
元素：以太、气、土或水；类别：性质注能；等级：1；超载：1

  关联念袭类别：突风，风卷雪，带电水，岩击，熔岩流，轰钢，硬泥团，沙尘暴，蒸灼，念动，水突

  豁免：无

  你的念袭势头汹涌，能够将敌人击退。尝试一次冲撞（bull rush）战技检定对抗每个被你的注能念袭伤害的目标，使用你的体质调整值替代你的力量调整值来确定检定的加值。这个注能最高可以把敌人推开5尺。你能够增加这个注能的超载消耗来增加推开敌人的最高距离，每额外承受1点超载便能够增加5尺距离上限。你无法将这个注能与不具有明确推行方向的塑形注能结合使用，比如云形（cloud）。

Putrid Curse.name: Putrid Curse（Putrid Curse）
Putrid Curse.description:
Your presence stagnates water and befouls all liquids carried on your person, including magical items such as potions, and unattended sources of still water within 10 feet. Creatures who drink such a liquid are nauseated for 1 round (though potions and similar liquids still convey their usual benefits as well). Affected liquids remain stagnant for 1 hour after leaving your presence. @Compendium[pf1.spells.xi1uouy7qlpfaqlr]{净化食粮} can cleanse a stagnant potion or water with a successful caster level check (DC = 15 + double the potion閳ユ獨 caster level).

  At 5th level, you become immune to the nauseated effects created by liquids your presence has befouled.

  At 10th level, your body is covered in noxious slime, and each creature adjacent to you at the beginning of its turn must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your oracle level + your Charisma modifier) or become sickened for 1 round.

  At 15th level, your slime coating grants you DR 10/閳?

Pyroclastic Shove.name: Pyroclastic Shove（Pyroclastic Shove）
Pyroclastic Shove.description:
As a standard action, you conjure a cascade of volcanic ash to bull rush a creature within 30 feet of you. The CMB of this cascade is equal to your base attack bonus + your Charisma modifier + 4 from the cascade閳ユ獨 Gargantuan size. If the bull rush succeeds, the creature takes 1d6 points of fire damage per oracle level.

  At 12th and at 17th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

  You must be 7th level to select this revelation.

Quenching Infusion.name: 猝熄注能（Quenching Infusion）
Quenching Infusion.description:
元素：水；类别：性质注能；等级：1；超载：1

  关联念袭类别：带电水，水突

  豁免：无

  你的念袭能够熄灭非魔法火焰，就如同它们接触到了水元素（water elemental）一般。若你将超载消耗增加至2点或者把念袭的伤害降至0点，念袭还会如同生命骰与你的操念使等级相同的水元素一般解除魔法火焰（dispels magical fires）。

Quick Change.name: 快速变装（Quick Change）
Quick Change.description: 侠客学会了如何快速改变自己身份的方法。拥有本天赋的侠客可以以一个整轮动作而非一分钟时间来转换身份。但是如果他进行快速变装后被任何同时认识他的两个身份的生物遇到，那么侠客就必须进行一个易容技能检定来避免这个生物通过他杂乱的变装看穿两个身份事实上属于同一个人。不过，侠客也可以在快速变装后再花1轮时间来完善自己的变装以避免该检定。侠客必须达到7级才能选择本天赋。

Quick Disguise.name: Quick Disguise（Quick Disguise）
Quick Disguise.description:
A rogue with this talent can use the items at hand and seemingly innocuous material hidden on her person to create startlingly effective disguises, reducing the amount of time it takes to create a disguise using the Disguise skill.

The time needed for the rogue to alter her appearance in this manner is based on the complexity of the disguise, as noted on the following table. The times are cumulative, so if a female rogue wants to disguise herself as a male of a different race, that takes 2 minutes.

Disguise Time
Minor details only 1 full-round action
Disguise as a different gender 1 minute
Disguise as a different race 1 minute
Disguise as a different age category 1 minute
Disguise as a different size category 1 minute

Quick Scrounge.name: Quick Scrounge（Quick Scrounge）
Quick Scrounge.description: The rogue can search a creature, object, or area in half as much time as normal. If her Perception check would normally require a full-round action or less, it becomes one step shorter along the following progression: full-round action, standard action, move action, swift action, immediate action. This talent has no effect on Perception checks that are attempted as free actions or Perception checks that don閳ユ獩 require an action.

Quickness.name: 急速（Quickness）
Quickness.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点让你自己或你接触的一个自愿生物获得超自然速度。该能力如同加速术运作，不过AC和反射豁免上的加值变为+2。该能力持续每秘学士等级1轮。你必须至少5级才能选择该灵器之力。

Rabbit Punch (UC).name: Rabbit Punch (UC)（Rabbit Punch (UC)）
Rabbit Punch (UC).description:
The monk gives a sharp blow to the back of a foe閳ユ獨 head. The critical threat range and critical multiplier of this strike increase by 1, and the monk gains a +2 bonus on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit with this strike. This increase is not doubled by @Compendium[pf1.feats.TbOPtIL8Fv8obXtP]{精通重击} or similar effects. Creatures without a discernible head are unaffected by this style strike (subject to GM discretion).

  The monk must attack with a fist to use this style strike.

Racial Paragon.name: Racial Paragon（Racial Paragon）
Racial Paragon.description:
The vigilante can take a move action to gain the benefit of a feat with a racial prerequisite he meets but doesn閳ユ獩 have. This effect lasts for 1 minute. The vigilante must meet all the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites. He can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + 1/2 his vigilante level (minimum four times per day). The vigilante can use this ability again before the duration expires to replace a previous racial feat with another choice.

If a feat temporarily gained in this way has a daily use limitation, any uses of that feat while using this ability count toward that feat閳ユ獨 daily limit.

This vigilante talent can be selected multiple times. Each time it is selected after the first, the vigilante can use this ability to gain the benefits of one additional racial feat at the same time, or to reduce the action required to activate this talent by one step (a move action becomes a swift action, a swift action becomes a free action, and a free action becomes an immediate action). If the vigilante chooses to gain the benefits of multiple feats, the feats selected must share the same racial prerequisite. He can use one of these feats to meet a prerequisite of a second feat; doing so means he cannot replace a feat currently fulfilling another閳ユ獨 prerequisite without also replacing those feats that require it. Each individual feat selected counts toward his daily uses of this ability.

Racing Current (UC).name: Racing Current (UC)（Racing Current (UC)）
Racing Current (UC).description:
A monk with this ki power can create a wave to help him maneuver allies upon the battlefield, as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}. Using this ability is a move action that costs 2 ki points, and the ability remains in effect for 1 minute.

  A monk must be 6th level to select this ki power.

Radiance.name: 辉光（Radiance）
Radiance.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点触摸一个武器，让它发散出光亮来。如同提供如同火炬一般的光。在确定黑暗法术或效果时，该辉光视为环级为0+每2秘学士等级1的光亮法术。辉光持续每秘学士等级1分钟。另外，当该武器对一个敌人成功确认重击时，武器持用者可以选择结束辉光效果，让目标被辉光环绕1d4轮。目标被辉光环绕时，无法从隐蔽或隐形中获得好处，也无法尝试进行潜行检定。对被辉光缠绕的目标进行的攻击检定都获得+2环境加值。

Radiating Touch.name: Radiating Touch（Radiating Touch）
Radiating Touch.description:
As a standard action that provokes attacks of opportunity, you can irradiate any unattended object for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. While an object is irradiated, it emits a faint aura of transmutation. Any creature that passes within 5 feet of the aura must succeed at a Will save (DC equal to 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) or become sickened. You閳ユ獧e immune to this object閳ユ獨 effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Acid Dart power of the Earth Domain.

Radiation Subdomain.name: Radiation Subdomain（Radiation Subdomain）
Radiation Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sq5lzym6a8mmfl7l]{Defoliate}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gq7np9mwtfd500zg]{枯萎术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}

Rag Doll Mutagen.name: Rag Doll Mutagen（Rag Doll Mutagen）
Rag Doll Mutagen.description: When the alchemist imbibes a mutagen, his body and bones become rubbery and easy to contort. The alchemist gains a bonus equal to his class level on Escape Artist checks, can squeeze through places as if he were one size category smaller, and can make a Reflex save (DC equal to 15 + 1 for every 10 feet fallen) to take half damage from falling. At 10th level, all falling damage is considered nonlethal damage, and the alchemist can squeeze through places as if he were two size categories smaller than his size while under the effects of this mutagen.

Rage (Cleric).name: 狂暴(牧师)（Rage (Cleric)）
Rage (Cleric).description:
8级时，你每天能狂暴的轮数为牧师等级，该狂暴轮数和任何你从野蛮人等级获得的狂暴轮数叠加。在12级和16级能分别选择一个狂暴之力——但不能是有等级要求的，其它时候你野蛮人等级视为牧师等级一半。

  此能力替换毁灭领域的毁灭灵光能力。

Raging Flyer.name: Raging Flyer（Raging Flyer）
Raging Flyer.description: When raging, the barbarian adds her level as an enhancement bonus to Fly checks.

Raging Grappler.name: Raging Grappler（Raging Grappler）
Raging Grappler.description: While raging, the barbarian grapples her foes with the power and viciousness of a river crocodile. As long as she is raging, whenever the barbarian succeeds at a check to start a grapple, she can choose to deal damage as if she had also succeeded at a check to maintain the grapple. In addition, while she is raging, whenever the barbarian succeeds at a combat maneuver check to maintain a grapple, she can choose to give herself, the target of her grapple, or both the prone condition as a free action while continuing to maintain the grapple.

Raging Whirlwind.name: Raging Whirlwind（Raging Whirlwind）
Raging Whirlwind.description:
The barbarian can create a whirlwind with a powerful spinning move as an immediate action after she confirms a critical hit with a melee attack. The whirlwind circles the target of her melee attack, lifting it in the air slightly until the end of the barbarian閳ユ獨 turn. The creature can attempt a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier) to negate this effect. If it fails the save, the target loses its Dexterity modifier to AC for the rest of the barbarian閳ユ獨 turn and lands prone on the ground at the end of her turn. Raging whirlwind has no effect on flying creatures.

  A barbarian must be at least 12th level to choose this rage power.

Rake (2 pts).name: Rake (2 pts)（Rake (2 pts)）
Rake (2 pts).description:
An eidolon grows dangerous claws on its feet, allowing it to make 2 rake attacks on foes it is grappling. These attacks are primary attacks. The eidolon receives these additional attacks each time it succeeds on a grapple check against the target. These rake attacks deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

  This evolution is only available to eidolons of the quadruped base form. This evolution counts as one natural attack toward te eidolon's maximum.

  The summoner must be at least 4th level before selecting this evolution.

Rake (UC) (2 pts).name: Rake (UC) (2 pts)（Rake (UC) (2 pts)）
Rake (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 4th, quadruped base form.

  The eidolon grows dangerous claws on its feet, allowing it to make two rake attacks against foes it is grappling. These attacks are primary attacks. The eidolon can make these additional attacks each time it succeeds at a grapple check against the target. These rake attacks deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

  This evolution counts as one natural attack toward the eidolon閳ユ獨 maximum.

Ranged Baptism.name: Ranged Baptism（Ranged Baptism）
Ranged Baptism.description:
When the alchemist uses holy water as a splash weapon, any squares subject to its effects (including creatures affected by splash damage) or that contain creatures subject to its effects are also affected as if by @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpav8ywcqwkcuojw]{祝圣术}, for a number of rounds equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Undead struck by holy water remain affected by the @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpav8ywcqwkcuojw]{祝圣术} effect even if they leave the affected area.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

Rapid Boost.name: Rapid Boost（Rapid Boost）
Rapid Boost.description: Once per day, the rogue can roll two dice while attempting a Sleight of Hand check and take the better result. She must choose to use this talent before attempting the Sleight of Hand check. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she has.

Rapid Perception.name: Rapid Perception（Rapid Perception）
Rapid Perception.description: A rogue with this talent can attempt a Perception check to intentionally search for a specific item or creature as a swift action instead of a move action. If she is intentionally searching for an invisible creature, the creature閳ユ獨 bonus on its Stealth check from its invisibility is halved. An investigator can select this rogue talent in place of an investigator talent. She must have the expanded inspiration investigator talent before selecting this talent.

Rapport Discipline.name: 和谐境界（Rapport Discipline）
Rapport Discipline.description:
和他人建立紧密的联系会引出你体内最好的一部分，这使得你可以更轻松地把精神和他人连接在一起。通过把自己的精神与他人相连，你能够填补自身的心理缺陷，进而发展出全新的精神力量。

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{注目术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lisojmynoblunlex]{协调行动} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ofw6gnp6r7t2wcba]{Geas, Lesser} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lovx4kiq18gbvg4e]{Telepathy} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg3i21asvo69mbma]{Battlemind Link} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lf7xf41mmcdaaxzb]{Charm Person, Mass} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q2r6jrgsbwjgssdg]{Charm Monster, Mass} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (18th).

Rare-Metal Infusion.name: 全金属注能（Rare-Metal Infusion）
Rare-Metal Infusion.description:
元素：土；类别：性质注能；等级：3；超载：2

  关联念袭类别：轰钢

  豁免：无

  你能够控制金属的特性，让你的轰钢如同精金、寒铁或者炼银（由你选择）一般克服伤害减免。若你的目标是需要正确的金属类型才能够克服的罕见伤害减免（比如DR/黄金），那么你还可以选择此类金属以满足要求。你使用这个注能创造的金属会在不久之后逐渐消失，而且不具有任何金币价值。

Ravenous Fury.name: Ravenous Fury（Ravenous Fury）
Ravenous Fury.description: At 9th level, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} for a number of rounds per day equal to your sorcerer level. These rounds don閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive. Each time you hit a creature with two or more claw attacks during a full attack while affected by this ability, that creature takes 1d4 points of bleed damage.

Reach (1 pt).name: Reach (1 pt)（Reach (1 pt)）
Reach (1 pt).description: One of an eidolon's attacks is capable of striking at foes at a distance. Pick one attack. The eidolon's reach with that attack increases by 5 feet.

Reach (UC) (1 pt).name: Reach (UC) (1 pt)（Reach (UC) (1 pt)）
Reach (UC) (1 pt).description: One of the eidolon閳ユ獨 attacks is capable of striking foes at a distance. Select one attack. The eidolon閳ユ獨 reach with that attack increases by 5 feet.

Reach Spellstrike.name: Reach Spellstrike（Reach Spellstrike）
Reach Spellstrike.description:
The magus can deliver spells with a range of touch with ranged spellstrike up to a maximum range of close (25 feet + 5 feet per 2 caster levels).

  The magus must be at least 9th level and must have ranged spellstrike to select this arcana.

Reaper Final Revelation.name: Reaper Final Revelation（Reaper Final Revelation）
Reaper Final Revelation.description: Upon 20th level, you are a true reaper of death and no soul can escape your sight. You automatically confirm critical hits and creatures automatically fail Fortitude saves against your coup de grace attempts. In addition, you can notice, locate, and distinguish between living and undead creatures within 60 feet, just as if you had the blindsense ability. This sense does not allow you to detect objects, but it does allow you to notice living things that are not creatures.

Reaper Mystery.name: Reaper Mystery（Reaper Mystery）
Reaper Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with this mystery adds Intimidate, Perception, Stealth, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.to1cdmyh5rtfyg2s]{寒冷之触} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4ztvvswf2uuwuqo]{Calm Spirit} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7tmsbg37zr1q382]{时之沙} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l8xwrepcmkdgb2wf]{Purge Spirit} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dg3mrasygkm83c3e]{杀生术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lllhr9py6w44cxjm]{亡灵归亡} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rlfd7f64wgjfvg6e]{灰飞烟灭} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wplgawb6aznjx7se]{女妖之嚎} (18th).

Reaping Stalker.name: Reaping Stalker（Reaping Stalker）
Reaping Stalker.description: Some slayers prefer weapons with grim symbolism of lives cut short and can wield such weapons with unparalleled lethality. A slayer with this talent treats any sickle or scythe he wields as though it were one size larger for the purpose of determining its damage dice. In addition, the slayer increases the critical threat range of any sickle or scythe he wields by 1; this does not stack with other effects that alter a weapon閳ユ獨 threat range.

Rebel Leader.name: Rebel Leader（Rebel Leader）
Rebel Leader.description: At 8th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力} as a bonus feat.

Rebirth Discipline.name: 重生境界（Rebirth Discipline）
Rebirth Discipline.description:
你的识海是由你往生中最强大的记忆所铸成。你能把你前世所修化为今生的心灵力量。

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ndvks6ztnxhj6oxh]{Burst Of Insight} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{虚假生命} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0dcr75sqs8wpdrhg]{Ancestral Memory} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3w1ozzzf8hk0gdzm]{转生术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

Rebirth.name: Rebirth（Rebirth）
Rebirth.description: At 20th level, the full power of a phoenix erupts from within you if you perish. When you die, you are brought back to life, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{完全复生术}, after 1 minute. This ability can be used only once every 24 hours, and if you are slain again within this period, your death is permanent.

Recall Training.name: Recall Training（Recall Training）
Recall Training.description:
Samsaran only.

  By calling on the memories of previous incarnations, a samsaran slayer can use martial techniques that transcend his usual capabilities. Once per day, the slayer can take a move action to gain the benefit of a combat feat he doesn閳ユ獩 have. This effect lasts for 1 minute per slayer level he has.

  The slayer must meet all the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites.

Reclusive Curse.name: Reclusive Curse（Reclusive Curse）
Reclusive Curse.description:
You are reclusive and paranoid to the point that your allies cannot easily help you in times of stress or unease. Whenever you are in combat, your allies must succeed at a melee touch attack to affect you with touch spells, and you must attempt saving throws to resist all spells cast by anyone other than yourself, even those cast by allies. Instantaneous spells you cast only on yourself affect you as though your caster level were 1 higher.

  At 5th level, any spells you cast only on yourself affect you as if they were modified by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时} feat. This does not increase their level or casting time.

  At 10th level, you are immune to charm spells and spell-like abilities.

  At 15th level, you gain spell resistance equal to 10 + your oracle level.

Recovery Patron.name: Recovery Patron（Recovery Patron）
Recovery Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8jqq8kxdzx01ogl9]{Liberating Command}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7xdn59ffjaqchhrz]{移除麻痹}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.75bgl52r3qmp1wh4]{神圣链接}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sbhij6pdo24wkm48]{清洁术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2ip53auf03bqxkl1]{Joyful Rapture}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0kppkhsencd6tzvh]{防护法术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.klcvk9ct1l7mhjwp]{群体医疗术}

Redemption Subdomain.name: Redemption Subdomain（Redemption Subdomain）
Redemption Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rue864nzo68esp30]{Qualm}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.98277u53x5r925cm]{强制忏悔}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qr6qcx8zqum6jhc4]{赎罪术}

Redirect Force.name: Redirect Force（Redirect Force）
Redirect Force.description: If the ninja has a feat that allows her to attempt a combat maneuver without provoking attacks of opportunity, she can choose to provoke them anyway when she performs that maneuver. If she does so and takes damage from the attack of opportunity, the ninja adds the damage as a bonus on her attack roll instead of as a penalty.

Redirect Poison.name: Redirect Poison（Redirect Poison）
Redirect Poison.description:
The slayer can divert poisoned attacks against him. When a creature unsuccessfully attacks the slayer with a poisoned weapon or a natural weapon that would poison him, the slayer can attempt to redirect the attack to a creature within his reach (including, possibly, the creature that unsuccessfully attacked the slayer). As an immediate action, the slayer can make an attack roll against the creature to which he would redirect the poison. On a success, the poison is redirected to the target, and the target must attempt a saving throw against the poison as normal. This attack only redirects the poison and does not otherwise damage the targeted creature.

  This ability cannot affect a creature that attacked the slayer with a poisoned natural weapon, but it can affect a creature that attacked him with a poisoned manufactured weapon.

Redirect Primal Magic.name: Redirect Primal Magic（Redirect Primal Magic）
Redirect Primal Magic.description: If the arcanist triggers a primal magic event, she can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as an immediate action to redirect the event. The event occurs at a location of the arcanist閳ユ獨 choosing within a 20-foot radius. This radius expands by 5 feet for every 2 arcanist levels she has.

Reflect Fear.name: Reflect Fear（Reflect Fear）
Reflect Fear.description:
The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject is affected by a fear effect or is the target of an Intimidate check to demoralize it. When the trick is triggered, the subject suppresses the fear effect that triggered the trick for 1d4 rounds, and any creature that caused this effect must succeed at a Will save or become shaken for 1 round. The rounds during which the subject ignores the triggering fear effect still count against the effect閳ユ獨 duration.

  If the duration of the reflect fear trick is longer than the fear effect lasts, the subject isn閳ユ獩 affected by the fear effect at all.

Reflection of Weakness.name: 衰弱映射（Reflection of Weakness）
Reflection of Weakness.description: 当敌人将弱化效果强行加诸于受术者身上时，精神反馈会让敌人自身也受到弱化。当一个敌人进行的攻击或法术导致受术者受到属性伤害（ability damage）、属性吸取（ability drain）、出血伤害（bleed damage）、或者接触疗法（Touch Treatment）职业能力中列出的次级或中级状态（minor or moderate condition）时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。当诡计被属性伤害、属性吸取或出血伤害触发时，受术者承受的伤害或吸取量降低2点（最低降至0点），而进行攻击或施放法术的生物会承受2点属性伤害，哪个属性受到伤害则由催眠师进行选择。敌人能够尝试一次意志豁免来免受属性伤害。若攻击者是通过诅咒（curse）、疾病（disease）或毒素（poison）来对受术者承受属性伤害或吸取的话，该项诡计也能生效，不过仅限于上述效果能立即造成伤害且没有潜伏期的情况。当诡计是由于受术者承受了一个状态而被触发时，受术者仍会受到状态影响，但是攻击者也会按照催眠师的选择承受一个状态，持续1轮。该状态必须为接触疗法（Touch Treatment）职业能力中列出的次级状态（Minor Conditions）或中级状态（Moderate Conditions）。敌人能够尝试一次意志豁免来抵御这个状态。催眠师不需要具有接触疗法（Touch Treatment）就能使用或选取该项催眠师诡计。

Reflexive Shadow Shield.name: Reflexive Shadow Shield（Reflexive Shadow Shield）
Reflexive Shadow Shield.description: Once per day as an immediate action, the rogue can gain an amount of cold resistance or electricity resistance equal to half the rogue閳ユ獨 level. This resistance lasts for 1 round. If the rogue has the shadowy resistance racial trait, the cold or electricity resistance stacks with the resistance that trait grants; otherwise, the energy resistance does not stack with any cold or electricity resistance the rogue has. The rogue must have the resiliencyPU rogue talent before choosing this talent.

Reforged Arms.name: Reforged Arms（Reforged Arms）
Reforged Arms.description:
The forge閳ユ獨 fire turns earthen ore into useful metal, and you can hone weapons in the same way. As a standard action, you can touch a metal or stone weapon and transform it into a masterwork equivalent if it is not already a masterwork or magical weapon.

  At 3rd level, you can also have the weapon act as if it were made of alchemical silver or cold iron (your choice when you activate this ability) for the purpose of bypassing damage reduction.

  At 7th level, 15th level, and 19th level, the weapon gains a cumulative +1 enhancement bonus, though this bonus does not stack with any enhancement bonus the weapon already has.

  At 11th level, you can have the weapon act as if it were made of adamantine rather than of alchemical silver or cold iron.

  This effect lasts for 1 minute per oracle level, and you can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Reforged Flesh.name: Reforged Flesh（Reforged Flesh）
Reforged Flesh.description: At 20th level, you become immune to fire damage and gain DR 10/adamantine and magic.

Refreshing Rain.name: Refreshing Rain（Refreshing Rain）
Refreshing Rain.description:
At 8th level, as standard action, you can call a brief shower of rain in a 30-foot radius. Creatures in the area are healed of an amount of nonlethal damage equal to double your cleric level and are no longer exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, or sickened. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Lightning Lord power of the Weather Domain.

Regenerative Sinew.name: Regenerative Sinew（Regenerative Sinew）
Regenerative Sinew.description:
The witch can cause the debilitating wounds of a creature she touches to quickly close, helping it heal rapidly. The target either gains fast healing 5 for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 the witch閳ユ獨 class level or it heals up to 4 points of ability score damage from any two ability scores (witch閳ユ獨 choice).

  At 15th level, in addition to the chosen effect, the target閳ユ獨 severed body members, broken bones, and ruined organs grow back, as per regenerate.

  Once a creature has benefited from this hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.

Relativity.name: Relativity（Relativity）
Relativity.description: At 15th level, you can traverse vertical surfaces as easily as you walk on the ground. When climbing, you move at your normal land speed and take none of the penalties associated with climbing. The surface must be able to support your weight, and difficult terrain affects your speed as normal. You are also immune to @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力} and similar effects.

Relentless Casting.name: 强韧施法（Relentless Casting）
Relentless Casting.description: 异能者能够从精神力池中花费1点精神力，来使得联结法术在克服法术抗力（spell resistance）时需要进行的施法者等级检定可以投掷两次并取较好的结果。由于异能者必须在开始施放法术时决定是否花费精神力，因此她必须在GM要求进行施法者等级检定之前决定是否使用该能力。

Remade Self.name: 重塑自我（Remade Self）
Remade Self.description: 20级起，异能者会受到后述法术之一的影响，作为常驻（constant）的类法术能力；秘法视力（Arcane Sight）、飞行术（Fly）、加速术（Haste）、英雄气概（Heroism）、回避侦测（Nondetection）或巧言术（Tongues）。该能力在异能者达到20级时进行选择，且不能更改。若异能者处于这个类法术能力影响之下的话，每当她施放一个异能者法术（psychic spell）时，都可以从她已知的精神增幅或高等精神增幅中，选取一个在正常情况下花费1点精神力的精神增幅，然后在不消耗精神力的情况下联结到法术上。而且这个精神增幅不被计算在每个法术最高只能受到一个精神增幅影响的正常限制中。

Remedy Extract.name: Remedy Extract（Remedy Extract）
Remedy Extract.description:
When the alchemist creates an extract, he can add one nonmagical alchemical remedy (such as an antitoxin) to it. When the extract is consumed, both the formula and the alchemical remedy take effect. The extract has a level 1 higher than normal. This discovery cannot be combined with other methods of combining multiple consumed items or extracts into one.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

Remote Bomb.name: Remote Bomb（Remote Bomb）
Remote Bomb.description: The alchemist can spend two uses of his daily bombs to create a special bomb that is manually detonated. When the bomb is created, the alchemist also creates a catalyst distillate, which requires no extra time or cost. A remote bomb is inert unless triggered by this distillate. The bomb is detonated as a standard action when the distillate fumes are exposed to the rest of the bomb. An alchemist must be within 60 feet of the bomb for the distillate to successfully trigger the bomb. A catalyst distillate can detonate a bomb even if the bomb has already been hurled at a target. Triggering the distillate outside of the 60-foot range or after 1 hour has no effect.

Rend (2 pts).name: Rend (2 pts)（Rend (2 pts)）
Rend (2 pts).description:
An eidolon learns to rip and tear the flesh of those it attacks with its claws, gaining the rend ability. Whenever the eidolon makes two successful claw attacks against the same target in 1 round, its claws latch onto the flesh and deal extra damage. This damage is equal to the damage dealt by one claw attack plus 1-1/2 times the eidolon's Strength modifier. The eidolon must possess the claws evolution to select this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 6th level before selecting this evolution.

Rend (UC) (2 pts).name: Rend (UC) (2 pts)（Rend (UC) (2 pts)）
Rend (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 6th, claws evolution.

  The eidolon learns to rip and tear the flesh of those it attacks with its claws, gaining the rend ability. Whenever the eidolon makes two successful claw attacks against the same target in 1 round, its claws latch on to the flesh and deal extra damage. This damage is equal to the damage dealt by one claw attack plus 1-1/2 times the eidolon閳ユ獨 Strength modifier.

Renewed Vigor (UC).name: Renewed Vigor (UC)（Renewed Vigor (UC)）
Renewed Vigor (UC).description:
As a standard action, the barbarian heals 1d8 points of damage + her Constitution modifier. For every 4 levels the barbarian has beyond 4th, the amount healed increases by 1d8 (to a maximum of 5d8 at 20th level).

  This ability can be used only once per day.

  The barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

Renown.name: 声誉（Renown）
Renown.description: 侠客的作为和能力为他赢得了相当的知名度，无论他目前的身份是公开的或是私下的。声誉让侠客可以在进行社交时更为圆滑轻松，或是在他披上假面打击敌人时用名声威吓自己的对手。

Reshape Space.name: Reshape Space（Reshape Space）
Reshape Space.description:
Whenever you cast a spell that creates an extradimensional space or demiplane, increase the duration by a number of units (rounds, minutes, hours, etc.) equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1).

  At 20th level, you can make one spell that creates an extradimensional space or demiplane permanent. You can have no more than one such spell made permanent in this way at a time. If you designate another spell as permanent, the previous permanent spell ends.

Resilience of the Faithful.name: 坚毅信仰（Resilience of the Faithful）
Resilience of the Faithful.description: 5级起，你的所有豁免检定获得+2抗力加值。这个加值在5级之后的每5个等级增加1点。

Resiliency (ORA) (Battle).name: 坚韧身躯(先知)(战争)（Resiliency (ORA) (Battle)）
Resiliency (ORA) (Battle).description: 当你的生命值降为0时你并不会陷入瘫痪，也不会再获得恍惚状态。7级你获得“顽强”作为奖励专长。11级你在陷入瘫痪时进行标准动作不会失去1点生命值。你不需要达到获得顽强专长的先决条件。

Resiliency (ORA) (Godclaw).name: Resiliency (ORA) (Godclaw)（Resiliency (ORA) (Godclaw)）
Resiliency (ORA) (Godclaw).description:
Once per day, when you are brought below 0 hit points but not killed, you can act is if you are disabled for 1 round. At the end of your next turn, unless you are brought to above 0 hit points, you immediately fall unconscious and begin dying.

  At 7th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强} as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisite.

  At 15th level, three times per day, if you are disabled and take a standard action (or any otherwise strenuous action), you avoid taking 1 point of damage if you succeed at a DC 15 Fortitude saving throw.

Resist Primal Magic.name: Resist Primal Magic（Resist Primal Magic）
Resist Primal Magic.description: When attempting to cast spells in an area infused by primal magic, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as part of the casting to gain a bonus equal to half her arcanist level on Spellcraft checks to avoid triggering a primal magic effect.

Resistance (1 pt).name: Resistance (1 pt)（Resistance (1 pt)）
Resistance (1 pt).description:
An eidolon's form takes on a resiliency to one particular energy type, which is usually reflected in its physical body (ashen hide for fire, icy breath for cold, and so on). Pick one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). The eidolon gains resist 5 against that energy type.

  This resistance increases by 5 for every 5 levels the summoner possesses, to a maximum of 15 at 10th level.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different energy type.

Resistance (UC) (1 pt).name: Resistance (UC) (1 pt)（Resistance (UC) (1 pt)）
Resistance (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon閳ユ獨 form takes on a resiliency to one particular energy type, which is usually reflected in its physical body (ashen hide for fire, icy breath for cold, and so on). Select one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). The eidolon gains resistance 5 against that energy type. This resistance increases by 5 for every 5 levels the summoner possesses, to a maximum of 15 at 10th level.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time the eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different energy type.

Resonating Rumbles.name: Resonating Rumbles（Resonating Rumbles）
Resonating Rumbles.description: When a rogue with this talent makes a successful sneak attack against a creature with tremorsense, the rogue can subtract 3 dice from her sneak attack damage to prevent the target from using tremorsense for a number of rounds equal to half her rogue level.

Restless Slumber.name: Restless Slumber（Restless Slumber）
Restless Slumber.description:
The witch causes a creature within 30 feet to fall into a sleep riddled with nightmares. This functions as the slumber hex.

  Additionally, the restless nature of the sleep causes the creature to violently toss and turn, dealing 1d10 points of damage to itself each turn. This damage does not wake the creature.

  When it wakes, the creature閳ユ獨 addled state causes it to be confused for a number of rounds equal to half the witch閳ユ獨 level.

  The witch must have the slumber hex to select this hex.

Restored Glory.name: Restored Glory（Restored Glory）
Restored Glory.description: At 3rd level, objects in your possession with the broken condition function as if they did not have the broken condition, though if they reach 0 hit points they are destroyed as normal. At 9th level, destroyed objects (objects with 0 hit points) in your possession function and appear as if they had only the broken condition, though if they reach a number of negative hit points equal to your level, they become fully destroyed and don閳ユ獩 function at all, even in your possession. At 15th level, destroyed objects in your possession function and appear as if fully repaired, though they can become fully destroyed as described above. Destroyed objects must have physical pieces left to be affected by this ability. Objects that leave your possession are affected normally by these conditions. This ability does not affect artifacts.

Restoring Flames.name: Restoring Flames（Restoring Flames）
Restoring Flames.description: At 15th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.igmb8lisqcnsxd2d]{高等复原术} once per day as a spell-like ability.

Restriction (Stare).name: Restriction (Stare)（Restriction (Stare)）
Restriction (Stare).description: The target of the hypnotic stare treats all areas of dim light or darker as difficult terrain.

Resurgence.name: 复苏（Resurgence）
Resurgence.description: 在5级时，当你受到足以将你生命值降为0的攻击时，你可以支付2点精神力以一个直觉动作回复1D8+你的异能者等级的生命值。在10级时，这个数值增加到3D8+你的异能者等级。如果这次治疗不能将你的生命值回复到正数，则你会自动稳定。如果你依旧被这次攻击杀死，则你会以你为中心作一次30尺半径的正能量爆发来治疗你所有盟友，其治疗的生命值等同你受到的治疗额度。

Retributive Spray.name: Retributive Spray（Retributive Spray）
Retributive Spray.description: At 12th level, whenever you閳ユ獧e hit by an attack or spell that deals slashing or piercing damage, your black blood sprays up to 10 feet toward the opponent who attacked you, striking the first creature along its path. That creature takes 1d8 points of cold damage + 1 point of cold damage for every 2 bloodrager levels you possess. A successful Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier) halves the damage.

Return to Dust.name: Return to Dust（Return to Dust）
Return to Dust.description:
You call upon the inexorable ravages of time and entropy to damage an object or undead creature within 30 feet, dealing 1d6 points of damage per 2 oracle levels you have, ignoring hardness and damage reduction. If used against an undead creature or an object in another creature's possession, the undead creature or the creature possessing the object can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Returning Weapon.name: 武器回返（Returning Weapon）
Returning Weapon.description: 侠客拥有一种他标志性的投掷武器，在把它丢出去的时候这件武器会自己飞回来。侠客需要选择一种投掷武器如匕首或飞斧，每当侠客使用这种武器战斗时，它们会在被投掷后自动返回，如同拥有回返武器特殊附魔一般。在14级时，如果侠客选择将一种可以视为弹药的投掷武器（如手里剑）应用本天赋，那么如果他使用的这一组50发投掷武器均会在被扔出去之后自动返回，使侠客的投掷不会造成任何消耗。如果侠客选择的是一种正常情况下不会消耗的投掷武器，那么当他投出这把武器的同一轮中接下来他所有投掷的同种类非魔法武器都会自动继承第一把武器的所有魔法品质，让侠客可以在一轮中使用拥有同样好处的武器发动整轮投掷攻击——虽然它们仍然会在他的下回合才会飞回来。

Revelation Inquisition.name: Revelation Inquisition（Revelation Inquisition）
Revelation Inquisition.description: 神授力量: 摘下它们不配拥有的身份，在你的眼前，以良善为假面具的恶徒将被曝光于天下，接受制裁。

Revelation Subdomain.name: Revelation Subdomain（Revelation Subdomain）
Revelation Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.moftgchcn1d0p2t0]{侦测密门}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.u5rbvasnr78ifrp7]{表象祛除}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术}

Revelry Subdomain.name: Revelry Subdomain（Revelry Subdomain）
Revelry Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rgd5v3llwoptwcdb]{强大希望}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞}

Revenge.name: Revenge（Revenge）
Revenge.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{魔牙术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.suilv5ug3tvbwuh2]{Vengeful Outrage}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6jz03m4lryndt0kd]{复仇鬼影}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

Reverse Shift.name: 逆向迁跃（Reverse Shift）
Reverse Shift.description:
元素：通用；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：8；超载：0

  你将原本从灵界位面流向你的联系逆转，把你自己的身体置于灵界位面中，就如同幻化灵体（ethereal jaunt）一般。只要你专注于逆转联系，便可以维持在灵界位面中；当你在灵界位面中持续逗留的轮数等同于你的操念使等级时（以及之后每隔同样长的时间段时），你必须承受1点超载。一旦你返回了主物质位面（the Material Plane），就会在一定时间内无法再次使用逆向迁跃，这段时间的长度和你身处灵界位面的轮数相同。

Ride the Blast.name: 随念而动（Ride The Blast）
Ride the Blast.description:
元素：通用；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：6；超载：0

  你能够在使用念动（telekinetic blast）之外的念袭时，以使用念袭的一部分使用该原力。你把自己转化为元素或能量，并随着念袭把自己发送出去。你会出现在念袭路径的最末端，并与念袭的目标相邻。如果使用了连锁（Chain）这样的塑形注能，则与最后一个目标相邻。如果使用了爆破（Explosion）这样的塑形注能的话，则会出现在扩散或爆发区域的中心。该能力对涉及到近战攻击的塑形注能（比如念刃）或者喷涌（Spray）这样的锥形注能无效。

Rider Bond (2 pts).name: Rider Bond (2 pts)（Rider Bond (2 pts)）
Rider Bond (2 pts).description:
You and your eidolon share an empathic connection while you ride it. You gain a bonus on Ride checks equal to one-half your summoner level and you also gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{骑乘战斗} as a bonus feat when mounted on your eidolon.

  The eidolon must possess the mount evolution to take this evolution.

Rift Reach.name: Rift Reach（Rift Reach）
Rift Reach.description:
As a move action, you can tear open a small rent in reality just large enough to reach an arm through. The far end of this portal must be within 10 feet of you, but otherwise allows you to manipulate objects, perform melee attacks requiring a single hand, or even cast spells. If you cannot see your target, standard concealment penalties apply. You cannot move either end of the portal once it閳ユ獨 created, and the opening collapses immediately when you leave your current space or withdraw your arm, but it otherwise lasts for 1 round per psychic level. Your disembodied hand uses your AC with a +4 size bonus, should opponents target it. This size bonus does not apply to disarm combat maneuver checks.

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 11th level, the range of your rift reach increases to 20 feet.

  At 15th level, your range increases to 30 feet.

Righteous Fury.name: Righteous Fury（Righteous Fury）
Righteous Fury.description: At 9th level, once per day you can create a spear of pure light and throw it at a creature within 60 feet as a standard action. This is a ranged touch attack that uses your Charisma modifier in place of your Dexterity modifier to determine the attack bonus. The spear deals 1d6 points of damage per sorcerer level and ignores all damage reduction and hardness. This damage increases to 1d8 points of damage per sorcerer level against an evil creature. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 17th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

Rime-Bound Gloom.name: Rime-Bound Gloom（Rime-Bound Gloom）
Rime-Bound Gloom.description:
The gloom creates an area of freezing shadow in its splash radius that deals 2d6 points of cold damage to all creatures in the area each turn. This effect lasts 1 round for every 2 alchemist levels.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level to select this discovery.

Riot Subdomain.name: Riot Subdomain（Riot Subdomain）
Riot Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1os71jpk7lrrl47b]{挑拨曲}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kikowbnn4h6anegq]{Symbol of Strife}

Rites Subdomain.name: Rites Subdomain（Rites Subdomain）
Rites Subdomain.description:
替代神授力量 When casting a Rites domain spell with a costly material component閳ユ攼r casting permanency on any domain spell閳ユ敂educe the cost of the necessary components by 20%.

  替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5o8uysrb153tnvci]{Sanctify Corpse}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{魔法恒定术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gb7pxobi1za67p7g]{束缚大法}

Ritual Unity.name: Ritual Unity（Ritual Unity）
Ritual Unity.description:
You receive a +2 bonus on all skill checks attempted as part of an occult ritual. When you take the aid another action to assist an ally with a skill check and succeed at a DC 20 check, you impart a +4 bonus to your ally instead.

  When you successfully aid an ally in this way, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

Rivers Subdomain.name: Rivers Subdomain（Rivers Subdomain）
Rivers Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{元素身躯II}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h4nlrm44ubsyzuhz]{液体形态}

Rivethun Discipline.name: Rivethun Discipline（Rivethun Discipline）
Rivethun Discipline.description:
You have embraced those aspects of your body that cause you agony, respecting the perspective they grant you if not necessarily the roles they閳ユ獫e condemned you to in life.

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r8bhei88g6h26fp0]{Heightened Awareness} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{熊之坚韧} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.isrnyw9biluqoo80]{Aura Sight} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ev845glbl54em94v]{Persistent Vigor} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.37ubwx82nqaog3ib]{Thought Shield V} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

Rocket Bomb.name: Rocket Bomb（Rocket Bomb）
Rocket Bomb.description:
Alchemists with this discovery can prepare special rockets to deliver their bombs. Rocket bombs travel farther and explode bigger than normal bombs, but cannot target individual creatures. Rocket bombs explode in a 20-foot radius, and all creatures in that area take the alchemist閳ユ獨 normal splash damage. The range increment on a rocket bomb is 50 feet. Rocket bombs cannot be used with the precise bomb or fast bomb discoveries.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

Rogue Talent (VIG).name: Rogue Talent (VIG)（Rogue Talent (VIG)）
Rogue Talent (VIG).description: The vigilante gains a single rogue talent (not an advanced talent) of his choice. If he selects a rogue talent marked with an asterisk (*), that talent applies to his hidden strikes instead of to sneak attacks, and the talent counts as a stalker vigilante talent with an asterisk (*) for the limitation of only one applying to a given hidden strike. Only a stalker vigilante can select this talent.

Roiling Soil.name: Roiling Soil（Roiling Soil）
Roiling Soil.description:
Combining your mastery of earth and water, you shape the battlefield in your favor, bending the terrain to benefit you and your allies and hinder any who might oppose you. The ground within 5 feet per 2 oracle levels you have shifts and rolls unpredictably; if you use this ability underwater, the surrounding waters churn. This area moves with you, and you and your allies are unaffected by the roiling terrain. Other creatures can move within the area at half speed with a successful DC 10 Acrobatics check. Failure means they stop moving for the round, while failure by 5 or more causes them to fall prone; if underwater, creatures gain the effects of being off-balance (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 433) instead of falling prone.

  This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to your oracle level, and you can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Rooftop Infiltrator.name: 大厦渗透者（Rooftop Infiltrator）
Rooftop Infiltrator.description: 侠客获得相当于他基础移动速度一半的攀爬速度，并且他在爬绳子的时候这个攀爬速度上升到等于他的基础移动速度。

Roots.name: Roots（Roots）
Roots.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  Your body sinks roots into soft surfaces, making it hard to move you. This functions as the earth walk wild talent, except it works only on soft surfaces (like soil or snow) and not on stone.

  If you have both roots and earth walk, the bonuses stack while you閳ユ獧e on soft earth surfaces.

Rot Patron.name: Rot Patron（Rot Patron）
Rot Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7mnhs4rmcv7lo1l6]{Decompose Corpse}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mt3gozaeg6qqy180]{曲木术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.26d575hwkhmftrbw]{Fungal Infestation}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5ues51xy0x9yyapy]{Fleshworm Infestation}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kvfggbo0tr5gklxu]{Plague Carrier}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wueg9fxln3z761m1]{Epidemic}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0rhghy2ft8l9buyt]{Cursed Earth}

Rule Minds.name: 精神支配（Rule Minds）
Rule Minds.description: 20级起，催眠师能够永久性地从精神上奴役一个生物。当催眠师成功用一个需要进行豁免检定的附魔系（enchantment）法术影响了催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）的目标时，他能够迫使该名生物尝试第二次意志豁免检定，该次豁免的DC与法术的DC相同。如果目标是怪物（monster）而非类人生物（humanoid）的话，DC会降低5点。若该生物豁免失败，它会如同受到支配怪物（Dominate Monster）法术一般成为催眠师的永久奴隶，直至死亡为止。若该生物豁免成功，则会在24小时内不再受到精神支配的影响。在同一时间，催眠师仅能拥有一名被支配的生物。如果他奴役了一个新的生物，原有的生物便会得到解放，但它并不会意识到自己受到了催眠师的奴役。

Rumormonger.name: Rumormonger（Rumormonger）
Rumormonger.description:
A rogue with this talent can attempt to spread a rumor though a small town or larger settlement by making a Bluff check. She can do so a number of times per week equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 0). The DC is based on the size of the settlement, and it takes a week for the rumor to propagate through the settlement. If the check succeeds, the rumor is practically accepted as fact within the community; succeeding by 5 or more over the DC decreases the time it takes the rumor to propagate by 1d4 days. A failed check means the rumor failed to gain traction, while failing by 5 or more causes the opposite of the rumor or some other competing theory involving the rumor閳ユ獨 subject to take hold.

Community Size DC
Small town 18
Large town 20
Small city 25
Large city 30
Metropolis 35

Rustling Grasp.name: Rustling Grasp（Rustling Grasp）
Rustling Grasp.description:
Once per day as a standard action, you can perform a melee touch attack that rusts iron, as the rusting grasp spell.

  At 11th level, and every four levels thereafter, you can use this ability an additional time per day.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Sabotage (Stare).name: Sabotage (Stare)（Sabotage (Stare)）
Sabotage (Stare).description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to Diplomacy and Intimidate checks.

Sacred Sneak Attack.name: Sacred Sneak Attack（Sacred Sneak Attack）
Sacred Sneak Attack.description: When making a sneak attack against an undead creature or evil outsider, the rogue閳ユ獨 sneak attack damage is considered good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. Normal weapon damage is unaffected for this attack. A rogue must have a good alignment to select this rogue talent.

Sacred Threshold.name: Sacred Threshold（Sacred Threshold）
Sacred Threshold.description:
As a standard action, you can bless a door, a window, or another portal with a touch. For 1 minute, you can increase or decrease the DC of any check to unlock or force open the portal by an amount equal to half your cleric level. In addition, your first ally to pass through the portal during this time gains an amount of temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have. These temporary hit points last for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Agile Feet power of the Travel Domain.

Sacrifice (3 pts).name: Sacrifice (3 pts)（Sacrifice (3 pts)）
Sacrifice (3 pts).description: An eidolon can sacrifice its own hit points to heal another creature. As a standard action, the eidolon can sacrifice up to 2 hit points per Hit Die and then touch the target creature, thereby healing the creature for half the amount sacrificed.

Sacrifice Self.name: Sacrifice Self（Sacrifice Self）
Sacrifice Self.description: A rogue who makes a successful Reflex save against an area effect can ignore the benefits of her evasion ability to shield an adjacent ally against the effect, essentially halving the damage that ally would normally take. A rogue with improved evasion can attempt a secondary save against her ally閳ユ獨 damage. If the save is successful, neither she nor her ally takes any damage. A rogue must have evasion in order to select this talent, and she must have improved evasion to benefit from the secondary effect.

Safe Casting.name: Safe Casting（Safe Casting）
Safe Casting.description: Whenever you cast a spell that cures the target of hit point damage, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity for spellcasting.

Safe House.name: Safe House（Safe House）
Safe House.description:
The vigilante can establish a safe house in his area of renown, and he can change it every time he changes his area of renown. If he doesn閳ユ獩 have the renown talent, he can still select this talent and place the safe house in a single location to which he has access, but he can never move the safe house from its initial location until he gains the renown talent. This safe house must be an area no larger in volume than a cube that is a number of feet per side equal to 10 feet per vigilante level. The safe house can be arranged any way he likes and it can be part of a larger building, like a secret room or an underground cave. Objects within this safe house can閳ユ獩 be located by any effect that is less powerful than a discern location spell.

  At 7th level, this protection from being located also applies to creatures in the safe house.

  At 13th level, the entire area is protected from scrying effects (though not mundane snooping) like a mage閳ユ獨 private sanctum.

Safekeeping.name: Safekeeping（Safekeeping）
Safekeeping.description: At 1st level, you can touch a creature as a standard action, granting it a +2 insight bonus to AC for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Sahkil Subdomain.name: Sahkil Subdomain（Sahkil Subdomain）
Sahkil Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2nd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.y71mqkh49c6lfgec]{Haunting Mists}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gi6x0mazwt8y08cx]{They Know}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.aq152bwi65cfz8fo]{Phobia}

Salamander Bloodline.name: Salamander Bloodline（Salamander Bloodline）
Salamander Bloodline.description:
You are descended from the elemental outsiders known as salamanders. You wield flame as a weapon and a tool, and your smithing skills are unrivaled.

  本职技能: Acrobatics.

  奖励法术:
