  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cvv6oimqks9n62vy]{魔化武器} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6h3p3zr2hbrjea8k]{Molten Orb} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (warm shield) (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d3a93wcwatqhywqy]{火蛇术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hzkaqaa8n6ygwmub]{Tar Pool} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hfca2lb4tlmrzoxm]{火焰纹章} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h17ad4lpmphnospf]{熔岩墙} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}, 
  • Prodigy,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Acrobatics),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (察觉),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: The DCs of your sorcerer spells increase by 2 against creatures that are suffering ongoing fire damage.

Salamander Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Salamander Bloodrager Bloodline（Salamander Bloodrager Bloodline）
Salamander Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Salamanders are fierce warriors and master smiths, and you wield their might and mastery of metal by birthright.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{精通擒抱}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.cKxfEL5XOWuzLhfO]{精通钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Perception),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0rd4z2kcln69xif]{重压之刃} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.x23pz2agjub1eh89]{完全修复术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vjnynvz1omleni8a]{武器幻化} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (warm only) (16th).

Salamander's Scales.name: Salamander's Scales（Salamander's Scales）
Salamander's Scales.description:
At 4th level, you gain fire resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus to AC.

  At 8th level, your fire resistance increases to 10 and your natural armor bonus increases to +2.

  At 16th level, your fire resistance increases to 20 and your natural armor bonus increases to +3.

Sand Bomb.name: Sand Bomb（Sand Bomb）
Sand Bomb.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can pack the casing full of sand that explodes in an abrasive cloud on impact. A creature that takes a direct hit from a sand bomb is blinded for 1 round, as are any creatures in the splash radius that fail a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier).

Sandstone Solution.name: Sandstone Solution（Sandstone Solution）
Sandstone Solution.description: As a full-round action, the alchemist can convert any potion or extract into a solution that, when thrown or applied, solidifies sand or dirt to the hardness of stone for 1 hour, affecting an area with a radius of 10 feet 鑴?the level of the potion or extract. If this solution is thrown at or applied to stone, it instead causes a 5-foot cube of stone to become crumbly and soft for 1 minute, reducing its hardness by double the level of the potion or extract.

Sandwalker.name: Sandwalker（Sandwalker）
Sandwalker.description: At 15th level, you gain you gain a burrow speed of 30 feet and tremorsense with a range of 60 feet.

Sapped Magic (Stare).name: 魔力衰减（Sapped Magic (Stare)）
Sapped Magic (Stare).description: 催眠注视的减值还能应用至目标所使用的法术和类法术能力（spell-like abilities）的DC上，此外还可以对目标的法术抗力（spell resistance）生效（若有的话）。

Saurian Subdomain.name: Saurian Subdomain（Saurian Subdomain）
Saurian Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.choriern682hgptb]{召唤自然盟友 IV} (deinonychus or pteranodon only),
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{召唤自然盟友 VII} (brachiosaurus or tyrannosaurus only).

Savage Dirty Trick.name: Savage Dirty Trick（Savage Dirty Trick）
Savage Dirty Trick.description:
Once per round while raging, the barbarian can attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver in place of a melee attack. This attempt does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If successful, the target takes an amount of damage equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier and must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier) or take an additional penalty from the dirty trick based on the type of dirty trick performed and the following table.

Initial Penalty Additional Penalty
Blinded Staggered
Dazzled Dazed
Deafened Staggered
Entangled Anchored in place and unable to move from that square
Sickened Nauseated

  
On a failed Fortitude save, the opponent takes this additional penalty on top of the dirty trick閳ユ獨 original effect. The additional penalty lasts for 1 round (though the initial penalty lasts as long as normal), and can be removed with a move action. The initial effect cannot be removed via mundane means until the additional penalty is removed (though magical effects like remove blindness/deafness work). Removing the initial effect also removes the additional penalty. If the target is immune to the initial penalty, then it is unaffected by the additional penalty.

For example, a barbarian using this rage power attempts a dirty trick combat maneuver against her opponent to blind him. She succeeds and her opponent fails his Fortitude save, so he becomes staggered as well as blinded. Regardless of whether he had succeeded at his saving throw, the opponent still takes an amount of damage from the barbarian閳ユ獨 combat maneuver equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier (unless he has damage reduction or would otherwise be able to prevent this damage). Likewise, if her opponent were immune to blinding effects, he would not suffer from the blindness or the staggering effect, regardless of his saving throw.

This power can only be used once per opponent per rage. A barbarian must be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Savage Intuition.name: Savage Intuition（Savage Intuition）
Savage Intuition.description: Your bestial senses allow you to sense danger and become enraged before you even have time to consciously react to danger. When combat begins, if you have rounds of rage remaining, you may automatically enter a rage without using an action at the start of the first round of combat (or at the start of the surprise round, if there is one), even if you are not otherwise aware that combat has begun.

Savage Jaw.name: Savage Jaw（Savage Jaw）
Savage Jaw.description:
While raging, the barbarian can open her jaw wide and latch her teeth firmly onto her opponent. While using the animal fury power, the barbarian can activate this power as a free action and gain the grab ability with her bite attack until the start of her next turn. This power can be used only once per rage.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power to select this rage power.

Scaled Toughness.name: Scaled Toughness（Scaled Toughness）
Scaled Toughness.description:
You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action, you can harden your skin, giving it a scaly appearance and granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level.

  At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Scalykind Blessing: Scaly Touch.name: Scalykind Blessing: Scaly Touch（Scalykind Blessing: Scaly Touch）
Scalykind Blessing: Scaly Touch.description:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally as a standard action to grant it reptilian scales. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +1 enhancement bonus to its natural armor.

  At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5 at 20th level).

Scalykind Blessing; Serpent Fang.name: Scalykind Blessing; Serpent Fang（Scalykind Blessing; Serpent Fang）
Scalykind Blessing; Serpent Fang.description:
At 10th level, as a standard action you can manifest venomous fangs for 1 minute. These fangs grant a bite attack that deals 1d4 points of damage (for a Medium warpriest, 1d3 if Small). A successful bite also afflicts the opponent with a debilitating venom. The poison閳ユ獨 save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your warpriest level + your Constitution modifier.

Serpent Venom (Ex): Bite閳ユ攰njury; save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d2 Con; cure 1 save.

Scalykind Domain.name: Scalykind Domain（Scalykind Domain）
Scalykind Domain.description:
神授力量: 你是爬虫类的真神，只凭一撇便可令弱小的生物昏厥。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{魔牙术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.05m8kfc2u9cg528g]{迷惑动物}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bgtmki0xl4xl4y91]{Magic Fang, Greater}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.29cfi65seiajh5qv]{动物异变}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (takes the form of Diminutive-sized reptiles),
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化}*Only reptiles.

Scar Hex.name: Scar Hex（Scar Hex）
Scar Hex.description:
This hex curses a single target touched with horrible scars of the witch's choosing, whether something as simple as a single letter on the target's forehead or blotchy, burnlike scars on his body. The target may make a Will save to resist this hex. These scars do not interfere with the target's senses or prevent it from using abilities, but may affect social interactions. They persist through disguises and shapechanging.

  The witch can user her hexes on the scarred target at a range of up to 1 mile, and she is considered to have a body part from the target for the purpose of scrying and similar divination spells. The witch can withdraw this hex from a target as a move action at any range.

  The number of supernatural scars the witch can maintain at once is equal to her Intelligence bonus; once she reaches this limit, she must remove the scar from a current victim in order to mark another. Effects that remove curses can remove the scar.

Scavenger.name: Scavenger（Scavenger）
Scavenger.description: A rogue with this talent can pick up and stow an object as a swift action instead of two separate move actions. She gains a +2 bonus on Sleight of Hand checks to pick the pockets of creatures that are stunned or disabled.

Scent (1 pt).name: Scent (1 pt)（Scent (1 pt)）
Scent (1 pt).description: An eidolon's sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if downwind, it drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction with a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature's location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

Scent (UC) (1 pt).name: Scent (UC) (1 pt)（Scent (UC) (1 pt)）
Scent (UC) (1 pt).description: The eidolon閳ユ獨 sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if the opponent is downwind, the range drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction as a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature閳ユ獨 location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

Scorching Heat.name: Scorching Heat（Scorching Heat）
Scorching Heat.description: At 12th level, your weapons conduct heat. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. You also deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This does not damage your equipment.

Scorpion Aspect.name: Scorpion Aspect（Scorpion Aspect）
Scorpion Aspect.description:
The aspect of the scorpion invokes a hidden menace with a poisonous sting.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Stealth checks and grapple combat maneuver checks.

  This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant scorpion. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, two primary claw attacks (1d6) with the grab ability, and a secondary sting attack (1d6).

  At 8th level, the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet, and you gain a +4 racial bonus on Climb and Perception checks.

  At 15th level, when you make an attack of opportunity with your sting attack or maintain a grapple and deal damage with your sting attack, that attack also applies the following poison.

Poison (Ex): Sting閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/ round for 6 rounds; effect 1d3 Strength damage; cure 2 consecutive saves.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Pincers (B), sting (P)

Scorpion Bloodline.name: Scorpion Bloodline（Scorpion Bloodline）
Scorpion Bloodline.description:
Whether your ancestors served a scorpion goddess or simply worked closely with more mundane members of the species, the venom from these arachnids has seeped down through generations into your blood.

  本职技能: Climb.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6vx3lvbhp6h220wq]{Thorn Javelin} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{蛛行术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{巨虫术} (scorpions only) (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j8fufy7sr3bty5du]{Vermin Shape II} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jg2n48yy9pk9mpdr]{Transmute Blood To Acid} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QvlxYVVsBDlykPKe]{奥术打击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  •  Disruptive Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.VMVAqGze4cs3naya]{灵狐步},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Climb),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{隐秘}.

  血统奥秘: You are trained in the use of poison and cannot accidentally poison yourself when applying poison to a weapon.

Scourge Curse.name: Scourge Curse（Scourge Curse）
Scourge Curse.description:
You are a blight on the natural world. Bizarre natural hazards develop within a 300-ft radius around you whenever you linger in a natural area for more than 10 minutes, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug4qh4cuh5f9ralf]{Curse Terrain, Lesser}. You cannot choose the hazards or their locations. However, your movement is unimpeded by undergrowth, as a druid閳ユ獨 woodland stride ability, as plants wither away in your footsteps.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.23pgt0f34obki95q]{Feast Of Ashes} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.1msv71n204g06fbe]{Explosion Of Rot} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{血肉虫群} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

Scrap Bomb.name: Scrap Bomb（Scrap Bomb）
Scrap Bomb.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it explode into shards of shrapnel that deal piercing damage. A creature that takes a direct hit from a scrap bomb takes 1 point of bleed damage per die of bomb damage unless it succeeds at a Reflex save.

Scribe Scroll.name: Scribe Scroll（Scribe Scroll）
Scribe Scroll.description: At 1st level, a wizard gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.tlRu8SYjzA7WCHN7]{抄写卷轴} as a bonus feat.

Scry Slip.name: Scry Slip（Scry Slip）
Scry Slip.description: Whenever a rogue with this talent is targeted by a scrying effect that allows a Will save, the caster of the divination must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 15 + the rogue閳ユ獨 class level). This talent wards the rogue and any objects she is holding or carrying. An investigator can select this talent in place of an investigator talent.

Scrying Familiarity.name: Scrying Familiarity（Scrying Familiarity）
Scrying Familiarity.description: You are well acquainted with scrying sensors. You can roll twice and take the better result on saving throws against divination (scrying) spells and effects, on Perception checks to notice scrying sensors, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance when you use a scrying spell or effect. If you notice a magical sensor, you can attempt a Stealth check opposed by the caster閳ユ獨 caster level check to avoid being detected by the sensor.

Sczarni Smuggler.name: Sczarni Smuggler（Sczarni Smuggler）
Sczarni Smuggler.description: The rogue has picked up Sczarni tricks for making masterful forgeries and using bribery to evade trade rules. The rogue needs to learn only the approximate appearance of a document that doesn閳ユ獩 require a particular person閳ユ獨 signature to accurately forge the document with Linguistics (gaining a +8 bonus on the check to create the forgery, as if she had seen a similar document before). The rogue needs only a small sample of a person閳ユ獨 handwriting to make a convincing forgery of great length in that person閳ユ獨 handwriting. The rogue can always take 10 on Diplomacy checks to offer bribes. In addition, the rogue automatically gains an extra advantage at the start of a pursuit (Ultimate Intrigue 142) in an urban environment.

Seamless Guise.name: 无痕伪装（Seamless Guise）
Seamless Guise.description: 侠客学习过如何让自己完全融入当前他所扮演的这个角色，而避免他人发现自己维持着其他身份的方法。任何怀疑侠客还拥有他当前处于的社交/侠客身份以外身份的人在尝试看破他的身份时，侠客可以进行一次易容技能检定以说服怀疑者他一定是认错人了，并在这次检定上拥有+20的环境加值。

Searing Flame.name: 枯萎之炎（Searing Flame）
Searing Flame.description:
元素：火；类别：通用（Su）；等级：2；超载：－

  前置：灼烧注能（Burning Infusion）

  随着时间的经过，你的灼烧注能能够将敌人的火焰抗力（fire resistance）烧毁。当你投掷来自灼烧注能的点燃伤害（burn damage）对抗敌人时，敌人的火焰抗力也会随之减少，减少量等同于未受调整的点燃伤害；在判断火焰抗力的减少量时，不能将火焰抗力应用至该检定上。火焰抗力的减少所持续的轮数等同于你的操念使等级的一半。这些减少量会叠加，最低降低至0点。

Searing Flesh.name: 炎之血肉（Searing Flesh）
Searing Flesh.description:
元素：火；类别：护身原力（Su）；等级：－；超载：0

  你的身体散发出让人疼痛的高温。每当有生物用一个天生攻击（natural attack）或一个徒手打击（unarmed strike）命中你时，该生物会承受火焰伤害，具体数值为你每具有4个操念使等级1点（最低1点火焰伤害）。和你擒抱在一起的生物（A creature in a grapple with you）会在它的回合结束时承受双倍于上述数量的伤害。击中你的武器也会承受这个伤害，不过这点伤害一般无法克服武器的硬度。通过承受1点超载，你能够将此伤害增加，增加量为你每具有4个操念使等级1点，直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止。你能够以此方式增加伤害的次数最高为7次。

  每当你使用火原力（fire wild talent）并承受超载时，体内奔腾的烈焰会让炎之血肉造成的伤害数量变为当前的两倍，持续1轮（与你擒抱在一起的生物受到的总伤害为正常数值的四倍）。你能够以直觉动作解消或恢复该效果。

Searing Heat.name: Searing Heat（Searing Heat）
Searing Heat.description: At 15th level, your body becomes as hot as a salamander閳ユ獨. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. In addition, you deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This heat does not damage your equipment. You can activate or deactivate this effect as a free action.

Sedition Inquisition.name: Sedition Inquisition（Sedition Inquisition）
Sedition Inquisition.description: 神授力量: Your deity calls you to cast down a hostile government. Stealth is a class skill for you.

Seduction Inquisition.name: Seduction Inquisition（Seduction Inquisition）
Seduction Inquisition.description: 神授力量: Your deity blesses your attempts to use sex and love for a higher purpose.

Seduction.name: Seduction（Seduction）
Seduction.description:
The witch uses enthralling movements to fascinate a single creature within 60 feet that can see the witch. A Will save negates this effect. If the target is (or could be) sexually attracted to the witch, the save DC is increased by 2. The effect lasts for 1 round, but the witch can extend this effect for 1 additional round (up to a total number of rounds equal to her class level) by taking a standard action to continue her enthralling movements. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it cannot be the target of this ability again for 1 day.

  At 8th level, the fascination effect lasts for 2 additional rounds after the witch ceases taking a standard action to maintain it. This is a mind-affecting charm effect.

See Invisibility.name: 识破隐形（See Invisibility）
See Invisibility.description: 在9级时，唤魂师可以看见许多普通人所看不到的事物，她回答每天一次以类法术能力的形式使用法术识破隐形的能力，这个效果持续10分钟。

See It Coming.name: See It Coming（See It Coming）
See It Coming.description: At 3rd level, you gain a +1 luck bonus on the saving throw type of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will). As a full-round action, you can change which saving throw your luck bonus applies to. At 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +5 at 19th level.

See in Darkness (3 pts).name: See in Darkness (3 pts)（See in Darkness (3 pts)）
See in Darkness (3 pts).description:
An eidolon can see perfectly in darkness of any kind, including that created by deeper darkness.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

See in Darkness (ROG).name: See in Darkness (ROG)（See in Darkness (ROG)）
See in Darkness (ROG).description: The rogue gains the see in darkness ability (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 301). A rogue must have darkvision before choosing this talent.

See in Darkness (SAM).name: See in Darkness (SAM)（See in Darkness (SAM)）
See in Darkness (SAM).description: At 15th level the samurai can see perfectly in darkness, even magical darkness, as the universal monster ability of the same name.

Seek Retribution.name: Seek Retribution（Seek Retribution）
Seek Retribution.description: At 8th level, once per day after receiving a request for aid from a legal authority or an aggrieved party regarding the breaking of an oath, whenever the cavalier encounters the oath-breaking creature, he can choose to vehemently exact retribution. As a swift action, the cavalier can grant himself a competence bonus equal to his Charisma modifier on all attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and opposed checks against the oathbreaking creature. These bonuses last for 1 round per level.

Seemless Shapechanger.name: Seemless Shapechanger（Seemless Shapechanger）
Seemless Shapechanger.description:
The vigilante seamlessly adopts any persona he assumes with magic. The vigilante adds his seamless guise bonus to the bonus on Disguise checks that he gains to assume the shape of another creature with a polymorph spell or effect.

  A vigilante must have the shapechanger subtype to select this talent.

Seismic Master.name: 震颤之主（Seismic Master）
Seismic Master.description:
元素：土；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：9；超载：0

  你能够将精神集中于自身和大地的联系，创造出地区性的震颤，就如同法术地震术（Earthquake）一般。

Self Telekinesis, Greater.name: Self Telekinesis, Greater（Self Telekinesis, Greater）
Self Telekinesis, Greater.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite self telekinesis

  You have greater control over your self telekinesis. Otherwise, this wild talent functions like greater flame jet.

Self Telekinesis.name: 念力御身（Self Telekinesis）
Self Telekinesis.description:
元素：以太；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：0

  你可以使用念动能力搬运自己。这项原力在其他方面的功能就如同火焰喷进（flame jet）一般。

Self-Assurance.name: Self-Assurance（Self-Assurance）
Self-Assurance.description:
Overwhelming confidence in your success brings you closer to your goals, and you know that your superiority has destined you for greatness. As an immediate action, you can gain a morale bonus equal to half your psychic level (minimum 1) on a single ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check. You must declare that you are using this ability before attempting the roll in question. If you succeed at the check, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

Self-Perfection Discipline.name: 自我完善境界（Self-Perfection Discipline）
Self-Perfection Discipline.description:
你对精神力量有一种全面的认识，相信必须让精神和肉体都得到锻炼才能维持平衡。你发觉修行、断食和其他磨练身体的训练能够拓宽你的精神力量。

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pysrx5kxfjvsjjsi]{脚底抹油} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{熊之坚韧} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wuispaydz8jvw3io]{Echolocation} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

Self-Realization Subdomain.name: Self-Realization Subdomain（Self-Realization Subdomain）
Self-Realization Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5v3j49r4mdq9rbx6]{Paragon Surge} (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide 48; always matches your actual race)
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dckgxyd6ariois1s]{Primal Scream}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术}

Self-Resurrection.name: Self-Resurrection（Self-Resurrection）
Self-Resurrection.description:
From the ashes of your body springs forth new life. At 16th level, once per day when you are reduced below 0 hit points while you are bloodraging, you can call upon the power in your blood to pull yourself back from death. This functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{生命之息} spell cast upon yourself.

  At 20th level, this instead functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.4re1j2w8wkvsvnsi]{医疗术} spell, except that the healing can return you to life as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{生命之息}, using your bloodrager level as your caster level. Using this ability does not take an action. This ability does not function if your body is completely destroyed by an effect such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术}.

Sensed (Stare).name: Sensed (Stare)（Sensed (Stare)）
Sensed (Stare).description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to Stealth checks.

Serpent Fangs.name: Serpent Fangs（Serpent Fangs）
Serpent Fangs.description:
At 1st level, you grow serpentine fangs. These fangs are treated as a natural weapon, granting you a bite attack as a primary natural weapon. This attack deals damage equal to 1d8 (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

  At 4th level, your fangs are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 8th level, the damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

Serpent in the Sun.name: Serpent in the Sun（Serpent in the Sun）
Serpent in the Sun.description:
So long as you are exposed to at least 4 hours of sunlight per day, you no longer need to eat to survive and you gain +2 bonus on saves against diseases.

  At 5th level, you become immune to nonmagical diseases and no longer need to drink water to survive.

  At 10th level, you become immune to magical diseases, gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against poisons, and only need to sleep half as long to rest or recover from fatigue or exhaustion.

  At 15th level, you become immune to poison and fatigue. You lose these benefits if you fail to spend at least 4 hours in sunlight in a 24-hour period.

Serpent's Tail.name: Serpent's Tail（Serpent's Tail）
Serpent's Tail.description: At 9th level, you can transform your legs into a slithering serpentine tail as a free action. Your speed is reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet), and you can閳ユ獩 be tripped. Your footwear melds into your body and is nonfunctional unless it provides a constant bonus and does not need to be activated. You also gain a tail slap natural attack that deals 1d8 points of damage (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier. At 15th level, your reach with your tail slap increases by 5 feet. These effects last a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level; the duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

Serpentine Swim.name: Serpentine Swim（Serpentine Swim）
Serpentine Swim.description: At 4th level, you can swim sinuously, like a snake. You gain a swim speed equal to your base speed.

Servant of Winter.name: Servant of Winter（Servant of Winter）
Servant of Winter.description:
As a full-round action, you can summon a single ice elemental (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 114) to serve you.

  At 7th level, you can summon a Medium ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}.

  At 11th level, you can summon a Huge ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mf6k8tg8xu0wedoz]{召唤怪物 VI}.

  At 15th level, you can summon an elder ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.j91n23p4tfjixp3s]{召唤怪物 VIII}.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

  You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.

Servitor.name: 仆从（Servitor）
Servitor.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点召唤一个仆从。该能力如同一级怪物召唤术，但你只能召唤1个生物，且只持续1分钟。4级及之后每3级时，怪物召唤术的等级都增加1，最高在19级时达到七级怪物召唤术。同一时间你只能有一只仆从。任何时候，你都可消耗1点心智点增加当前仆从的持续时间1分钟。

Set-Up.name: Set-Up（Set-Up）
Set-Up.description: When you successfully hit a target with a sneak attack in melee, you can choose to forgo your additional sneak attack damage to make the target more vulnerable to one of your allies adjacent to it. The first melee attack that ally makes against the target before the beginning of your next turn treats the target as flanked, even if your ally is not flanking the target. This has no effect on creatures you could not flank with that ally, even if the ally was properly positioned.

Sever Alignment.name: Sever Alignment（Sever Alignment）
Sever Alignment.description: When making a sneak attack against an opponent with an alignment subtype, a rogue with this talent can forgo her sneak attack damage to scramble the creature閳ユ獨 metaphysical nature. If the attack succeeds, the rogue deals weapon damage as normal, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier) or lose all damage reduction overcome by aligned weapons (such as DR 10/good), lose all regeneration overcome by aligned sources (such as regeneration 10 [good]), and lose the ability to cast spells and use spell-like abilities with alignment descriptors for 1 round for every 2d6 points of sneak attack damage the rogue would have dealt (minimum 1 round). The rogue must have the aligned sneak attack talent to select this talent.

Shackle Smash.name: Shackle Smash（Shackle Smash）
Shackle Smash.description: Perhaps trained to remove or destroy restraints from slaves and prisoners by the Twilight Talons or Bellflower Network, a vigilante with this talent can choose to make no more noise than people talking when he attempts a sunder combat maneuver check or attempts a Strength check to break an object. He ignores half an object閳ユ獨 hardness when attempting sunder combat maneuver checks and when attacking nonmagical objects.

Shades of Gray.name: Shades of Gray（Shades of Gray）
Shades of Gray.description: A rogue with this talent uses mental and emotional tricks to protect herself from attempts to discern her alignment. This offers her the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.vsr1e8ib0hfhbnxb]{隐匿阵营} whenever she chooses, though she must be conscious to maintain the effect.

Shades of Rage.name: Shades of Rage（Shades of Rage）
Shades of Rage.description: At 4th level, whenever you enter a bloodrage, the light level within 30 feet of you decreases by one step. Natural light is always affected, but magical illumination dispels this ability if the caster of the light effect succeeds at a caster level check against a DC equal to 10 + your class level.

Shadow Beast.name: 暗影猛兽（Shadow Beast）
Shadow Beast.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点呼唤出一只或更多暗影构成的猛兽。该能力如同幽影咒法术一般，但它只能用来复制怪物召唤术的效果。用此法召唤的生物对不相信的生物只造成50%的伤害，而且非伤害性效果只有50%机率影响不相信的生物。最高可用该能力复制出五级怪物召唤术来。9级后你每有2秘学士等级，最高可复制的怪物召唤术等级加1（最高17级时复制九级怪物召唤术）。无论法术复制什么，此法召唤的生物持续每秘学士等级1轮。你必须至少9级才能选择该灵器之力。

Shadow Blend (2 pts).name: Shadow Blend (2 pts)（Shadow Blend (2 pts)）
Shadow Blend (2 pts).description:
In any condition of illumination other than bright light, the eidolon disappears into the shadows, giving it concealment (20% miss chance). If it has the shadow form evolution, it instead gains total concealment (50% miss chance).

  The eidolon can suspend or resume this ability as a free action.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend（Shadow Blend）
Shadow Blend.description:
The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject attempts a Stealth check while in an area of dim or darker light. The subject gains total concealment from all enemies (50% miss chance) as long as it remains within areas of dim or darker light. Against creatures with darkvision, the subject gains concealment (20% miss chance) rather than total concealment.

  Once triggered, this effect lasts for 1 round per mesmerist level or until the subject enters an area of normal or brighter light.

Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows.name: Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows（Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows）
Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows.description:
At 1st level, you can cause a weapon you touch to warp and become insubstantial for a split second before an attack. The first attack made with this weapon each round ignores any shield bonus to Armor Class, as well as bonuses from cover. Total cover still provides a creature its full benefit.

  This effect lasts for 1 minute.

Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow.name: Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow（Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow）
Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow.description: At 10th level, you can spend a swift action to empower yourself or an ally within 30 feet to move over the ground as easily as its shadow. The subject閳ユ獨 land speed increases by 10 feet and it takes no movement penalties for darkness, difficult terrain, or slickness. The creature can safely move over areas of ice and even those affected by a grease spell. When a creature affected by this ability hits with a charge attack, that attack deals an amount of additional cold damage equal to your level.

Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline（Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline）
Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Because of your heritage, you can move and see through shadows as if you are part of them. Your fury absorbs light, warmth, and strength.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Mz8ZG6nqW3NKFZhK]{快步跟进}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mz9yr5yhr0f3oqtp]{黑暗视觉} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术} (16th)

Shadow Discipline.name: Shadow Discipline（Shadow Discipline）
Shadow Discipline.description:
You perceive the space between light and darkness, and draw power from it. Shadows conceal and protect you, while revealing the locations of those who dare to hide within them. Over time, you develop the ability to deny the warmth of light or life to your enemies.

精神力池属性 感知

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4hrop7rq2c9phyi]{Blurred Movement} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.advqdmonj6ro62u7]{Fear The Sun} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cmwcavfyc1vbehy8]{Shadow Step} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{幽影塑能术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8rf2ucrtzmxooyw6]{Lunar Veil} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9dzj2fr5lksdjcp]{Umbral Strike} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (18th).

Shadow Door.name: Shadow Door（Shadow Door）
Shadow Door.description: At 16th level, you can take any part of your movement through shadows, teleporting to another location within 60 feet. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门}, except you can閳ユ獩 use shadow door in brightly lit areas. You can teleport in this manner a total of 10 feet per class level each day.

Shadow Duplicate.name: Shadow Duplicate（Shadow Duplicate）
Shadow Duplicate.description: Once per day as an immediate action when the rogue is hit, the rogue can create a single shadow duplicate of herself, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jsss37x0pplib8f]{镜影术}. The GM randomly determines whether the attack hit the rogue or the shadow duplicate. The shadow duplicate lasts for a number of rounds equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level, or until the shadow duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. This ability does not stack with the mirror image spell. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she has.

Shadow Form (2 pts).name: Shadow Form (2 pts)（Shadow Form (2 pts)）
Shadow Form (2 pts).description: The eidolon's body becomes shadowy and more indistinct. This shadow form grants the eidolon constant concealment (20% miss chance), and its melee attacks affect incorporeal creatures as if it had the ghost touch weapon property. The eidolon's melee attacks deal only half damage to corporeal creatures.

Shadow Splinter.name: 嫁祸之影（Shadow Splinter）
Shadow Splinter.description: 催眠师能够保护受术者对抗一次攻击，并将伤害转嫁至他人。当受术者由一次攻击而受到伤害时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者承受的伤害会被降低，降低的量为3 + 催眠师的魅力调整值（最高为攻击造成的总伤害量）。在原始攻击的攻击范围之内，且不是攻击者的一个其他生物会受到幽影幻象的攻击，这看起来就好像是攻击者在攻击该生物一般。该生物所承受的伤害数值相当于先前所减少的数额。幽影幻象并不需要投掷攻击检定便能命中，而且它也能忽视掩蔽（cover）和隐蔽（concealment），不过幽影的目标能够尝试一次意志豁免，成功则不相信该效果。若豁免成功，该生物就不会受到伤害，而且也不会相信是攻击者对它发动了攻击。如果攻击范围内没有合适的第二个生物成为被转嫁的伤害的目标，那么该项诡计就无法被触发。这是一个幻术系（illusion）幽影幻觉（shadow）效果。

Shadow Subdomain.name: Shadow Subdomain（Shadow Subdomain）
Shadow Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{魅影杀手}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.003tu19dpyoaj0se]{Orb Of The Void}

Shadow Vision.name: Shadow Vision（Shadow Vision）
Shadow Vision.description:
While bloodraging, you gain low-light vision if you don閳ユ獩 already have it. If you already have low-light vision, you gain darkvision to a distance of 30 feet.

  At 10th level, you gain darkvision with a range of 30 feet, or add 30 feet to the range of your darkvision if you already have it.

Shadow Warrior.name: Shadow Warrior（Shadow Warrior）
Shadow Warrior.description: At 20th level, you become shadow and fury personified. You see perfectly in natural and magical darkness. Whenever you deal hit point damage with a spell or attack, you also deal 2 points of Strength damage to each creature that took damage.

Shadow's Chill.name: Shadow's Chill（Shadow's Chill）
Shadow's Chill.description: When a rogue with this talent hits a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, a number of points of the damage dealt equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled is cold damage. The remainder of the sneak attack damage and the normal weapon damage are unaffected. The rogue must have cold resistance from a racial trait before selecting this talent.

Shadow's Sight.name: Shadow's Sight（Shadow's Sight）
Shadow's Sight.description: The vigilante gains low-light vision and darkvision 60 feet. If he already had darkvision, its range increases by 30 feet.

Shadow's Speed.name: Shadow's Speed（Shadow's Speed）
Shadow's Speed.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 base speed increases by 10 feet.

  At 10th level, it increases by an additional 10 feet.

Shadowbound Curse.name: Shadowbound Curse（Shadowbound Curse）
Shadowbound Curse.description:
Your pigmentation is oddly colorless, and your eyes are highly sensitive to light. You are blinded for 1 round when exposed to normal or bright light and dazzled while in such a lit area. You gain darkvision to a range of 30 feet.

  At 5th level, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{幽影塑能术} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

Shape Mastery.name: 塑形大师（Shape Mastery）
Shape Mastery.description: 作为你施放一个区域性质的塑能法术的一部分，你可以消耗一定量的心智点（最高达到你的智力调整值），使该法术排除同等量的格子区域。

Shape Wood.name: Shape Wood（Shape Wood）
Shape Wood.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You reshape wood to suit your purposes, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.10e3iwsr5jkq4q73]{塑木术}.

Shapechanger Bloodline.name: Shapechanger Bloodline（Shapechanger Bloodline）
Shapechanger Bloodline.description:
Channeling the power of your shapeshifting ancestors that you carry in your blood, you gain powers that allow you to change your shape and alter your appearance and physical abilities.

  本职技能:易容.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d40ia71c2eljm91k]{变形术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{高等变形术} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Disguise),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: You are very skilled with magic that transforms you. Transmutation spells you cast only on yourself affect you as though your caster level were 1 higher.

Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline（Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline）
Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The blood of doppelgangers, faceless stalkers, lycanthropes, or other shapechangers courses through your veins.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BkKYCzEGNTzZRiTz]{快速移动}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (16th)

Share Memory.name: 共享记忆（Share Memory）
Share Memory.description: 5级起，你能够随意使用共享记忆UM（Share Memory），但是仅限于自愿的目标。

Share Spells (SU).name: 法术共享（Share Spells (Su)）
Share Spells (SU).description: 唤魂师可以将目标为自身的法术施展在魅影身上（如同接触法术）而不是自己身上。即使某些法术通常不会影响魅影的生物类型（异界生物），唤魂师依旧可以对其施展。用这种方法施展的法术必须来自唤魂师的法术列表。这项能力不允许唤魂师分享法术以外的能力，即使它们的作用如同法术。

Shared Consciousness.name: 共享意识（Shared Consciousness）
Shared Consciousness.description: 在1级时，如果魅影停留在唤魂师的意念空间中（即没有完全显形或被放逐回灵界的状态），它可以为唤魂师在两项技能上提供专长技能专攻的好处，这两个技能由魅影的情感羁绊（Emotional Focus）所决定，除非唤魂师已经拥有了相应的技能专攻专长。共享意识同样为唤魂师在对抗影响心灵的效果时在豁免检定上提供+4加值；在12级时，这个加值增加到+8.最后，每天一次，每当唤魂师在对抗一个影响心灵的效果但豁免检定失败时，她可以选择改由自己魅影的意识负担这个效果的影响而非她自己的。如果她这么做的话，唤魂师自身将不会受到这个效果的影响，但同时，在该效果的持续时间内，她失去魅影提供的两个技能专攻和对抗影响心灵效果时的豁免加值，并且无法要求魅影以任何方式显形，或是让魅影承受另一个影响心灵的效果。在此期间，施放到唤魂师身上的法术解除魔法和破除附魔仍然可以有效的解除由唤魂师（魅影）承受的影响心灵的效果，如同它处于唤魂师本身一样。

Shared Evolution (1 pt).name: Shared Evolution (1 pt)（Shared Evolution (1 pt)）
Shared Evolution (1 pt).description:
Select a 1-point or 2-point evolution the eidolon has. As a standard action, the eidolon can touch the summoner and transfer the selected evolution to him. This functions as the summoner閳ユ獨 aspect ability, and the same limitations apply. The summoner can touch the eidolon as a standard action to return the evolution. The evolution returns to the eidolon automatically if the eidolon is dismissed by the summoner or sent back to its home plane.

  This evolution can only be taken by Summoners with the Twinned Summoner archetype.

Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt).name: Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt)（Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt)）
Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Twinned eidolon.

  Select a 1-point or 2-point evolution the eidolon has. As a standard action, the eidolon can touch the summoner and transfer the selected evolution to him. This functions as the summoner閳ユ獨 aspect ability, and the same limitations apply. The summoner can touch the eidolon as a standard action to return the evolution. The evolution returns to the eidolon automatically if the eidolon is dismissed by the summoner or sent back to its home plane.

Shared Seance.name: 降灵会（Shared Seance）
Shared Seance.description: 在2级时，通灵者可以在呼唤英灵时请求他们帮助与自己一起进行降灵的盟友。所有参加降灵会的盟友都可以在24小时内获得该英灵的降灵奖励的好处。

Shared Skill.name: 共享技能（Shared Skill）
Shared Skill.description: 13级起，每当你设置情感纽带时，你能够选择一个基于智力或者基于魅力的技能，该技能要来自异能者的本职技能列表。任何情感纽带的受术者在尝试该技能时，只要情感纽带仍然存续着，就能够使用你的加值来替代他自己的加值。

Shared Slot (2 pts).name: Shared Slot (2 pts)（Shared Slot (2 pts)）
Shared Slot (2 pts).description:
Select a magic item slot. A magic item worn by the eidolon in that slot remains active even if the summoner is also wearing a magic item in that slot.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new slot. 

  This evolution can only be taken by Summoners with the Twinned Summoner archetype.

Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts).name: Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts)（Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts)）
Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Twinned eidolon.

  Select a magic item slot. A magic item worn by the eidolon in that slot remains active even if the summoner is also wearing a magic item in that slot.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new slot.

Shattered Psyche Curse.name: Shattered Psyche Curse（Shattered Psyche Curse）
Shattered Psyche Curse.description:
Your mind is crowded with dozens of voices, fragmented snippets of your past lives. You take a 閳? penalty on all Intelligence-based skill checks, Wisdom-based skill checks, and concentration checks. You gain a +4 competence bonus on saving throws made against mind-affecting effects.

  At 5th level, you閳ユ獧e immune to charm effects.

  At 10th level, you閳ユ獧e immune to compulsion effects.

  At 15th level, you閳ユ獧e immune to all mind-affecting effects.

Shed Skin.name: Shed Skin（Shed Skin）
Shed Skin.description: At 16th level, when your bloodrage ends, you can choose one spell or spell-like ability affecting you and attempt to shake it off as an immediate action. Attempt a dispel check (1d20 + your bloodrager level) as if you were casting @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法}. If you succeed, the effect is dispelled.

Shell of Succor.name: Shell of Succor（Shell of Succor）
Shell of Succor.description:
You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have.

  The target always loses these temporary hit points first, even before other temporary hit points (including those from, for example, the purify body spell on page 9 or a kineticist閳ユ獨 force ward defense wild talent). If an attack deals fewer points of damage than the target has as temporary hit points from shell of succor, it still reduces those temporary hit points but otherwise counts as a miss for the purpose of abilities that trigger on a hit or a miss.

  You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th and 19th levels.

  You must be at least 3rd level before selecting this revelation.

Sheltering Walls.name: Sheltering Walls（Sheltering Walls）
Sheltering Walls.description:
As a standard action, you can touch an ally to summon a floating blockade of stone, granting the ally the benefits of partial cover for 1 round plus 1 round for every 6 cleric levels you possess. This ability does not grant the ally enough cover to attempt a Stealth check or avoid provoking attacks of opportunity. If the ally benefits from any other form of cover against an attack, the bonuses to AC and on Reflex saving throws increase by 1. You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This pwoer replaces the Resistant Touch power of the Protection Domain.

Shepherd of Souls Infusion.name: Shepherd of Souls Infusion（Shepherd of Souls Infusion）
Shepherd of Souls Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 7; Burn 4
Associated Blasts any simple
Saving Throw Will negates

  When your blast kills a living creature, it helps shepherd the creature閳ユ獨 soul to the Boneyard, warding against effects of spells that would attempt to restore the creature to life.

  Spellcasters attempting to bring the creature back from the dead using raise dead or similar magic must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 11 + your kineticist level) or the spell fails and the material component is wasted.

Shield of Fury.name: 暴风盾（Shield of Fury）
Shield of Fury.description: 侠客获得精通盾击作为奖励专长。如果他已经拥有了精通盾击专长，那么侠客可以转而获得一个他在获得精通盾击的那个等级上满足先决条件的任意专长。除此之外，如果侠客达到至少6级，那么他还会在至少有使用一面盾牌作为武器的时候视为拥有双武器格斗专长的好处，此天赋可以让侠客选择需要双武器攻击专长作为前置的专长而无视双武器攻击专长或敏捷需求的前置，但所有的这些好处都只在他有持有一面盾牌作为他的武器时才会生效（除非他自己再选择双武器格斗专长，这样他可以无视本限制）。干你的P子有种你直接写Fury`s SHIELD啊

Shift Earth, Greater.name: Shift Earth, Greater（Shift Earth, Greater）
Shift Earth, Greater.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 7; Burn 0
Prerequisite kinetic cover, shift earth

  You can move greater quantities of earth, as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukuyfbufbglbzfco]{地动术}.

Shift Earth.name: 地动（Shift Earth）
Shift Earth.description:
元素：土；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：4；超载：0

  前置：念力掩体（kinetic cover）

  豁免：见后文；法术抗力：否

  以标准动作，你能够推拉30尺内一块5立方尺的土或者未经加工的石头，让它向着任意方向移动5尺。你能够创造出升高的平台（raised platforms）、在悬崖上设置阶梯、挖洞或者其他有用的地貌。该能力无法使泥土漂浮在空中，不过当你身处具有大量泥土的地方时，可以抬起立方体并创造出矮柱子。若你移动的泥土在生物的脚下，那么它可以尝试一次DC20的反射豁免来跳向别处，并以此来避免随着土地一同移动。

Shift Focus.name: 心智转移（Shift Focus）
Shift Focus.description: 4级起，秘学士可以将一件灵器里的心智点转移到另一件灵器中，不过会产生一点损耗。心智转移首先先从某灵器内减去一定数值的心智点，然后将该数值-1的心智点填充进另一件灵器中；此举需要1分钟安静的凝视和抚摸两件灵器。秘学士只能将灵器内的心智点转移进其他灵器中，而无法将共用心智点填充进灵器内。与一般的心智点消耗不同的是，这种转移会让心智点减少的灵器所提供的共鸣之力减弱，但不会让填充进心智点的灵器提供的共鸣之力增强。

Shifter Aspect.name: 变形者拟态（Shifter aspect）
Shifter Aspect.description:
1级起，变形者获得她的第一种拟态——一种与她的肉体和灵魂产生超自然调谐的动物。她每日可以进入她的拟态的次级形态（见P 28拟态）的分钟数等于“3+变形者等级”，这些时间不需要连续，但是必须以1分钟为使用单位。变形者可以在她的回合以迅捷动作进入次级形态，而终止这个效果是一个只能在她回合内作出的自由动作。在变形者达到9级获得〖奇美拉拟态〗职业能力之前，她一次只能展现一种次级形态。进入新的拟态（或多个拟态，如使用〖奇美拉拟态〗或〖高等奇美拉拟态〗）将会终止当前已展现的全部次级形态。变形者拟态的次级形态不是变形效果（polymorph effects），变形者受变形效果影响期间不会失去次级形态带来的好处。

  随着变形者等级提升，她获得更多的拟态；变形者在5级获得她的第二种拟态，10级时获得第三种拟态，15级时获得第四种拟态。拟态的详述内容在本书28页的相关章节。

Shifter Claws.name: 变形者利爪（Shifter Claws）
Shifter Claws.description:
以一个迅捷动作，处于天生形态（natural form）的变形者可以任意生长出她的利爪作为武器使用（原文没说爪子收回去的内容）。变形者依靠自身的天赋才能以及对自然的感悟推动了这种神奇的转变。每只手的爪抓攻击都是主要天生武器，造成1d4（小体型1d3）点穿刺和挥砍伤害。如果她用一只利爪发动攻击的同时另一只手持握（hold）武器，则此爪抓视为次要天生武器攻击。

  随着变形者等级的提升，她的利爪也成长的更为强大。

  3级起，她的爪抓忽略DR/寒铁、DR/魔法和DR/银。

  7级起，她的爪抓伤害提升至1d6（小体型1d4）。

  11级起，她的爪抓伤害提升至1d8（小体型1d6）。

  13级起，她的爪抓伤害提升至1d10（小体型1d8）。

  17级起，伤害不再提升，但是重击倍率提升为X3。

  最后，19级时，爪抓忽略DR/精金和DR/-。

  当变形者使用自然变身展现出她的拟态中的专攻形态时，她的天生武器也会获得变形者利爪能力赋予的相同好处〔译注：推测此处指的是忽略DR和重击倍率提升的能力〕。如果她从自然变身形态获得了爪抓攻击，她可以在她的变形者利爪的基本伤害或者自然变身形态的爪抓伤害，两者取其高。若她的自然变身形态没有爪抓攻击，则她可以选择至多两个伤害低于变形者利爪伤害的天生武器，使之造成与变形者利爪相同的伤害作为替代。

Shifter's Fury.name: Shifter's Fury（Shifter's Fury）
Shifter's Fury.description: At level 6, a shifter gains the ability to make several ferocious attacks with the same natural weapon. Instead of attacking with all her natural weapons, the shifter can choose a single natural weapon and make a full attack with that natural weapon, gaining a second iterative attack at a 閳? as if it was a manufactured weapon. When she does so, all her other natural attacks count as secondary attacks and don閳ユ獩 benefit from shifter閳ユ獨 claws. At 11th level, she gains a third iterative attack at a 閳?0 and at 16th level, she gains a fourth iterative attack at 閳?5.

Shifting Aspect.name: Shifting Aspect（Shifting Aspect）
Shifting Aspect.description: At 1st level, you gain the benefit of the Aspect of the Beast feat while bloodraging. As part of the action to enter a bloodrage, you can choose any one of the four manifestations to affect you for the duration of your bloodrage.

Shimmering Mirage.name: 微光幻影（Shimmering Mirage）
Shimmering Mirage.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：5；超载：1

  前置：水之护罩（shroud of water）

  你的护罩能够偏折光线，形成闪亮的幻影。当你启动的水之护罩后，对你进行的攻击会由于隐蔽（concealment）而承受20%的失手率，直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止。

Shove Aside.name: Shove Aside（Shove Aside）
Shove Aside.description: When you and an adjacent ally are both in the area of an attack that requires a saving throw, you can take a 閳? penalty on your saving throw to grant your ally a +4 bonus on his saving throw. You lose the evasion ability against this attack. If you have improved evasion, it is reduced to evasion for this attack instead. A rogue must have evasion to select this rogue talent.

Shrinewalk.name: Shrinewalk（Shrinewalk）
Shrinewalk.description: Council agents can walk the mystic paths between Westcrown閳ユ獨 shrines. A rogue with shrinewalk can create her own shrine simply by designating an area in any urban region by placing a unique marking or rune on a wall or the ground. This marking is not magical, and if it is defaced or erased, it can no longer be used by the rogue (the marking can be hidden from view without removing its usability, including painting over the marking in question). Once placed, the rogue can use word of recall once per day to return to the shrine. A rogue can maintain one shrine at a time; if a new marking is created in a new location, the previous shrine becomes inactive.

Shroud of Retribution.name: Shroud of Retribution（Shroud of Retribution）
Shroud of Retribution.description:
As an immediate action, you can summon a shroud of spirits that reflects your attackers閳?damage back onto them. Any creature that strikes you deals normal damage to you, but at the same time the attacker takes 1d8 points of force damage + 1 point per 2 caster levels you possess (maximum +10). This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 11th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Shroud of Water.name: 水之护罩（Shroud of Water）
Shroud of Water.description:
元素：水；类别：护身原力（Su）；等级：－；超载：0

  你让一层由水、冰或者两者混合构成的护罩包裹着身体，来保护你免受伤害。这层护罩可以像护甲一般覆盖在你的身体上，也可以如同盾牌一样环绕在你身边抵挡攻击。你的AC会获得+4护甲加值或者+2盾牌加值，而且你可以用标准动作切换加值的类型。2级起你每具有4个操念使等级，这个加值便会增加1点。通过承受1点超载，你能够让上述加值增加1点，直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止。你可以以此方式多次增加加值，但是增加量无法高于起始数值的50%。当你将护罩切换为盾牌时，超出上述限制的加值无法生效，但是如果你将护罩切换回护甲，这些加值仍然保留。每当你使用水原力（water wild talent）并承受超载时，围绕在你身边的水流会使得你的护罩同时提供护甲加值和盾牌加值，持续1轮。你能够以直觉动作解消或恢复该效果。

Sickening (2 pts).name: Sickening (2 pts)（Sickening (2 pts)）
Sickening (2 pts).description: The eidolon閳ユ獨 smell or appearance is so offensive it sickens nearby creatures. Any living creature except its summoner that approaches within 20 feet or begins its turn in that area is sickened for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 HD + its Con modifier). Creatures that successfully save cannot be affected by the same eidolon閳ユ獨 sickening effect for 24 hours.

Side Step.name: 隙间行走（Side Step）
Side Step.description: 你消耗1点心智点创造出临时的隙间来。你可用用来移动的移动动作的一部分来施放该能力。隙间出现在你指定的任意格子，允许你传送到每秘学士等级10尺范围内的可见格子中。从隙间中行走需要消耗5尺的行动力，且穿过隙间的移动不会引发藉机攻击。其他方面该能力如同传送术般运作。你必须至少7级才能选择该灵器之力。

Sidestep.name: Sidestep（Sidestep）
Sidestep.description: You can push your way through holes in reality, crossing vast distances in a single stride. At 13th level, you can teleport up to 10 feet per psychic level per day as a move action. This teleportation must be used in 5-foot increments and such movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. You must have line of sight to your destination to use this ability. You can bring other willing creatures with you, but you must expend an equal amount of distance for each creature transported.

Sight Unseen.name: Sight Unseen（Sight Unseen）
Sight Unseen.description: At 3rd level, you gain darkvision with a range of up to 30 feet. If you already have darkvision, its range instead increases by 30 feet. At 9th level, you gain lifesense with a range of 30 feet (lifesense allows you to sense and locate living creatures as if you had the blindsight ability).

Signature Arrows.name: Signature Arrows（Signature Arrows）
Signature Arrows.description:
The vigilante must select one type of bow or crossbow (such as shortbow or heavy crossbow) when he selects this talent. After the first time the vigilante buys a set of 50 pieces of magic ammunition intended for that type of bow or crossbow, he can pay the construction cost instead of the purchase price for additional ammunition with identical magical effects for the same weapon, even if he could not normally craft magic ammunition. This benefit applies only to the first type of magic ammunition that the vigilante buys 50 pieces of for the designated weapon. The vigilante can take this talent more than once; each time he takes it, he can purchase and gain this benefit with either a specific type of magic ammunition for a different type of bow or crossbow or a different type of magic ammunition for the original weapon.

  The vigilante must be at least 14th level to select this talent.

Signature Poison.name: Signature Poison（Signature Poison）
Signature Poison.description: A rogue with this talent chooses one poison (such as bloodroot or oil of taggit) as her signature poison. When she uses the chosen poison, the poison閳ユ獨 saving throw DC increases by +2. A rogue can take this talent multiple times, each time applying it to a new poison.

Signature Weapon.name: 钟意武器（Signature Weapon）
Signature Weapon.description: 当获得本天赋时侠客选择一种武器（比如长剑或手弩），他对此武器获得武器专攻作为奖励专长。如果他已经拥有了武器专攻专长，那么侠客可以转而获得一个他在获得武器专攻的那个等级上满足先决条件的任意专长。在8级时，侠客对他选择的武器获得武器专精作为奖励专长，他无需满足任何先决条件即可获得这些专长。只有选择复仇骑士之道的侠客才能选择本天赋。

Silencing Strike (INV).name: Silencing Strike (INV)（Silencing Strike (INV)）
Silencing Strike (INV).description:
When the investigator deals damage with a studied strike, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the investigator閳ユ獨 class level + her Intelligence modifier) or be unable to speak (even for verbal components) for 1d4+1 rounds. A successful save reduces the duration to 1 round. This talent has no effect on creatures immune to critical hits.

  An investigator must be at least 15th level to select this talent.

Silencing Strike.name: Silencing Strike（Silencing Strike）
Silencing Strike.description: Using magic stolen from the Hellknights, Council agents can render foes silent. When a creature is damaged by the rogue閳ユ獨 sneak attack, the rogue magically renders the creature mute for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save (DC = 10 + half the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier). Silencing strike can be used a number of times per day equal to half the rogue閳ユ獨 level.

Silent Dispatch.name: 寂静突击（Silent Dispatch）
Silent Dispatch.description: 每当侠客对一个或一群未意识到他存在的目标发动伏击时，侠客都可以再进行一个承受-5减值的潜行技能检定。将这个检定的结果作为目标在自己的行动之前可能听到侠客的袭击的察觉检定DC。在侠客发动攻击后，这个DC再多-5，达到正常的听到战斗发生的察觉检定的-10DC。其他的敌人仍然可能正常的看到侠客的行动，他们只是比较难因为听到侠客而警告目标。

Silkstring Strike.name: Silkstring Strike（Silkstring Strike）
Silkstring Strike.description:
The shaman causes ribbons of spider silk to erupt from the ground beneath a single creature. The target must succeed at a Reflex save or be entangled and anchored in place. The foe can escape the silk as a standard action with a successful Escape Artist or Strength check at the same DC, or by dealing an amount of damage to the silk equal to double the shaman閳ユ獨 class level (the silk has hardness 0).

  This hex lasts a number of rounds equal to 3 + the shaman閳ユ獨 Wisdom modifier.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

Singularity Infusion.name: Singularity Infusion（Singularity Infusion）
Singularity Infusion.description:
Element void; Type form infusion; Level 4; Burn 3
Associated Blasts gravity, negative, void
Saving Throw Reflex half

  You create a growing singularity. Choose a grid intersection within 30 feet. All creatures and objects in a 5-foot-radius burst centered on the intersection take 1/4 your blast閳ユ獨 normal amount of damage (or half damage for a negative blast).

  On your next turn, the singularity deals damage in a 10-foot-radius burst, and on your turn after that, it deals damage in a 15-foot-radius burst. The DC is Dexterity-based.

Sink.name: Sink（Sink）
Sink.description:
The witch can cause a creature in water to struggle, imposing a 閳? penalty on its Swim checks and reducing its swim speed (if any) by 10 feet for 1 minute unless it succeeds at a Fortitude saving throw; on a successful save, the effect閳ユ獨 duration is reduced to 1 round.

  The duration of this hex can be extended with the cackle hex.

  This hex does not stack with itself.

Site-Bound Curse.name: Site-Bound Curse（Site-Bound Curse）
Site-Bound Curse.description:
You bond with a particular 10-foot square, and must remain within 1,500 feet of that site or immediately become sickened. You must succeed at a DC 15 Fortitude save each minute you spend outside of the boundary or become nauseated. For every hour spent outside of the boundary, you also take 1d4 points of Constitution damage (no save). When within range of your bonded site, you gain a +1 bonus to your caster level when casting oracle spells.

  At 5th level, the radius increases to 2,250 feet.

  At 10th level, the radius increases to 3,000 feet and the bonus to your caster level when casting oracle spells within the boundary increases by 1.

  At 15th level, you can move up to 1 mile from your bonded site.

Size Alteration.name: 变化体型（Size Alteration）
Size Alteration.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点触摸一个生物改变他的体型。你可以增大或减小目标体型一阶，如同人类变巨术或人类变小术，但不限制目标的生物类型。若目标与你态度为敌对，则使用该能力需要进行近战接触攻击，且目标可以进行强韧豁免以免除该效果。该效果持续每秘学士等级1轮。你不能对已经改变了体型的单位使用该能力。

Skill Familiarity.name: Skill Familiarity（Skill Familiarity）
Skill Familiarity.description:
The vigilante choses four skills when he gains this talent. He can take 10 on checks with his chosen skills even when distracted or threatened. If he takes 10 on checks with these skills while not distracted or threatened, he gains a bonus on the check equal to one-quarter his vigilante level (minimum +2).

  A vigilante must be at least 9th level to select this talent.

Skilled (1 pt).name: Skilled (1 pt)（Skilled (1 pt)）
Skilled (1 pt).description:
An eidolon becomes especially adept at a specific skill, gaining a +8 racial bonus on that skill. This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack.

  Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different skill.

Skilled (UC) (1 pt).name: Skilled (UC) (1 pt)（Skilled (UC) (1 pt)）
Skilled (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon becomes especially adept at a specific skill, gaining a +8 racial bonus on that skill.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time the eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different skill.

Skilled Kineticist, Greater.name: Skilled Kineticist, Greater（Skilled Kineticist, Greater）
Skilled Kineticist, Greater.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite skilled kineticist

  By delving into study of the Ethereal and Elemental Planes, you are able to use your primary element to assist with your skills in an unusual way. Add Knowledge ：位面 to your list of class skills.

  Choose one of your kineticist class skills that wasn閳ユ獩 granted by your primary element to also receive the bonus from skilled kineticist.

Skilled Kineticist.name: 熟练操念使（Skilled Kineticist）
Skilled Kineticist.description:
元素：通用；类别：通用（Su）；等级：1；超载：－

  对于你的首要元素（primary element）向本职技能列表中添加的技能来说，这些技能检定均会获得一个加值，加值的数值等同于你的操念使等级的一半，而且你能够使用与首要元素相关的知识技能鉴别生物，不过仅限亚种类型和你的首要元素一致的元素（elementals）。

Sky Walk.name: Sky Walk（Sky Walk）
Sky Walk.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 7; Burn 1
Prerequisite air cushon or air's leap, wings of air

  By accepting 1 point of burn, you can enable your allies to fly, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}, except the duration of the effect is 10 minutes.

Slam (1 pt).name: Slam (1 pt)（Slam (1 pt)）
Slam (1 pt).description:
An eidolon can deliver a devastating slam attack. This attack is a primary attack. The slam deals 1d8 points of damage (2d6 if Large, 2d8 if Huge). The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with this slam attack (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the limbs evolution.

Slam (UC) (1 pt).name: Slam (UC) (1 pt)（Slam (UC) (1 pt)）
Slam (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon can deliver a devastating slam attack. This attack is a primary attack. The slam deals 1d8 points of damage (2d6 if Large, 2d8 if Huge). The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution.

  Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with this slam attack (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of the eidolon閳ユ獨 limbs (arms) evolutions.

Slavery Subdomain.name: Slavery Subdomain（Slavery Subdomain）
Slavery Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gb7pxobi1za67p7g]{束缚大法}

Sleeper Agent.name: Sleeper Agent（Sleeper Agent）
Sleeper Agent.description:
The alchemist learns how to create a sleeper agent, whom he releases back into its original society none the wiser. The alchemist can create a sleeper agent in a ritual that takes 1 minute; the target must be unconscious for the ritual閳ユ獨 duration. At any time during the next year, as long as he is within 1 mile of the sleeper agent, the alchemist can activate the agent閳ユ獨 programming. When the sleeper agent is activated, treat her as if she were the target of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类} spell with a caster level equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level at the time the sleeper agent was created. If the sleeper agent is killed or the dominate person effect閳ユ獨 duration expires, the sleeper agent is permanently released from the alchemist閳ユ獨 control. The alchemist can also release any sleeper agent as a free action. The alchemist can have one active sleeper agent for every 6 alchemist levels he possesses.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level before selecting this discovery.

Slick Infusion.name: Slick Infusion（Slick Infusion）
Slick Infusion.description:
Element water; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Prerequisite slick
Associated Blasts blizzard, charged water, cold, ice, water
Saving Throw Reflex negates

  Your blast leaves behind slippery water or ice in its area for as long as the blast is in that area and for 1 round thereafter, making the area difficult terrain and increasing the DC of Acrobatics checks attempted in the area by 5. You can use this infusion only if you also use a form infusion that has an area of effect.

Slick.name: 溜滑（Slick）
Slick.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  豁免：反射，通过则无效；法术抗力：否

  以标准动作，你能够呼唤滑溜的水或冰，创造出油腻术（Grease）的任意效果，持续1轮。你能够在你的下个回合开始时承受1点超载，来使得效果持续时间延长至每操念使等级1分钟。

Slip Bonds.name: Slip Bonds（Slip Bonds）
Slip Bonds.description:
While implanted with this trick, the subject gains a +2 circumstance bonus on Escape Artist checks. If the subject becomes grappled, pinned, shackled, or otherwise personally restrained, the mesmerist can trigger the trick and cause the subject to become incorporeal just long enough to slip her bonds (unless they can otherwise restrain an incorporeal creature). This effect doesn閳ユ獩 last long enough for the subject to move through walls or other barriers.

  If the mesmerist is 12th level, the subject remains incorporeal until the beginning of the mesmerist閳ユ獨 next turn.

Slippery (1 pt).name: Slippery (1 pt)（Slippery (1 pt)）
Slippery (1 pt).description: Due to its slimy hide or a slick exoskeleton, the eidolon is especially slippery. The eidolon gains a +4 bonus to CMD to escape a grapple and on Escape Artist checks.

Sluggishness (Stare).name: 迟钝（Sluggishness (Stare)）
Sluggishness (Stare).description: 催眠注视的目标所拥有的所有速度都会被减少5尺（最低降至5尺），而且催眠注视的减值还能应用至目标的反射豁免检定上。

Sluggish.name: Sluggish（Sluggish）
Sluggish.description:
The shaman causes the speed of a creature within 30 feet to be halved. The target can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to negate this effect. The penalty lasts for a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 character level and does not stack with other effects that reduce speed.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the creature can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

Smoke Storm.name: 烟雾迸发（Smoke Storm）
Smoke Storm.description:
元素：火；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：0

  豁免：强韧，通过则无效；见后文；法术抗力：否

  你将120尺范围内的一处无遮盖的火源变为呛人的烟云，充满半径20尺的扩散区域，而且还会如同发烟棒（Smokestick）一般影响视线。在自己的回合开始时处于烟云内的生物会陷入恶心（sickened），只要没有离开烟云该效果便会持续下去，即便离开烟云，该效果也会持续1d4+1轮（强韧豁免，通过则无效）。

Snake Aspect.name: 蛇拟态（Snake Aspect）
Snake Aspect.description:
蛇是一名鬼祟且致命的敌手，在意料不及时出击并造成致命的效果，同时又避开对方的趁机回击。

  次级形态：你进行藉机攻击的攻击检定获得+2加值，对抗藉机攻击检定的AC获得+2闪避加值。8级时，这个加值提升至+4。15级时，这个加值提升至+6。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只帝王眼镜蛇（怪物图鉴2 pg. 252）。当处于该形态时，你获得30尺攀爬速度、30尺游泳速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、2d6伤害的啮咬攻击和战斗反射专长。如果你已经拥有战斗反射专长或者你的敏捷属性值不足以获得更多的藉机攻击次数，则每轮获得1次额外的藉机攻击次数。8级时，你的特技和隐匿检定获得+4种族加值。15级时，当你用你的啮咬攻击发动藉机攻击时，这次攻击还能附带以下毒素。

  毒素（Poison）：啮咬—伤口；强韧豁免DC=10+1/2变形者等级+体质调整值；频率：每轮1次，持续6轮；效果：1d3体质伤害；治愈：连续2次通过检定。

Snake Infusion.name: 蛇形（Snake Infusion）
Snake Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：3；超载：2

  前置：增距（extended range）

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：无

  你对自己的念袭有着良好的掌控力，这使得你可以调整它的路径并且避免障碍。你可以为念袭勾绘出任意总长度不超过120尺的路径，这使你能够避免掩蔽（cover），甚至是全掩蔽（total cover）。你可以选择通往自己无法看到的方格的路径。

Snapping Turtle Aspect.name: Snapping Turtle Aspect（Snapping Turtle Aspect）
Snapping Turtle Aspect.description:
Long-lived and resilient, turtles embody wisdom and endurance in many cultures. Those who take this aspect gain profound insight as well as remarkable resilience. A snapping turtle閳ユ獨 alternate attack is bite (B, P, S).

Minor Form: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

  At 8th level, this bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Large giant snapping turtle. While in this form, you gain low-light vision, scent (30 feet), a swim speed of 20 feet, and a bite attack (1d8 + 1-1/2 your Strength modifier damage).

  At 8th level, you gain an insight bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier to your CMD against bull rush, drag, overrun, reposition, and trip attempts.

  At 15th level, you gain DR 5/silver.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

Sneak Training.name: Sneak Training（Sneak Training）
Sneak Training.description: The rogue counts as having the sneak attack class feature of a rogue of her level for the purpose of meeting prestige class requirements, although this talent doesn閳ユ獩 improve the rogue閳ユ獨 existing sneak attack ability or grant her the sneak attack class feature if she doesn閳ユ獩 already have it. This talent is most useful for rogues that lack the sneak attack class feature, such as those with the phantom thief archetype.

Sneaky Maneuver.name: Sneaky Maneuver（Sneaky Maneuver）
Sneaky Maneuver.description: Anytime a rogue with this talent could hit an opponent with a melee sneak attack on her turn, she may take a 閳? penalty on her attack roll and attempt a dirty trick, disarm, steal, sunder, or trip combat maneuver instead of dealing sneak attack damage. If the attack succeeds, the rogue deals weapon damage as normal and then attempts a combat maneuver check as a swift action (the 閳? penalty only applies to the initial attack roll, not the combat maneuver check). This combat maneuver still provokes attacks of opportunity unless the rogue has a feat or ability that allows her to perform it without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Sniper (VIG).name: 狙击手(侠客)（Sniper (VIG)）
Sniper (VIG).description: 侠客的远程暗袭攻击不再受到任何距离限制。只有达到6级且选择诡秘猎手之道的侠客可以选择本天赋。

Snow Sight.name: Snow Sight（Snow Sight）
Snow Sight.description:
You can see through falling snow and sleet without taking any penalties on Perception checks as long as there is enough light to allow you to see normally.

  At 11th level, in cold conditions or in icy or snowy terrain, you can learn about your surroundings as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.icjrw9y6pa1uatlz]{问道自然} spell.

  You can use the commune with nature ability once per day at 11th level, and twice per day at 15th level.

Social Grace.name: Social Grace（Social Grace）
Social Grace.description:
The vigilante selects any one Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill other than Perception or Use Magic Device. Whenever the vigilante is in his social identity, he receives a +4 circumstance bonus on checks with the selected skill.

  At 5th level and every 4 levels thereafter, he can select another skill (with the same restrictions) to gain this bonus.

Social Talent.name: 社交天赋（Social Talent）
Social Talent.description: 在1级以及之后每提升两个等级时，侠客可以获得一个社交天赋。除非特别提及，否则侠客的所有社交天赋只能被选择一次。有一些社交天赋需要侠客在满足特定的先决条件（比如其他的社交天赋或是达到一定的侠客等级）的情况下才能选择。社交天赋一旦选取即无法改变。

Soiling Touch.name: Soiling Touch（Soiling Touch）
Soiling Touch.description: At 1st level, you can impose the broken condition upon one Medium or smaller object by making a successful melee touch attack. Magical items or objects carried or worn by a creature are allowed a Fortitude save to resist this effect. Multiple uses of this effect do not stack. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Solar Ascension.name: Solar Ascension（Solar Ascension）
Solar Ascension.description: At 20th level, as a full-round action, you can become an incorporeal being of light for 1 round per sorcerer level. While in this form, you gain the incorporeal subtype and take half the normal damage from corporeal magic attacks (you take no damage from nonmagical weapons and objects). Your spells deal half damage to corporeal creatures, but spells and abilities that do not deal damage function normally. The duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-round increments. While in this form, any creature you move through (as the overrun combat maneuver) takes 2d6 points of fire damage.

Solar Bloodline.name: Solar Bloodline（Solar Bloodline）
Solar Bloodline.description:
Sorcerers who serve in the sun goddess閳ユ獨 court display powers infused with the glory of the sun itself.

  本职技能: 察觉.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dnet1tyxbsnwailm]{灼热光辉} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myeqz367l1vb5fje]{Fury Of The Sun} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oz41554bzacn8szb]{Shield Of The Dawnflower} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nWFr8SNcjcMqsXSH]{法术穿透}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell with the fire descriptor, if it deals damage, it deals +1 point of damage per die rolled.

Solar Final Revelation.name: Solar Final Revelation（Solar Final Revelation）
Solar Final Revelation.description: At 20th level, yours becomes a journey without end. You cease aging, no longer suffer age-related penalties to ability scores, and cannot be magically aged. Any spells you cast of the conjuration (teleport) subschool or with the fire or light descriptor are automatically enlarged without affecting their spell level.

Solar Mystery.name: Solar Mystery（Solar Mystery）
Solar Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with this mystery adds Fly, Knowledge (geography), Linguistics, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.evoz9r9n186nsjf0]{位面适应}n (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lxxliyxfw9uvbxmt]{虹光法球} (18th).

Solar Wind.name: Solar Wind（Solar Wind）
Solar Wind.description:
You can unleash a blast of searing wind at a single target within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack with no range increment. Your solar wind deals 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 for every 2 oracle levels you possess.

  At 7th level, you can also knock an opponent back, treating the blast as a bull rush combat maneuver that uses your caster level + your Charisma modifier in place of your CMB.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Solid Ground.name: Solid Ground（Solid Ground）
Solid Ground.description: The alchemist launches an explosive paste bomb that bonds with any earthen surface. Each application of this paste deals no damage and affects a 5-foot-cube of dirt, loose soil, or stone, transmuting the earth for a number of minutes equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level. Creatures cannot use burrow, earthmeld, or similar abilities (such as the meld into stone spell) while the ground remains transmuted in this way.

Solitude Subdomain.name: Solitude Subdomain（Solitude Subdomain）
Solitude Subdomain.description:
Replacement 领域法术:

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ow4t1zox6dtybgji]{沉默术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.viq93vkjaungdbul]{侦测探知}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{海市蜃楼}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ngsn9j87t68uhysj]{Create Demiplane, Greater}

Song-Bound Curse.name: Song-Bound Curse（Song-Bound Curse）
Song-Bound Curse.description:
(Merfolk only) Whenever you speak, you are compelled to sing loudly, and you draw out even short utterances with vocal scales or simple melodies. You cannot speak in less than a loud voice, although you may choose not to speak. You can perform the countersong bardic performance (using Perform [sing] only) for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level. If you gain the bardic performance class feature, these rounds are in addition to any other bardic performance rounds you gain, but they can be used only for the countersong bardic performance.
