  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.2p6fzj5t03oivndd]{命令术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add 1 to the difficulty class of saving throws against language-dependent spells you cast.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术} to your list of spells known.

Songbird.name: Songbird（Songbird）
Songbird.description: The vigilante gains the use of @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{动物信使} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his character level. He also gains Handle Animal as a class skill.

Soothsayer.name: Soothsayer（Soothsayer）
Soothsayer.description:
The witch閳ユ獨 predictions become selffulfilling prophecies. When the witch uses the evil eye hex, fortune hex, misfortune hex, or retribution major hex, she can choose to delay the effect. If she does so, the hex takes effect the next time the target makes a roll that could be affected by the hex (such as an ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check) or is affected by an action that could be modified by the hex (such as being attacked when the hex would affect the target閳ユ獨 AC), whichever comes first (ignoring actions that are not in combat and actions that have no penalty for failure). The duration of the hex begins on the same round as the action that causes it to take effect.

  The hex is wasted if it is not triggered within 24 hours.

Sorrow Discipline.name: Sorrow Discipline（Sorrow Discipline）
Sorrow Discipline.description:
You draw strength from deep feelings of abandonment, loneliness, and sadness, turning these emotions into a powerful weapon or a barrier that protects you.

精神力池属性 魅力.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ow4t1zox6dtybgji]{沉默术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{极度绝望} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dlmeq0hpxfbjtibb]{心灵迷雾} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c3qqu6l3vdcfaoh7]{隔离术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hi72gh3dlf7a1qyt]{迷宫术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (18th).

Soulbound Puppet.name: 魂缚木偶（Soulbound Puppet）
Soulbound Puppet.description: 以一个整轮动作，你消耗1点心智点用一块骨头、一个玩偶或一个骷髅头创造出一个魂缚木偶。若你使用骨头或骷髅头，你的力量会让骨头重新长出模糊的肉，创造出超小型或小型的木偶，长得会模糊地与骨头原主人相似。若使用玩偶，玩偶将获得生命。将它视为魔宠，使用你的秘学士等级作为法师等级来计算力量和能力。通过使用适当生物的骨头或骷髅头，或用与适当生物相似的玩偶，你可以选择任何法师可用的魔宠。你也可以使用类人生物的骨头、玩偶或骷髅头，来使得魂缚木偶获得人造人（人彘）的基本数据，除了飞行速度和毒咬和心灵链接。无论什么形态，该木偶还是一个构装体，拥有与你相同的阵营。你同一时间无法拥有多于一个的魂缚木偶。该木偶只能活动每秘学士等级10分钟的时间。

Soulstrider.name: Soulstrider（Soulstrider）
Soulstrider.description: The arcanist can, as a swift action while he casts a spell that targets one living creature, spend 1 point from his arcane reservoir to infuse his spell with a manifestation of fiendish energy called a 閳ユ笩oulrider.閳?The soulrider attaches to the target of the spell and buries itself in the target閳ユ獨 subconscious mind, persisting there as long as the arcanist maintains at least 1 point in his arcane reservoir, until the arcanist dismisses the soulrider (this requires a standard action), or until the arcanist successfully infects another creature with a soulrider. The target of the spell can resist having the soulrider attach to its soul with a successful Will saving throw (this is in addition to any saving throw the spell itself might or might not allow). If the target resists the spell閳ユ獨 effects with a successful save or other methods (such as via spell resistance or by being immune to that spell閳ユ獨 effects) the soulrider automatically fails to attach to the victim. @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{侦测邪恶} can uncover the presence of a soulrider. As long as the soulrider persists, the arcanist can track the targeted creature as if it were under the effect of @Compendium[pf1.spells.4ya1fs9tyvsqnwqx]{关照术}, and the creature takes a 閳? penalty to any saving throw against a mind-affecting effect created by the arcanist. While the soulrider remains bonded to the target, the arcanist can spend 1 point from his arcane reservoir to communicate with the target as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0d86z521shpman1]{短讯术}. Soulrider is a mind-affecting effect.

Soverignty Subdomain.name: Soverignty Subdomain（Soverignty Subdomain）
Soverignty Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h8zit03e88jxrg9t]{严加斥责}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k8va0g2bqb8w31q6]{Castigate, Mass}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

Space Patron.name: Space Patron（Space Patron）
Space Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.97mcivnu2owb8119]{Mirror Strike}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4gs8xrmzy2bvfkr0]{Twisted Space}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qmorw7eojkfqr00m]{闪现术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s0uh1psyg0cfd9e6]{Hostile Juxtaposition}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.oh6kkz31ai7eoxhp]{Walk Through Space}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.if867t28tu6zxaei]{传送法阵}

Space-rending Spell.name: 空间撕裂（Space-rending Spell）
Space-rending Spell.description: 异能者能够使用自身的精神力扭曲空间，在施放联结法术的同时传送自己。异能者每从精神力池中花费1点精神力，便能够将自己传送10尺的距离，就如同任意门（Dimension Door）一般。以此方式花费的精神力数量最高等同于联结法术的等级。

Spacious Soul.name: 伽蓝之洞（Spacious Soul）
Spacious Soul.description: 在18级时，通灵者的心魂变得空无而辽阔，可以容纳其他刚刚离世的盟友的灵魂。如果一个参加了通灵者的本日降灵会的盟友在通灵者拥有对他的效果线并且可以看到他时死亡，通灵者可以以一个即时动作将他的灵魂装入自己体内。只要他保持容纳着一个盟友的灵魂，通灵者就无法使用英灵，英灵之力和灵力奔涌能力。如果一个盟友的灵魂和通灵者共享他的身体，那么他甚至可以在通灵者的行动轮中决定通灵者的行动。如果通灵者不同意盟友的行动，那么他必须与盟友进行一个魅力对抗检定来决定下一个小时他们中由谁获得对身体的控制权，接下来的每轮中均由胜利者决定行动。盟友的灵魂保有他所有死亡时尚未使用的法术和每日能力使用次数（如气池，灵感，派头，勇毅，引导能量，等等）但他无法恢复任何已经使用掉的能力次数和能量点数。当盟友的灵魂控制通灵师行动时，他可以使用自己原本的基础攻击加值，施法者等级和职业能力（比如武器擅长），但必须使用通灵者的体能属性。如果该盟友之后被复活，这个能力的效果立刻结束，否则它们将永远共享通灵者的身体。即使自己的盟友不愿意，通灵者也可以以一个标准动作结束共享身体，但是他必须成功通过一个DC=（10+盟友HD的一半+盟友的魅力调整值）的意志检定，如果失败，接下来的24小时内盟友的灵魂会控制他的躯体。

Spark Malfeasance.name: Spark Malfeasance（Spark Malfeasance）
Spark Malfeasance.description:
At 8th level, you can awaken the sinful desires of a target within 30 feet with a ranged touch attack. The target suffers extreme guilt and is sickened for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level. To end the effect earlier, the target can willingly commit an evil act (if it is of good alignment) or attempt a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) at the beginning of its turn each round. Creatures that succeed at their saving throws are immune to this ability for 24 hours. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Scythe of Evil power of the Evil Domain.

Spark of Innovation.name: Spark of Innovation（Spark of Innovation）
Spark of Innovation.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

  You shape metal into a clockwork creature, as spark of life except you summon a clockwork earth elemental. The elemental閳ユ獨 type is changed to construct (clockwork) and it gains construct traits and clockwork traits instead of elemental traits. The creature loses any spell-like abilities or supernatural abilities it normally has. If you have the greater elemental whispers utility wild talent, you can take a clockwork familiar as an improved familiar with that ability instead of an earth elemental.

Spark of Life.name: 生命闪烁（Spark of Life）
Spark of Life.description:
元素：通用；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：5；超载：0

  你把虚假的生命力量注入元素物质，这会形成一个中型元素（Medium elemental），就如同使用召唤怪物 IV（Summon Monster IV）召唤的一般，元素的类型要从你所具有的元素中选择，该效果的施法者等级等同于你的操念使等级，不过这个元素会获得无心智（mindless）特性。每当轮到你的回合时，你必须使用移动动作指引元素，否则它便会坍塌成原本的元素构成物质。通过承受1点超载，你能够将少部分自身的意志注入到元素中，移除它的无心智特性，并且让它能够存在每操念使等级1轮，在此期间你也不需要你执行进一步的动作维持它。12级起，你能够形成一个大型元素（Large elemental），就如同使用了召唤怪物 V（Summon Monster V）一般；14级起，你能够选择形成超大型元素（Huge elemental），就如同使用了召唤怪物 VI（Summon Monster VI）一般；16级起，你能够选择形成一个菁英元素（greater elemental），就如同使用了召唤怪物 VII（Summon Monster VII）一般；在18级，你能够选择形成一个元素长老（elder elemental），就如同使用了召唤怪物 VIII（Summon Monster VIII）一般。

Spatial Switch.name: 空间换位（Spatial Switch）
Spatial Switch.description: 催眠师能够让自己和一名盟友交换身体所在的位置。当一个敌人移动至与受术者或催眠师相邻的位置、或者攻击受术者或者催眠师之时，如果受术者与催眠师之间相互的距离在100尺之内的话，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。受术者与催眠师会交换位置。如果触发该项诡计的是一次攻击，那么换位会在进行检定判断攻击是否命中之前作出。催眠师不能为自己植入该项诡计。这是一个咒法系（conjuration）传送（teleportation）效果。

Speak with Animals (SHA).name: 动物交谈(萨满)（Speak with Animals (SHA)）
Speak with Animals (SHA).description: 选择一个具体的动物种类（鹰、狐狸、狗等等）。萨满能够与该种动物交谈，如同法术动物交谈效果。每3个萨满等级可以额外选择1种动物进行交谈（3级2种，6级3种，最高18级7种）。

Speak with Dead.name: Speak with Dead（Speak with Dead）
Speak with Dead.description:
At 8th level, as a standard action, you can ask one question of a dead creature as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈}. The dead creature you are questioning does not gain a Will saving throw if your alignments are different. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your cleric level.

  This power replaces the Ward Against Death power of the Repose Domain.

Spectral Smoke.name: 鬼魅烟云（Spectral Smoke）
Spectral Smoke.description: 一片烟云突然笼罩在受术者的身边妨碍他人攻击。当受术者成为了一个攻击或者需要攻击检定的法术的目标时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。烟云会出现在受术者所占据的方格，并延伸出半径10尺的范围围绕着她。这些烟云的持续时间为每催眠师等级1轮。烟云的作用就如同云雾术（Fog Cloud）一般，不过这是一个幻术系（illusion）虚假幻觉（figment）效果，因此不会被风吹散，而且可以在水下使用。与烟云产生互动的生物能够尝试一次豁免检定来不相信该效果。催眠师每有5个施法者等级，烟云的半径便能够增加5尺，至多为20级时的30尺。

Spectral Spells.name: Spectral Spells（Spectral Spells）
Spectral Spells.description:
You gain Ectoplasmic Spell as a bonus feat. In addition, once per day, you can cast a spell with the Ectoplasmic Spell metamagic feat as a standard action that does not increase the level of the spell.

  You can use this ability one additional time per day at 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

Spell Anticipation.name: 先制法术（Spell Anticipation）
Spell Anticipation.description: 催眠师能够选取一个法术来回击敌方施法者。当催眠师植入该项诡计时，他必须将一个已知法术与诡计相结合，这要花费适当环级的法术位。用于与诡计结合的法术的施法时间必须为标准动作或更快，而且能够以一个生物为目标，支配人类（Dominate Person）这样对目标有严格要求的法术可以使用，但如果触发诡计的生物不符合法术要求，就不会产生任何效果。当受术者成为了一个敌人的法术目标之后，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。催眠师的法术也会随之触发，不过仅会影响敌方施法者。只有当敌方施法者处于法术的范围内（以诡计的受术者为起点进行范围测量）才能生效，这就好像催眠师在受术者所在的方格内施法一般。敌人的法术仍然会产生完整的效果，即便催眠师的法术在通常情况下能够完美地对抗敌人、并让施法者无法施法也是如此。

Spell Binding.name: Spell Binding（Spell Binding）
Spell Binding.description:
When a magus selects this arcana, he must select one spell from the wizard spell list that is of a magus spell level he can cast. He adds this spell to his spellbook and list of magus spells known as a magus spell of its wizard spell level. He can instead select two spells to add in this way, but both must be at least one level lower than the highest-level magus spell he can cast.

  A magus can select this magus arcana more than once.

Spell Blast.name: Spell Blast（Spell Blast）
Spell Blast.description: As a swift action whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a spell that requires an attack roll, you can immediately attempt to bull rush your opponent in any direction. You don閳ユ獩 provoke an attack of opportunity for this bull rush attempt.

Spell Deflection.name: 法术偏转（Spell Deflection）
Spell Deflection.description:
元素：以太；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：7；超载：0

  你把以太编织起来环绕自身，以此来将目标型的法术偏转回施法者身上。直至你的下个回合开始为止，每当你成为法术目标，并且这个法术可以被法术反转（Spell Turning）影响时，投掷1d10-1并得出结果，就如同你的法术反转剩下这么多等级可供反转一般判断法术的效果。你可以承受1点超载来将效果的持续时间延长至每个操念使等级10分钟，但是在此情况下，它的效果提早结束之前只能反转总和为10个等级的法术（仍旧要逐次投掷1d10-1进行检定）。

Spell Destruction.name: Spell Destruction（Spell Destruction）
Spell Destruction.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 7; Burn 0

  You weave strands of aether around yourself in order to deflect targeted magic back at the caster. Until the beginning of your next turn, every time you are targeted by a spell that could be affected by spell turning, roll 1d10閳? and determine the effects of the spell as if you had @Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转} with that many spell levels remaining.

  You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 10 minutes per kineticist level you possess, but in that case, it deflects only 10 spell levels in total (still rolled 1d10閳? at a time) before ending early.

Spell Knowledge.name: Spell Knowledge（Spell Knowledge）
Spell Knowledge.description:
Your studies into how all things are interconnected have taught you to cast a very limited number of spells. Select a single spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list that is at least 2 levels lower than your highest-level extract known. You can prepare and cast this spell as an arcane spell. Preparing the spell uses up an extract slot 1 level higher than the spell閳ユ獨 level. Your caster level is equal to your alchemist level, and your save DCs and concentration checks are Intelligence-based. You閳ユ獧e considered to have this spell on your spell list for purposes of prerequisites, spell completion items, and spell trigger items.

You may select this discovery more than once. Each time, it grants you access to another spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list.

Spell Resistance (4 pts).name: Spell Resistance (4 pts)（Spell Resistance (4 pts)）
Spell Resistance (4 pts).description:
An eidolon is protected against magic, gaining spell resistance. The eidolon's spell resistance is equal to 11 + the summoner's level.

  This spell resistance does not apply to spells cast by the summoner.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

Spell Resistance (UC) (4 pts).name: Spell Resistance (UC) (4 pts)（Spell Resistance (UC) (4 pts)）
Spell Resistance (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon is protected against magic, gaining spell resistance. The eidolon閳ユ獨 spell resistance is equal to 11 + the summoner閳ユ獨 level.

  This spell resistance does not apply to spells cast by the summoner.

Spell Storing.name: Spell Storing（Spell Storing）
Spell Storing.description: The rogue can store within himself a single targeted harmless spell of up to 2nd level. The spell must have a casting time of 1 standard action. Anytime a spell that meets these conditions is cast on the rogue, and he does not already have a spell stored, he can choose to store it rather than have it take effect immediately. Anytime afterward, as a standard action, the rogue can have the spell take effect (acting in all ways as if it had just been cast on him). A rogue must have 1 rank of Use Magic Device to select this talent.

Spellbreaker (BAR).name: 破法者(野蛮人)（Spellbreaker (BAR)）
Spellbreaker (BAR).description: 狂暴时，野蛮人获得“破法者”作为奖励专长。野蛮人必须习得【扰法者】且至少12级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Spellbreaker (MAG).name: 破法者(魔战士)（Spellbreaker (MAG)）
Spellbreaker (MAG).description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士得到@Compendium[pf1.feats.yE3hVOvBq9rx6TAw]{破法者}做为奖励专长。

Spider Aspect.name: Spider Aspect（Spider Aspect）
Spider Aspect.description:
The spider is a patient hunter, sensing foes that struggle in its webs.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Climb checks, Stealth checks, saving throws against web effects (magical or otherwise), and checks to break free of webs.

  This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant spider. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, a climb speed of 30 feet, the web special attack, and a bite attack (1d6).

  At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial bonus on Perception checks, and the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet.

  At 15th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack (bite), and the range of your tremorsense increases to 30 feet.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

Spindle Infusion.name: Spindle Infusion（Spindle Infusion）
Spindle Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw Reflex negates (see text)

  You throw a long, roughly 5-foot-by-10-foot spindle of elemental matter or energy (or nearby unattended objects in the case of telekineticists) up to 30 feet away, damaging all creatures and objects within any two adjacent 5-foot squares unless they succeed at a Reflex save.

  An energy blast infused with spindle deals its normal damage to each target, while a physical blast infused with spindle deals half its normal damage to each target. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

Spines and Brambles.name: Spines and Brambles（Spines and Brambles）
Spines and Brambles.description:
With a beckoning gesture, the shaman conjures spiny shrubs in a number of squares equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1) within 30 feet. The squares become filled with light undergrowth (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 426). The shaman can pass through the affected squares without impediment.

  When the shaman uses this hex again, any previously conjured undergrowth withers away.

Spire Totem, Greater.name: Spire Totem, Greater（Spire Totem, Greater）
Spire Totem, Greater.description:
While the barbarian is raging, all allies within 30 feet gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saves. When attempting a Will save against a fear effect, all allies within this area can roll twice and use the better result.

  A barbarian must have the spire totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

Spire Totem, Lesser.name: Spire Totem, Lesser（Spire Totem, Lesser）
Spire Totem, Lesser.description: While raging, the barbarian gains a +1 morale bonus on attacks against any creature that has targeted one of her allies with an attack or a harmful spell within the last round.

Spire Totem.name: Spire Totem（Spire Totem）
Spire Totem.description:
While raging, the barbarian takes no penalties for using a weapon to deal nonlethal damage. When dealing nonlethal damage, the barbarian adds a bonus equal to half her barbarian level on her damage rolls.

  A barbarian must have the lesser spire totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Spirit Bonus.name: 英灵同调（Spirit Bonus）
Spirit Bonus.description: 当通灵者降灵了一个英灵以后，他可以在特定检定和数据上获得加值，具体加值类型取决于他召唤的英灵类型。在1级时，英灵之力的加值为+1，在4级和之后每提升4级时额外+1。

Spirit Channeling.name: Spirit Channeling（Spirit Channeling）
Spirit Channeling.description: As your self-awareness expands, you become increasingly attuned to the spirit world around you. At 5th level, as part of your meditation to initiate metamorphosis, you can invite a wandering spirit to share your body as if you were a shaman (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Class Guide 37). You gain the associated 1st-level spirit ability as long as you maintain your altered form, but your metamorphosis form also exhibits some aspect of the spirit you host, such as vivid red hair for a flame spirit or gauntness for a bone spirit.

Spirit Mastery.name: 英灵化（Spirit Mastery）
Spirit Mastery.description: 在19级时，通灵者本人已经位居传奇之列，受到其他英灵特别是低级精魂的敬仰。通灵者可以每天多使用两次灵力奔涌而不增加共鸣点数，并且无论他是否选择遵守禁忌或是使用较弱的英灵都是如此。当他降灵较弱的英灵时，每放弃一个英灵之力通灵师可以获得4次不增加共鸣的灵力奔涌而非两次。

Spirit Shroud.name: 精魂罩衣（Spirit Shroud）
Spirit Shroud.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点用精魂能量笼罩自己。你获得等同于1d6+秘学士等级的临时生命值。罩衣持续每秘学士等级1分钟时间，或直到临时生命值全部耗尽。该临时生命值可与其他资源叠加，但不与本能力叠加。4级时，当精魂罩衣存在时，你对抗死亡效果、恐惧效果、任何造成负向等级或造成负能量伤害的法术或类法术效果（若它允许进行豁免）时，豁免检定获得抗力加值。该加值等于1+4级后每有4个秘学士等级1点。你必须至少3级才能选择该灵器之力。

Spirit Surge.name: 灵力奔涌（Spirit Surge）
Spirit Surge.description: 当通灵者做出任何一个享有英灵同调加值的d20检定且失败后，他可以借助英灵的力量，以增加1点共鸣为代价为检定结果增加1d6加值（不需要任何动作）。这个加值可能会使一个失败的检定获得成功，但通灵者需要意识到自己这么做才能使用这个能力，且每轮最多使用一次。在10级时，这个加值提升到1d8；在20级时，提升到1d10。

Spirit Touch.name: Spirit Touch（Spirit Touch）
Spirit Touch.description:
At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Death's Embrace power of the Death Domain or the Ward Against Death power of the Repose Domain.

Spiritual Awareness.name: Spiritual Awareness（Spiritual Awareness）
Spiritual Awareness.description:
While raging, the barbarian's dodge bonus to AC from trap sense applies against attacks made by incorporeal creatures.

  The barbarian must have trap sense to select this ability.

Spiritual Bond.name: 魅影联结（Spiritual Bond）
Spiritual Bond.description: 在14级时，唤魂师的生命力在本质上与她的魅影的灵力存为一体。只要她的魅影至少还有1点生命值，当唤魂师的生命值因为受到伤害而被降到0时，这些伤害可以被传递到她的魅影身上。这些伤害会在全部被魅影吸收，或是对魅影造成能够使其承受达到体质值负值的伤害时停止。在后一种情况下，多出来的伤害仍然会被唤魂师承受。本能力只对会造成生命值伤害的效果有效。

Spiritual Bulwark.name: Spiritual Bulwark（Spiritual Bulwark）
Spiritual Bulwark.description: At 5th level, you develop a deeper attachment to your lingering spirits, and learn to rely on their presence as protection from external spiritual attacks. You gain a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier on saving throws against effects generated by haunts, incorporeal undead, incorporeal outsiders, and on saving throws against possession attempts.

Spiritual Companion.name: Spiritual Companion（Spiritual Companion）
Spiritual Companion.description:
While ninjas are accustomed to solitude, some form pacts with magical beings to seek aid and advice. A ninja with this trick gains an improved familiar, treating her ninja level as her wizard level. The ninja can select any of the following as her familiar: calligraphy wyrm, pipefox, shikigami kami, or spirit oni.

  The ninja must have an alignment compatible with the chosen familiar.

Spiritual Defense.name: Spiritual Defense（Spiritual Defense）
Spiritual Defense.description:
Your chanting grants protection against your enemies. As a move action, you can begin chanting to gain the benefit of a protection spell (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.skgjjub1hng29nwo]{防护邪恶}) using your oracle level as your caster level. This protection lasts until you stop chanting or for the spell閳ユ獨 normal duration, whichever comes first. Chanting after the initial round of the effect is a free action, and you can incorporate verbal components and communication into the chant; magical silence ends a chant and its protection effect.

  At 6th level, you can chant aloud to create a magic circle effect (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵}).

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Spiritual Interference.name: 魅影加护（Spiritual Interference）
Spiritual Interference.description: 在4级时，每当唤魂师处于自己的以灵质态显形的魅影的触及范围内时，她都可以在自己的防御等级上获得+2盾牌加值，在所有的豁免检定上获得+2环境加值。当魅影被擒抱，无助或失去意识时唤魂师也会失去这些加值。每当唤魂师处于自己的以虚灵态显形的魅影周围30尺范围之内时，她还会在对抗影响心灵的效果时在所有的豁免检定上获得+2环境加值，这个加值属于超自然能力并会在魅影失去意识时同时失去。

Splash of the Styx.name: Splash of the Styx（Splash of the Styx）
Splash of the Styx.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 1
Prerequisite tiefling or Planar Infusion (Abaddon, Abyss, or Hell)
Saving Throw Will negates; SR yes

  You can spend 1 full round to draw upon the waters of the River Styx to erase memories of a target. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆}, except that it can only eliminate memories.

Splitting Mutagen.name: Splitting Mutagen（Splitting Mutagen）
Splitting Mutagen.description:
Once per day while under the effects of his mutagen, the alchemist can split into two identical copies of himself as an immediate action after being damaged by a piercing or slashing weapon. Each copy has an ooze-like complexion, most often manifesting as a slimy sheen to his skin. The alchemist splits his current hit points evenly between the copies. The copies use the same statistics, share the same resources, and have identical equipment (except artifacts, which only one copy has). Similarly, if one of the copies expends a charge or daily use from a magic item that a copy has, the charge or daily use is expended from both copies. If one copy drops or gives away an item, the duplicate item disappears from the other copy as well.

The two copies act independently and each one has a full set of actions. At the end of the alchemist閳ユ獨 next turn, he selects one of the copies, which loses its ooze-like complexion as it becomes the alchemist; the other copy dissolves into a fine mist and dissipates. If one of the copies is destroyed before this happens, the remaining copy immediately becomes the alchemist, and he gains 1 permanent negative level. If both copies are destroyed simultaneously (such as from a @Compendium[pf1.spells.6oq1wcryviik9ice]{火球术}), both copies collapse into formless goo; the alchemist can only be restored to life via @Compendium[pf1.spells.thh46ghi51lrl3cl]{复生术} or similarly powerful magic.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level before he can select this discovery.

Spontaneous Change.name: Spontaneous Change（Spontaneous Change）
Spontaneous Change.description: At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can cast a transmutation spell that affects only you as a swift action, provided that the spell閳ユ獨 normal casting time is 1 round or shorter. The spell lasts for as long as you continue bloodraging, regardless of the spell閳ユ獨 normal duration. You can use this ability only to cast bloodrager spells you know.

Spontaneous Generation.name: Spontaneous Generation（Spontaneous Generation）
Spontaneous Generation.description: At 3rd level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物} as a bonus feat. In addition, when you craft a magic item (except a potion, a spell-trigger item, or a spell-completion item), you may ignore one spell prerequisite without increasing the creation DC. You can ignore an additional spell prerequisite at 9th, 15th, and 20th levels.

Spore Infusion.name: Spore Infusion（Spore Infusion）
Spore Infusion.description:
Element wood; Type substance infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Associated Blasts autumn, spring, summer, verdant, winter, wood
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  Creatures that take piercing or slashing damage from your blast are infected with spores. If a target fails its Fortitude save, it takes 1d6 points of damage per round for 10 rounds as plants and fungi grow out of its body. At the end of that time, the target is exposed to the pulsing puffs disease. This infusion is a disease effect. When using a wood kinetic blast against a creature infected by this infusion, you gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls, to saving throw DCs, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance.

Pulsing Puffs: Blast閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 18; onset 1 minute; frequency 1/day; effect 1d6 Dex damage; cure 2 consecutive saving throws.

Spray Infusion.name: 喷涌（Spray Infusion）
Spray Infusion.description:
元素：水；类别：塑形注能；等级：4；超载：3

  关联念袭类别：带电水，水突

  豁免：反射，通过则减半

  你能够让念袭宛如汹涌的波涛一般喷出。所有30尺锥形区域内的物体和生物都会受到伤害，数值相当于正常念袭伤害的一半。该豁免DC基于敏捷。

Spring Patron.name: Spring Patron（Spring Patron）
Spring Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2jx5vqudbddi0a2w]{Pup Shape}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rauee0gjmvenijmr]{现形术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wp6qm9gnjxoqww4h]{Lightning Arc}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{连环闪电}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f7gaaxcschrg2r0q]{雷暴箭雨}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止}

Spying Touchsight.name: Spying Touchsight（Spying Touchsight）
Spying Touchsight.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0
Prerequisite touchsight

  You attach a sticky strand of invisible aether to a target and then project your senses along the strand, allowing you to spy on that target. Attaching the strand of aether requires a ranged touch attack, but if you activate this ability while your target is under the effect of your touchsight, you can use the strands from your touchsight instead.

  Once you have activated spying touchsight, you can concentrate on it to spy on your target with any of your five senses (though your own body no longer benefits from the senses you project); the strand lasts as long you concentrate, though you can switch which senses you are projecting each round. A creature using see invisibility or a similar effect can notice the trailing strand of aether and follow it back to you.

  A creature can break your spying touchsight by dispelling it, but otherwise, the only way to break the strand is if one of you uses a teleportation effect, moves more than 1 mile from the other, or is completely blocked from the other in all directions (such as if one of you were inside a telekinetic sphere).

Squander.name: Squander（Squander）
Squander.description: At 15th level, you gain the ability to force others to waste the opportunities they are given. Once per day as a standard action, you can cause a target within 30 feet to gain the staggered condition for a number of rounds equal to your sorcerer level. The duration is halved if the target makes a successful Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Cha modifier).

Stag Aspect.name: 牡鹿拟态（Stag Aspect）
Stag Aspect.description:
牡鹿几乎可以在对抗任何敌人时都能跑赢或坚守阵地。这拟态提供了雄伟的优雅及迅捷的速度。

  次级形态：你的基本移动速度获得5尺增强加值。8级起，这个加值提升至10尺。15级起，这个加值提升至20尺。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只大型牡鹿（怪物图鉴4 pg. 150），但是它的占据变为10尺。当处于该形态时，你获得50尺基础速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、1d8伤害的抵撞攻击和2个1d4伤害的蹄踢。8级时，你在跳跃的特技检定获得+4种族加值。15级时，你获得抵撞的精通天生武器攻击专长和可怖殴击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 314, 315），并且你能用可怖殴击对抗体型跟你一样或更小的生物。

Staggering Gaze.name: Staggering Gaze（Staggering Gaze）
Staggering Gaze.description: At 8th level, when a creature is affected by your gaze bloodline power, it is staggered in addition to being slowed.

Stalker Sense.name: 猎手直觉（Stalker Sense）
Stalker Sense.description: 侠客的第六感随时警告他危险的迫近。侠客总是能在突袭轮行动。在6级时，侠客获得直觉闪避能力；在12级时，侠客获得精通直觉闪避能力。只有选择诡秘猎手之道的侠客可以选择本天赋。

Stalker Talent.name: Stalker Talent（Stalker Talent）
Stalker Talent.description: The rogue can select a vigilante talent. For the purposes of selecting and using this talent, she counts as a 10th-level vigilante with the stalker specialization, regardless of her actual rogue level. Her sneak attack counts as a hidden strike with reduced damage for the purpose of determining the effects of her vigilante talent, which means, among other things, that she can閳ユ獩 apply any of the vigilante talents marked with an asterisk (*) to her sneak attacks.

Stampede.name: Stampede（Stampede）
Stampede.description: At 15th level, as a standard action, the cavalier can incite any riderless and nonhostile animals and animal companions within 60 feet of him to stampede. Each affected creature gains a +4 bonus to AC (this bonus stacks with the benefits of the cavalier閳ユ獨 challenge), the trample universal monster rule, and a bonus to damage equal to half the cavalier閳ユ獨 level for 1 round. The save DC against an incited animal閳ユ獨 trample attack is 10 + half the cavalier閳ユ獨 level + his Charisma modifier. Incited creatures attack whatever targets the cavalier directs them to unless commanded otherwise by a bonded master (in the case of a familiar or animal companion).

Starlight Agility.name: Starlight Agility（Starlight Agility）
Starlight Agility.description:
You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避} as a bonus feat.

  At 8th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.9p0aAtCyLdcwnftS]{疾风步} as a bonus feat.

  At 15th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.jbvXxHpu7BVbCpwr]{闪电步} as a bonus feat.

  You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.

Stars Subdomain.name: Stars Subdomain（Stars Subdomain）
Stars Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2nd - @Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹}
  • 7th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 9th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆}

Startling Appearance.name: 惊愕现身（Startling Appearance）
Startling Appearance.description: 在5级时，侠客学会了如何利用他人的惊讶作为自己的优势，他总是能在自己的目标毫无知觉的时候突然冒出来。每当拥有本能力的侠客尝试对一个完全没有意识到他的存在（比如通过隐形效果或是维持潜行）的敌人发动一次攻击时，直到侠客的本回合结束前这个目标都视为对他措手不及（直觉闪避和类似效果仍然能避免该状态，除非侠客的侠客等级比该目标至少高4级）。除此之外，在侠客的下一回合开始前，该对手对他发动的所有攻击也在攻击检定上承受-4减值。

Steadfast Example.name: Steadfast Example（Steadfast Example）
Steadfast Example.description:
The shaman touches a willing creature and bolsters its mental and emotional defenses. The next time the target attempts a Will saving throw, the subject can use the shaman閳ユ獨 Will saving throw bonus instead of his own.

  The shaman can have only one creature under the effect of this hex at a time, and a creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

Steal Voice.name: Steal Voice（Steal Voice）
Steal Voice.description:
The witch can steal the voice of one creature within 30 feet, causing it to lose, for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus, all abilities that rely on speech, including talking, casting spells with verbal components, and using auditory bardic performances. A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. If this hex is used upon a willing target, the duration lasts for a number of hours equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus.

  Additionally, the witch can change her voice to match that of any creature whose voice she has stolen with this hex, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.26g4tysnax570dxo]{Vocal Alteration} (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 248).

Steel Soldier.name: Steel Soldier（Steel Soldier）
Steel Soldier.description:
Some vigilantes ceaselessly tinker with their armor until the two seem inseparable; masked maidens are particularly prone to developing this obsession. The vigilante can spend 1 day and 100 gp per class level modifying a set of armor with which he is proficient. The vigilante can conceal one set of unworn modified armor on his person as though it were an extraordinarily small object, as per Sleight of Hand, and can don modified armor without aid. The armor skin talent also applies to armor with this ability.

  At 8th level, the vigilante treats modified armor閳ユ獨 enhancement bonus (if any) as a weapon enhancement bonus when making attacks with the armor閳ユ獨 gauntlets, if the armor has any.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

Steely Resolve.name: Steely Resolve（Steely Resolve）
Steely Resolve.description: Three times per day, as an immediate action when the vigilante fails a Will saving throw against a mind-affecting effect, the vigilante can delay the effect閳ユ獨 onset for a number of rounds equal to half his vigilante level, after which the vigilante is affected as normal by the entire effect. Rounds spent delaying the effect do not count toward the effect閳ユ獨 duration.

Stem the Flow.name: Stem the Flow（Stem the Flow）
Stem the Flow.description: When making a successful sneak attack against a creature with the ability to channel energy, the rogue may forgo 3d6 points of sneak attack damage to instead prevent the target from channeling energy for a number of rounds equal to half her rogue level.

Sticks and Stones.name: Sticks and Stones（Sticks and Stones）
Sticks and Stones.description: The slayer gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.bZ1YdzkT8NtRIEJ4]{随手武器} as a bonus feat.

Sticky (1 pt).name: Sticky (1 pt)（Sticky (1 pt)）
Sticky (1 pt).description: The eidolon is especially sticky, whether from a coating of adhesive slime, partially congealed blood, or tiny barbed spines. The eidolon gains a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks to initiate or maintain a grapple.

Sting (1 pt).name: Sting (1 pt)（Sting (1 pt)）
Sting (1 pt).description:
An eidolon possesses a long, barbed stinger at the end of its tail, granting it a sting attack. This attack is a primary attack. The sting deals 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge). The eidolon must possess the tail evolution to take this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the tail evolution.

Sting (UC) (1 pt).name: Sting (UC) (1 pt)（Sting (UC) (1 pt)）
Sting (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype; tail evolution.

  The eidolon possesses a long, barbed stinger at the end of its tail, granting it a sting attack. This attack is a primary attack. The sting deals 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of tail evolutions the eidolon possesses.

Stone Resistance.name: Stone Resistance（Stone Resistance）
Stone Resistance.description: At 16th level, you gain acid resistance 10 and are immune to disease, poison, and the sickened and staggered conditions. You also cannot be flanked.

Stone Sculptor.name: 雕石者（Stone Sculptor）
Stone Sculptor.description:
元素：土；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：5；超载：0

  你可以将大地塑造成任意形态，就如同使用塑石术（Stone Shape）法术一般。

Stone Stabilitiy.name: Stone Stabilitiy（Stone Stabilitiy）
Stone Stabilitiy.description:
You receive a +4 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

  At 5th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{精通绊摔} as a bonus feat.

  At 10th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.lNyMFFQaOxxTOW7M]{高等绊摔} as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to gain these feats.

Stony Skin.name: Stony Skin（Stony Skin）
Stony Skin.description: A rogue with this talent gains DR 2/adamantine. A rogue can select this talent up to three times; each additional time the rogue selects this talent, the DR granted by this talent increases by 1.

Storms Patron.name: Storms Patron（Storms Patron）
Storms Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rrheoc0h80mbss7z]{召雷术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dwb03nzhbwb1b5nr]{召唤雷暴}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mkigzpu5hohovgw]{御风而行}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{旋风术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

Strangler.name: Strangler（Strangler）
Strangler.description: A ninja with this trick knows how to use a scarf, usually with a coin or large knot, as a lethal garrote. The ninja takes no penalties when using a scarf as an improvised garrote. In addition, as a free action when attempting a grapple combat maneuver check, the ninja can spend 1 ki point to gain the constrict special attack on that maneuver with damage equal to half the ninja閳ユ獨 sneak attack dice (minimum 1d6).

Strength of Shadows.name: Strength of Shadows（Strength of Shadows）
Strength of Shadows.description:
At 8th level, you gain cold resistance 10. Your melee attacks deal additional cold damage equal to the critical multiplier of the weapon you use.

  At 13th level, your cold resistance increases to 20.

  At 18th level, you become immune to cold damage.

Strike Through Shadow.name: Strike Through Shadow（Strike Through Shadow）
Strike Through Shadow.description:
At 12th level, you can declare a single melee attack as a strike through shadow. This attack moves through its target閳ユ獨 shadow and strikes from below or inside its armor. You make this attack against the target閳ユ獨 touch AC.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus an additional time per day each at 15th and 18th levels.

Strike the Unseen.name: 无形之敌（Strike the Unseen）
Strike the Unseen.description: 侠客获得盲斗作为奖励专长。除此之外，他还可以对拥有全隐蔽的敌人发动暗袭攻击。在11级时，侠客获得精通盲斗作为奖励专长，并且他可以对拥有隐蔽或是全隐蔽的敌人造成任何种类的精准伤害。在16级时，侠客获得高等盲斗作为奖励专长。侠客无需满足任何先决条件即可通过本天赋获得精通盲斗和高等盲斗专长。

Strong Impression.name: Strong Impression（Strong Impression）
Strong Impression.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼} as a bonus feat.

Studied Ally.name: Studied Ally（Studied Ally）
Studied Ally.description:
The slayer can study an ally or friendly creature he can see as a move action. The slayer gains a +1 bonus on checks and attack rolls to use the aid another action to help with that ally閳ユ獨 skill checks, attacks, or AC. This bonus increases at the same rate as a slayer閳ユ獨 studied target bonus.

  At 7th level, a slayer can study an ally as a move or swift action. A slayer閳ユ獨 studied ally counts against the number of studied targets he can have active at once.

Studied Target.name: 杀戮目标（Studied Target）
Studied Target.description:
杀手能以移动动作研究他能看到的一个对手。杀手将对此目标的唬骗、知识、察觉、察言观色和生存技能检定+1，武器攻击和伤害检定+1，并且使杀手职业能力的DC +1。杀手只能同时保持对一个目标的研究；上述加值将持续到对手死亡，或杀手研究另一个目标为止。

  如果杀手对某目标造成了偷袭伤害，他能以直觉动作研究该目标，并获得针对该目标的杀戮目标加值 (包括这次攻击的正常伤害检定)。

  5级、10级、15级和20级时，杀手对研究目标的武器攻击加值、伤害加值、技能加值和DC各+1。此外，杀手在达到上述等级时，分别能够同时研究1个新的目标。杀手能以自由动作放弃针对1个目标的专注，这允许他去研究下一个目标。

  7级时，杀手能以移动动作或迅捷动作来对目标进行研究。

Stunning Appearance.name: 震撼现身（Stunning Appearance）
Stunning Appearance.description: 在17级时，侠客可以在他的对手完全无以行动的间隙突然出现。每当拥有本能力的侠客尝试对一个完全没有意识到他的存在（条件见上惊愕现身）的敌人发动一次成功的攻击时，这个敌人都必须超过的通过一个DC=（10+侠客的等级的一半+他的魅力调整值）的意志检定否则将在侠客的下一回合开始前陷入震慑状态。如果该生物拥有的HD比侠客的等级多，那么他可以在这次检定上获得+4环境加值。一旦某个生物成为了震撼现身的目标（无论侠客的威吓是否成功），他都会免疫同一个侠客的震撼现身能力24小时。本能力的效果与惊愕现身和骇人现身能力的好处叠加。震撼现身是一个影响心灵的恐惧效果。

Stylish Infusion.name: Stylish Infusion（Stylish Infusion）
Stylish Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Prerequisite brawler's flurry or flurry of blows class feature, kinetic fist
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  When you learn this infusion, select an unchained monk style strike. You can use that style strike during a flurry of blows with your infused blast, though you must still follow the limitation of one style strike per flurry of blows (or two if you are a 15th-level unchained monk). If you select flying kick, the distance is equal to your elemental overflow bonus on attack rolls 鑴?10 feet. You can use this infusion only while also using the kinetic fist form infusion.

Special: You can select this infusion multiple times. Each time, you must select a different style strike.

Subjective Truth.name: 主观事实（Subjective Truth）
Subjective Truth.description: 侠客拥有的不同身份允许他对抗侦测谎言的魔法效果。只要侠客所说的内容从他的当前所处的身份视角为真的话，在受到诸如法术辨识谎言（Discern Lies）的侦测时即会显示为真实，他也可以在诸如法术诚实之域（Zone of Truth）之类强迫他说出真相的效果内叙述这些真实的内容。侠客必须达到9级并拥有扮无辜社交天赋才能选择本天赋。

Subordinate Spell.name: 附属法术（Subordinate Spell）
Subordinate Spell.description: 异能者能够一心二用，在施放联结法术的同时对着自身施放较弱的法术。联结法术不得低于5级，而且施放时间不得比1个标准动作更快。由于该能力会影响实际的施法时间，因此异能者无法对瞬发法术（quickened spell）添加附属法术的效果。附属法术的施法时间必须为1个标准动作或者更快，而且它的等级不能高于联结法术的等级-5。附属法术的目标必须是异能者自己（即便该法术在正常情况下能够影响他人或者附属目标也是如此）。异能者必须花费的精神力数量为3 + 附属法术的等级的两倍。附属法术就如同它被正常施放一般生效，而且会用到一个异能者在对应等级上的每日法术位。两个法术的效果是分开的，因此必须分别进行各自的专注检定。

Substantiating Bomb.name: Substantiating Bomb（Substantiating Bomb）
Substantiating Bomb.description:
Your bombs are infused with ectoplasm and a longing for life, lending ethereal creatures a measure of substance. You can throw a bomb that inflicts no damage but instead creates a 10-foot-radius cloud of fog that functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术} and lasts for 1 round per alchemist level. Incorporeal creatures that pass through this cloud become partially solid, taking half damage from nonmagic attacks and full damage from magic weapons, spells, and spell-like abilities. This effect lasts for the duration of the smoke cloud, even if the incorporeal creature moves outside the cloud閳ユ獨 area. A creature affected by the cloud can attempt a Will saving throw to negate the substantiating effects of this bomb.

  An alchemist must be 10th level before selecting this discovery.

Subsumed Spirit.name: Subsumed Spirit（Subsumed Spirit）
Subsumed Spirit.description:
As the alchemist grows in power, his parasitic twin laps up a portion of his soul, like a dog feeding on its master閳ユ獨 scraps. The alchemist閳ユ獨 parasitic twin can now manifest or hide within the alchemist閳ユ獨 torso as a move action. As a standard action, the alchemist can cause his manifested twin to babble, driving listeners insane. All creatures without the insanity special ability that are within 60 feet of the alchemist must succeed at a Will save or be affected by confusion for 1 round per alchemist level. The alchemist can urge his parasitic twin to babble a number of times per day equal to 3 + the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Creatures that successfully save can閳ユ獩 be affected by this effect for 24 hours. The alchemist is immune to its sibling閳ユ獨 babbling. This is a sonic, mind-affecting compulsion effect.

  The alchemist must have the parasitic twin discovery before selecting this discovery.

Subtle Misdirection.name: Subtle Misdirection（Subtle Misdirection）
Subtle Misdirection.description: As a standard action, you can touch a creature or an object that weighs no more than 25 pounds per caster level to impart an illusory ward that lasts for 1 minute. Attacks against a warded creature suffer a 20% miss chance, and the ward ends once it negates an attack. The DC of any caster level check, skill check, or saving throw to detect or determine the properties of a warded item increases by 1, plus 1 for every 5 wizard levels you have. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Succor Final Revelation.name: Succor Final Revelation（Succor Final Revelation）
Succor Final Revelation.description: You become a beacon of aid and assistance to your allies and those you deem worthy of receiving your succoring magical benefits. You can apply any one of the following metamagic feats to any spell you cast that targets one or more of your allies without increasing the level or casting time: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell. You do not need to have these feats to use this ability, and you can use this ability any number of times per day on any spell that can be affected by the listed metamagic feats.

Succor Mystery.name: Succor Mystery（Succor Mystery）
Succor Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the succor mystery adds Handle Animal, Knowledge ：自然, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qc7vnye0x975gxdf]{Shield Of Fortification} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lisojmynoblunlex]{协调行动} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rxenoze8iyh9iyng]{Shield Of Fortification, Greater} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uuzeynxotp9dzu15]{耗费术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cc0or00vpiky87n7]{Spellcrash, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.77bihy40diufd6p1]{抑制法墙} (18th).

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch（Sucker Punch）
Sucker Punch.description:
Whenever the vigilante attacks a foe that is unaware of his presence (or who views him as an ally), and the attack deals nonlethal damage, the attack deals an additional 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. This additional damage increases by 1d6 at each of 6th, 12th, and 18th levels.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

Sudden Attack.name: 瞬袭（Sudden Attack）
Sudden Attack.description: 当你发动整轮攻击时，你可以以自己的最高基本攻击加值额外发动一次攻击。本能力与法术加速术提供的额外攻击次数叠加，但是不与其他通过额外攻击次数的特殊动作叠加，比如疾风连击或法术战斗能力。在双武器战斗时瞬袭正常生效。

Sudden Block.name: 突进格挡（Sudden Block）
Sudden Block.description: 每当一个敌人的攻击即将命中你或一个邻接生物时，你能使用你的灵力奔涌骰增加受害目标的AC，以至于有可能使攻击失手。骰一次灵力奔涌骰，将数值加到防御等级上对抗这次攻击。你不能处于措手不及状态且必须意识到这次攻击才能进行格挡，如果敌人攻击失手，那么你可以有一个即时动作立刻以最高攻击加值对他发动一次攻击。

Sudden Insight.name: 瞬时洞见（Sudden Insight）
Sudden Insight.description: 以一个迅捷动作，你消耗1点心智点预见到瞬间未来。你可以在任一次能力检定、攻击检定或技能检定前自由动作使用获得的预兆，让该次检定获得等于1/2秘学士等级的洞察加值（最低为1）。该预兆每回合只能用一次，且若你未在该回合结束前使用掉，洞察到的预兆就会消失，没有任何效果。

Sudden Speed.name: 瞬时加速（Sudden Speed）
Sudden Speed.description: 以一个迅捷动作，你消耗1点心智点让自己爆发速度。1分钟内，你的陆地移动速度增加30尺。该能力不与其本身叠加。

Sudden Sting.name: Sudden Sting（Sudden Sting）
Sudden Sting.description: At 9th level, when you are able to act in the surprise round, you can take a full round閳ユ獨 worth of actions rather than just a single standard action. You can also cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.3fkwj6d8s65ufwar]{加速毒发} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7e01shgg8c44zfg]{减缓毒发} as spell-like abilities a total of three times per day.

Suffocate.name: 窒息（Suffocate）
Suffocate.description:
元素：以太、气或水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：6；超载：0

  豁免：强韧，通过则部分生效；法术抗力：可

  你让距离自己120尺内的一个生物窒息，这可以是使用以太扼住它的喉咙、利用气流在它周围创造出无法呼吸的空气，或者使用水来灌满它嗓子。若目标需要呼吸，它必须在你维持专注期间屏住呼吸。在该生物的每个回合中，都需要尝试一次强韧豁免才能说话，但是只有在你的专注中断、你离开距离该生物120尺的范围、或者你打破效果线时，该生物才能够呼吸。在启动这个原力时，你能够为了清空目标肺部的空气而承受1点超载。若你这么做，而且目标在第一次强韧豁免中失败的话，它会陷入瘫痪（disabled）、生命值降至0点，而且在它再一次在强韧豁免中失败时，便会陷入昏迷（falls unconscious）、而且生命值降至-1点。

Suffocating Grip, Greater.name: Suffocating Grip, Greater（Suffocating Grip, Greater）
Suffocating Grip, Greater.description:
When the barbarian is using the suffocating grip rage power, the grappled creature cannot hold its breath and immediately begins suffocating.

  A barbarian must be at least 12th level and have the suffocating grip rage power to select this rage power.

Suffocating Grip.name: Suffocating Grip（Suffocating Grip）
Suffocating Grip.description: While raging, when the barbarian successfully maintains a grapple, she can choke her opponent instead of dealing damage to, moving, pinning, or tying up her opponent. The grappled opponent cannot speak or breathe and must hold its breath or begin suffocating. The grappled opponent can take a breath during any round in which the barbarian does not maintain the grapple. Creatures that do not breathe are not affected by this ability.

Summer Patron.name: Summer Patron（Summer Patron）
Summer Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{神莓}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ph3krpxerzptnwbl]{Flaming Sphere, Greater}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯}

Summer's Heat.name: Summer's Heat（Summer's Heat）
Summer's Heat.description:
The witch surrounds her target with oppressive heat, dealing a number of points of nonlethal damage equal to her witch level and causing the target to become fatigued. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to reduce this nonlethal damage by half and negate the fatigued condition.

  Whether or not the target succeeds at this save, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

Summon Monster (UC).name: 召唤怪物(掉链)（Summon Monster (UC)）
Summon Monster (UC).description: 1级起，召唤师能够以类法术能力施放召唤怪物 I（summon monster I），这么做的每日次数为3 + 他的魅力调整值。由于该能力和召唤师召唤幻灵使用了相同的力量。因此召唤师只能在没有召唤自己的幻灵时使用该能力。召唤师能够以标准动作使用该能力，而且召唤出的生物会持续每等级1分钟（以取代每等级1轮）。在3级以及之后的每2个等级，该能力的力量都会增加1个法术等级，这使得召唤师能够召唤更加强大的生物（最高为17级时的召唤怪物 IX）。在19级时，该能力可以作为异界之门（Gate）或召唤怪物 IX（Summon Monster IX）来使用。作为异界之门来使用时，召唤师必须支付任何必要的材料成分。召唤师以此方式在同一时间仅能让一个召唤怪物或异界之门法术生效。若再次使用该能力，那么由此类法术能力而正在生效的召唤怪物或异界之门会立即结束。在判断法术触发（spell trigger）和法术完成型（spell completion）物品时，这些召唤法术被视为包含在召唤师的法术列表内。此外，只要召唤师能够使用该能力来施放造物需要的法术，他就可以花费该能力的使用次数来满足任何由他制作的魔法物品的造物要求。

Summon Nature's Spirits.name: Summon Nature's Spirits（Summon Nature's Spirits）
Summon Nature's Spirits.description:
Once per day, as a standard action, you may cast a summon monster spell of a level up to the highest level you can cast. You may only summon elementals in this manner, but are treated as having the @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤} feat when you do so.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

Sun Stride.name: Sun Stride（Sun Stride）
Sun Stride.description:
You can travel between areas of natural sunlight as if by means of a dimension door spell. This ability does not function in areas of less than bright light, though it does work within the area of a daylight spell.

  At 5th level, you can sun stride up to 40 feet per day; this can be a single stride of 40 feet or four strides of 10 feet each.

  At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the distance you can sun stride doubles (80 feet at 9th level, 160 feet at 13th level, and 32 feet at 17th level). This amount can be split among many strides, but each one, no matter how small, counts as a 10-foot increment.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

Sun Totem, Greater.name: Sun Totem, Greater（Sun Totem, Greater）
Sun Totem, Greater.description:
The barbarian takes on aspects of the sun. She gains fire resistance 20 when raging. While raging, she is surrounded by a halo of flame that deals 1d6 points of fire damage to anyone that hits her with a touch attack or unarmed attack or succeeds at a bull rush, drag, or grapple combat maneuver against her. Her unarmed strikes and attacks with natural weapons deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage.

  A barbarian must have the sun totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

Sun Totem, Lesser.name: Sun Totem, Lesser（Sun Totem, Lesser）
Sun Totem, Lesser.description: The sun閳ユ獨 fire invigorates the barbarian. She is immune to environmental effects from heat and severe heat, and she gains a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves against the effects of extreme heat. In addition, the barbarian gains fire resistance 5 while raging.

Sun Totem.name: Sun Totem（Sun Totem）
Sun Totem.description:
The touch of flame fuels and bolsters the barbarian閳ユ獨 rage. She gains fire resistance 10 when raging. In addition, for 1d6 rounds after coming in direct contact with open flame, her speed increases by 10 feet.

  A barbarian must have the lesser sun totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

Sungazer.name: Sungazer（Sungazer）
Sungazer.description:
You can study the sun and gaze upon any place its light touches. You can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术} as a spell-like ability, but only for visual observation and you can only place your sensor in places currently being touched by sunlight.

  At 10th level, you can instead use @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知} to observe any area touched by sunlight.

  At 15th level, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} instead. You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

  You can sungaze for 1 minute per day per oracle level; the duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

Sunlight Acclimation.name: Sunlight Acclimation（Sunlight Acclimation）
Sunlight Acclimation.description: Time spent in the bright light of day has partially inured the alchemist to its effects. When the alchemist would normally take Constitution damage as a result of vulnerability to sunlight, he can attempt a DC 11 Fortitude saving throw to negate the effects. The DC of this saving throw increases by 1 for each hour after the first spent in sunlight within the last 24 hours.

Sunlight Strike.name: Sunlight Strike（Sunlight Strike）
Sunlight Strike.description: The slayer can reflect sunlight (or other sources of bright light) into the eyes of an adjacent target as a swift action, causing it to gain the dazzled condition for 1 round.

Sunsight.name: Sunsight（Sunsight）
Sunsight.description: At 1st level, you gain low-light vision and cannot be dazzled. If you already have low-light vision, you instead gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against blindness effects.

Supercharge.name: 超聚合（Supercharge）
Supercharge.description: 11级起，当操念使以移动动作念力凝聚时，她可以让单个原力的总超载消耗降低2点而非原本的1点。当操念使以1个整轮动作念力凝聚时，她可以让单个原力的总超载消耗降低3点而非原本的2点。

Superior Automatic Writing.name: 高阶扶乩（Superior Automatic Writing）
Superior Automatic Writing.description: 5级起，当你尝试神秘技能解放（Occult Skill Unlocks）中的扶乩（Automatic Writing）时（详细见本书第五章），你能够将你的异能者等级 + 你的感知加值之和作为你在语言学技能中投入的技能点数。8级起，你会在使用扶乩时获得一个额外选项，可以尝试一次DC35的检定来获得信息，就如同你使用了通神术（Commune）一般，来取代使用占卜术（Augury）或预言术（Divination）。如此使用的通神术不需要材料成分，而且持续时间等同于每个你所具有的异能者等级1轮。你会联系到一个具有大智慧的遥远存在、阿卡西记录的断片（a fragment of the Akashic Record；见本书第六章 244)或者类似的知识堡垒（bastion of knowledge）以取代联系一名神祇。

Superior Psychic Magic (UC) (4 pts).name: Superior Psychic Magic (UC) (4 pts)（Superior Psychic Magic (UC) (4 pts)）
Superior Psychic Magic (UC) (4 pts).description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype; advanced psychic magic evolution; summoner level 11th; Charisma 13.

  The eidolon has 7 points of psychic magic to spend each day. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • confusion, 
  • deeper darkness, 
  • displacement, 
  • jester閳ユ獨 jauntAPG, 
  • id insinuation IIOA, or 
  • mind thrust IIIOA.

  The eidolon can cast that spell as a psychic spell by spending 3 points of psychic energy. The caster level and save DC are the same as for basic psychic magic.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 amount of psychic energy available to spend each day does not stack; it uses only the highest number of points granted by its most powerful psychic magic evolution.

Superior Sniper.name: Superior Sniper（Superior Sniper）
Superior Sniper.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains Expert Sniper (Dirty Tactics Toolbox 10) as a bonus feat. If she already has this feat, she can instead select any feat that lists Expert Sniper as a prerequisite, as long as she meets the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites.

Superior Transformation.name: Superior Transformation（Superior Transformation）
Superior Transformation.description: At 15th level, you become master of your own shape and you fully understand the intricacies of all shapechanging magic. You are immune to polymorph effects unless you are a willing target. Once per day when you cast a polymorph spell on yourself, in addition to the normal effects of the spell, you can choose to gain a fly speed of 60 feet (average maneuverability), a swim speed of 60 feet, or an increase to your base land speed of 30 feet.

Superiority Discipline.name: Superiority Discipline（Superiority Discipline）
Superiority Discipline.description:
You know that you are far better than average creatures of your kind. The more you leverage your psychic talents to prove yourself superior, the more powerful you become.

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ux76jy9wbi88br0]{光荣时刻} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wrh3m8ad4l8sbisc]{Deflect Blame} (4th), 
  • unflappable mien (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qy6sn5a4wrsa36yb]{Majestic Image} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9v2s3xjlakjm1eq1]{法师密室} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9968j68bl9x9iq7u]{克隆术} (self only) (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (18th).

Supernatural Trap.name: Supernatural Trap（Supernatural Trap）
Supernatural Trap.description:
At 8th level, select a supernatural ranger trap (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 64). You can use this trap a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom bonus. The DCs for Perception checks, Disable Device checks, and saving throws against the trap are equal to 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom bonus. The trap lasts for 1 hour or until triggered.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapons power of the Artifice Domain.

Suppress Poison.name: Suppress Poison（Suppress Poison）
Suppress Poison.description: A rogue with this talent can stave off the effects of a poison. As an immediate action when she fails a saving throw against a poison, the rogue can attempt the saving throw a second time. If she succeeds at this second saving throw, the poison does not affect her for a number of rounds equal to her Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round), but this time it counts against the poison閳ユ獨 duration. This talent has no effect on poisons with an onset longer than immediate.

Sure Footing.name: Sure Footing（Sure Footing）
Sure Footing.description: The slayer gains a +5 bonus on Acrobatics checks to move on narrow surfaces and loose or uneven ground.

Sure Soul.name: Sure Soul（Sure Soul）
Sure Soul.description:
Because of your experience with possessing spirits, you gain a +2 insight bonus on saving throws against possession effects such as magic jar, a ghost閳ユ獨 malevolence ability, or domination effects.

  At 7th level, this bonus also applies against death effects and mind-affecting effects.

  At 11th level, the bonus increases to +4.

Sure-Footed.name: 稳步（Sure-Footed）
Sure-Footed.description: 侠客可以以全速移动并进行潜行和特技动作检定而不再这些技能检定上承受减值。在8级时，侠客可以以全速在困难地形中移动。

Surprise Strike.name: 诡击（Surprise Strike）
Surprise Strike.description: 你可以对一个在防御等级上失去敏捷加值的对手在攻击时造成额外伤害。你每拥有3个通灵者等级这个伤害就增加1d6点，本伤害是精准伤害。每天在你第一次攻击一个目标时，他一定对你视为措手不及，即使他拥有可以避免措手不及的能力也是一样。在你的第一次攻击之后，这个生物将免疫因为你的诡击使它措手不及，持续24小时。

Surprising Charge.name: Surprising Charge（Surprising Charge）
Surprising Charge.description:
Once per day, you can move up to your speed as an immediate action.

  You can use this ability one additional time per day at 7th level and 15th level.

Survival Instinct.name: 生存本能（Survival Instinct）
Survival Instinct.description: 通过纯粹的意志力，你在到达极限后还能保持身体运作下去。你在决定死亡的体质属性的负值，以及稳定或恢复意识（regain consciousness）的体质检定中加上你的感知调整值。

Susceptibility (Stare).name: 多情（Susceptibility (Stare)）
Susceptibility (Stare).description: 目标用来对抗唬骗检定的察言观色检定、以及对抗目标时的交涉和威吓检定DC均会受到催眠注视的减值。

Sustained Inspirational Expertise.name: Sustained Inspirational Expertise（Sustained Inspirational Expertise）
Sustained Inspirational Expertise.description:
When granting a bonus to allies via the inspirational expertise investigator talent (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Class Guide 33), the investigator can spend one use of inspiration as a swift action the following round to extend the duration of the granted bonus for 1 additional round. The insight bonus granted decreases by 1 each round this ability is used.

  The investigator must be at least 11th level and have the inspirational expertise talent to select this talent.

Swallow Reversal.name: Swallow Reversal（Swallow Reversal）
Swallow Reversal.description:
This technique, a creation of a legendary Minkaian duelist, mimics the movement of a bird in flight to pierce an opponent’s defenses. As an attack action, the slayer can make a single melee attack against his studied target at his highest base attack bonus. When attempting a swallow reversal, the slayer rolls two attack rolls and uses the highest result. If the attack is a critical threat, the slayer attempts to confirm the critical hit as normal.

  The slayer can use swallow reversal at will, but it can only be used against a given target once per day.

Swallow Whole (3 pts).name: Swallow Whole (3 pts)（Swallow Whole (3 pts)）
Swallow Whole (3 pts).description:
An eidolon gains the swallow whole ability, giving it the ability to consume its foes. If the eidolon begins its turn with a creature grappled using its bite attack (see the grab evolution), it can attempt a combat maneuver check to swallow the creature. The creature can be up to one size category smaller than the eidolon. Swallowed creatures take damage equal to the eidolon's bite damage each round plus 1d6 points of bludgeoning damage. A swallowed creature keeps the grappled condition, but can attempt to cut its way free with a light slashing or piercing weapon. The amount of damage needed to cut free is equal to 1/10 the eidolon's total hit points. The eidolon's AC against these attacks is equal to 10 + 1/2 its natural armor bonus. If a swallowed creature cuts its way out, the eidolon loses this ability until it heals this damage. Alternatively, the swallowed creature can attempt to escape the grapple as normal. Success indicates that it has returned to the eidolon's mouth, where it can attempt to escape or be swallowed again.

  The eidolon must possess the grab evolution, tied to a bite attack, to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

Swallow Whole (UC) (3 pts).name: Swallow Whole (UC) (3 pts)（Swallow Whole (UC) (3 pts)）
Swallow Whole (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th; agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype; grab (bite) evolution.

  The eidolon gains the swallow whole ability, giving it the ability to consume its foes. If the eidolon begins its turn with a creature grappled using its bite attack (see the grab evolution), it can attempt a combat maneuver check to swallow the creature. The creature must be at least one size category smaller than the eidolon. Swallowed creatures take an amount of bludgeoning damage equal to the eidolon閳ユ獨 bite damage each round + 1d6 points of damage. A swallowed creature keeps the grappled condition, but can attempt to cut its way free with a light piercing or slashing weapon. The amount of damage needed to cut free is equal to 1/10 the eidolon閳ユ獨 total hit points. The eidolon閳ユ獨 AC against these attacks is equal to 10 + 1/2 its natural armor bonus. If a swallowed creature cuts its way out, the eidolon loses this ability until it heals this damage.

  Alternatively, the swallowed creature can attempt to escape the grapple as normal. Success indicates that it has returned to the eidolon閳ユ獨 mouth, where it can attempt to escape or can be swallowed again.

Swamp Concoctions.name: Swamp Concoctions（Swamp Concoctions）
Swamp Concoctions.description:
Twice per day as a full-round action, the vigilante can use the environment weapon vigilante talent to improvise an alchemical weapon worth no more than 15 gp per vigilante level. This improvised weapon cannot be sold and must be used within 3 rounds before it becomes inert. The vigilante gains the benefits of the Throw Anything feat for the purpose of these improvised weapons. This ability cannot create improvised weapons that incorporate special materials unless those materials are also present.

  To select this talent, the vigilante must have the environment weapon vigilante feat, and he must have selected jungle, swamp, or water for that talent.

Swamp's Grasp.name: Swamp's Grasp（Swamp's Grasp）
Swamp's Grasp.description:
The witch can cause an area to become an entangling quagmire. One 10-foot square per witch level within 90 feet becomes difficult terrain for a number of rounds equal to 3 + the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier.

  If the witch uses this hex again before the duration of the previous use has expired, the effects of the previous use of this hex end immediately.

Swarming Attack.name: Swarming Attack（Swarming Attack）
Swarming Attack.description: Ratfolk ninjas use their large numbers to overwhelm their enemies with countless attacks. While using the swarming racial trait to share a space with an ally, a ninja with this talent gains a bonus on damage roles equal to the number of sneak attack dice her ally has. For example, a ninja would gain +3 damage if her ally has sneak attack 3d6.

Sweeping Impact.name: Sweeping Impact（Sweeping Impact）
Sweeping Impact.description:
You can shake the earth and buffet foes with the roaring force of wind you draw from the Elemental Plane of Air. When performing a bull rush as part of a charge, if you push the target at least 5 feet, you can attempt a trip combat maneuver against that creature as a free action. You are not tripped if you fail this check by 10 or more.

  At 7th level, you can bull rush or trip creatures two size categories larger than you; for every 4 levels you gain beyond 7th, you can bull rush or trip creatures an additional size category larger.

Sweeping Strike.name: Sweeping Strike（Sweeping Strike）
Sweeping Strike.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩} as a bonus feat.

  At 6th level, he gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.6HSMdwX1VS6nZ6Zf]{大顺势斩} as a bonus feat. He does not need to meet the prerequisites for these feats.

  At 12th level, while using Great Cleave, he no longer has to hit a target in order to make an additional attack against a foe that is adjacent to that target.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

Swift Poisoner.name: Swift Poisoner（Swift Poisoner）
Swift Poisoner.description: A ninja with this trick can apply a dose of poison to a weapon as a swift action.

Swift Tracker (RNG).name: Swift Tracker (RNG)（Swift Tracker (RNG)）
Swift Tracker (RNG).description: Beginning at 8th level, a ranger can move at his normal speed while using Survival to follow tracks without taking the normal –5 penalty. He takes only a –10 penalty (instead of the normal –20) when moving at up to twice normal speed while tracking.

Swift Tracker (ROG).name: Swift Tracker (ROG)（Swift Tracker (ROG)）
Swift Tracker (ROG).description: While following tracks, the rogue can move at her normal speed without penalty while using the Survival skill. In addition, the penalty for moving at up to twice her normal speed while following tracks is reduced to –10.

Swim (1 pt).name: Swim (1 pt)（Swim (1 pt)）
Swim (1 pt).description:
An eidolon gains webbed hands, feet, or powerful flippers, giving it a swim speed equal to its base speed. This evolution does not give the eidolon the ability to breathe underwater.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon's swim speed by 20 feet.

Swim (UC) (1 pt).name: Swim (UC) (1 pt)（Swim (UC) (1 pt)）
Swim (UC) (1 pt).description:
The eidolon gains webbed hands, webbed feet, or powerful flippers, giving it a swim speed equal to its base speed. This evolution does not give the eidolon the ability to breathe underwater.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon閳ユ獨 swim speed by 20 feet.

Swine.name: Swine（Swine）
Swine.description:
The witch can partially transform an enemy into a pig. The effects of the transformation are mostly cosmetic and do not change the creature閳ユ獨 size category or overall shape, but the affected creature takes a 閳? penalty on Will saving throws for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier (Will negates).

  At 8th level, the affected creature閳ユ獨 hands (or paws) turn into hooves, preventing it from using claw attacks or taking any action that would require the creature to use its fingers.

Sworn Oathkeeper.name: Sworn Oathkeeper（Sworn Oathkeeper）
Sworn Oathkeeper.description: At 15th level, the cavalier can formally witness an oath or agreement between two creatures. If either creature breaks or reneges on the agreement and the cavalier becomes aware of this, he gains the bonuses from his seek retribution ability against that creature at all times. This ability ends when the creature fulfills the conditions of the oath or receives just punishment for breaking the oath. The maximum number of witnessed oaths cavalier can have active at a time is equal to his Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

Symbiosis Discipline.name: Symbiosis Discipline（Symbiosis Discipline）
Symbiosis Discipline.description:
Like pollen on the wind or the roots of plants in the ground, your thoughts permeate your surroundings, allowing you to study and manipulate the world around you.

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zkvylzsupqboef0z]{动物无视术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yyzf346hiq8ixt0u]{动物定身术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.io2yjhr42chvcfb4]{支配动物} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{命令植物} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9qiwo9kx8d1hqrn]{启蒙术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed0epy1pofukpgm6]{橡树守卫} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{操控植物} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物} (18th).

Synaptic Infusion.name: Synaptic Infusion（Synaptic Infusion）
Synaptic Infusion.description:
Element air; Type substance infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Associated Blasts electric, charged water, thunderstorm
Saving Throw Will negates

  Your blast sends strange electric signals through the target閳ユ獨 body, scrambling its synapses and causing it to become staggered for 1 round. The target is aware it can choose to take a move action to remove the staggered condition inflicted by this infusion. This infusion is a mind-affecting effect.

Synaptic Shock.name: 思维震撼（Synaptic Shock）
Synaptic Shock.description: 异能者使用残暴的力量影响一名敌人的精神，在联结法术生效前便对敌人造成了精神创伤。在施放影响心灵（mind-affecting）的联结法术时，她能够从精神力池中花费1点精神力从法术的目标中选择一个。若这个目标受到联结法术的影响，那么该目标会在法术持续时间结束后困惑（Confused）1轮；如果法术的持续时间为立即（instantaneous）的话，便会即刻生效。若目标成功通过对抗联结法术的豁免检定，那么它会立即困惑1轮作为替代。异能者每从自己的精神力池中额外花费1点精神力，她就可以让额外一名联结法术的目标陷入困惑。这项精神增幅仅能联结到能够影响多个目标或者影响一片区域的影响心灵法术上。除非联结法术可以影响目标生物，否则该能力对免疫影响心灵效果的生物无效。举例说明，通过双重增幅来同时使用思维震撼和死之意志这两个精神增幅，可以让思维震撼对不死生物生效。

Synergistic Touch.name: Synergistic Touch（Synergistic Touch）
Synergistic Touch.description:
You can touch a creature as a standard action to confer upon it the benefits of any one Teamwork feat that you possess. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Calming Touch power of the Community Domain.

Synergized Energy.name: 能量同调（Synergized Energy）
Synergized Energy.description: 当你使用电池（科技指南 39），发电机，或者是使用在异能科技-异能电池中的能力来为任何科技装备充能的时候，你可以回覆一点精神力池。你每天通过这种方式回覆的精神力池的最大值等于你的感知调整值。

Syringe Stirge.name: Syringe Stirge（Syringe Stirge）
Syringe Stirge.description:
As a full-round action, you can expend two daily uses of bombs to create a syringe stirge, a tiny construct primed with a bomb (if you have multiple types of bombs, you must select which type the syringe stirge carries when created). Undirected, they take no actions except to flock around you in your square and follow you as best they can. They can be attacked normally, but gain cover while occupying your square. As a swift action, you can order one of your syringe stirges to attack an enemy it can see. Once ordered to attack that enemy, the syringe stirge will continue to attack every round, attempting to attach and deliver its payload.

A syringe stirge has all of the statistics of a stirge but lacks the blood drain ability. If it ends its turn attached to an opponent, it injects your bomb into the opponent閳ユ獨 bloodstream, dealing damage as a direct hit plus the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier (as the @Compendium[pf1.feats.gGfXQq0IZrxdcZDx]{随手投掷} feat閳ユ敄his injection is a direct attack and doesn閳ユ獩 deal splash damage. A syringe stirge dies immediately after injecting its bomb. A syringe stirge lasts for 1 minute per alchemist level or until destroyed; if it has not attached to an enemy before the end of its life span it and its bomb payload fall inert. An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

Taboo.name: 禁忌（Taboo）
Taboo.description: 在2级时，通灵者可以在每日执行降灵时选择接受英灵提出的一项禁忌以取悦它们。每一个英灵都有自己所要求的禁忌，GM也可以设计自己的禁忌。如果接受禁忌，通灵者可以每天发动两次灵力奔涌能力而不承受任何共鸣增长。通灵者每次只能选择遵守一项禁忌。不过，通灵者并不会被任何规则限制他去打破禁忌，然而一旦他这么做了，通灵者就会在攻击，伤害，豁免，属性与技能检定上承受-2减值，持续1小时，且英灵对他产生1点共鸣；如果通灵者继续打破禁忌，这些数值惩罚的持续时间会延长，但英灵不会继续对他造成额外共鸣。如果通灵者因为打破禁忌而使得自己与英灵的共鸣达到5点时英灵会抛弃通灵者的身躯，直到他下次降灵以前通灵者将失去英灵之力，英灵提供的加值和灵力奔涌能力。除此之外，这种行为还会损害英灵与通灵者的关系，在接下来的一周内隶属该职阶的英灵不会回应通灵者的召唤。并且下一次通灵者降灵此职阶的英灵时，他承受2点而非1点共鸣。

Tail (1 pt).name: Tail (1 pt)（Tail (1 pt)）
Tail (1 pt).description:
An eidolon grows a long, powerful tail. This grants it a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks made to balance on a surface.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

Tail (UC) (1 pt).name: Tail (UC) (1 pt)（Tail (UC) (1 pt)）
Tail (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  The eidolon grows a long, powerful tail. This grants it a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks to balance on a surface.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

Tail Slap (1 pt).name: Tail Slap (1 pt)（Tail Slap (1 pt)）
Tail Slap (1 pt).description:
An eidolon can use its tail to bash nearby foes, granting it a tail slap attack. This attack is a secondary attack. The tail slap deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). The eidolon must possess the tail evolution to take this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the tail evolution.

Tail Slap (UC) (1 pt).name: Tail Slap (UC) (1 pt)（Tail Slap (UC) (1 pt)）
Tail Slap (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype; tail evolution.

  The eidolon can use its tail to bash nearby foes, granting it a tail slap attack. This attack is a secondary attack. The tail slap deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of tail evolutions the eidolon possesses.

Tail Swipe.name: Tail Swipe（Tail Swipe）
Tail Swipe.description:
You express your wrath through sweeps of a wicked tail. You can grow a scaly tail. This tail can be used only to make attacks of opportunity, but it allows you to make one additional attack of opportunity each round. This tail attack deals an amount of bludgeoning damage equal to 1d8 (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

  At 10th level, you can attempt a free trip combat maneuver check against any creature damaged by your tail attack. This does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

Tainted Infusion.name: Tainted Infusion（Tainted Infusion）
Tainted Infusion.description:
The alchemist can mask murder behind beneficence. When preparing an extract with the infusion discovery, he can lace the extract with one of his bombs as long as the extract has a duration greater than instantaneous. If he chooses, the alchemist can reduce the duration of the extract to 1 round. As soon as the extract閳ユ獨 duration expires, it detonates, dealing 150% of the alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb damage to the drinker. This effect does not produce a splash radius. Producing a tainted extract consumes both an infusion slot and a daily bomb use.

  An alchemist must know both the delayed bomb and infusion discoveries to select this discovery.

Take 'em Alive.name: Take 'em Alive（Take 'em Alive）
Take 'em Alive.description:
The vigilante doesn閳ユ獩 take the usual -4 penalty on attack rolls made to deal nonlethal damage with weapons that normally deal lethal damage. In addition, the vigilante gains a +1 bonus on all attack and damage rolls for attacks that deal only nonlethal damage and have no secondary effects (such as poison).

  This bonus increases by 1 at 5th level and every 3 levels thereafter, to a maximum of +5 at 20th level.

Talons of the Dragon.name: Talons of the Dragon（Talons of the Dragon）
Talons of the Dragon.description:
You fight with the fearsome talons of dragonkind. You can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to perform two claw attacks as a full attack action using your full base attack bonus. Each of these attacks deals an amount of slashing damage equal to 1d4 (1d3 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

  At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR.

  At 7th level, the damage die increases by 1 step, to deal an amount of slashing damage equal to 1d6 (1d4 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

  At 11th level, these claws deal an additional 1d6 points of damage of your chosen energy type on a successful hit.

  You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

Teaching Moment.name: Teaching Moment（Teaching Moment）
Teaching Moment.description:
At 8th level, when you or an ally within 30 feet rolls a natural 1 or a natural 20 on an attack roll, an ability check, a skill check, or a saving throw, as an immediate action you can grant all allies within 30 feet special insights that help them overcome similar challenges. Once during the next minute, each affected creature can choose to roll twice and take the better result before attempting an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 cleric levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Unity power of the Community Domain or the Remote Viewing power of the Knowledge Domain.

Team Player.name: 好队友（Team Player）
Team Player.description: 在5级和13级时，你能够获得一个奖励团队专长（bonus teamwork feat）。

Teamwork Mastery.name: Teamwork Mastery（Teamwork Mastery）
Teamwork Mastery.description:
