Verdant Familiar.description: The witch閳ユ獨 familiar閳ユ獨 creature type changes to plant, gaining all respective plant traits.

Verdant Growth.name: Verdant Growth（Verdant Growth）
Verdant Growth.description: At 1st level, you gain fast healing 1 while bloodraging. Your fast healing increases by 1 at 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter, to a maximum of fast healing 6 at 19th level. If you have a bloodrager class feature that also grants you fast healing (such as the spelleater閳ユ獨 blood of life class feature), you can stack up to half of your fast healing from such abilities with the fast healing gained from this ability, but you cannot do so by an amount that exceeds your Charisma bonus (minimum 0).

Verdant Path.name: Verdant Path（Verdant Path）
Verdant Path.description:
Even the most tangled briars make way for the shaman, and suitable roots and branches appear to support her feet. The shaman gains woodland stride, as per the druid ability of the same name.

  At 8th level, she can use air walk at will whenever she is within 10 feet of a tree, though the effect ends instantly when she moves farther than 10 feet from a tree.

Vermilion Wings.name: Vermilion Wings（Vermilion Wings）
Vermilion Wings.description: At 9th level, you gain the ability to grow a pair of phoenix wings from your back as a standard action. The wings grant you a fly speed of 60 feet with good maneuverability. You can dismiss the wings as a free action.

Versatile Comedy.name: Versatile Comedy（Versatile Comedy）
Versatile Comedy.description: The powers of whimsy infuse your comedy with the ability to awe and befuddle. You can use your total Perform (comedy) bonus in place of your Bluff and Intimidate bonuses.

Versatile Performance (SAM).name: Versatile Performance (SAM)（Versatile Performance (SAM)）
Versatile Performance (SAM).description: At 2nd level, the order of the songbird samurai gains the benefits of the bard閳ユ獨 versatile performance ability with one Perform skill.

Vestige Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Vestige Bloodrager Bloodline（Vestige Bloodrager Bloodline）
Vestige Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
You are the descendant of great heroes from a lost civilization.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.IER2MzJrjSvxMlNS]{高等武器专攻}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.asmQDyDYTtuXg8b4]{高等武器专精}*,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.YLCvMNeAF9V31m1h]{武器专精}*.

  (The bloodrager counts his total bloodrager levels as fighter levels for the purpose of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*]. If he also has levels in fighter, these levels stack.)

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{克敌机先} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{虚假生命} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpwd0f19q1lm04p3]{魅影驹} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.isfcr7k77gppxnwq]{Enlarge Person, Mass} (16th).

Vestige Sorcerer.name: Vestige Sorcerer（Vestige Sorcerer）
Vestige Sorcerer.description:
You trace your ancestry to a bygone civilization and can call upon its forgotten people or places for power.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：历史.

  奖励法术:@Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术} (3rd), @Compendium[pf1.spells.9hi94t05i449j5ul]{Share Memory} (5th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.2dc7e9wby8qpi6m0]{秘法视力} (7th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.pyr472hvqn8c8es2]{Hypercognition} (9th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线} (11th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.f2awecndqcmhavq7]{解析咒文} (13th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (15th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.gw2sgj93dgarpem8]{感知位置} (17th), @Compendium[pf1.spells.vl7yer8k1leyuxld]{预警术} (19th).

  奖励专长： @Compendium[pf1.feats.QvlxYVVsBDlykPKe]{奥术打击}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物}, Echoing Spell, @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：历史), @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell of the divination school, you see into the past. You gain an insight bonus equal to the divination spell閳ユ獨 level on the next Appraise, 工艺：, or 知识skill check you attempt within 24 hours.

Vigilante Specialization.name: 侠客之道（Vigilante Specialization）
Vigilante Specialization.description:
在1级时，侠客需要选择以下一条侠客之道作为自己的方向：复仇骑士（Avenger）或是诡秘猎手（Stalker）。

  选择复仇骑士之道的侠客不使用表：侠客中的基础攻击加值成长，而是使用他的侠客等级作为他的基础攻击加值，另外再加上从其他职业和种族HD中获得的基础攻击加值。

  选择诡秘猎手之道的侠客获得新的职业能力：暗袭（Hidden Strike）。当侠客对一个将他认作盟友或是因为侠客的惊愕现身能力而陷入措手不及状态的敌人发动近战攻击（或是对距离他30尺内的上述目标发动的远程攻击）命中时，额外造成1d8点精准伤害。在3级以及侠客之后每提升2个等级时这个额外伤害再增加1d8点。诡秘猎手也可以对被他夹击或是在防御等级上失去敏捷加值的目标发动暗袭，但这种较弱的暗袭伤害骰降低为d4。诡秘猎手可以对拥有隐蔽（Concealment）的目标发动暗袭（拥有全隐蔽的目标不行）。

  侠客一旦选择了自己的侠客之道即不能改变。侠客之道主要的影响体现在侠客天赋的选择上：某些侠客天赋只有特定的侠客之道的侠客才能选择。除非特别说明，否则诡秘猎手侠客在每次发动暗袭时只能将一个标有*号的侠客天赋应用到他的暗袭效果上，并且这些侠客天赋的效果仅在暗袭是因为因为目标未意识到诡秘猎手的存在（或是将他视为盟友）而触发时才会生效。

Vigilante Talent.name: 侠客天赋（Vigilante Talent）
Vigilante Talent.description:
在2级及之后每提升两个等级时，侠客可以获得一个侠客天赋。除非特别提及，否则侠客的所有侠客天赋只能被选择一次。有一些侠客天赋需要侠客在满足特定的先决条件（比如其他的侠客天赋或是达到一定的侠客等级）的情况下才能选择。侠客天赋一旦选取即无法改变。

  如果侠客在他处于社交身份的时候使用任何一项侠客天赋，他都必须通过一个易容技能检定来对抗所有旁观者的察觉技能检定（不应用无痕伪装的+20环境加值），否则看到侠客使用不符合他身份的能力的人可能会意识到侠客的秘密身份。如果一个侠客天赋要求进行豁免检定，那么再没有其他说明的情况下，它的豁免DC=10+侠客等级的一半+侠客的魅力调整值。

Vigilante's Reflexes.name: Vigilante's Reflexes（Vigilante's Reflexes）
Vigilante's Reflexes.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射} as a bonus feat. If he already has the Combat Reflexes feat, he instead gains another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Combat Reflexes.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the number of additional attacks of opportunity per round the vigilante can make increases by 1, regardless of the vigilante閳ユ獨 Dexterity bonus.

Viper's Breath.name: Viper's Breath（Viper's Breath）
Viper's Breath.description:
While holding a dose of poison in her mouth, the barbarian can exhale a 15-foot cone of inhaled poison. Anyone caught in the spray must succeed at a saving throw against the poison with a DC equal to the poison閳ユ獨 DC 閳?4 or suffer the poison閳ユ獨 effects with an immediate onset.

  A barbarian must have viper閳ユ獨 kiss to select this rage power.

Viper's Kiss.name: Viper's Kiss（Viper's Kiss）
Viper's Kiss.description:
The barbarian can drink 1 dose of an ingested poison as a move action (instead of a standard action) as long as she starts the turn with the poison in her hand. She can hold this dose within her mouth for a number of rounds equal to her Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round) without suffering harmful effects. If the barbarian still holds the poison in her mouth after this time, she consumes the poison. While the dose is held within her mouth, the barbarian閳ユ獨 next successful bite attack applies the effect of the poison with an immediate onset; this consumes the dose.

  A barbarian must have a bite attack (at least when raging, such as that granted by animal fury) to select this rage power.

Viper's Touch.name: Viper's Touch（Viper's Touch）
Viper's Touch.description:
At 12th level, you grow two sets of venomous claws resembling the teeth of a serpent. These claws are primary natural attacks that deal 1d8 points of damage (1d6 if you are Small). The claws also gain the following poison ability: 

  Viper閳ユ獨 Venom: Claw閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + half the bloodrager閳ユ獨 level + the bloodrager閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d3 Str damage; cure 1 save.

Vision Hex.name: Vision Hex（Vision Hex）
Vision Hex.description:
A witch with the vision hex can grant a glimpse of the future to a creature touched. Granting a vision takes 1 minute, during which time the witch and the target must remain in contact with one another. At the end of this time, the subject receives a brief image of the future, usually no more than 1 year from the time of the vision, subject to GM discretion. This is only one possible version of the future, making such visions unreliable at best. Most visions are slanted toward the alignment of the witch that granted them. For example, the visions granted by a chaotic evil witch often show scenes of death and destruction, while those of a neutral good witch tend to be of joyous events or occasions. A creature cannot be subject to another vision until the current vision has either come to pass or been prevented.

  A witch cannot use this ability on herself. Unwilling creatures receive a Will save to negate the vision.

Vision of Blood.name: 血泊幻视（Vision of Blood）
Vision of Blood.description: 当一个敌人被受术者袭击时，它会相信自己遭受的创伤异常严重，由此产生的冲击感会淹没它。当受术者使用一把武器、一个天生武器或者一次徒手打击进行一次攻击并命中时，催眠师能够触发该项诡计。攻击的目标必须尝试一次意志豁免检定，失败则会被震慑（stunned）1轮。若触发诡计的攻击是一次重击（critical hit），目标就无法获得进行豁免检定的机会。

Vision of Iron.name: Vision of Iron（Vision of Iron）
Vision of Iron.description:
You can use any piece of polished metal at least the size of a dagger as a scrying device, as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知}.

  At 15th level, this functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知}.

  You can scry for a number of rounds per day equal to your oracle level; these rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Vision-Clouding Strike.name: Vision-Clouding Strike（Vision-Clouding Strike）
Vision-Clouding Strike.description:
The magus can expend 1 or more points from his arcane pool as a swift action to empower his weapon with shadowy energy that dissipates within 1 minute. A creature struck with the weapon must succeed at a Will save (DC = 1/2 the magus閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier) or treat the magus as being in an area of dim light for 1d4 rounds, plus 1 additional round for each arcane pool point expended. True seeing penetrates this effect, but darkvision and similar darkness-penetrating effects do not.

  The magus must be at least 9th level before selecting this arcana.

Vital Punishment.name: 暴打（Vital Punishment）
Vital Punishment.description: 侠客获得暴击作为奖励专长，并且他无需满足获得暴击专长的先决条件。每轮一次，当侠客发动藉机攻击时他可以宣告他要暴打自己的目标。如果这次攻击命中，侠客就可以应用暴击专长的好处。如果侠客之后获得了精通暴击和高等暴击，那么他也可以将这些专长用来发动暴打。侠客必须达到6级才能选择本天赋。

Voice of Reason.name: Voice of Reason（Voice of Reason）
Voice of Reason.description:
The subject can more easily pierce sight-based illusions with the mesmerist閳ユ獨 aid. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts a saving throw to disbelieve a sight-based illusion effect, but only so long as the mesmerist is not affected by or has disbelieved the illusion himself. The subject receives an insight bonus on her saving throw to disbelieve the illusion equal to the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier.

  This trick cannot be used for illusions that do not allow a saving throw.

Voice of the Wind, Greater.name: Voice of the Wind, Greater（Voice of the Wind, Greater）
Voice of the Wind, Greater.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite voice of the wind

  Your voice of the wind ability gains both power and finesse.

  You can use voice of the wind to create unusual sounds, as ghost sound, to throw your voice, as ventriloquism,and even to alter your voice, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.26g4tysnax570dxo]{Vocal Alteration}. You can send messages at a much greater distance than before and at a faster rate. When using voice of the wind閳ユ獨 whispering wind effect, you can choose to have the wind rise high into the sky, where it can gust at 50 miles per hour before descending to deliver the message. While the gust is still small, abnormal wind that fast is noticeable, unlike the normal gentle zephyr from whispering wind. If you choose to use the faster gust, you can deliver a message as far as 50 miles per kineticist level, instead of 1 mile per kineticist level.

Voice of the Wind.name: 风之声（Voice of The Wind）
Voice of the Wind.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：1；超载：0

  豁免：无；法术抗力：可

  当你低语时，你能够让风携带着你的声音传入120尺内任何你能够看到的人的耳中，就如同它们是你所施放的传讯术（Message）的目标之一一般。此外，你能够把你的声音送到某个特定地点，就如同风讯术（Whispering Wind）一般。

Void Blessing: Airless Touch.name: Void Blessing: Airless Touch（Void Blessing: Airless Touch）
Void Blessing: Airless Touch.description:
At 1st level, with a successful melee touch attack you can steal the breath from an opponent閳ユ獨 lungs, leaving it unable to speak, use breath weapons, cast spells with verbal components, or do anything else requiring breath for 1 round. If the target fails at a Fortitude saving throw, it閳ユ獨 also staggered for 1 round as it catches its breath. If the target was attempting to hold its breath, it can no longer do so: it must breathe on its turn or risk suffocation and unconsciousness.

  Creatures that don閳ユ獩 need to breathe are unaffected.

  Regardless of whether it succeeds at its saving throw, the target is immune to further uses of your airless touch for 24 hours.

Void Blessing: Deny Gravity.name: Void Blessing: Deny Gravity（Void Blessing: Deny Gravity）
Void Blessing: Deny Gravity.description: At 10th level, as a standard action you can touch an ally to allow her to ignore the effects of gravity for 1 minute (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}y). The ally gains a fly speed of 40 feet with average maneuverability. The ally is also immune to dangerous environmental conditions (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6lqt3ju8m7r5la2]{维生气泡}) for 1 minute.

Void Bomb.name: Void Bomb（Void Bomb）
Void Bomb.description:
By combining the spores from strange fungi with slivers from extradimensional voids, some drow alchemists create bombs that cause bursts of gravity capable of crushing those inside. Void bombs deals 1d4 points of bludgeoning damage, plus 1d4 points of bludgeoning damage for every 2 alchemist levels beyond 1st, instead of 1d6. A creature hit by the bomb must succeed at a Reflex save against the bomb閳ユ獨 DC. If it fails, it is knocked prone and can閳ユ獩 get up for 1 round. If it succeeds, all of its movement speeds are reduced to 5 feet for 1 round. Other creatures within 5 feet of the bomb閳ユ獨 target take no damage, but must succeed at a Reflex save against the bomb閳ユ獨 DC or have all their movement speeds reduced to 5 feet for 1 round.

  An alchemist must be 6th level before selecting this discovery.

Void Domain.name: Void Domain（Void Domain）
Void Domain.description:
神授力量: 你可以从翱翔于星界，唤来寒冷的黑暗，穿梭于异界之中，或召唤更为强大的生物。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.plou8h168bfn5hq6]{浮空术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y4b1zmhmsa0gvf06]{Planar Binding, Lesser}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bbmd0fj17jsf5300]{高等异界誓缚}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport}

Void Form.name: Void Form（Void Form）
Void Form.description:
At 6th level, you can become semi-tangible as a standard action. While in this form, you are immune to critical hits and gain a +1 def lection bonus to AC. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Remote Viewing power of the Knowledge Domain.

Void Healer.name: Void Healer（Void Healer）
Void Healer.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 1

  This functions as kinetic healer, except it heals undead (and others healed by negative energy).

Volatile Arrows.name: Volatile Arrows（Volatile Arrows）
Volatile Arrows.description:
A vigilante with this talent gains the ability to attach an alchemist bomb to a ranged attack he makes with a bow or crossbow as part of firing the attack. If the attack hits, it deals an additional amount of damage equal to that of an alchemist bomb, using the vigilante閳ユ獨 level as his alchemist level to determine the bomb閳ユ獨 damage. He can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + his Intelligence modifier.

  The vigilante can takes this talent multiple times. Each time he does, he can use the ability one additional time per day and he gains one alchemist discovery that can modify bombs, treating his vigilante level as his alchemist level for any prerequisites. He can apply these discoveries to his bombs as normal.

Volcano Final Revelation.name: Volcano Final Revelation（Volcano Final Revelation）
Volcano Final Revelation.description: At 20th level, the oracle閳ユ獨 body takes on the consistency of rock, and her touch carries the heat of a volcano. She gains the fire and earth subtypes and becomes vulnerable to cold. Any fire damage she deals ignores the first 10 points of fire resistance, but not fire immunity. The oracle gains a +4 bonus to natural armor. Her attacks with natural weapons, unarmed strikes, and metal-hafted weapons deal an additional 1d6 points of fire damage. Any creature that strikes the oracle with a natural weapon or unarmed strike, or that succeeds at a grapple combat maneuver check against her, takes 1d6 points of fire damage. This damage stacks with other sources of fire damage. You can suppress or reestablish this heat as a standard action.

Volcano Mystery.name: Volcano Mystery（Volcano Mystery）
Volcano Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the volcano mystery adds Climb, Intimidate, Knowledge (geography), and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3b1x69kfhnsa2d54]{灼热金属} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{防护能量伤害} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8qligfr61kotnlwx]{Volcanic Storm} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nll8ip8348eti0ff]{间歇泉} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0cbreqkr1vp7meyi]{游荡烈焰} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9wl8ijy6argdvz5f]{火焰风暴} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h17ad4lpmphnospf]{熔岩墙} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (18th).

Volumizer.name: Volumizer（Volumizer）
Volumizer.description: The alchemist can use an extract slot of any level to create a reactive tablet that purifies water and doubles its volume. This works like purify food and drink for a maximum volume of water equal to 1 gallon for each level the alchemist has 鑴?the level of the extract slot the alchemist used to create the tablet. Additionally, if the alchemist has a receptacle of sufficient volume to gather the water, the tablet doubles the volume of pure water. The water volume increases over the course of 1 minute, but the effect stops before it can create significant water pressure on a container that閳ユ獨 not large enough to hold the entire volume. An unused tablet remains usable until the next time the alchemist recovers extract slots.

Vortex Splash.name: Vortex Splash（Vortex Splash）
Vortex Splash.description: When in rain or waist deep in water, the vigilante can make a whirling splash as a full-round action, allowing him to attempt a single dirty trick combat maneuver or feint against each adjacent foe. The vigilante can make a separate choice for each target.

Vortex fo Flesh.name: Vortex fo Flesh（Vortex fo Flesh）
Vortex fo Flesh.description: At 9th level, you can momentarily change into an amalgam of erratic geometric shapes once per day, lashing out at every creature in a 20-foot-radius spread around you as a standard action. This attack deals 1d6 points of bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage per sorcerer level. If you benefit from a spell or effect that allows you to overcome damage resistance with your natural attacks (such as magic fang), this attack ignores DR of the same type. Those caught in the area can attempt a Reflex saving throw (DC = 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier) for half damage. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

Waking Dream.name: 清醒之梦（Waking Dream）
Waking Dream.description: 13级起，以标准动作，你能够控制30尺内的一名昏睡生物的身体，持续时间为每等级1小时。该能力的功能如同魔魂壶（Magic Jar）一般，不过你的灵魂会直接进入昏睡目标的体内而无需容器，而且目标生物的意识会继续存在于梦境中，不会意识到自己身体的动作。当清醒之梦的效果时间结束或者宿主的身体被摧毁时，只要你自己的身体没有被摧毁，便可以无视宿主和你自己身体之间的距离，立即在自己的体内醒来。每日你能够使用该能力的次数等同于你的魅力加值。不会做梦的生物免疫该效果。

Wall Infusion.name: 筑墙（Wall Infusion）
Wall Infusion.description:
元素：通用；类别：塑形注能；等级：5；超载：3

  关联念袭类别：任意

  豁免：无

  你创造出一堵由翻腾的元素、聚合的碎片或滚动的能量组成的墙壁。墙壁出现在30尺内，有两种规格：一种是至多10尺高、至多120尺长；另一种是至多20尺高、至多60尺长。当你创造墙壁时，所有身处于墙壁所占的某个方格的生物和物体均会无豁免地受到伤害，数值相当于你的念袭伤害的四分之一（对于能量念袭来说是正常伤害的一半）。无论何时，在生物穿过墙壁的时候均会受到伤害，数值相当于你的念袭伤害的一半（对于能量念袭来说是全额伤害）。墙壁并非是完全的实体，但是在对抗来自墙壁另一侧的攻击时，它可以提供掩蔽（cover）。墙壁持续的轮数等同于你的体质调整值或者直至你再次使用筑墙注能为止。

Wall of Power.name: 能量之墙（Wall of Power）
Wall of Power.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点创造出纯净的能量之墙。墙体长度最高每秘学士等级5尺。墙有10尺高1尺厚。它不会妨碍穿行，不阻挡效果线和视觉线，但它会对穿行的单位造成伤害。伤害量为2d6+每秘学士等级1点。你必须在创造墙体时选择酸、寒冷、电击、火焰之一作为伤害类型。墙体必须笔直，并且创造时无法穿过已被生物占据的空间。墙持续时间为每秘学士等级1轮。你必须至少9级才能选择该灵器之力。

War's Memory.name: War's Memory（War's Memory）
War's Memory.description: At 12th level, you can manifest an illusion of an ancestor閳ユ獨 bloody battlefield once per day. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.a2y1yf0a4jy3610w]{幻景}, except it can create only battlefields drawn from a civilization閳ユ獨 past, and the effect ends when your bloodrage ends. The saving throw to disbelieve is equal to 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier. The horrifying scene causes creatures within the area of effect to take a 閳? penalty on saves versus fear effects until they disbelieve the illusion. If a creature fails the Will save to disbelieve the illusion, it gains the shaken condition until your bloodrage ends, or until it leaves the area of effect. This is an illusion (glamer) and fear effect.

Ward Hex.name: Ward Hex（Ward Hex）
Ward Hex.description:
A witch can use this hex to place a protective ward over one creature. The warded creature receives a +2 deflection bonus to AC and a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws. This ward lasts until the warded creature is hit or fails a saving throw. A witch knows when a warded creature is no longer protected. A witch can have only one ward active at a time. If the witch uses this ability again, the previous ward immediately ends.

  A witch cannot use this ability on herself.

  At 8th level and 16th level, the bonuses provided by this ward increase by +1.

Warding Rune.name: Warding Rune（Warding Rune）
Warding Rune.description:
At 6th level, when a creature is damaged by your blast rune, it cannot attack you for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level unless it succeeds at a Will save, as per the spell sanctuary. Using this ability is an immediate action when a creature triggers one of your blast runes. The ability does not prevent you from being attacked or affected by area of effect spells or abilities. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day at 14th level and 20th level.

  This power replaces the Spell Rune power of the Rune Domain.

Warding Talisman.name: 守护之符（Warding Talisman）
Warding Talisman.description: 守护之符驱散有害的效果。每填充入2点心智点，佩戴（或持握，比如铃铛）该灵器的生物豁免检定就获得1点抗力加值，最高加值为1+每4秘学士等级1点。

Wards of the City.name: Wards of the City（Wards of the City）
Wards of the City.description:
The spirit of the city shrouds one creature the shaman touches from the hazards of the slums. The warded creature gains a +5 bonus on saves against disease and poison, and a +25% bonus on percentage chances to negate critical hits and sneak attacks. (This stacks with effects such as fortification, or abilities that grant a creature with no chance to negate critical hits a flat 25% chance.) Each time the ward is used (whether the roll is successful or not), the bonuses are reduced by 1 and 5%, respectively. The ward ends when the bonuses are reduced to 0, when the shaman wards a new creature, or after 24 hours, whichever comes first. At 8th level and 16th level, the ward閳ユ獨 starting bonuses increase by 2 and 10%, respectively.

  A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

Warp Discipline.name: Warp Discipline（Warp Discipline）
Warp Discipline.description:
Ratfolk mythology claims they were appointed by the gods to sniff out the ragged edges of creation. Whether the art of ranatagi descended from this glorious role or formed the source of such myths, this psychic tradition among the ratfolk of Vudra and eastern Casmaron unlocks the psychic potential in trainees, teaching them to sniff out folds and tears in reality. Ancient practitioners of ranatagi even claimed that the art once allowed ratfolk to guide great caravans to the stars.

精神力池属性 魅力

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kdnkszyxk0a7n62w]{Apport Object} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k3zn13pbr5tr9zac]{驱逐术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{高等传送术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ef75tkrzjuotgra2]{次元锁} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport} (18th).

Warp Wood.name: Warp Wood（Warp Wood）
Warp Wood.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You can bend and twist plants and wooden objects. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mt3gozaeg6qqy180]{曲木术}.

Warped Brain.name: 乖戾心智（Warped Brain）
Warped Brain.description: 5级起，你的思维变得难以理解。当其他生物使用影响心灵法术或能力对抗你时，该生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。若失败，它会反胃（nauseated）1轮。即便你自己的豁免成功了（或者由于其他原因而免受法术和能力的影响），该能力也会被触发，不过当你自愿成为法术的受术者时，该能力不会生效。这是个影响心灵（mind-affecting）的效果。

Warpriest Aura.name: Warpriest Aura（Warpriest Aura）
Warpriest Aura.description: A warpriest of a chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity has a particularly powerful aura (as a cleric) corresponding to the deity閳ユ獨 alignment (see detect evil on page 266 of the Core Rulebook for details).

Warrior's Discipline.name: Warrior's Discipline（Warrior's Discipline）
Warrior's Discipline.description: At 1st level, you tap into untold generations of battle experience to control your battle fury. As a swift action, you can halve any morale bonuses gained from bloodrage to be able to use Intelligence- or Charisma-based skills, or any abilities requiring patience or concentration. This effect lasts for 1 round.

Watchful Eye.name: 警戒之眼（Watchful Eye）
Watchful Eye.description: 以一个标准动作，你消耗1点心智点在30尺内创造一个监视5尺方格的隐形监视器。当有任何生物进入该方格时，只要你和监视器处于同一个位面，心中就立刻看到侵入者的影像。该监视器持续时间每秘学士等级10分钟。该影像不会让你从沉眠中醒来，但你在醒来后会立刻得到所有传过来的影像。该监视器可被隐形术或类似魔法效果欺骗。你可以消耗额外的心智点让监视器可观察的方格变大，每额外消耗1点方格边长增大5尺（2点边长10尺，3点边长15尺，等等）。

Water Adaptation.name: Water Adaptation（Water Adaptation）
Water Adaptation.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can turn fresh water into seawater, and vice versa. This can affect a volume of water equal to 2 gallons per kineticist level, allowing sea creatures to survive in water that was fresh and freshwater creatures to survive in water that was briny.

  Additionally, when you alter water閳ユ獨 salinity with this talent, you can adjust the water閳ユ獨 temperature so that a creature can survive in it more easily (or simply be more comfortable). Water altered in this way must be confined within an appropriately sized container; attempts to alter a larger quantity of water fail.

Water Manipulator.name: 控水者（Water Manipulator）
Water Manipulator.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：0

  前置：念力掩体（kinetic cover）

  豁免：无；见后文；法术抗力：否

  你能够操控大量的水。以标准动作，你能够升高或降低水位，就如同使用操纵水位（Control Water）一般，或者你也能够操纵一定量的水移动至法术范围内的不同地点，具体数量相当于操纵水位法术控制水量的千分之一。只要你保持静止并且每轮使用标准动作进行专注以维持效果，水便会维持在你所安置的位置。这个原力能够使得由水构成的生物受到缓慢术（slow）的效果，就好像操纵水位法术所能做到的那样（意志，通过则无效）。当你停止专注时水流会恢复正常，若你承受1点超载，便可以延长效果的持续时间并将水流维持在当前的状况下，延长的时间为你所具有的每个操念使等级10分钟。

Water Sense.name: Water Sense（Water Sense）
Water Sense.description: The barbarian閳ユ獨 senses are no longer fooled by the rippling surface and confounding reflections seen in water that is being used as cover by her foes. While the barbarian is raging and on land, opponents in the water gain only partial cover from her attacks, instead of improved cover. In addition, while on land and targeting an opponent in water, she takes only a 閳? penalty on attacks with ranged weapons (including thrown weapons) for every 5 feet of water they pass through (instead of the usual 閳? penalty for every 5 feet of water).

Water Totem, Greater.name: Water Totem, Greater（Water Totem, Greater）
Water Totem, Greater.description: While raging, the barbarian gains tremorsense to a range of 30 feet while underwater. She can attack and move underwater as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}.

Water Totem.name: Water Totem（Water Totem）
Water Totem.description: While raging, the barbarian can breathe water as well as air.

Waterdancer, Greater.name: Waterdancer, Greater（Waterdancer, Greater）
Waterdancer, Greater.description:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite waterdancer

  You can move across water (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g2obld7y0lpyztes]{水面行走}) at will and breathe underwater, and your slashing and bludgeoning attacks don閳ユ獩 take the usual penalties when you閳ユ獧e underwater.

Waterdancer.name: 水舞者（Waterdancer）
Waterdancer.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：3；超载：0

  你能够呼唤出一股水流，用来提高自身的速度，并且使得你能够熟练的游泳，就如同持续时间无限的水流术（Slipstream；APG）的效果一般。

Watersense, Greater.name: Watersense, Greater（Watersense, Greater）
Watersense, Greater.description:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite watersense

  You project your watersense outward through the tides and water around you, allowing you to spy on others at a distance. You can take 10 minutes to project your senses, choosing a location within 480 feet that is connected to your current location via the same continuous body of water, or you can take 1 hour to attempt to spy on a specific creature within 1 mile per kineticist level that is visible from a location connected to your current location via the same continuous body of water. In the latter case, the creature receives a Will save as per scrying (including bonuses and penalties based on connection and knowledge); a target that saves is immune to your greater watersense for 24 hours. In either case, an extremely thin funnel of water, lasting for 1 minute per kineticist level, carries light and sound to your location, where your target area or location appears in the water next to you and you can view it as if through a scrying sensor, allowing you to both see and hear the area immediately surrounding the other end of the funnel. In the case of a distance greater than 480 feet, the sound comes 1 round later than its corresponding visual information for every mile away you are (for instance, if you were 5 miles away, you would see your target start talking 5 rounds before you heard what it said). When you are tracking a creature, the funnel moves as best it can through the water to follow that creature, up to 150 feet per round, but the target can escape by simply moving away from the water.

  If you also possess the voice of the wind wild talent, you can use its message effect to send your voice through the funnel with a delay of 1 round per mile. This wild talent is a divination and scrying effect.

Watersense.name: 水流感应（Watersense）
Watersense.description:
元素：水；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：4；超载：－

  你获得30尺范围的颤动感知（tremorsense）来侦测与你接触着相同水体的任何事物。当你从这个颤动感知中获益，且使用水突（water blasts）和其他包含水元素的复合念袭对抗被颤动感知侦测到的生物时，这些攻击不会承受来自隐蔽（concealment）或全隐蔽（total concealment）带来的失手率。

Wave of Gloom.name: Wave of Gloom（Wave of Gloom）
Wave of Gloom.description:
At 5th level, by expending 1 use of your despair ability as a standard action, you can project a strong feeling of dejection. All creatures within 30 feet of you must succeed at a Will save or take a penalty on attack rolls, saves against fear effects, and skill checks for 1d4 minutes. The penalty is equal to (but doesn閳ユ獩 stack with) the penalty provided by your despair ability. The DC of the saving throw equals 10 + half your psychic level + your Charisma modifier.

  You閳ユ獧e immune to your own wave of gloom. This is a mind-affecting emotion effect.

Wavedancer.name: Wavedancer（Wavedancer）
Wavedancer.description: At 12th level, your bloodrage directs the flow of water to assist you in battle. While underwater, your reach increases by 5 feet and you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术}.

Waves Spirit Mastery.name: Waves Spirit Mastery（Waves Spirit Mastery）
Waves Spirit Mastery.description: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes a master of cold and water. The shaman gains cold resistance 30. She can also apply any one of the following feats to any cold or water spell she casts without increasing the spell閳ユ獨 level or casting time: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell. She doesn閳ユ獩 need to possess these feats to use this ability.

Weapon Familiarity.name: Weapon Familiarity（Weapon Familiarity）
Weapon Familiarity.description:
The vigilante selects either two simple or martial weapons or one exotic weapon when he gains this talent. He gains proficiency with his chosen weapon or weapons.

  At 8th level, he also gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻} as a bonus feat for his selected weapon or weapons.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

Weapon Training (2 pts).name: Weapon Training (2 pts)（Weapon Training (2 pts)）
Weapon Training (2 pts).description: An eidolon learns to use a weapon, gaining @Compendium[pf1.feats.y3GhqdsCdE9IyYQc]{擅长简易武器} as a bonus feat. If 2 additional evolution points are spent, it gains proficiency with all martial weapons as well.

Weapon Training (ROG).name: 武器训练(盗贼)（Weapon Training (ROG)）
Weapon Training (ROG).description: 选择此天赋的盗贼获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}专长

Weapon Training (UC) (2 pts).name: Weapon Training (UC) (2 pts)（Weapon Training (UC) (2 pts)）
Weapon Training (UC) (2 pts).description:
The eidolon learns to use a weapon, gaining Simple Weapon Proficiency as a bonus feat.

  If 2 additional evolution points are spent, it gains proficiency with all martial weapons as well.

Weather Master.name: 天候之主（Weather Master）
Weather Master.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：8；超载：0

  通过花费10分钟集中精力专注于空气并向着你的周围输送气流，你能够创造出强大的天气效果（weather effects），就如同操控天气（Control Weather）一般。你能够视当前的季节而创造出龙卷风（Tornado）或旋风级别的风力（Hurricane-force winds）。若你有权使用火元素，便可以创造出热天气（hot weather）、热浪（heat wave）、回暖（thaw）或早春（early spring）。若你有权使用水元素，便能够创造出操控天气中列出的所有其他类型的天气。

Weather Sage.name: Weather Sage（Weather Sage）
Weather Sage.description: If she spends 1 point from her arcane reservoir, the arcanist can predict the weather in her current location for the next 24 hours. The arcanist閳ユ獨 prediction is always accurate, but it cannot account for spells or supernatural effects that might alter conditions. In addition, she gains a bonus equal to half her arcanist level on Fortitude saves against severe weather for the next 24 hours. She can share this benefit with a number of allies equal to her Charisma bonus.

Web (3 pts).name: Web (3 pts)（Web (3 pts)）
Web (3 pts).description:
An eidolon gains a pair of spinnerets, giving it the ability to spin webs. The eidolon can use these webs to support itself plus up to one creature of the same size. It can throw webbing as a ranged touch attack up to 8 times per day, entangling a creature up to one size larger than the eidolon. The webbing has a range of 50 feet and a 10-foot range increment. Creatures entangled by the web can escape with an Escape Artist check or a Strength check (at a 閳? penalty). The DC of these checks is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Con modifier. The webs have a Hardness of 0 and a number of hits points equal to the eidolon's total Hit Dice. The eidolon can climb its own webs at its climb speed and can pinpoint any creature touching its webs.

  The eidolon must possess the climb evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

Web (UC) (3 pts).name: Web (UC) (3 pts)（Web (UC) (3 pts)）
Web (UC) (3 pts).description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th; daemon, demon, or protean subtype; climb evolution.

  The eidolon gains a pair of spinnerets, giving it the ability to spin webs. The eidolon can use these webs to support itself plus one creature of up to the same size. It can throw webbing as a ranged touch attack up to eight times per day, entangling a creature up to one size larger than the eidolon. The webbing has a range of 50 feet and a 10-foot range increment. Creatures entangled by the web can escape with a successful Escape Artist check, or with a Strength check at a 閳? penalty. The DC of these checks is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier. The webs have a hardness of 0 and a number of hits points equal to the eidolon閳ユ獨 total Hit Dice.

  The eidolon can climb its own webs at its climb speed and can pinpoint the location of any creature touching its webs.

Webbed Extremities.name: Webbed Extremities（Webbed Extremities）
Webbed Extremities.description: An alchemist with this discovery grows membranes between his fingers and toes, greatly improving his movement underwater. The alchemist gains a +4 alchemical bonus on Swim checks and can take 10 on a Swim check even if distracted or endangered while swimming.

Weighing Infusion.name: Weighing Infusion（Weighing Infusion）
Weighing Infusion.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts gravity, void
Saving Throw Reflex negates

  This infusion functions as entangling infusion, except it entangles and immobilizes a foe by increasing its weight, rather than surrounding it in elemental matter.

Well-Known Expert.name: Well-Known Expert（Well-Known Expert）
Well-Known Expert.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 social identity is known as an expert in numerous fields, including areas and topics the vigilante hasn閳ユ獩 actually taken the time to study. As a result the vigilante is skilled at encouraging others to discover solutions to difficult problems themselves by asking probing questions, while appearing to give the information himself.

In his social identity, the vigilante can take 10 when attempting to aid another on Appraise, Craft, and Knowledge checks. He also gains a bonus equal to half his class level (minimum +1) on Bluff checks to appear knowledgeable in Appraise, Craft (all), and Knowledge (all). If he has the renownUI social talent, he grants a +3 bonus when he successfully aids another on these skill checks, rather than +2.

In his area of renown, the vigilante閳ユ獨 social identity is so trusted as an expert that scholars are inspired to make amazing deductions and intuitive leaps in discussions with him. A creature that has already failed a Knowledge check on a specific subject can attempt one additional check to gain information on the same topic if it receives an aid another bonus from the vigilante when doing so.

Wet Coat.name: Wet Coat（Wet Coat）
Wet Coat.description:
An alchemist with this discovery has conditioned his body so that it never completely dries out when on land. He effectively becomes immune to any detrimental effects of his water dependency. Only an alchemist with the aquatic subtype and the water dependency special quality can select this discovery.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

Whimsical Prank.name: Whimsical Prank（Whimsical Prank）
Whimsical Prank.description: As a standard action, you can call upon fey to play a prank on a creature within 30 feet as a dirty trick combat maneuver. Resolve this attempt as normal, except that it doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity, you use your oracle level in place of your Combat Maneuver Bonus, and you add your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier. No save is allowed against this attempt, but a creature affected by this revelation cannot be the target of this revelation again for 1 day.

Whimsical Step.name: Whimsical Step（Whimsical Step）
Whimsical Step.description:
Once per day as a move action, you can teleport up to 10 feet per oracle level.

  You can use this ability once per day at 7th level and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 7th.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Whimsy Final Revelation.name: Whimsy Final Revelation（Whimsy Final Revelation）
Whimsy Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a fey trickster in the flesh. Your type changes to fey and you gain low-light vision, immunity to poison, and DR 10/ cold iron.

Whimsy Mystery.name: Whimsy Mystery（Whimsy Mystery）
Whimsy Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the whimsy mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Perform, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ofgzglphaotmwnw]{Shamefully Overdressed} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7rx66m98dwo18fy8]{强效幻影} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv17a5jsmapb0wcz]{Entice Fey, Lesser} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{假象术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b9klr16gssc2x0ab]{Entice Fey} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6isran0p5phoru7x]{Entice Fey, Greater} (18th).

Whimsy Subdomain.name: Whimsy Subdomain（Whimsy Subdomain）
Whimsy Subdomain.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pzwe3gxjz8gthyaj]{梦之衣}

Whip Hurricane Infusion.name: Whip Hurricane Infusion（Whip Hurricane Infusion）
Whip Hurricane Infusion.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 6; Burn 4
Prerequisite kinetic blade, kinetic whip, blade whirlwind
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  As blade whirlwind, except it manifests a kinetic whip, and the whip lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until you use any form infusion that creates a blade or whip again, whichever comes first.

Whip of Vengeance.name: Whip of Vengeance（Whip of Vengeance）
Whip of Vengeance.description:
The vigilante gains Whip Mastery as a bonus feat. If he already has the Whip Mastery feat, he can immediately swap it for another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Whip Mastery.

  In addition, if he is at least 6th level, he also gains the Improved Whip Mastery feat. He treats his vigilante level as his vigilante base attack bonus for the purpose of meeting prerequisites of feats and abilities that have Whip Mastery as a prerequisite.

Whisper of Ancients.name: Whisper of Ancients（Whisper of Ancients）
Whisper of Ancients.description:
The psychic can send her consciousness into the Astral Plane for a glimpse of synchronous information. While casting a linked divination spell, the psychic can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to gain a +2 bonus on any associated skill check.

  She can spend 2 points from her phrenic pool to instead gain a +4 bonus.

Whispered Glimpses.name: Whispered Glimpses（Whispered Glimpses）
Whispered Glimpses.description: The whispers of intrigue sing to you with glimpses of insight into others閳?presence and motives, granting you greater awareness than your own senses could manage. You can add your Charisma modifier instead of your Wisdom bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks.

Whispering Leaves.name: Whispering Leaves（Whispering Leaves）
Whispering Leaves.description:
Whenever the shaman is within 10 feet of a tree or undergrowth, she can cast whispering wind as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to her shaman level. The targeted area must also contain trees or undergrowth, which relay the message in a gentle, rustling voice.

  At 8th level, the shaman can also listen to the targeted area as though she were using clairaudience/ clairvoyance for the 1 round during which the hex is delivering the message.

Whispering Shadows.name: Whispering Shadows（Whispering Shadows）
Whispering Shadows.description:
You can darken the shadows around you and cause them to hiss, confounding and distracting your enemies. As an immediate action, you can force a target within 30 feet to reroll a miss chance due to concealment or a saving throw against an illusion or necromancy spell. The target of this ability must keep the result of the second roll, even if it is worse than the original roll. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Darkness power of the Darkness Domain.

Wholeness of Body (UC).name: Wholeness of Body (UC)（Wholeness of Body (UC)）
Wholeness of Body (UC).description: A monk with this ki power can heal his own wounds as a standard action. By spending 2 points from his ki pool, he can heal an amount of damage equal to 1d8 + his monk level.

Wild Arcana.name: 无拘奥法（Wild Arcana）
Wild Arcana.description: 当通灵者做施放一个法术时，他可以借助英灵的力量，以增加1点共鸣为代价施放任意一个在法师/术士列表内的法术，但是他必须付出同环数的法术位来施放这个法术。通灵师无法为无拘奥法的法术添加超魔。

Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth（Wild Growth）
Wild Growth.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You can charge plants with life energy, hindering your enemies or aiding local farmers. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tvhm9lzgnjlcucsn]{植物滋长}.

Wild Magic.name: Wild Magic（Wild Magic）
Wild Magic.description: A rogue with this talent gains the ability to cast a 0-level spell from the druid spell list. This spell can be cast three times per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level. The save DC for this spell is 10 + the rogue閳ユ獨 Wisdom modifier. The rogue must have a Wisdom score of at least 10 to select this talent.

Wild Shape (SHI).name: 自然变身（Wild Shape (SHI)）
Wild Shape (SHI).description:
4级起，变形者获得变身成专攻形态并且再变回来的能力。此能力如同野兽形态II（beast shape II）法术，但有下列几点不同：

  变形者每次只能变身为她的一种拟态的专攻形态。

  通过自然变身转化为专攻形态或变回来是一个不会引起藉机攻击的标准动作。

  通常而言从一种拟态的专攻形态获得的能力远超野兽形态II（beast shape II）法术的正常效果。每个专攻形态都列出了变形者会在相应等级获得的新能力；她获得这些能力以取代野兽形态II（beast shape II）法术的正常效果，但她仍会获得基于体型部分的能力。

  限于只能发出未经训练的普通动物的叫声，变形者在动物形态时失去说话能力，但可以和她对应形态的动物同类交流。此外她可以用非语言的方式和盟友交流。

  变形者每次能使用自然变身的小时数等同“其变形者等级+其感知调整值”。此时间不需要连续，但是必须以1小时为使用单位。对于基于“使用自然变身的次数”的能力中，每个小时视为1次使用次数。

  变形者可以选择需要自然变身作为前提条件的专长和其他能力，并以变形者等级作为有效的德鲁伊等级。

Wild Stride.name: Wild Stride（Wild Stride）
Wild Stride.description: The arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to ignore impediments to her movement and vision in natural growth. For 1 minute per level, the arcanist gains the druid閳ユ獨 woodland stride ability and can see through plant material as if she had greensight with a range of 60 feet.

Wild Talents.name: 原力（Wild Talents）
Wild Talents.description:
操念使能够使用原力——这是一种类似于法术的魔法能力，不过它会汲取操念使体内的精神力，而且可以随意使用（usable at will）。原力通常为类法术能力（spell-like abilities），不过其中也有一部分是超自然能力（supernatural abilities），除非另有说明，使用原力均为标准动作。原力通常具有和元素类别相符的元素描述符或相关叙述，比如以太（aether）、气（air）、土（earth）、火（fire）或水（water）。能够通过多种元素使用的原力（wild talent）在被某种元素所驱动时，会获得相应的元素描述符（elemental descriptor）。例如：由使用地脉念力的操念使（geokineticist）创造的筑墙原力（wall wild talent）会获得土描述符（earth descriptor）。

  每个原力都有有效法术等级。操念使总是可以选择1级原力，但是她的操念使等级必须至少达到原力的有效法术等级的两倍，才可以选择更高等级的原力。操念使在使用念袭和护身原力时，总是将其有效法术环级视为等同于操念使职业等级的一半（最高有效法术环级为9级，在操念使18级时达成）。

  除非另有说明，原力的豁免检定DC等同于10 + 原力的有效法术等级 + 操念使的体质调整值。对于所有和原力相关的专注检定，操念使均使用她的体质调整值进行调整。

  除了从其他职业能力中获取的原力，操念使还可以在2级以及之后的每2个等级时再选择一个新的通用原力（universal wild talents）或者和自身所选元素相符的原力（详见上文中的元素念力）。在6级、10级和16级时，操念使可以用其他等级相同或更低等级的原力替换一个已经拥有的通用原力。她无法将作为其他原力的先决条件的原力替换掉。

Wildfire Blessing: Fiery Wake.name: Wildfire Blessing: Fiery Wake（Wildfire Blessing: Fiery Wake）
Wildfire Blessing: Fiery Wake.description: At 10th level, when you move, you can use a swift action to invoke a blazing blessing on yourself. For the rest of your turn, your movement leaves behind a 10-foot-tall wall of opaque fire in your path. The wall burns for 1 minute. A creature that touches the wall takes 2d6 points of fire damage.

Wildfire Blessing: Leaping Flames.name: Wildfire Blessing: Leaping Flames（Wildfire Blessing: Leaping Flames）
Wildfire Blessing: Leaping Flames.description: You touch an ally to bless it with the speed of a wildfire for 1 minute. The ally gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to its base speed, and the ally gains a +1 dodge bonus to its AC against attacks of opportunity.

Wilds-Attuned.name: Wilds-Attuned（Wilds-Attuned）
Wilds-Attuned.description: The shaman receives @Compendium[pf1.feats.bqoIfsrF8BF1GC28]{动物亲和} as a bonus feat and gains a +4 insight bonus on Knowledge ：自然 checks when in a cold climate.

Will of the Dead.name: 死之意志（Will of the Dead）
Will of the Dead.description: 即便是不死生物（undead creatures），也会受到异能者的影响心灵（mind-affecting）法术影响。异能者能够从精神力池中花费2点精神力，使得联结法术能够克服不死生物对影响心灵效果的免疫能力。该能力甚至可以对无心智（mindless）的不死生物生效，但是它对不属于不死生物的生物没有效果。此项精神增幅仅能联结到具有影响心灵描述符的法术上。

Willful Ignorance.name: Willful Ignorance（Willful Ignorance）
Willful Ignorance.description: The subject gains the ability to tell one undetectable lie. When the subject attempts to lie, the mesmerist can trigger this trick. That particular lie resists truth-detecting magic, and creatures attempting to use such magic must succeed at a caster level check against a DC equal to 15 + the mesmerist閳ユ獨 class level to succeed; failure means the magic doesn閳ユ獩 detect the subject閳ユ獨 lie or force her to speak only the truth.

Wilting Glare.name: Wilting Glare（Wilting Glare）
Wilting Glare.description:
As a standard action, you can leach moisture and vitality from a living, corporeal creature you can see within 30 feet. The target takes an amount of nonlethal damage equal to 1d6 + 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have and becomes fatigued until the beginning of your next turn (Fortitude negates). Plant creatures and those with the aquatic or water subtype take lethal damage from this ability, and they are fatigued for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Sun's Blessing power of the Sun Domain.

Wind Manipulator.name: 控风者（Wind Manipulator）
Wind Manipulator.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Sp）；等级：6；超载：0

  前置：吞噬之风（engulfing winds）

  你能够向着庞大的区域内呼唤出强而有力的风。以标准动作，你能够改变周围的风力，就如同使用操纵风相（Control Winds）一般，不同的是只要你持续花费标准动作来专注该效果的话，风力的改变便会持续下去。若你承受1点超载，则可以让你在无需维持专注的情况下延长效果的持续时间，延长的时间为你所具有的每个操念使等级10分钟。

Windsight, Greater.name: Windsight, Greater（Windsight, Greater）
Windsight, Greater.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite windsight

  You can send a slight breeze in a path up to 480 feet long and then back to where you wait. This allows you to use your windsight wild talent to catch a quick glimpse and hear a tiny snippet from any location that could be reached by the wind traveling that distance (the wind閳ユ獨 path can閳ユ獩 pass through openings smaller than 1 inch in diameter). The breeze travels 100 feet per round, so what you see and hear is delayed by 1 round for every 50 feet of the path. If you spend at least 10 minutes to set up a steady flow of wind, you can concentrate for up to 1 minute per level to gain continuous visual and auditory information for as long as you concentrate, delayed by 1 round for every 100 feet the wind travels (since the steady flow of wind has to travel only one way).

  While there is no invisible sensor to detect with this ability, creatures along the path of the breeze may notice a light wind, though it may not seem out of the ordinary.

Windsight.name: 风之视野（Windsight）
Windsight.description:
元素：气；类别：通用（Su）；等级：3；超载：－

  你能够看透迷雾（mist）或云雾（fog），这也包括云雾术（Fog Cloud）和类似的魔法。在刮着常风（moderate wind）或强风（stronger wind）的区域内，你可以在两类位置上看和听（see and hear），其中之一是你当前所在的位置，另一种是顺着风向延伸一定范围内的位置，这个距离为数值与风速的每小时英里数相同的英尺数*，这可能会让你看到转角或者其他障碍后的位置。

  *注：常风的风速为11-20英里/小时，强风的风速为21-30英里/小时。

Wing Buffet (1 pt).name: Wing Buffet (1 pt)（Wing Buffet (1 pt)）
Wing Buffet (1 pt).description:
An eidolon learns to use its wings to batter foes, granting it two wing buffet attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The wing buffets deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

  The eidolon must possess the flight evolution, with wings, to select this evolution.

Wing Buffet (UC) (1 pt).name: Wing Buffet (UC) (1 pt)（Wing Buffet (UC) (1 pt)）
Wing Buffet (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Flight (wings) evolution.

  The eidolon learns to use its wings to batter foes, granting it two wing buffet attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The wing buffets deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

Wings (ALC).name: 翅膀(炼金术师)（Wings (ALC)）
Wings (ALC).description: 炼金术师身上长出类似蝙蝠、鸟类或昆虫的翅膀。允许他如同“飞行术”一样飞翔，每日可以飞翔的分钟数等同于他的施法者等级。此能力的使用时间不须连续，不过每次使用必须消耗1分钟的使用时间。炼金术师可以多次选择此能力，每次他选择此能力的时候，他可以得到相当于其施法者等级的额外飞行分钟数，此飞行能力是特异能力。炼金术师必须达到6级才能选择此科研发现。

Wings (SHA).name: Wings (SHA)（Wings (SHA)）
Wings (SHA).description:
The shaman can grow a pair of wings for a number of minutes per day equal to her level. These minutes do not need to be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-minute increments. Initially, these wings lack the power to allow the shaman to fly, but the shaman can use them as a secondary natural attack that deals 1d3 points of damage (1d2 for a Small shaman).

  At 3rd level, she can use the wings to safely descend any distance, as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术} spell.

  At 7th level, she can use the wings to fly with poor maneuverability and a fly speed of 30 feet, but the shaman must land at the end of each turn or fall.

  A shaman of 8th level or higher can select the wings hex a second time. This doubles the number of minutes per day the shaman can use her wings (2 minutes per level), and allows her to fly with average maneuverability and a fly speed of 30 feet while the wings are active.

Wings (SOR).name: 龙翼(术士)（Wings (SOR)）
Wings (SOR).description: 在15级时，作为标准动作，你的背上长出龙翼。你获得60尺飞行速度，机动性一般。你能够通过自由动作收起龙翼，使之消失。

Wings of the Dragon.name: Wings of the Dragon（Wings of the Dragon）
Wings of the Dragon.description:
Like the great dragons, you can take to the skies and terrorize opponents from above. As a swift action, you can manifest leathery dragon wings that grant you a fly speed of 60 feet (clumsy maneuverability).

  At 10th level, your maneuverability increases to poor. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

  At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have.

  At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

Winter Final Revelation.name: Winter Final Revelation（Winter Final Revelation）
Winter Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of winter and the North. Your body permanently transforms into living ice, as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.qubzqiz5mqs8tbqr]{Ice Body} spell. In addition, your mastery of winter magic is such that any of your attacks that deal cold damage bypass cold immunity or cold resistance.

Winter Mystery.name: Winter Mystery（Winter Mystery）
Winter Mystery.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the winter mystery adds Intimidate, Knowledge ：自然, Stealth, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境}(2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ue0h9b1fl21m8lzy]{Frost Fall} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qnp4eosajai8s3sf]{雪风暴} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjjy56tcyfq8wa9g]{Icy Prison} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{寒冰锥} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qubzqiz5mqs8tbqr]{Ice Body} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8jq1atxonnerix55]{极冰射线} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ezpm33cvtlq8aswa]{Icy Prison, Mass} (18th).

Wisdom of the Ages.name: Wisdom of the Ages（Wisdom of the Ages）
Wisdom of the Ages.description: The shaman can call upon her ancestors for lore and guidance. She can use her Wisdom modifier instead of her Intelligence modifier on all Intelligence-based skill checks.

Wisdom of the Ancients.name: Wisdom of the Ancients（Wisdom of the Ancients）
Wisdom of the Ancients.description:
Once per day, you can enter a trance in which you commune with the spirits of your ancestors. This trance lasts for 10 minutes, which must be uninterrupted and during which you can take no other actions. When you come out of this trance, you have gained mystical insight into the future.

  At 1st level, this insight acts as an @Compendium[pf1.spells.d1wxnax51cecplm4]{占卜术} spell with 80% effectiveness.

  At 5th level, the insight takes the form of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术} with 90% effectiveness.

  At 8th level, the knowledge you gain is equivalent to a @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术} spell.

  None of these spell effects require material components.

Witch's Bottle.name: Witch's Bottle（Witch's Bottle）
Witch's Bottle.description:
Once per day, the witch can perform a 10-minute ritual to create a potion imbued with the power of one of her hexes. Any creature that consumes this potion is affected by the hex as if cast by its creator. The witch can閳ユ獩 use that hex until the potion is consumed or rendered inert.

  Only hexes that can target a creature other than the witch can be distilled in this way. The potion remains potent until consumed or rendered inert by the witch as a free action.

  A witch must have the cauldron hex to select this hex.

Witch's Bounty.name: Witch's Bounty（Witch's Bounty）
Witch's Bounty.description:
The witch may bless a bush, plant, or tree that is planted in the ground, so that it creates a plentiful harvest. Each day at dawn, this blessed bush grows a number of goodberries equal to twice her witch level. Berries on the tree remain until they are picked, but the tree can never manifest a number of berries greater than twice her level at one time.

  The witch may only have one witch閳ユ獨 bounty active at a time, but can shift her blessing to a new plant with a ritual requiring 1 hour.

Witch's Charge.name: Witch's Charge（Witch's Charge）
Witch's Charge.description: Once per day when preparing spells, a witch can designate a willing creature as her charge. She gains a constant status effect on this creature and can target it with beneficial touch spells from a range of 30 feet. The creature remains her charge until she designates a new one.

Witch's Hut.name: Witch's Hut（Witch's Hut）
Witch's Hut.description:
The witch can animate a hut, small house, covered wagon, tent, or similar construction as an animated object. The hut can be of up to Huge size (approximately 15 feet by 15 feet). The animated hut's hardness increases to 8 and its hit points double. The witch can give the hut the following commands: guard (the hut watches for trespassers within 120 feet using the witch's Perception modifier and screams if it spots any), hide (all entrances are hidden by illusory wall spells and locked with arcane lock), and move (moves at speed 60 on giant bird or bone legs as directed by the witch, even obeying commands such as 閳ユ竾ollow me from 100 feet away閳?.

  The hut remains animate for 24 hours, until she dismisses it or she animates another, at which time the hut stops where it is and reverts to its nonmagical state.

Witch's Patron.name: Witch's Patron（Witch's Patron）
Witch's Patron.description: At 1st level, when a witch gains her familiar, she must also select a patron. This patron is a vague and mysterious force, granting the witch power for reasons that she might not entirely understand. While these forces need not be named, they typically hold influence over one of the following forces. At 2nd level, and every two levels thereafter, a witch閳ユ獨 patron adds new spells to a witch閳ユ獨 list of spells known. These spells are also automatically added to the list of spells stored by the familiar. The spells gained depend upon the patron chosen. Each patron is listed by its theme. Its actual name is up to the GM and the witch to decide.

Withering Nimbus.name: Withering Nimbus（Withering Nimbus）
Withering Nimbus.description:
This ability functions as the nimbus of light domain ability, but it damages plants and creatures with the aquatic or water subtype, not undead.

  This power replaces the Nimbus of Light power of the Sun Domain.

Withering.name: Withering（Withering）
Withering.description:
The witch causes a creature within 30 feet to age rapidly, empowering the witch in the process. The target ages to the next age category (adult to middle-aged, and so on). The witch gains a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d10 + her witch level and a +2 enhancement bonus to either Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution for a number of hours equal to her Intelligence modifier.

  These effects last for a number of hours equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. A creature cannot be aged past venerable age by this hex, and it can attempt a Fortitude save to negate the effect altogether.

  Once a creature has successfully saved against the withering hex, it cannot be affected by it again.

Without a Trace.name: Without a Trace（Without a Trace）
Without a Trace.description: When the rogue successfully uses evasion or improved evasion to avoid taking damage, she can attempt to hide as an immediate action. The rogue attempts a Stealth check with a 閳?0 penalty, but gains a +1 bonus on her check for every die of damage the avoided attack would have dealt. The rogue can attempt this check even while being observed, as long as she has cover or concealment or an ability that allows her to use the Stealth skill while being observed without cover or concealment.

Witness the Legend.name: Witness the Legend（Witness the Legend）
Witness the Legend.description:
At 8th level, as a move action, you can extol the virtues of yourself or an ally within 60 feet that you can see. This causes the target to shed light like a torch for 1 minute, and while the effect lasts, you can expend a daily use of your touch of glory domain ability as an immediate action to add 1d6 to an attack, saving throw, skill check, or ability check attempted by the target; for a roll to confirm a critical hit or save against a fear effect, you instead add 1d12. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Divine Presence power of the Glory Domain.

Wolf Aspect.name: 狼拟态（Wolf Aspect）
Wolf Aspect.description:
狼拟态提供了狼中英豪的感官和攻击能力，它们的本能被磨练来追踪和取下猎物。

  次级形态：你获得10尺灵敏嗅觉，若你已拥有灵敏嗅觉能力，则范围提升10尺。8级时，你的灵敏嗅觉范围或者你的灵敏嗅觉提升范围提升至20尺。15级时，此范围提升至30尺。若目标位于上风处时范围加倍，若目标位于下风处则范围减半。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只凶暴狼（怪物图鉴 pg. 278）。当处于该形态时，你获得50尺基础速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）和1d8伤害的啮咬攻击，并且在发动啮咬攻击时可以尝试进行绊摔。8级时，你的灵敏嗅觉范围提升至40尺并且你在用嗅觉进行追踪的生存检定获得+4种族加值。15级时，你获得啮咬的精通天生武器攻击专长（怪物图鉴 pg. 315）。

Wolverine Aspect.name: 狼獾拟态（Wolverine Aspect）
Wolverine Aspect.description:
这拟态释放了狼獾的残暴凶猛和顽强愤怒。狼獾对战斗的渴望激励着它的生存意志，它可以在战斗中坚持比敌人所预期还要更长的时间。

  次级形态：你每生命骰获得1点额外hp，并在决定你是否因hp伤害而死亡的负体质值上视为比原本的高4点。8级时，你获得顽强作为奖励专长。15级时，在决定你是否因hp伤害而死亡的负体质值上视为比原本的高8点。

  专攻形态：你变身为一只凶暴獾（怪物图鉴 pg. 279）。当处于该形态时，你获得10尺攀爬速度、昏暗视觉、灵敏嗅觉（30尺）、1d6伤害的啮咬攻击和2个1d8伤害的爪击攻击。当处于凶暴獾形态时，你获得野蛮人的狂暴力量，但只能在你受伤后的下一轮激发狂暴。你可以狂暴的每天轮数等同“你的变形者等级”。该能力如同野蛮人的狂暴能力般运作（不同于凶暴獾，你能选择自行结束狂暴）。8级时，你能选择两个野蛮人的狂暴之力，在判断这些狂暴之力的效果和任何先决条件时，将你的变形者等级视为你的野蛮人等级。15级时，你在狂暴结束后不再疲乏。

Wood Healer.name: Wood Healer（Wood Healer）
Wood Healer.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 1
Prerequisite positive blast
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  This functions as kinetic healer, but you must base the amount of healing on your positive blast, not wood blast.

  A phytokineticist with positive blast as her first blast qualifies for the kinetic chirurgeon archetype and gains this utility talent instead of kinetic healer.

  This wild talent counts as kinetic healer for prerequisites for selecting other kineticist wild talents.

Wood Soldiers.name: Wood Soldiers（Wood Soldiers）
Wood Soldiers.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 8; Burn 1

  Your presence animates surrounding plant life and causes it to fight by your side. Each time you recover burn, you automatically use this ability once and ignore the burn cost. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.9fd7mcoint902oyb]{树界降诞}, except you always animate four golems, and the duration lasts until the next time you recover burn.

  If you have spring blast, one of your golems gains a 30-foot fly speed (average maneuverability).

  If you have summer blast, one of your golems is healed by fire damage, is vulnerable to cold, and deals 1d6 extra points of fire damage on slam attacks and when splintering.

  If you have autumn blast, one of your golems gains a 20-foot burrow speed.

  If you have winter blast, one of your golems deals 1d6 extra points of cold damage on its slam attacks and when splintering. Each of the above modifications must apply to a different golem.

Wood Spirit Manifestation.name: Wood Spirit Manifestation（Wood Spirit Manifestation）
Wood Spirit Manifestation.description:
Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes a living creature of wood. She is forevermore treated as a plant creature rather than her original creature type for the purposes of spells and magical effects. Her skin takes on the appearance of polished wood grain, and she gains a +4 natural armor bonus to her Armor Class and damage reduction 10/閳?against wooden weapons and the natural attacks of wooden and wood-like creatures. She gains immunity to paralysis, poison, polymorph, sleep, and stun.

  At will, the shaman can meld with any tree or single block of wood (as per meld into stone, except she can meld only with wood and has no limit on how long she can remain in the wood).

Wood Spirit.name: Wood Spirit（Wood Spirit）
Wood Spirit.description:
A shaman who selects the wood spirit has a skin tone similar to the coloration of trees in her home region. Her vibrant hair is fragrant and resembles leaves and blossoms.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v05u8sl116ab2n9c]{橡棍术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{树肤术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{次级造物术} (wood items only) (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.818uuekrao87o57u]{荆刺之躯} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmacjpo6tgm1xhnv]{金刚木} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3fravqa4vrm4ygkr]{化铁为木} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cp5m19me647dojha]{化棍法} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9fd7mcoint902oyb]{树界降诞} (9th)

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal looks like a wooden figurine or a vaguely animal-shaped tree branch when it is motionless. The animal gains freeze as per the universal monster rule (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 297).

Wooden Flesh.name: Wooden Flesh（Wooden Flesh）
Wooden Flesh.description: The arcanist infuses herself with the toughness of the plant life that she studies. The arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to gain a +2 natural armor bonus and DR/slashing equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1) for 1 minute per arcanist level. While this ability is in effect, she counts as both her original creature type and a plant creature for the purpose of abilities and spells.

Woodland Caprice.name: Woodland Caprice（Woodland Caprice）
Woodland Caprice.description:
Your fey powers allow you to move easily through woodland environments. You gain woodland stride, as per the druid ability.

  At 7th level, you also gain the trackless step druid class feature and can similarly conceal the tracks of any allies within 30 feet that you choose.

Woodland Step, Greater.name: Woodland Step, Greater（Woodland Step, Greater）
Woodland Step, Greater.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite woodland step

  The plants actively assist you and nearby allies. You and all allies within 30 feet benefit as per forest friend.

Woodland Step.name: Woodland Step（Woodland Step）
Woodland Step.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  You gain @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.5iXq1igb1Cq0qobT]{Woodland Stride}, as per the druid ability. Due to your ability to manipulate plants, you can attempt a caster level check (DC = 11 + the spell閳ユ獨 caster level) as a standard action to also ignore magically manipulated plants (but not creatures of the plant type).

Woodlands Patron.name: Woodlands Patron（Woodlands Patron）
Woodlands Patron.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3fkwj6d8s65ufwar]{加速毒发}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7jqqoorcwq9ro81m]{步步生莲}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0sssdtv0tkbns2r3]{喘息之林}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ipc85wy0f0lmr0l4]{驱离木材}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qt0xmkag6ahtvesm]{活化植物}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{操控植物}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bp4s030vn5iwwf58]{蔓生术}

World Serpent Unity.name: World Serpent Unity（World Serpent Unity）
World Serpent Unity.description:
While raging, the barbarian doubles her fast movement bonus to land speed and cannot be knocked prone. She also doubles her world serpent totem insight bonus to AC against attack rolls made by an outsider or aberration to confirm a critical hit against her.

  A barbarian must have the world serpent totem and world serpent totem spirit rage powers and be at least 10th level before selecting this rage power.

Wrecking Mysticism Curse.name: Wrecking Mysticism Curse（Wrecking Mysticism Curse）
Wrecking Mysticism Curse.description:
A divine entity has blessed you with a source of eldritch power that erodes your fortitude, increasing by 50% the duration of any poison, sickened condition, or nauseated condition affecting you. Whenever you would gain a mystery spell, you can gain Magical Tail (Advanced Race Guide 193) as a bonus feat instead. Once this choice has been made, it cannot be changed. You cannot replace a bonus spell granted to you by an oracle archetype with Magical Tail, even if it replaces a mystery spell.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.0onqjy8gfgop1xsi]{腹语术} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.8ai7fslz4zu8xe9s]{魔魂壶} to your list of spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} to your list of spells known.

Ymeri's Pyre.name: Ymeri's Pyre（Ymeri's Pyre）
Ymeri's Pyre.description: The barbarian visibly burns with an inner flame that consumes all impurities affecting her. Each round that the barbarian rages reduces the duration of negative spells and effects inflicted upon her as if 2 rounds had passed; this has no effect on the duration of such effects against other creatures. Once per day, the barbarian can expend 5 rounds of rage to attempt a new saving throw against each nonpermanent effect currently affecting her. Each successful saving throw ends the related effect, and she can choose not to make a save against an effect.

Zephyr Blow (UC).name: Zephyr Blow (UC)（Zephyr Blow (UC)）
Zephyr Blow (UC).description: By spending 1 ki point as a standard action, a monk with this power can disrupt the wind and create a sharp blast of air, as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.cnuin981hdq7ryit]{造风术}. The monk閳ユ獨 caster level for this effect is equal to his monk level.

Knock-Out Blow.name: 一击倒地（Knock-Out Blow）
Knock-Out Blow.description: 每日1次，盗贼可以选择放弃她的偷袭伤害而将对手击倒在地。她必须在攻击之前使用这一天赋。如果攻击命中，那么取代造成偷袭伤害（同时也不造成任何其他偷袭带来的负面效果)，对手被击倒在地并昏迷1d4轮。一个成功的强韧检定可以将效果降至恍惚1轮，DC为“10+1/2盗贼等级+智力修正”。

Knockback (UC).name: 一击即飞（Knockback (UC)）
Knockback (UC).description: 每回合1次，野蛮人可以尝试冲撞一个目标来取代一次近战攻击。该次冲撞战技使用完整的CMB而不是被取代的攻击的。如果成功，目标承受等同于野蛮人力量修正的伤害，且如常地向后移动。野蛮人无须跟着目标移动。此动作不会引发藉机攻击。

Assassinate.name: 一击瞬杀（Assassinate）
Assassinate.description: 拥有此高等天赋的杀手可以直接解决无法保护自己的敌人。为暗杀对手，杀手必须先以标准动作研究对像1轮。接下来的1轮中，若杀手发动偷袭且对方的AC失去敏捷加值，则此次偷袭具有可能秒杀对方的额外效果。这种尝试在对方能意识到杀手是敌对者时自动失败。若偷袭成功，对方必须通过DC为 {10+1/2杀手等级+杀手智力修正} 的强韧豁免。如果豁免失败则即死；若成功则受到正常的偷袭伤害，且在24小时内免疫该杀手的一击瞬杀能力。

Act as One.name: 一心同体（Act as One）
Act as One.description: 15级时，骑将可以以一个标准动作来以其标准速度移动并做出一次近战攻击。30尺内的所有同伴也可以以直觉动作进行一次移动和攻击。如果地形符合，移动和攻击可以以冲锋的形式做出。所有这样的攻击都有+2加值（与冲锋带来的加值叠加），并且所有参与者的AC获得+2闪避加值，持续一轮。骑将每次战斗可使用此能力1次。

Jack of All Trades.name: 万事通（Jack of All Trades）
Jack of All Trades.description: 10级或以上的吟游诗人能够使用任何技能，包括正常需要训练但他未曾受训的技能在内。16级或以上的诗人将所有技能看作本职技能。19级或以上的诗人可以在任何情况下为技能检定取10，哪怕正常来说这样做是不被允许的。

Certainty (UC).name: 万无一失（Certainty (UC)）
Certainty (UC).description: 盗贼从她的盗贼绝艺（Rogue's Edge）能力选取的技能中选取一项。每日1次，盗贼在使用上述选择的技能时，可以在刚做出的技能检定之后进行重掷，并取较好的结果。在10级以及之后的每5个等级，她每日重掷该项技能的次数会额外增加1次。盗贼可以多次选择该项盗贼天赋。每次选取这项天赋时，盗贼都必须选取不同的技能。盗贼必须具有盗贼绝艺职业能力时才能选取这项盗贼天赋。

Honor in All Things.name: 万物荣耀（Honor in All Things）
Honor in All Things.description: 2级时，勇武道的武士从他的荣誉感中提取力量。每当武士进行一次技能或豁免检定时，他可以用一个自由动作唤起荣耀的力量，来令自己的检定获得+4士气加值。他在2级时可以每日使用本能力1次，之后每提升4级再加1次每日可用次数，并在18级时达到每日5次的上限。

Multitalented, Greater (UC).name: 万金油（Multitalented, Greater (UC)）
Multitalented, Greater (UC).description: 具有该天赋的盗贼能够使用多面手天赋来让高等天赋获得额外的使用次数。盗贼必须具有多面手（Multitalented）盗贼天赋才能选取这个高等天赋。

Third Judgment.name: 三重审判（Third Judgment）
Third Judgment.description: 在16级时，当审判者使用她的【审判】能力，她可以选择三种不同的审判而不是两种。这个能力只会消耗1次每日使用次数。以一个迅捷动作，她可以改变其中一个审判。

Tireless Rage (UC).name: 不倦狂暴（Tireless Rage (UC)）
Tireless Rage (UC).description: 17级起，野蛮人在狂暴结束后不再疲乏。如果她在1分钟内再次进入狂暴，她还是不会获得临时生命值。

Tireless Rage.name: 不倦狂暴（Tireless Rage）
Tireless Rage.description: 17级起，野蛮人在狂暴结束后不再疲乏。

Tireless Bloodrage.name: 不倦血怒（Tireless Bloodrage）
Tireless Bloodrage.description: 17级起，血脉狂怒者不会在结束血怒后陷入疲乏（fatigued）。

Unravel Animation.name: 不可复生（Unravel Animation）
Unravel Animation.description: 在8级时，如果你的破敌职业能力启动时选择的破敌对象是不死生物，那么你可以选择使你的武器不获得破敌，而是获得瓦解特殊附魔，并且不死生物抵抗它的豁免DC提升到10+你的审判者等级的一半+你的感知调整值。

Unwitting Ally.name: 不存在的盟友（Unwitting Ally）
Unwitting Ally.description: 具有该天赋的盗贼能够以迅捷动作进行一次尝试，使得一个敌人在判断是否能够提供夹击时，就如同是自己的盟友一般，持续至盗贼的下个回合开始为止。这名敌人必须能够听到和看到盗贼，而且盗贼必须成功使用一次唬骗检定对抗敌人的察言观色检定。若检定成功，在判断是否提供夹击时，该名敌人就如同是盟友一般。无论检定是否成功，盗贼在接下来的24小时内都无法对相同的敌人再次使用这个盗贼天赋。若盗贼在检定中失败5点或更多的话，她在接下来的24小时内都无法对任何检定失败时与她具有视觉线（line of sight）的敌人使用化敌为友盗贼天赋。

Indomitable Will.name: 不屈意志（Indomitable Will）
Indomitable Will.description: 14级起，当血脉狂怒者处于血怒时，就会在对抗附魔法术（enchantment spells）的意志豁免中获得+4加值。这个加值与所有其他调整值叠加，包括血脉狂怒者在血怒时意志豁免检定获得的士气加值。

Flesh Wound.name: 不屈武勇（Flesh Wound）
Flesh Wound.description: 野蛮人可以尽量避免造成严重损害的攻击。野蛮人必须通过DC等于此次攻击伤害值的强韧检定——该豁免检定受防具减值影响，如果豁免成功，这次攻击对野蛮人造成一半致命伤害和一半非致命伤害。野蛮人必须在攻击命中后、伤害检定前决定是否使用此能力。野蛮人必须至少10级选择才能这个狂暴之力。这项能力每次狂暴只能使用1次。

Immortal Legend.name: 不朽传奇（Immortal Legend）
Immortal Legend.description: 20级起，你停止衰老；不再需要吃、喝或者睡眠；并且对即死效果和能量吸取免疫。

Fast Healing.name: 不朽肉体（Fast Healing）
Fast Healing.description: 炼金术师血肉之躯的伤害能以肉眼可见的速度回复。他获得5点快速医疗。

Undead Servitude.name: 不死奴役（Undead Servitude）
Undead Servitude.description: 你获得“命令亡灵”作为奖励专长。你每天可以引导负能量的次数等于“3+魅力修正”，但只能用于命令不死生物。你能够选择其他专长来增强这项能力，比如“精通导能”。但是不能用专长来改变这项能力，比如“阵营导能”。对抗此专长的DC为“10+1/2先知等级+魅力修正值”。

Undead Subschool.name: 不死学派（Undead Subschool）
Undead Subschool.description:
相关学派： 死灵学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代死灵学派的墓穴之触能力。

Evil Blessing: Unholy Strike.name: 不洁打击（Evil Blessing: Unholy Strike）
Evil Blessing: Unholy Strike.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以通过触摸一件近战武器给予其混乱祝福。在1分钟内，这件武器会变成黑色、橙色或蓝紫色，并对善良阵营的生物造成1D6额外伤害，在克服伤害减免时视为邪恶阵营。这个额外伤害不与邪恶（Unholy）武器特性叠加。

Unstable Bonds.name: 不稳连结（Unstable Bonds）
Unstable Bonds.description: 从1级开始，你的触碰可以扰乱受召唤或呼唤生物在这个位面的连结。以一个近战接触攻击，你可以让受召唤或呼唤的生物变的战栗和缓慢，持续轮数为你的法师等级的一半（最少1轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

Timeless Body.name: 不老身躯（Timeless Body）
Timeless Body.description: 15级起，德鲁伊不会因为年老而造成属性减值，也不会因魔法效果而老化。但之前的属性减值仍然存在。属性加值仍可累计，且德鲁伊也仍会因命尽而死去。

Victory or Death.name: 不胜则亡（Victory or Death）
Victory or Death.description: 20级起，你免疫麻痹（paralysis）、石化（petrification）、震慑（stunned）、晕眩（dazed）和恍惚（staggered）状态。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些优势。

Speak with Master.name: 与主人交谈（Speak with Master）
Speak with Master.description: 11级起，猎人和她的动物伙伴能够使用语言交流，就如同使用通用语（common）一般。其他生物如果没有魔法辅助的话，就无法理解沟通的内容。

Locate Focus.name: 专注定位（Locate Focus）
Locate Focus.description: 在8级时，每天一次你可以以类法术能力的形式使用法术生物定位术（Locate Creature）或是物品定位术（Locate Object），但必须以你专注搜寻的目标为法术目标。本能力的有效范围为你的每审判者等级1英里。

Focused Search.name: 专注搜寻（Focused Search）
Focused Search.description: 每天一次，你可以将一件物品或一个人设计为你专注搜寻的目标。你需要专注1分钟时间来进行设计，在此期间，你需要专注观察该人或物的图形，又或是静静思考该人或物的形象（如果你没有它的具体图形）。在你设计另一个专注搜寻的目标前，你可以在使用察觉技能寻找搜寻的物品或是以生存技能追踪搜寻的人的技能检定上获得相当于你的审判者等级一半的加值。本能力提供的加值和审判者的追踪职业能力叠加。

Focus Weapon.name: 专注武器（Focus Weapon）
Focus Weapon.description: 在1级时，战斗战斗祭司获得武器专攻作为奖励专长（可以是任何武器，而非限定于神祇的偏好武器）。

Focused Trance.name: 专注聚焦（Focused Trance）
Focused Trance.description: 你进入深沉的冥想，阻断视觉和听觉的刺激，让自己可以专注在单一的麻烦，哲学问题或是记忆之上。这最少得花费1d6轮的时间，在这段时间里面，你只能做一个移动动作。在这段时间里面，你对声波或凝视攻击的豁免检定得到相当于你先知等级的加值。当你结束冥想，你可以在一个基于智力的检定上得到+20环境加值。你一天能进入冥想状态的次数相当于你的魅力修正。

Feat (UC).name: 专长（Feat (UC)）
Feat (UC).description: 盗贼能够获得任何有资格选取的专长以取代一个盗贼天赋。

Feat.name: 专长（Feat）
Feat.description: 盗贼可以选择任何满足先决条件的专长来替代盗贼天赋。

World Serpent Totem.name: 世界之蛇图腾（World Serpent Totem）
World Serpent Totem.description: 当狂暴时，野蛮人对异界生物和异怪的AC得到+1洞察加值，他每得到一个世界之蛇图腾系列的狂暴之力，此加值会再上升1，包括此狂暴之力。

World Serpent Spirit.name: 世界之蛇圣灵（World Serpent Spirit）
World Serpent Spirit.description: 只要处在狂暴状态，野蛮人就可以在克服伤害减免时将他的武器视为善良、秩序、混乱、邪恶武器。且他对于来自异界生物、异怪或含有阵营成分的法术的豁免上得到+1抗力加值，每获得一个世界之蛇图腾系列的狂暴之力此加值会再上升1，包含此狂暴之力。要学习世界之蛇圣灵，野蛮人必须要拥有“世界之蛇图腾”且达到6级。

Order of the Eastern Star.name: 东晨骑士团（Order of the Eastern Star）
Order of the Eastern Star.description:
该团的骑士致力于在芸芸众生的注意力之外隐藏异界的危险知识，在暗影中地与常人难以想像的超自然威胁作斗争。东辰骑士是绝对的现实主义者而非道学家，除了例行的监控和探查以外，他们会使用各种秘密手段维护人类社会的稳定和存续。

守则： 我团骑士需避世隐身，以此作为骑士团与超自然的敌对力量长久作战的优先战略。他必须奋起对抗来自常识之外的恐怖存在，保护无辜而无知的平民百姓，并在第一时间向骑士团报告任何异常威胁的苗头。

挑战： 当东辰团的骑士发动挑战时，骑士会在对抗他目标的攻击和能力时，在防御等级上获得+1闪避加值，在豁免检定上获得+1洞察加值，但他必须着轻甲且不能负重超过轻度负重才能获得本加值。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 东辰团的骑士可以将知识（神秘）和知识（位面）技能加入本职技能列表，并且他可以在未受训的情况下进行这两项知识技能检定。除此之外，如果东辰骑士团的骑士在在知识（神秘）和知识（位面）技能上已受训，那么他在使用这两个技能探知关于神秘与超自然存在的技能检定上获得相当于他的骑士等级一半（至少为+1）的加值。

  专长: 东辰骑士团的骑士获得异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）作为奖励专长。

Stern Gaze.name: 严苛凝视（Stern Gaze）
Stern Gaze.description: 审判者擅长于察觉她们敌人的诡计并威吓他们。审判者在所有威吓及察言观色上得到审判者等级一半（最少+1）的士气加值。

Medium Armor.name: 中甲擅长（Medium Armor）
Medium Armor.description: 7级时，魔战士开始擅长中甲。魔战士可以穿着中甲施展魔战士法术而忽视正常的奥术失败率。但穿着重甲或使用盾牌的魔战士则和其他奥术施法者一样，在施放包含姿势成分的法术时遭受奥术失败率。

Elemental Rage.name: 中级元素之怒（Elemental Rage）
Elemental Rage.description: 狂暴时野蛮人近战攻击额外造成1d6点能量伤害（强酸、寒冷、电击或火焰），能量类型在野蛮人进入狂暴时决定。野蛮人必须习得“次级元素之怒”且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。请注意，野蛮人仍然可以使用他的【次级元素之怒】，但他必须选择不同的能量类型。

Fiend Totem.name: 中级恶魔图腾（Fiend Totem）
Fiend Totem.description: 狂暴时，数十根邪恶的倒钩从野蛮人的身体窜出。任何对野蛮人使用近战武器、天生武器或徒手攻击的生物会受到1d6点穿刺伤害。野蛮人必须习得【次级恶魔图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Hurling.name: 中级投掷（Hurling）
Hurling.description: 同【次级投掷】，但野蛮人可以使射程增量提高至20尺，或增加一级投掷物体的大小。野蛮人必须习得【次级投掷】且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Chaos Totem.name: 中级混沌图腾（Chaos Totem）
Chaos Totem.description: 狂暴时野蛮人的身影充满了混沌力量。他的脱逃技能检定+4，并有25%的机率免除重击和偷袭的额外伤害。野蛮人必须习得【次级混沌图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Spirit Totem.name: 中级灵魂图腾（Spirit Totem）
Spirit Totem.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人周围的灵魂使敌人难以见到他。非邻接野蛮人的敌人在使用远程或近战（通常是长触及武器）攻击时有20%失手率。野蛮人必须习得【次级灵魂图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Beast Totem.name: 中级野兽图腾（Beast Totem）
Beast Totem.description: 狂暴时野蛮人AC获得+1天生护甲加值。这个加值每4个野蛮人等级+1。野蛮人必须习得【次级野兽图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

Temporary Alliance.name: 临时盟约（Temporary Alliance）
Temporary Alliance.description: 在2级时，鳗鱼骑士团的骑将会获得创造与另一人有意义的（如果是暂时的）盟约的能力。以一个整轮动作，骑将能与一名智力属性4或高于4的自愿生物结盟。该生物在对抗骑将威胁的目标时，于攻击骰上获得+1增强加值，并且在对抗由那些目标创造的法术或效果时，于豁免检定上也获得+1增强加值。鳗鱼骑士团的骑将每有两级，这些加值就多持续1小时，或直到骑将与不同的生物创造一个新的盟约。同一时间，骑将只能与有一个盟约生效；如果他在现存盟约的效果下，又创造一个新的盟约，现存盟约会立即结束，而新的盟约会生效。

Near Death.name: 临近死亡（Near Death）
Near Death.description: 你在对抗对疾病，影响心灵的效果和毒药的豁免检定上获得+2洞察加值。7级该加值作用在对即死效果，睡眠效果和震慑的豁免检定上。11级该加值变为+4。

For the Faith.name: 为了信仰（For the Faith）
For the Faith.description: 8级时，骑将可以呼唤自己的信仰来支持自己的战斗。以一个自由动作，骑将可以呼喊他的神祇的名字，在1轮内获得等同于魅力修正的攻击加值。此外，30尺内的所有共同信仰的盟友也会获得他的加值的一半（最少+1）。骑将每天可使用此能力1次，12级以及之后每4级再增加1次。

For the King.name: 为了吾王（For the King）
